name: Click for Discount -Waterfront- Boat Dock-Pool
description:
Welcome to "The Plantation House"!
‚öìShort drive to the World Class Beaches of Anna Maria Island
‚öìPrivate Enclosed Heated Pool/Spa, Game Room, Boat Dock, & more!
‚öì Walk to the Palma Sola Causeway/ Jet Ski Rentals, Kayak rentals, and Horseback Riding!
‚öìClose proximity to Lakewood Ranch, Sarasota, and Tampa
‚öìFully stocked kitchen, Exterior Kitchen & 2 BBQ Grills
‚öìHigh Speed Wifi- Smart Lock for Self Check In
‚öìPool Heat included with rental

The space
Welcome to our one-of-a-kind original Palma Sola Bay home with its spectacular views. This large house oozes old Florida charm with all the modern conveniences you enjoy. The house makes you feel like you have come home the minute you pull onto the circular brick drive and see the welcoming wrap-around porch. The main house greets you with a carved wooden door high ceilings and hardwood floors.

With 5 spacious bedrooms, 4 full and 2 ¬Ω baths, Living Room, Game Room, TV Room, Dining Room, modern Kitchen with granite countertops, it will become your dream vacation spot. The detached guest suite with private entrance includes 2 additional Bedrooms, full bath with shower, Living Room and Dining area with Kitchenette. Even if you invite all your family plus some friends you will not be crowded. There are beds for 17 and fold-out couch adds 2 more. The house, yard, pool and dock area are large enough for everyone to be comfortable. Your own private retreat, this property encompasses over one acre and boasts 170 ft. of water frontage including a private dock. The backyard is a perfect playground for your family framed by native trees and wildlife. Enjoy the screened-in, custom pool and gorgeous views of Palma Sola Bay. Get a glimpse of what the original Florida was like while swinging on the porch swing surrounded by towering Banyan trees, waterside Mangroves and tropical landscaping. Watch the fish jump, porpoises and manatees swim and the birds fly in and out. Experience the beauty of our sunrises and sunsets. All the privacy you want, but only minutes to the white sands and blue waters of Holmes Beach, Anna Marie Island, Bradenton Beach and many more. Easy walking distance to the Holmes Beach Causeway, grocery stores and public transportation. Fish from the private dock that extends over 100 feet out into the Bay. Clean your catch on the aluminum fish cleaning table. Bring your kayaks and paddle boards, or put your boat in the water on one of the Causeway boat ramps and anchor it at the private dock. If you dont mind a little seaweed, there is even a small private beach area. Tired of the crowded beaches watch the kids swim in the heated, oversized pool while you relax in the bubbling water of the raised spa or lounge on the comfortable poolside furniture. The 1/2 pool bath adds to the ease of being outside. Little too much sun? cool off in the large Game Room -- its not just for the kids! Have family competitions on the arcade games --Supercade MultiGame, Multicade, Super Bikes 2, Foosball table, pool table, board and card games. Cool your thirst with a cold beverage from the convenient snack area or enjoy your favorite shows on the 55inch HD Smart TV.
The modern kitchen has plenty of counter space for more than one chef and everything you will need to prepare gourmet meals. The all new stainless-steel appliances make cooking a breeze. A large pantry completes the kitchen with lots of storage space. Dining in -- the large dining room table comfortably seats ten with additional seating for four.
Rather enjoy the Florida weather? Fire up the grill in the outdoor kitchen! Every Master grillers dream -- a 36inch FireKing grill, separate side burner, granite countertops, sink, drawer refrigerator, separate beverage cooler, storage and lots of prep space. Your audience can sip a beverage at the bar while they watch you cook. When your masterpiece is complete there is seating for ten and more in the screened in lanai.
The house is a blend of the old and new, we have added modern conveniences while maintaining the uniqueness of the older home. The downstairs master bedroom is vast high ceilings, king size bed, sitting area with 55inch TV, makeup table or desk, double doors to the porch with the gorgeous views of the Bay, private bath with double shower heads, double sinks and garden tub. The tub is surrounded by large bay windows overlooking the Bay. Motorized shades have been added for your privacy. It is the perfect place for some me time.
The TV Room with a carved wooden door can be a retreat from the noise and commotion of the rest of the house with a 65 inch HD Smart TV. It has comfortable recliners and a comfortable fold-out Queen sleeper couch that can double as a 6th Bedroom in the main house. The Living Room is a sitting room for relaxing and viewing the Bay through the double glass doors that open onto the porch. A half bath off the Living Room completes the downstairs.
The additional 4 Bedrooms, 3 full Baths and Laundry Room are Upstairs. Bedroom #2 is en-suite featuring a claw foot tub, King size bed and walk-in closet. Bedroom #3 has two twin beds, built-in shelves and storage benches with a view of the Bay and walk-in closet. Bedroom #4 has a King bed, built-in shelves and storage benches overlooking the Bay with a walk-in closet. Bedroom #5 has two Queen beds and overlooks the Bay. Bathroom #3 has double sinks featuring a pocket door that separates the sinks from the toilet and shower Bathroom #4 has double sinks, toilet and tub with shower.
Need even more room, give the young adults their own space or want your own private place to get away from it all? The completely remodeled Guest House is your answer. Make your morning coffee in the Kitchenette, sit on the balcony overlooking the Bay. Enjoy some quiet time. Inside there is seating for four and more at the Dining Room table which looks out over the Bay. The Living Room features another set of double glass doors overlooking the Bay with comfortable seating and 55inch Smart TV. Bedroom #1 has a full bunk bed on the bottom and twin bunk on the top. Bedroom #2 features a King size bed. The sparkling bathroom is state-of-the-art -- glass shower with rain shower head, all new fixtures and lots of storage space.

description:
Welcome to Palma Sola Bay House your Water Front Oasis!
‚öìShort drive to the World Class Beaches of Anna Maria Island
‚öìPrivate Heated Pool/Spa, Game Room, Boat Dock, & more!

‚öìClose proximity to Lakewood Ranch, Sarasota, and Tampa
‚öìFully stocked kitchen & BBQ Grill
‚öìPool Heat included with rental

The space
This waterfront oasis is your own private retreat, encompassing over an acre of lush lawn and tropical landscaping with over 150 ft of waterfront including a private boat dock! The property sleeps 20 guests comfortably.

Pulling up to the house you will be greeted by plenty of lovely tropical flora and a beautiful view, a peek into the backyard oasis through the jasmine-formed archway. This home welcomes you inside with its elegant brick structure and hardwood floors. As soon as you walk in you will be met by a huge wall of windows, a gourmet kitchen, and a living space that opens into the lanai.

The main house has 4 bedrooms, 3 full/2 half baths, and a large gourmet kitchen, fit for any chef. It‚Äôs fully equipped and has ample counter space for preparing large family meals! The open floor plan has a large screen TV, or just enjoy the view! The back lanai is fully screened and overlooks the pool area as well as the bay. There is ample dining space in the lanai and outside by the pool with combined table seating for 16. Enjoy morning coffee, brunches, or picturesque sunset dinners in this large and flexible space in this expansive backyard.

Located on the main floor is the primary bedroom with a King and Twin bed a full bath, a large walk-in shower, and a huge soaking tub. A second bedroom with a King bed is located just off the living room. Upstairs are 2 more bedrooms. The first has 2 Queen beds and a private bath, the other bedroom has a king bed, twin bed with a private bath. You may find the ‚Äúhidden‚Äù loft space for privacy and relaxation. Or catch a sunset on the upstairs balcony.

Just across the pool deck in a separate guest house with sleeping for up to 8 guests. The main area offers a sleeper sofa and upstairs is a Queen bunk bed and 2 twin beds and a little nook with a desk. Downstairs living space with beautiful bay views, kitchenette, full bath, and attached game room.

Bedroom 1 - King Bed, Twin bed Ensuite, Smart TV
Bedroom 2 - King Bed, Smart TV
Bedroom 3 - 2 Queen Beds, Smart TV
Bedroom 4 - King Bed, Twin bed, Smart TV

Guest House Main Area: Sleep Sofa
Guest House Upstairs Bedroom - 2 Queen Bunk Beds, 2 Twin Beds

Here to enjoy the great outdoors? The center of the outdoor activities is the 2000+ square foot travertine pool deck that surrounds the pool and spa and connects the two units. Patio chairs, loungers, tables, and shade umbrellas are located throughout the space. You will absolutely love the backyard ambiance where you will have luscious trees on either side of you with views across almost ¬Ω acre of the perfectly manicured lawn of the stunning Palma Sola Bay. The sunsets are incredible, either from the comfort of the heated pool and relaxing spa, the private dock on the pool deck, or the upstairs main house balcony. Take the path leading from the pool deck towards the bay and walk out onto the private dock where you can look out for some of the amazing wildlife or drop a line and fish right off the dock. No license is required from the dock and fishing gear is provided. Bring (or rent nearby) kayaks and paddle boards or put your boat in the water on one of the nearby Causeway boat ramps and anchor it at the private dock.

The property location is only minutes from the white sands and blue waters of Holmes Beach, Anna Maria Island, Bradenton Beach, and many more. Walking distance to the Holmes Beach Causeway, grocery stores, and public transportation. Convenient to restaurants, movies, shopping, and the local beaches, this home is perfect for those looking to enjoy all Anna Maria/Bradenton/Sarasota has to offer. Or anyone looking to escape to Paradise!

The space
This gorgeous property has been completely renovated ‚Äì inside and out, all designed with your comfort and enjoyment in mind. Your own gated, private estate! Come play in the Florida sun and relax under the swaying palm trees. This enormous property boasts 8 bedrooms, 6 full baths, 3 half baths, a game room, a private pool, a three-hole putting green, pickleball court and an outdoor kitchen.

A large circular driveway leads you to the unique, lovely double doors of the main house where you will find a large dining room and combined kitchen that overlooks the pool and gorgeous courtyard. The dining room table seats ten and the large kitchen bar seats even more. The kitchen has all new state-of-the-art appliances and everything else you will need to prepare gourmet meals.

This house is designed for entertaining lots of family and friends! The kitchen and dining room with a half bath are conveniently located in the middle of this sprawling home. One side features a master suite with private gorgeous bath, and three bedrooms that share a large full bath. The other side includes a bunk room, full bath, and enormous game room.

Follow the winding shell stone path to discover the guest house with three bedrooms all featuring beautiful ensuite full baths. Add the additional half bath, large kitchen bar with seating and you have the perfect retreat for parents, grandparents, or teenagers who want a place to hang out. Each bedroom has its own outside entrance with seating on the patio to enjoy a morning cup of coffee or an evening night cap.

The jewel of this estate is the slice of paradise between the main house and the guest house. Surrounded by lush landscaping and towering palms, this secluded, tranquil haven makes the perfect spot for entertaining or just relaxing. The oversized pool is surrounded by a patio and a courtyard of shell stone. Need a little shade or a beverage, amble over to the gazebo and grab a cold drink from the outdoor kitchen and a seat at the surrounding bar. Keep the kids busy and the adults too with the 3-hole golf putting green. A gorgeous pool bath and outdoor shower have been added for your convenience. After you have grilled the perfect steaks on the large grill, the day is done and you‚Äôre ready to relax for the evening, sink into the bubbling seven-person hot tub.

The massive game room is perfect for entertaining the young and not so young ‚Äì something for everyone! Relax in comfortable recliners while watching the four TV‚Äôs. The billiard table, foosball table, gaming stations are waiting for you to begin your fun. There are board games for every age group if you want something a little quieter. The shaded patio, pool, and courtyard are just steps away through the French doors.

There is even a quiet room with comfy recliner and couch if you need a little me time away from all the commotion.

The laundry room in the main house has an additional full-size refrigerator and washer and dryer. The guest house also has a full-size washer and dryer. To make sure your beverages are always cold, the property also has two two-drawer refrigerators, two beverage coolers and the guest house has an additional smaller refrigerator.

The expansive parking area is beyond compare ‚Äì large circular driveway for basic parking or enter through the double gates in the front and exit out the back through the additional gate. Plenty of parking for your RV or boat.

You are within walking distance of the Robinson Preserve and De Soto National Memorial. For relaxation and entertainment, it does not get any better than this property ‚Äì unparalleled privacy minutes from the blue waters and white sands of the Gulf, and all the amenities you would like at your fingertips.

And yes, there really are more than 75 palms on this estate!

The single-family home is located in Bradenton and is situated in a community called "Sabal Harbor". The location is perfect for travelers who are looking to not only travel to the wonderful white sandy beaches of the Gulf Coast but also a close drive to Lakewood Ranch, Sarasota, and I-75. The property is conveniently located close to Publix, Starbucks, WAWA, and several restaurants in the area!

A Wave From It All is a very spacious home with plenty of room for entertaining and has a refreshing ocean vibe throughout the whole house. The rear bedroom offers a king bed as well as a separate bathroom that is shared with the exterior pool area. All of the bedrooms come with smart TVs for your enjoyment!

Welcome to Cortez Cabana!
‚öìShort drive to the World Class Beaches of Anna Maria Island

The space
Escape to paradise at the "Cortez Cabana" in this stunning 5-bedroom, 3-bathroom fully renovated pool home located on a picturesque canal in the beautiful Palma Sola Bay in Bradenton, Florida. Whether you're seeking a family retreat or a gathering of friends, this luxurious short-term rental promises an unforgettable experience! It is a boater's paradise with a boat dock large enough for a 30' boat (Boatlift in pictures is not available to renters). With no bridges to the bay by boat and just minutes away from the most popular beaches in the area, this renovated pool home is the perfect destination point to enjoy everything the area has to offer!

Walking into the property you will immediately notice the homey, modern decor of the property that is accentuated by the natural lighting that flows through the large windows and glass doors. The home has a spacious open floor plan with a living room, kitchen, dining room, and family room all combined which offers a gorgeous view that overlooks the pool and canal.

In this renovated kitchen, the chef is always in the center of things, with a large island, a new cooktop, and all new appliances. The dining room accommodates a table for six and the kitchen island offers seating for 6 as well. Just off the dining room, you will find the family room with a Roku Smart TV which boasts the view outside and seamlessly blends together with the pool deck via the sliding glass doors.

When heading outdoors, you will notice a plentiful supply of seating to make lounging by the pool a breeze. There is also a dining set outside for dinners by the water or for quick snacks during fun at the pool. This pool faces west so it will be a great place to hang out at the end of the day and catch the beautiful sunsets that Florida has to offer.

Trying to figure out sleeping arrangements? This property offers a split floor plan with the master bedroom suite and 2 more bedrooms on the right side of the home and the other 2 bedrooms on the left side of the home. All bedrooms come equipped with Roku Smart TVs to make sure you don't miss your favorite shows or movies. The master suite sits at the back of the home with access to the pool area and provides a king bed and sleek ensuite bathroom with double vanity. Two more bedrooms sit on the right side of the home. Both are appointed with queen beds and share the bathroom in the hallway which has a shower-tub combo and double vanity sinks. On the other side of the home, you will find the last two bedrooms; the first is equipped with a queen bed/ full trundle bed and the other contains two queen beds, these two rooms share the third bathroom which can be found in the hallway between the rooms. This bathroom is finished with a shower and also has dual vanity sinks.

Fifth Bedroom: One Queen Bed. Smart TV

Since no Florida getaway would be complete without direct water access - the dock is the perfect place to tie up your boat, fish, or soak in the pleasure of the sunsets. The community of San Remo Shores is known locally as a boating community with fishing and boating right in your backyard. What more could you ask for? Or grab a few chairs and your favorite cocktail and watch the dolphins play right off the dock seawall. Whatever your water calling, you will find it here.

Looking to explore the town? There is a myriad of options for both shopping and dining within minutes of the property and plenty of sites to see nearby like:

Anna Maria Island

The space

Guest access
Guests will have access to entire house except owner's closets.

Other things to note
By booking with us you're agreeing to our following terms and conditions.

SMOKING/ VAPING: Smoking and vaping is STRICTLY PROHIBITED in the house. This includes e-cigarettes. Smoking is allowed in the back yard with the door closed. Cigarette butts must be picked up. The VIOLATION FEE is $500.


MUSIC & NOISE: Parties/Events are not allowed. No rowdy or loud music at any time.


QUIET HOURS: You are vacationing in a residential area and quiet hours are from 10:00pm to 8:00am. Noise levels are strictly enforced after 10pm. Per city ordinance, maximum permissible noise levels are 65 decibels between 8am and 10pm. Maximum permissible noise levels between 10pm and 8am are 50 decibels. Guests are responsible for any fines if police are called.

PETS: Prior approval is required. We allow up to 3 dogs, $200/each per stay. Must be fully house trained, and vaccinated prior to arrival. Must be completely cleaned up after. Leashed at all times when not in the fenced area. Crated indoors when not home with pets. If barking becomes an issue for our immediate neighbors, alternative arrangements must be made. Pets are not allowed on furniture, bedding, or inside the pool and spa.


MAXIMUM OCCUPANCY: The maximum number of guests is 18. Any other person in the property is the sole responsibility of guest. Guest agrees that any additional persons without approval shall be considered as default and will be asked to vacate the premises with no refund.


CHECK IN AND CHECK OUT: Check in is after 4pm. Check out is 10:00am. Guests with unauthorized late check out will be charged $50 per 30 minute increment after 10:00am, plus additional charge if it results in canceling of incoming guests.


USE OF PROPERTY: Keep the property, appliances, and all furnishings in good order. Guests may not make any changes to the property and must put furnishings back to its original placement if moved.


MINIMUM AGE REQUIREMENTS: We take reservations only from adult guests age 25 and older. The Guest who reserves the property must be on site the full duration of your stay.

PARKING: Parking is limited to 4 vehicles. Vehicles are to be parked in the driveway. Parking on the road is not permitted. Illegally parked cars are subject to towing; applicable fines/towing fees are the sole responsibility of the vehicle owner.


POOl/SPA: No glass product whatsoever in or around the pool or spa. Our pool and spa are serviced twice weekly. We make every attempt to keep the pool/spa as clean as possible, but it is not unusual to find unexpected debris or some mineral stains in the pool/spa because it‚Äôs located outdoor. Guest have the option to purchase pool heat, which includes spa heat, for $35 per day. The pool/spa settings are all on schedule. Pool heat is set to 85 degrees and 95 degrees for spa after purchase. However, if air temps drop below 60 degrees it can affect pool temperature, so unfortunately pool temperatures cannot be guaranteed. No refund, discount, credit, and/or rate adjustments can be given for circumstances beyond our control. GUEST ACKNOWLEDGES THAT POOLS/SPA ARE INHERENTLY DANGEROUS, AND GUEST HEREBY ACCEPTS ALL RISK OF PERSONAL INJURY OR DEATH FROM THE USE OF THE POOL OR SPA AND SHALL HOLD PROPERTY OWNERS HARMLESS FROM ANY SUCH INJURY OR DEATH.


AIR CONDITIONING: Keep all sliders, doors, and windows closed when the air conditioning system is on. Do not adjust below 71 degrees as AC coil will freeze up.

HOUSEKEEPING: There is no daily housekeeping service.

GARBAGE: Garbage is collected Wednesdays. Recycling is collected on Thursday. Our local team will take out the trash bins the night before they are scheduled for pick up, and return them afterwards.


WILDLIFE/PEST: Pest controls are scheduled quarterly, however we sometimes expect some unwanted visitors from nature.


CANDLES: Use of candles are prohibited due to fire safety hazards.


GAS GRILL: Grill and tank are provided, please refill propane at local Publix or CVS as needed. Please empty grease drip tray, turn off the gas valve securely after each use.


FIRE PIT: Turn off the gas valve securely after each use. Guest are responsible to refill propane tank at local Publix or CVS as needed.


RIGHT OF ENTRY: Upon 24 hours notice, owner or owner‚Äôs representative(s), have the right to enter the home for the purpose of showing the property to prospective tenants or purchasers, to make repairs, or to inspect the property. Owner, property manager, and/or its Representatives have immediate right of entry in cases of emergency, or to protect or preserve the premises.

We take great pride in maintaining our property to ensure that our guests have a comfortable and enjoyable stay. To that end, we have scheduled maintenance tasks that we would like to inform you about.

‚Ä¢ Our pool is cleaned twice a week, on Mondays and Thursdays.

‚Ä¢ Our landscaper comes once a week on Thursdays.

‚Ä¢ We also have a scheduled quarterly lawn-care pest control service, although we cannot guarantee the specific days this will occur as it depends on the vendor's schedule.

Our maintenance schedule may change due to weather or other unforeseen circumstances. If any changes do occur, we will do our best to inform you in advance.


MAINTENANCE: Owner shall be responsible for maintaining the home unless damage is caused by the Guest‚Äôs misuse or neglect. Guest agrees that no rent reduction or abatement will be given unless the property is deemed to be completely uninhabitable. Owner will order repairs in a timely manner once notice is given by Guest, but owner has no control over the scheduling availability of vendors. Owner shall not be liable for any losses or damages, including incidental or consequential damages, including those caused by owner‚Äôs failure to perform repairs and maintain the home. All personal property of the Guests kept on the premises is at risk of the Guest. Non-scheduled pool cleans will be the responsibility of the guest(s).


LIABILITY/RISK: The Owners are not responsible for any accidents, injuries or illness that occurs while on the premises. The Owners are not responsible for any accidents, injuries, or illness that occurs off the premises while using equipment provided as part of the rental, such as beach chairs, bikes, beach umbrellas, and beach wagon. The Owners are not responsible for the loss of personal belongings or valuables of the guest. By accepting this reservation, it is agreed that all guests are expressly assuming the risk of any harm arising, including death, from their use of the premises and equipment taken off the premises. This applies to others whom the guest invites to use the premises or equipment.

name: Newly Remodeled Palma Sola Bay Getaway!
description:
We completely remodeled this awesome Palma Sola Getaway (PSG) house with all the important amenities for your vacation. With 3 master suites and 3 large bedrooms with bunk beds. Palma Sola Getaway will suit smaller groups that like a wide open, large and luxurious space, or a big extended family getaway.

Every possible amenity , great location, and private walking path to access Palma Sola Bay gives our guests plenty of options for spending their vacation days.

The space
We completely remodeled this awesome Palma Sola Getaway (PSG) house with all the important amenities for your vacation. With 3 master suites and 3 large bedrooms with bunk beds. Palma Sola Getaway will suit smaller groups that like a wide open, large and luxurious space, or a big extended family getaway. PSG has 14 beds and we can hold 20 guests depending on sleeping configuration ! We have an amazing outside heated pool and spa, complete with a bar and 2 outside TV's. If you are there for the water, we have private water access right across the street for kayaks and paddleboards that we provide,. PSG is a mere 5-7 minutes away from the amazing Gulf beaches on Anna Maria Island, and 1 mile from a very nice tidal beach on Palma Sola Bay that would be great for toddlers.

Our location couldn't be better no matter what your preference for food. Countless restaurants within a few minutes drive, and 2 grocery stores within a mile if you're staying in..

For the fisherman, some of the best fishing around is right in front of our private Palma Sola Bay access. Local's and charter guides are there almost daily. Redfish, Sea Trout, Snook and Sheepshead patrol the shallows constantly. Ladyfish are very plentiful. Not a good eating fish, but good fighters on light/medium tackle. We have plenty of poles and basic tackle. Bait shops are near by. There are also 3 public access fishing spots within walking distance.

For the golfers... Bradenton, Sarasota, and nearby Lakewood Ranch have plenty of excellent courses. You wont have to drive more that 40 minutes to get all the golf you can handle.

For those traveling with small children we have you taken care of. Our largest bedroom we call our "family suite". Within it, not only do we have crib/ toddler bed, but there is a connected min-bedroom with twin bunk beds.

If the weather doesn't cooperate, this 7000 sf home has plenty to do inside:

privacy fenced back yard and pool area

7 TV's with Spectrum Gold, TV Plus, and Sling = over 400 channels

400mg Wireless Internet

Ping Pong Table

Pool Table

Shuffleboard Table

FoozBall table

Dart Board

Corn Hole

Board Games

Poker chips and cards

Fitness room

Business Center

2 outdoor grills

3 covered patios

12' dining table

2 refrigerators

2 washer/dryers

Pizza oven

Plenty of wine and liquor glasses

X-Box and assortment of games.

6 Bikes and helmets

Toddler/bed crib

Height Chairs

Other things to note
Please note that we have 2 additional fees.

The first is for pets. $30/per night per pet, (max 2 pets), and pets are only allowed on the lower level. This is the main entertainment level that goes out to the pool, so shouldn't be an issue.

The second is a $200 energy/electric fee per week . This is a big pool and spa, and a house with 5 AC units. Heating the pool for guests in the winter and cooling the house in the summer is a massive expense.. $200/week does not come close to covering it, but it allows us to better even out nightly pricing.

These fees need to be paid before accessing the property and are not always included in the AIRBNB price.

description:
Welcome to Picasa by Stayawhilewithus ‚Äî a Mediterranean-style 5BR/4BA golf-front retreat on over an acre in one of Sarasota‚Äôs most desirable locations. Minutes to Siesta & Lido Beaches, Downtown, St. Armands, and SRQ. Enjoy a resort backyard with resurfaced heated pool & spa (Oct 2025), pickleball court, and firepit, plus elegant interiors with a chef‚Äôs kitchen, game room, and spacious bedrooms for families, golf groups, and wedding guests.

The space
‚ú¶ The Space ‚ú¶

Location meets elegant at Picasa, set in one of Sarasota‚Äôs most desirable spots. Just minutes to Siesta Key and Lido Key beaches, Downtown Sarasota, St. Armands Circle, and SRQ Airport, this retreat keeps you close to the best dining, shopping, golf, wedding venues, and cultural attractions.

On over an acre of land, the backyard feels like your own private resort. Relax in the heated pool & spa (resurfaced Oct 2025), play on the full-size pickleball court, or gather around the firepit with sweeping views of Sara Bay Golf Course and the tranquil waters of Bowlees Creek. description:
Make memories that will last a lifetime while vacationing at this massive, amenity filled family estate situated just a short distance away from the breathtaking beaches of Anna Maria Island. Immerse yourself in the radiant sunshine within the enchanting backyard then take a refreshing dip in the in the expansive heated pool. With six bedrooms, three bathrooms, and accommodations for up to 18 guests, there's ample room for your entire family to unwind and reconnect.

The space

‚òÄ 3 minutes to Robinson Nature Preserve

‚òÜ‚òÜ BEDROOMS ‚òÜ‚òÜ

‚òÄ Bedroom 6: The Aztec Adventure room with 4 custom built twin bunk beds


‚òÜ‚òÜ BATHROOMS ‚òÜ‚òÜ

Indulge in the convenience of three immaculate bathrooms, each designed to cater to your group's comfort. These well-maintained spaces offer private sanctuaries for your refreshment.
The primary suite boasts an exquisite ensuite bathroom, accessed directly from the primary bedroom. It features a spacious walk-in shower and a vanity equipped with dual sinks, providing both luxury and functionality.
The second full bathroom is easily accessible from the second king bedroom and the main living area, ensuring convenience for all. Its walk-in shower offers both style and utility.
Additionally, the third bathroom is a versatile gem, offering both a walk-in shower and a vanity with dual sinks. Not only does it serve as a convenient bathroom for guests, but it also functions as a convenient pool bath, making it a multifunctional space that caters to all your needs.

‚òÜ‚òÜ KITCHEN & LOUNGE ‚òÜ‚òÜ


In this expansive home, family life naturally gravitates towards the inviting open living areas. The primary living room, conveniently adjacent to the kitchen, serves as a cozy gathering spot for friends and family to snuggle up and enjoy a movie on the 65‚Äù smart TV ‚Äì effortlessly connect to your preferred streaming platform with your personal account for entertainment at your fingertips.

For those seeking more entertainment options, the secondary living room is equipped with a generous 75‚Äù smart TV and an Xbox One S, promising endless fun and excitement.

The fully stocked kitchen is a haven for the culinary enthusiast in your group. Adorned with exquisite granite countertops and top-of-the-line stainless-steel appliances, it provides all the comforts of home for your cooking endeavors. Abundant utensils and dishware are at your disposal, ensuring you have everything necessary to prepare delightful meals.

A spacious kitchen island offers ample room for food preparation, as well as a convenient space for casual dining or sipping morning coffee. Simply pull up one of the stools and relish the moment.

Adjacent to the kitchen, you'll discover the "formal" dining room ‚Äì though, in reality, it's anything but formal! This welcoming space revolves around a beautiful granite dining table, accommodating up to 10 guests in comfort. What's more, it seamlessly leads to the patio, granting effortless access to delightful al fresco dining experiences.


‚òÜ‚òÜ OUTSIDE SPACE ‚òÜ‚òÜ

Florida, famously known as the Sunshine State, beckons you to relish the great outdoors, and this private backyard paradise embraces the state's sunny reputation. Immaculately landscaped, it boasts a full-size volleyball court for active fun, a children's playground for the little ones, and a serene sandy lounge area adorned with a hammock and Adirondack chairs, ideal for relaxation.

Beat the Florida heat with a refreshing dip in the inviting heated pool, where you can lounge on sunbeds to bask in the warmth or take a break from the sun under the shade of the covered patio. This tropical haven caters to everyone, including small children, ensuring a delightful escape for all.

The covered patio is the heart of outdoor entertainment, a space designed for your entire family to gather and unwind. Savor the breeze from the ceiling fan as you dine at the outdoor table, where you can savor a barbecue in comfort. Grab your favorite cocktail or cold beverage and catch the big game or an outdoor movie on the flat-screen TV‚Äîan entertainment hub for unforgettable moments.

Vacations should be hassle-free, and convenient doorstep parking can make all the difference. This beautiful home is nestled in a serene neighborhood, offering free parking in the driveway for up to 6 cars.

Bradenton, often referred to as the "friendly city" by locals, welcomes you with an array of family-friendly activities just a short drive from this spacious family retreat. It serves as an ideal beach base, with the stunning beaches of Anna Maria Island a brief car ride away. To make your beach experience even more enjoyable, we provide beach gear, including a cooler, chairs, an umbrella, and beach towels, ensuring a stress-free and fun-filled day by the ocean!


‚òÜ‚òÜ FOR THE KIDS ‚òÜ‚òÜ
Traveling with little ones? We got you covered! We know it can be challenging taking your young ones on vacation which is why we supply all the basic necessities to the accommodate the needs of all age groups, including:

Escape to Bonjour AMI, a grand 5000 sq. ft. home, where elegance meets relaxation. Located just a short stroll from the serene Palma Sola Bay and Causeway Park, and less than 5 miles from the pristine beaches of Anna Maria Island, this BRAND NEW luxury retreat offers game rooms, resort-style pool and spa, and endless amenities for your extraordinary vacations!

The space
Our Bonjour AMI is perfect for multigenerational families, business groups, multiple couples, snowbirds, sports tournaments teams, or anyone desiring a spacious expanse to unwind in style. Whether you're basking in the sun by the pool, enjoying a friendly game night, fishing, or catching stunning sunsets at the bay a short walk away, our home promises an unforgettable experience. BOOK NOW and elevate your coastal getaway to the next level of luxury with Bonjour AMI!

‚≠ê WHERE YOU'LL SLEEP

With 5 spacious bedrooms, including a private mother-in-law master suite, 4.5 baths and 3 sets of washer/dryer, our home will be the perfect getaway for you and your family! We can comfortably accommodate a family of 14 at Bonjour AMI.

You‚Äôll find whatever you may need in our kitchen, from a blender and a toaster to both an espresso and drip coffee maker (we of course offer complimentary ground coffee and sugar).

Additionally, our kitchen boasts a marble countertop island, with 8 barstools and a window overlooking the main entrance, where the pool/billiard table is located.

Experience Bradenton, Florida, like never before at this stunning, brand-new 2,600 sq. ft. retreat. Perfectly designed for families and friends, this spacious 5-bedroom, 3-bathroom home comfortably accommodates up to 13 guests ‚Äì including a versatile walk-through bedroom for added flexibility.

The space
As you arrive at Bayside Bungalow, you're greeted by an inviting open floor-plan living area and a spacious fenced backyard, perfect for lounging around and soaking up the golden rays of the Florida sun. It's a scene straight out of a vacation dream.

Our family-friendly retreat is just a short drive from the stunning beaches of Anna Maria Island. Soak in the sunshine in our expansive backyard and take a dip in the large heated pool‚Äîit's the perfect recipe for relaxation.

Guest access
Guests will have access to entire house except owner's closets.

Other things to note
By booking with us you're agreeing to our following terms and conditions.

SMOKING/ VAPING: Smoking and vaping is STRICTLY PROHIBITED in the house. This includes e-cigarettes. Smoking is allowed in the back yard with the door closed. Cigarette butts must be picked up. The VIOLATION FEE is $500.


MUSIC & NOISE: Parties/Events are not allowed. No rowdy or loud music at any time.


QUIET HOURS: You are vacationing in a residential area and quiet hours are from 10:00pm to 8:00am. Noise levels are strictly enforced after 10pm. Per city ordinance, maximum permissible noise levels are 65 decibels between 8am and 10pm. Maximum permissible noise levels between 10pm and 8am are 50 decibels. Guests are responsible for any fines if police are called.

PETS: Prior approval is required. We allow up to 3 dogs, $200/each per stay. Must be fully house trained, and vaccinated prior to arrival. Must be completely cleaned up after. Leashed at all times when not in the fenced area. Crated indoors when not home with pets. If barking becomes an issue for our immediate neighbors, alternative arrangements must be made. Pets are not allowed on furniture, bedding, or inside the pool and spa.


MAXIMUM OCCUPANCY: The maximum number of guests is 18. Any other person in the property is the sole responsibility of guest. Guest agrees that any additional persons without approval shall be considered as default and will be asked to vacate the premises with no refund.


CHECK IN AND CHECK OUT: Check in is after 4pm. Check out is 10:00am. Guests with unauthorized late check out will be charged $50 per 30 minute increment after 10:00am, plus additional charge if it results in canceling of incoming guests.


USE OF PROPERTY: Keep the property, appliances, and all furnishings in good order. Guests may not make any changes to the property and must put furnishings back to its original placement if moved.


MINIMUM AGE REQUIREMENTS: We take reservations only from adult guests age 25 and older. The Guest who reserves the property must be on site the full duration of your stay.

PARKING: Parking is limited to 4 vehicles. Vehicles are to be parked in the driveway. Parking on the road is not permitted. Illegally parked cars are subject to towing; applicable fines/towing fees are the sole responsibility of the vehicle owner.


POOl/SPA: No glass product whatsoever in or around the pool or spa. Our pool and spa are serviced twice weekly. We make every attempt to keep the pool/spa as clean as possible, but it is not unusual to find unexpected debris or some mineral stains in the pool/spa because it‚Äôs located outdoor. Guest have the option to purchase pool heat, which includes spa heat, for $35 per day. The pool/spa settings are all on schedule. Pool heat is set to 85 degrees and 95 degrees for spa after purchase. However, if air temps drop below 60 degrees it can affect pool temperature, so unfortunately pool temperatures cannot be guaranteed. No refund, discount, credit, and/or rate adjustments can be given for circumstances beyond our control. GUEST ACKNOWLEDGES THAT POOLS/SPA ARE INHERENTLY DANGEROUS, AND GUEST HEREBY ACCEPTS ALL RISK OF PERSONAL INJURY OR DEATH FROM THE USE OF THE POOL OR SPA AND SHALL HOLD PROPERTY OWNERS HARMLESS FROM ANY SUCH INJURY OR DEATH.


AIR CONDITIONING: Keep all sliders, doors, and windows closed when the air conditioning system is on. Do not adjust below 71 degrees as AC coil will freeze up.

HOUSEKEEPING: There is no daily housekeeping service.

GARBAGE: Garbage is collected Monday and Thursday (except for holidays). Recycling is collected on Wednesday. Our local team will take out the trash bins the night before they are scheduled for pick up, and return them afterwards.


WILDLIFE/PEST: Pest controls are scheduled quarterly, however we sometimes expect some unwanted visitors from nature.


CANDLES: Use of candles are prohibited due to fire safety hazards.


GAS GRILL: Grill and tank are provided, please refill propane at local Publix or CVS as needed. Please empty grease drip tray, turn off the gas valve securely after each use.


FIRE PIT: Turn off the gas valve securely after each use. Guest are responsible to refill propane tank at local Publix or CVS as needed.


RIGHT OF ENTRY: Upon 24 hours notice, owner or owner‚Äôs representative(s), have the right to enter the home for the purpose of showing the property to prospective tenants or purchasers, to make repairs, or to inspect the property. Owner, property manager, and/or its Representatives have immediate right of entry in cases of emergency, or to protect or preserve the premises.

We take great pride in maintaining our property to ensure that our guests have a comfortable and enjoyable stay. To that end, we have scheduled maintenance tasks that we would like to inform you about.

‚Ä¢ Our pool is cleaned twice a week, on Mondays and Thursdays.

‚Ä¢ Our landscaper comes once a week on Thursdays.

‚Ä¢ We also have a scheduled quarterly lawn-care pest control service, although we cannot guarantee the specific days this will occur as it depends on the vendor's schedule.

Our maintenance schedule may change due to weather or other unforeseen circumstances. If any changes do occur, we will do our best to inform you in advance.


MAINTENANCE: Owner shall be responsible for maintaining the home unless damage is caused by the Guest‚Äôs misuse or neglect. Guest agrees that no rent reduction or abatement will be given unless the property is deemed to be completely uninhabitable. Owner will order repairs in a timely manner once notice is given by Guest, but owner has no control over the scheduling availability of vendors. Owner shall not be liable for any losses or damages, including incidental or consequential damages, including those caused by owner‚Äôs failure to perform repairs and maintain the home. All personal property of the Guests kept on the premises is at risk of the Guest. Non-scheduled pool cleans will be the responsibility of the guest(s).


LIABILITY/RISK: The Owners are not responsible for any accidents, injuries or illness that occurs while on the premises. The Owners are not responsible for any accidents, injuries, or illness that occurs off the premises while using equipment provided as part of the rental, such as beach chairs, bikes, beach umbrellas, and beach wagon. The Owners are not responsible for the loss of personal belongings or valuables of the guest. By accepting this reservation, it is agreed that all guests are expressly assuming the risk of any harm arising, including death, from their use of the premises and equipment taken off the premises. This applies to others whom the guest invites to use the premises or equipment.

TERMS AND CONDITIONS OF RENTAL

Indoors, enjoy the stylish game room with Pac-Man arcade, shuffleboard, foosball, toys, and board games. It‚Äôs the perfect setup for families, sports teams, and multigenerational groups.

Guests also love the short distance to Anna Maria Island‚Äôs beaches (8 miles), Downtown Bradenton (6 miles), and Sarasota‚Äôs cultural attractions (11 miles), with grocery stores, fresh markets, coffee shops, and dining just minutes away.


‚ú¶ Why Guests Love Champion Retreat ‚ú¶

‚úîÔ∏è Prime Location ‚Äî 0.4 miles to IMG Academy Golf Club, 3.4 miles to IMG Academy, 8 miles to Anna Maria Island beaches, and 6 miles to Downtown Bradenton.

Whether you‚Äôre here for sports, business, or leisure, Champion Retreat delivers the ideal blend of luxury, convenience, and relaxation. From training days at IMG to family fun nights in the game room, or soaking up the Gulf Coast lifestyle at Anna Maria Island ‚Äî this home is your all-in-one retreat.

BOOK NOW and elevate your Bradenton getaway with the unique prestige and comfort of Champion Retreat!


‚ú¶ Where You‚Äôll Sleep ‚ú¶

Champion Retreat offers 5 bedrooms, 4.5 bathrooms, and a private office, comfortably hosting up to 14 guests. Each bedroom is styled with a sports-inspired name to celebrate the home‚Äôs athletic heritage and proximity to IMG Academy.

- Master Bedroom: The Champion‚Äôs Suite, with a King bed, a chaise lounge, and an ensuite bathroom.

- Bedroom 5 ‚Äì The Athlete‚Äôs Loft, with a Twin-over-full bunk bed, and a daybed with a trundle.

- Private Office: Quiet workspace with desk & high-speed Wi-Fi.


‚ú¶ Kitchen & Dining ‚ú¶

Guests rave about the chef-inspired, fully equipped kitchen ‚Äî making group meals easy and enjoyable. Both an espresso machine and a drip coffee maker (with complimentary coffee and sugar) keep everyone fueled, while plenty of dinnerware and cooking essentials make dining together effortless.

Book your stay at Champion Retreat today and experience the luxury, comfort, and fun that guests consistently rave about ‚Äî the perfect Bradenton base for sports, beaches, culture, and unforgettable family memories.

Guest access

Other things to note
üåü PET FRIENDLY!

- Prior approval is kindly required. We allow up to 3 dogs for an additional fee of $150/pet/stay.

- Must be completely cleaned up after.

Kindly Note!

- For your peace of mind, surveillance cameras are located around the exterior of the house (by the front door, overlooking the driveway, and overlooking the pool equipment - none near the pool though). No inside cameras.

- Noise monitors inside and outside the house do not record voice or conversation, they only monitor decibels.

- We provide free parking on the premises (our driveway fits up to 3 cars, and if needed, only 1 car can be parked on the curbside).

- Guests are responsible for refilling the BBQ grill‚Äôs propane tank.

If you would like to purchase the pool heating feature, please note that it covers the entirety of your stay, and the pool heater may take up to 48 hours to reach the desired temp, so kindly let us know a week before you check-in.

- For your comfort, our home is treated quarterly by a professional pest control company. But given our tropical climate, you may still see the occasional bug. Please keep doors and screens closed to help prevent bugs from entering, as no compensation will be provided for any bugs that may come inside.

- Liability/Risk: The hosts/co-hosts are not responsible for any accidents, injuries or illness that occurs while ON or OFF premises while using equipment provided as part of the rental, including but not limited to pool, spas, stairs or playsets. By accepting this reservation, it is agreed that all guests are expressly assuming the risk of any harm arising from their use of the premises and equipment taken off the premises. This also applies to others whom the guest invites to use the premises or equipment.

PEST NOTICE:
Florida is very tropical. Mosquito, Lizards, Ants, Cockroaches, Beetles, and Rodents are very prevalent in this part of the world. We live in their environment. The space

description:
‚òÄ 4 minutes to Robinson Nature Preserve

The space
Gather your family and prepare to make memories at the Poppin Pineapple. This luxurious home with resort-style amenities is conveniently located just a short distance away from the stunning shores of Anna Maria Island. Immerse yourself in the radiant sunshine of the captivating backyard, then cool off with a revitalizing swim in the spacious heated pool. Boasting 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, and room for up to 12 guests, there's plenty of space for everyone to kick back, relax, and have some fun!

KEY FEATURES:
‚òÄ 3 spacious bedrooms
‚òÄ 2 pristine bathrooms
‚òÄ Private tropical paradise w/ hot tub + heated pool + gas BBQ grill
‚òÄ Incredible resort style backyard w/ Pickleball + Mini-Put + bocce ball
‚òÄ Awesome game room with ping pong + pool table + Arcade
‚òÄ Family-friendly: pack ‚Äòn‚Äô play + stroller + high chair, + kids‚Äô dinnerware
‚òÄ Fully-stocked kitchen w/ stainless steel appliances
‚òÄ 3 LED flat-screen smart TVs
‚òÄ Plenty of beach gear including chairs, towels, an umbrella, cooler & a beach cart
‚òÄ Free parking for up to 6 cars in the driveway
‚òÄ Washer + dryer
‚òÄ Fast wifi


‚òÜ‚òÜ BEDROOMS ‚òÜ‚òÜ

Each of the 3 beautiful bedrooms have been thoughtfully furnished to cater to your entire group. Crisp, clean linens, luxurious, soft furnishings, and many practical touches ensure your vacation is not only carefree but comfortable too.

Where you'll sleep

‚òÄ Bedroom 1 (The Master Suite): 1 King bed with ensuite bathroom
‚òÄ Bedroom 2: 1 Queen bed
‚òÄ Bedroom 3: Bunk Room ‚Äì 1 Queen Bed & 1 Full Bed & 1 Twin
‚òÄ Common Area ‚Äì 1 Queen Air Mattress & 1 Single Bed


‚òÜ‚òÜ BATHROOMS ‚òÜ‚òÜ

Experience the convenience of two pristine bathrooms, each meticulously designed to enhance your group's comfort. These impeccably maintained spaces serve as private retreats for your rejuvenation.

The primary suite features an exquisite ensuite bathroom directly accessible from the master bedroom. It showcases a spacious walk-in glass shower and a generously sized vanity with dual sinks, blending luxury with practicality.

The second bathroom, conveniently situated near the guest bedrooms, offers a combination tub and shower and vanity with dual sinks, combining style with functionality for all.


‚òÜ‚òÜ KITCHEN & LOUNGE ‚òÜ‚òÜ

The fully loaded kitchen is a haven for the culinary enthusiast in your group. It's adorned with beautiful granite countertops and top-of-the-line stainless-steel appliances, offering all the comforts of home for your culinary adventures. You'll find an abundance of utensils and dishware at your disposal, ensuring you have everything you need to prepare delightful meals.

Adjacent to the kitchen, the dining room awaits. This inviting space centers around a gorgeous dining table that comfortably accommodates up to 12 guests. What's more, just off the dining room the sliding glass doors open seamlessly to the pool patio, providing easy access to a delightful al fresco dining experiences with additional seating for 6.

The living room is a comfortable space for gathering, offering a variety of cozy seating options. This snug gathering spot offers plenty of room for friends and family to enjoy classic board games or cuddle up and watch a movie on the 55‚Äù smart TV. You can effortlessly connect to your preferred streaming platform with your personal account, ensuring entertainment is right at your fingertips.


‚òÜ‚òÜ OUTSIDE SPACE ‚òÜ‚òÜ

Step through the back patio doors, and you'll immediately be immersed in the lavish ambiance reminiscent of a 5-Star Resort. The initial panoramic view features an expansive and inviting pool and hot tub, accompanied by a comfortable dining table for six and multiple seating areas in both sun and shade‚Äîeach carefully designed to offer a variety of options for relaxation, unwinding, and complete immersion in the serene surroundings.

Take a refreshing plunge into the crystal-clear waters of the heated pool, a year-round delight catering to invigorating swims, morning laps, or leisurely floats. Afterwards, unwind and soothe your senses in the adjacent private hot tub, where the bubbling warmth creates a perfect oasis for relaxation and tranquility.

But the allure of this remarkable property extends beyond the poolside haven. Engage in various activities, including pickleball, a versatile sport that combines elements of tennis, badminton, and ping pong, suitable for all skill levels and guaranteeing hours of entertainment. The newly constructed pickleball court features a 16‚Äô x 38‚Äô playing area with a total court surface of 20‚Äô x 44‚Äô. If that‚Äôs not enough, refine your putting skills on our exclusive mini-putt golf course‚Äîan enjoyable way to elevate your short game while enjoying the company of friends and family. For an extra dose of excitement, challenge your luck and skill on the expansive bocce ball court.


‚òÜ‚òÜ GAME ROOM ‚òÜ‚òÜ

Escape the sun and shoot a game of pool, play some ping pong or throw some darts in our AMAZING Game Room! Video games more your style? The game room also has a Retro Arcade system featuring all of your favorited video games from the 80's such as Mrs. PacMan and Frogger. Equipped with a bar top and 4 stools where the team bartender can craft delicious cocktails, the game room is a fun place for people of all ages.


‚òÜ‚òÜ FOR THE KIDS ‚òÜ‚òÜ

Traveling with little ones? We got you covered! We know it can be challenging taking your young ones on vacation which is why we supply all the basic necessities to the accommodate the needs of all age groups, including:

‚òÄ Pack n Play
‚òÄ Stroller
‚òÄ Highchair
‚òÄ Sippy cups
‚òÄ Kids dinnerware
‚òÄ BUNK BEDS!!!


‚òÜ‚òÜ FOR THE BEACH ‚òÜ‚òÜ

We provide the following items for use at the beach:

‚òÄ Beach chairs
‚òÄ Beach towels
‚òÄ Beach Cooler
‚òÄ Beach Cart


‚òÜ‚òÜ OUTDOOR ACTIVITIES ‚òÜ‚òÜ

We provide the following games for use outdoors:
‚òÄ Pickleball
‚òÄ Mini-Golf
‚òÄ Cornhole
‚òÄ Bocce Ball


‚òÖ‚òÜ Book Your Stay Today So You Can Relax In the Sunshine Tomorrow! ‚òÜ‚òÖ

Guests are welcome to use anything on the property. This is your home away from home, get comfy, relax and have fun!

Other things to note

description:
SLEEPING ARRANGEMENTS

The space
5BR / 4.5BA / Sleeps 15

Master Bedroom 1 - King Bed

Guest Bedroom 2- King Bed

Guest Bedroom 3 - Two sets Bunk Beds (4 Twin beds)

Guest Bedroom 4 - One Queen Bed

Guest Bedroom 5- Bunk Bed (1 full on bottom 1 twin on top)

Living Room - Queen size sleeper sofa


Master bedroom located on main floor. All other bedrooms are located upstairs.


_____________________________________________________________________________

AMENITIES


1 small dog will be considered with prior approval and non-fundable pet fee of $200 plus tax. Please contact property manager for approval. NO CATS

Ample parking in the driveway and side of the home. A boat or RV can be parked in the driveway.

Propane grill for outdoor cooking.

Several dining areas in the home, outdoors, and in the kitchen. Most areas have seating for eight.

Living room with comfortable couches and fireplace.

Private saltwater pool with inground SPA and large outdoor area for entertaining. (Pool can be heated in cooler months (November - April) for an extra 35.00 a day. Please let us know in advance so it's heated when you arrive.

Close to Anna Maria Island and Bradenton Beaches (15-minute drive)

2 Beach Chairs, 1 small cooler, 1 Beach Umbrella

IMG Academy 4.6 miles

Downtown Bradenton is 5 minutes away.

Separate enclosed outdoor kitchen and entertainment area that has a foosball, pool table, and large wall-mounted TV.

Fully stocked modern kitchen with stemware, dishes, and everything needed to make meals at home.

Full-size stackable washer/dryer near the kitchen.

WIFI /streaming TV

No smoking allowed.


Professionally cleaned and sanitized per CDC guidelines between each guest stay. PLEASE NOTE- For extended stays of 60 days or more we require a mid-stay clean be done by our cleaners. A member of our team will reach out upon your booking to coordinate the fee and scheduling.

_____________________________________________________________________________

FULL DESCRIPTION


Welcome to a Bradenton luxury resort-like space that will wow you & your guests.


This 5-bedroom, 4.5-bathroom estate located in the heart of Manatee Bay is as close as it gets to resort living. With over 30 AMAZING reviews on other listing sites, this getaway is peer-reviewed to be a great place to make memories and have everything you need!

Inside, you'll enjoy clean colorful, high-end details, while outside the one-of-a-kind pool welcomes you home. Newly upgraded, we've added new lighting, new furnishings, and more!

This home was crafted with love for your family or friends, with space for indoor and outdoor gatherings - with room for games, meals & memories. Grill outside, hang in the treehouse, or go for a swim!


In the delightful kitchen, formal living space, and outdoor entertainment area you have breathtaking views of the outside grounds, landscape, and scenery. The formal dining room boasts ample seating for dinners and hosting discussions over libations. That, along with a bar-style eatery and an eating cove next to the kitchen, provides a gathering space for all to enjoy some delicious food.

Every inch of this residence is designed for fun whether you are inside or outside. Take some time to cool down inside by catching a movie on the oversized couch, shoot pool or test your skills on the foosball table in the redesigned garage game space.

Head outside to the all-ages fun-filled resort-like pool, and entertainment area. Soak in the sun on a poolside lounge chair or have dinner underneath the canopy and cafe lights. Youngsters will be kept fully entertained between the outdoor areas and the game room.


PLEASE NOTE- For extended stays of 60 days or more we require a mid-stay clean be done by our cleaners. A member of our team will reach out upon your booking to coordinate the fee and scheduling.


This comfortable private home is located just 5 minutes from downtown Bradenton. Downtown Bradenton is on the Manatee River and has bars, restaurants, and Village of the Arts. The Village of the Arts is an eclectic live-work community of colorful historic cottages that house everything from award-winning restaurants to specialty shops, studios, healing arts, bakeries, and Bradenton‚Äôs best art galleries. The Sarasota/Bradenton airport is a 35-minute drive (9.6 miles) south and downtown Sarasota and St Armands Circle are about 35-minute drive south which is a great place to watch a sunset from a rooftop bar with causal and upscale dining and shopping. You will also find dining options in nearby Longboat Key, Bradenton Beach, and Anna Maria Island which all have great places to eat and things to do by the beach. The home is centrally located to I-75 to take quick trips to Tampa or Orlando areas.

Other things to note
Please note that we may collect additional information from you after confirming your booking (usually an email address) in order to comply with local regulations and to provide the best possible experience.

Regulatory Information

TITLE: Click for Discount - Waterfront, Pool, Boat Dock
Listing Name: Click for Discount - Waterfront, Pool, Boat Dock
name: Click for Discount - Waterfront, Pool, Boat Dock
description:
Welcome to Royal Palm Paradise!
‚öìShort Drive to the World Class Beaches of Anna Maria Island
‚öìBring your Boat or other Water Toys!
‚öìHeated Pool, Hot Tub, Tiki Hut with exterior TV
‚öìKayaks, Paddleboards, Pool Table, Bikes, Corn Hole & More!
‚öìPet Friendly, Fenced in Yard!
‚öì High-speed Wi-Fi, Smart lock for Self Check-in
‚öìHeating of the pool is not included in rent and is an additional fee

The space
Welcome to "Royal Palm Paradise" your private waterfront pool and spa home located in the popular rental community of San Remo! This vacation home has something for everyone! The property is situated on the corner of the Palma Sola Bay with a boat dock large enough for a 30' boat (Boatlift in pictures is not available to renters). With no bridges to the bay by boat and just minutes away from the most popular beaches in the area, this completely renovated pool home is the perfect destination point to enjoy everything the area has to offer!

When pulling up to the property you instantly notice the well-manacured exterior and enough space for parking even if you have a trailer! Walking into the front door your eyes are instantly pulled to all the natural light coming off the back of the property overlooking the pool and canal. The main living space offers a large flat-screen smart tv, along with a PS4 for the kids to enjoy some gaming when you are relaxing in the hot tub late at night! The main living area has plenty of space for seating and everyone to gather around and play games and enjoy family time! The kitchen comes fully equipped with everything needed to make your favorite home-cooked meals! Some added bonuses at this property is a wine cooler, a Keurig machine as well as a few customized tools made specifically for this property!

When heading outside this property offers tons of activities for everyone to enjoy! Whether its shooting pool in the garage, playing hoops in the pool, or playing a fun game of cornhole along the canal you can spend your entire day outside enjoying the amazing weather Florida has to offer! When you are ready to relax take a soak in the hot tub or if you are needing to cool off jump in the pool! Do you enjoy fishing? Dock lights provided on the exterior that makes fishing off the back of the property a fun experience when enjoying the local fishery!

Trying to figure out sleeping arrangements? This property offers a split floor plan with the Master bedroom on the right side of the property and two guest bedrooms to the left when first walking into the door. The Master Bedroom offers a king-size bed, desk area for working, a mounted smart tv as well as an ensuite bathroom with a stand-up shower. Guest bedroom 1 offers a King size bed and Guest bedroom 2 offers a set of single bunk beds along with a King size bed. A shared bathroom is located in this hallway as well with double vanity sinks and a tub/shower combo. Additional sleeping is offered on the sleeper sofa in the living room that converts to a Queen size bed.

Master Bedroom: King Bed, Desk/Monitor, Smart Tv, Ensuite Bathroom
Bedroom 2: King Bed, Smart Tv
Bedroom 3: King Bed, Twin Bunk Beds, Smart Tv
Living Room: Sleeper Sofa, Smart Tv

*The boat lift on this property is owner-occupied year-round and not available for tenants' use. Tenants may dock their boat in the water along the dock only.

*The owner does use the boat lift (and boat) throughout the year and will require access to the boat/lift during your stay to gain access to the boat. The owners and property managers will always attempt to notify tenants in a timely manner when the boat the owner may require access if needed during your stay.

*This property is monitored (non-private areas) externally with security cameras. The cameras cover the front yard, front door/garage, and boat lift only.

*Pets are allowed for an additional cleaning fee. Inquire for more info. Dogs only
*Pool can be heated for an extra fee.
*Pool heaters in private homes are locked for your safety and controls must not be tampered with as they are monitored by the pool company. 85¬∞ is the highest heat temperature setting. Pool temperatures will probably stay around 76¬∞ during the winter months. Please note if cold days occur, water temperatures will drop and may take longer to heat.

Damage Waiver: The total cost of your reservation for this Property includes a nightly damage waiver fee (‚ÄúManagement‚Äù), plus tax if applicable.
The Damage Waiver covers you for up to $1,500 of accidental damage to the Property or its contents (such as furniture, fixtures, and appliances) as long as you report the incident to the host prior to checking out. The Damage Waiver fee eliminates the need for a traditional security deposit.
More information can be downloaded from the ‚ÄúRental Agreement‚Äù on the checkout page.

Other things to note
1. Please read the guestbook! Info like trash days, wifi passwords, and other things you need to know is located in the book.
2. Any people other than those in the guest party (renter) are the sole responsibility of the guest (renter). Parties and events are not allowed unless given prior
approval from the management company and paid an event fee. If a party or event did happen at the house an additional fee will be charged to the card on file
based on the property rented.
3. This home is privately owned. The homeowners are not responsible for any accidents, injuries, or illnesses that occur
while on-premises. The homeowners are not responsible for the loss of personal belongings or valuables of the guest. By
accepting this reservation, it is agreed that all guests are expressly assuming the risk of any harm arising from their use
of the premises or others whom they invite to use the premises.
4. Pets are only permitted with prior approval and upon completion of the Pet Addendum to the rental agreement. An additional pet fee does apply.
5. Please be considerate to the neighbors and not have loud music after 10 pm.
6. All items in the home and on the property, including DVD's, CD, books and games are intended for entertainment and
enjoyment of the guests while staying at the house and are not to be removed from the home or property. The only
exception would be those items which are intended for use at the beach.
7. Some properties have keys and garage/ gate remotes, if they are lost its $50 each to replace.
8. Please clean the grills after each use. There will be a $50 cleaning fee charged if grill is not cleaned.
9. No smoking allowed in the house. Smoking is allowed outside only.
($500 cleaning fee applies if found smoking in house or smoke smell)
10. Please follow the departure instructions to help keep our cleaning costs down. We do everything we can to keep the properties in the best shape possible
with your help! If you need anything during your stay please let us know!

Bedroom 2: King bed, desk
Bedroom 3: Queen bed
Bedroom 4: Queen bed with twin xl bunk and twin trundle
Game room: Full size futon
Pack n play, high chair, and baby bathtub available

-Large private backyard with heated pool (depth 3‚Äô ‚Äì 5‚Äô) and hot tub, outdoor eating area, outdoor shower, firepit, hammock, lounge chairs, bocce ball, corn hole, and slackline swing set. On colder days, the pool may not reach the set temperature. The pool temperature cannot be guaranteed.

-Foosball, Ms Pacman game, giant Connect 4, giant Jenga, dart board, board games, puzzles, and various toys such as Duplos and magnetic tiles for the young ones.

-Beach essentials ‚Äì umbrella, chairs, cooler, beach towels, and sand toys. Enjoy the outdoor shower after you return for quick clean up!

-Fully equipped kitchen with coffee maker (Keurig and drip), waffle maker, blender, toaster, electric tea kettle, hand mixer, dishwasher, microwave, crockpot, instant pot, some spices. Breakfast nook with seating for 6. Counter with 2 barstools

-Starter paper towels, toilet paper, dishwasher tablets, coffee, tea, sweeteners, laundry soap, and trash bags

-Formal dining room with seating for 12

-Smart TVs in each bedroom and a 75-inch TV in the living room. Bring your own streaming subscription. The TVs are factory reset between each guest so you will need to login to your subscriptions before your first use.

-500 MB fast internet with desks in both King bedrooms. A monitor is available as a second screen.

-Shampoo, conditioner, and soap dispensers in each bathroom, linens provided including bath and beach towels, washer and dryer, hair dryer, ironing board, vacuum.

We strive to provide a 5-star guest experience. Our check in process is easy with a guest keycode that is changed after each stay.

PARKING:
2 driveways can accommodate 4 - 5 vehicles. Each driveway is long enough to accommodate boat and trailer parking. ¬Ω mile to Manatee River. No street parking available.

Guest access
The whole house and property is available to guests. Host does not live on property, enjoy the privacy!

Other things to note
Check in after 4 pm. Check out 10 am.

Sometimes you may see our pool, lawncare and pest control vendors on the property. The pool is serviced twice a week.

We want everyone to enjoy our property, but also want to emphasize that we do not allow parties. This includes no playing loud or disturbing music outside. Quiet time hours 10 pm ‚Äì 8 am.

A maximum occupancy for the property is 12 individuals.

Florida is a tropical place. Our home is professionally sprayed quarterly to control bugs. However, it is not possible to get rid of all bugs inside or outside. Mosquitos can also be around in the evening and after it rains. Please remember to pack bug spray. Lizards will be seen outside in the yard.

The yard is fenced, however, there is no fence directly around the pool. The side and laundry room doors are equipped with alarms that should be turned on if children are present. Children should NEVER be left unattended outside. NO GLASSWARE IS ALLOWED IN THE POOL AREA. Please use plasticware by the pool. Swim at your own risk. This is a private home and there is no lifeguard.

Gas grill with propane tank is provided as well as barbecue tools in a case above refrigerator. We do not refill the propane tank, so when it goes empty, please feel free to exchange the tank at a local gas station or Home Depot for around $20. Please shut off propane tank and clean the grill after each use.

We do not supply firewood for the fire pit. Firewood can easily be purchased at Publix or the Ace hardware store, both a 5 minute drive.

We have a doorbell camera at the front door and a security camera by the side entrance door that points toward the gate and driveway. They will record audio and video.

No smoking/vaping in the house. There is a designated smoking area by the fire pit. Please dispose of ashes and butts in the firepit.

Any time guests leave the house, please ensure that all windows and doors are locked.

Garbage and recycling trucks come on Tuesdays.
Because it only comes once a week, there could be trash in the garbage can that does not belong to you. If you are staying on a garbage day, please bring the cans to the curb on the grass (not in the street) and bring them back by the shed once they are emptied.

We strongly encourage our guests to purchase travel insurance as it provides peace of mind and financial protection in case unexpected events occur. Unfortunately, we do not process refunds outside of the cancellation policy. Thank you for understanding.

A rental agreement will be sent to you to sign before you arrive.

name: Stylish 6 Bed Pool Home with Golf Simulator & Spa
description:
Experience ultimate Florida luxury at our 6-bedroom, 4-bathroom Bradenton home, fully remodeled for your perfect staycation. Enjoy a heated saltwater pool, spa, outdoor kitchen, and bar with granite counters, ice maker, and fridge. Nestled at the end of a private drive, this paradise offers a golf simulator, putting green, and cornhole court. Centrally located yet secluded, it comfortably sleeps 12. Non-smoking and meticulously clean, this is your dream getaway for relaxation and fun.

The space
Pool | Hot Tub | BBQ | Golf Simulator | Putting Green | Corn hole Court

Escape to luxury in this newly remodeled 6-bedroom, 4-bathroom home in Bradenton, FL, offering 3100 sq. ft. of pristine living space. Perfect for your next staycation, this paradise boasts a heated saltwater pool and spa, complemented by an outdoor kitchen and bar with granite countertops, an ice maker, and a fridge. Situated at the end of a private drive, this home ensures peace and seclusion. Enjoy the added amenities including a golf simulator, putting green, cornhole court, and a recreation room complete with ping pong, darts, and a gym area. This non-smoking, luxury retreat sleeps 12 comfortably and offers the best of Florida living. Centrally located yet tucked away for ultimate privacy, it‚Äôs the perfect escape for relaxation and fun. Book your stay today and experience the best Bradenton has to offer!

----- IMPORTANT BEFORE YOU BOOK -----
The property has 3 motion activated cameras as well as 3 motion activated lights for added protection and safety.
* There is NO smoking in the home or anywhere inside the pool cage.* This includes vaping, chewing tobacco, hookah pipes, or any smoking of any kind.
**Property has 2 KITCHENS- A completely stocked full sized kitchen inside w? all Brand NEW appliances (Fridge, Oven, Microwave & Dishwasher) - OUTDOOR KITCHEN is located outdoor next to the pool and is nicely equipped with all the cooking items typically found in indoor kitchens. Both kitchens have GRANITE Counters throughout! Also, due to the inability to properly deep clean the built-in grill pictured in the middle of the outdoor kitchen guests are asked to use the brand new portable propane gas grill for any of their grilling needs.**
----- CHECK-IN AND CHECK-OUT TIMES -----
Check-in time is: 16:00 (4 PM)
Check-out time is: 11:00 (11 AM)
It may be possible to arrange an early check-in or late check out and we'd be happy to accommodate you if possible however sometimes we have other guests arriving or leaving the same day so it's not always possible. The early check-in or late check out fee (if possible is $250)
Please let us know after you book if you would like to see if early or late check out is available for your stay.

The space is accurately listed and the pictures don't do it justice on how truly nice it really is!

----- RENTAL AGREEMENT -----
Please note you will need to sign a separate rental agreement and provide a valid Government issued ID, Passport or Drivers License before being allowed access to the property.
----- DAMAGE WAIVER -----
Damage Waiver: Guests are fully responsible for any and all damage to property including but not limited to cigarette/cigar/vaping smoke damage.

More information can be downloaded from the "Rental Agreement".
----- TRAVEL INSURANCE -----
For peace of mind we recommend travel and trip insurance to cover you in case of flight delays, cancellations, liability, health and loss and damage to personal items.
----- NUMBER OF GUESTS -----
The total number of persons allowed in the home at any one time is restricted to the number of persons scheduled and paid for at the time of booking. Please be upfront with us, we will take care of you.
----- VISITORS OF GUESTS -----
Booking guests are allowed up 2 additional visitors over and above the number of sleeping guests. These visitors are limited to day time visits 9AM to 10PM only.
Otherwise, double extra guest fee will apply if not disclosed before check-in. Should a group misrepresent themselves and arrive in numbers beyond the reservation count or other guests (or over the limit visitors or AFTER hours visitors) attempted to be added later/after hours, there will be a fee of $100 per guest per night required to be paid for excess guests immediately or (in case of what is considered gross misconduct or misrepresentation) denied the right to stay in the home altogether without refund.
----- SECURITY CAMERAS -----
The property has outside security cameras for your own security. One facing to the street in front of the house and one in the outside backyard area. There are no cameras inside the home. Please do not tamper or try to disable these cameras because it will result in a $500 fine & Immediate cancellation of the remaining time left on the booking. Any remaining days or time will be forfeited & will not be refunded.
----- PETS -----
Due to future guest allergies, pets of any kind are NOT allowed in or on the premises. A pet, or evidence of a pet, found on premises will cause immediate eviction, and the guest‚Äôs rent and deposit will be forfeited.
----- ONE LAST THING -----
This vacation home has been very popular and is often booked back to back. If your dates happen to be available we highly advise you lock in your dates to secure them in before they get taken by someone else.

We look forward to hosting you!

Guest access
Guests enter property through the front door or the side pool cage entrance to side driveway (next to pool cage). Please limit number of cars to 4 normal sized vehicles.

Other things to note
For everyone's safety, all booking guests must have a clear self photo listed on there Airbnb profile. This photo must match the photo in your government issued I.D. used during check. Lastly, guests must have zero negative reviews from past hosts prior to booking. Thank you.

‚ú¶ 3.5 miles to Starbucks
‚ú¶ 6.7 miles to Publix at Bradenton Commons
‚ú¶ 10 miles to Coquina Beach

And our staff at Stayawhilewithus ensure an impeccable degree of cleanliness and sanitation, so you and your family can feel the safest when staying with us.

Book now and enjoy the tranquility and luxury that staying at Robinson Recluse will offer!

KITCHEN

Our kitchen also boasts an open floorplan with a vast kitchen island, with barstools for additional seats, perfectly complementing our dining table, comfortably seating 8 people.

Traveling with small children? You can pack lighter because we provide Pack n‚Äô Plays, a highchair, and kid‚Äôs dinnerware.

BEDROOMS
Boasting 4 cozy and relaxing bedrooms that can comfortably accommodate a family of 14, Robinson Recluse will serve as the perfect ending to your day full of adventure and activity!

Master Bedroom: with a King-sized Bed, a daybed, a full ensuite bathroom, a walk-in closet

ALL THE COMFORTS OF HOME

Guest access

Other things to note
FURRY FRIENDS
- Prior approval is required. We allow up to 3 dogs for an additional fee of $150/pet/stay.
- Must be fully house-trained.
- Must be completely cleaned up after.
- Leashed at all times when not in a fenced area.
- Crated indoors when not home with the pet.
- If barking becomes an issue during your stay, alternative arrangements must be made.

KINDLY NOTE

- Noise monitors inside and outside the house do not record voice or conversation, they only monitor decibels.
- The heated pool feature is available for an extra $20/night or $400/month (offered from October till May). If you would like to purchase the pool heating feature, please note that it covers the entirety of your stay, and pool heater may take up to 24 hours to reach the desired temp, so kindly let us know before you check-in.
- Pool settings are all scheduled. When booked, pool heat is set to 85 degrees, however, pool temps are impacted if the weather drops below 60 degrees. So, unfortunately, pool temperatures cannot be guaranteed.
- Safety features: fire extinguisher, smoke detector, first aid kit.
- For your comfort, our home is treated quarterly by a professional pest control company. But due to the home's proximity to the Botanical Garden and Robinson Preserve, some insects may be spotted in the lawn outside, albeit seasonally. Please keep doors and screens closed to help prevent bugs from entering, as no compensation will be provided for any bugs that may come inside.

IMPORTANT NOTE: For the security of our guests, every guest who enters the home during your stay MUST be listed on the reservation. Please, make sure to register the correct number of guests. Undisclosed guests who are not included in the official confirmation can place your stay at risk for early termination without a refund, and will incur an additional charge of $25/undisclosed guest/night.
