description:
‚òÄ 9 minutes to IMG Academy
‚òÄ 13 minutes to Manatee Public Beach
‚òÄ 13 minutes to Bradenton Beach
‚òÄ 32 minutes to Bradenton Motorsports Park
‚òÄ 37 minutes to The Premier Sports Campus

The space
Gather your loved ones and prepare to make memories that will last a lifetime at The Tanning Turtle. This amenity-filled home is situated just a short distance from IMG Academy and the breathtaking beaches of Anna Maria Island. Bask in the sunlight of the awe-inspiring backyard then cool off with a refreshing dip in the massive heated pool. With four bedrooms, three bathrooms, and accommodations for up to 12 guests, there's plenty of room for your entire family to relax, unwind and reconnect.


KEY FEATURES:

‚òÄ 4 spacious bedrooms w/ blackout curtains
‚òÄ 3 pristine bathrooms
‚òÄ Private tropical paradise w/ huge covered patio + huge heated pool + Mini-Golf
‚òÄ Awesome game room with ping pong + foosball
‚òÄ Family-friendly: crib + pack ‚Äòn‚Äô play + stroller + high chair, + kids‚Äô dinnerware
‚òÄ Child Safety Fence for Pool
‚òÄ Fully-stocked kitchen w/ stainless steel appliances
‚òÄ Webber BBQ grill
‚òÄ 5 flat-screen smart TVs
‚òÄ Plenty of beach gear including chairs, towels, an umbrella, cooler & a beach cart
‚òÄ Free parking for up to 4 cars in the driveway
‚òÄ Fully fenced back yard
‚òÄ Washer + dryer (x2)
‚òÄ Pet friendly
‚òÄ Fast wifi


‚òÜ‚òÜ BEDROOMS ‚òÜ‚òÜ

Each of the 4 beautiful bedrooms have been thoughtfully furnished to cater to your entire group, whether you‚Äôre a gathering of multiple families on vacation or a group of friends reconnecting. Crisp, clean linens, luxurious, soft furnishings, blackout curtains and an array of practical touches ensure your vacation is not only carefree but also exceptionally comfortable too.


Where you'll sleep

‚òÄ Bedroom 1: (The Master Suite): 1 King bed with ensuite bathroom
‚òÄ Bedroom 2: 1 King bed with ensuite bathroom
‚òÄ Bedroom 3: 2 Full beds
‚òÄ Bedroom 4: Bunk Room ‚Äì 4 Twin Beds


‚òÜ‚òÜ BATHROOMS ‚òÜ‚òÜ

Experience the convenience of three impeccably maintained bathrooms, each thoughtfully designed to enhance your group's comfort. These immaculately maintained spaces serve as private retreats for your rejuvenation.

The primary suite boasts an exquisite en-suite bathroom that provides direct access from the master bedroom. This luxurious bathroom features a spacious walk-in glass shower and dual vanity, seamlessly blending opulence with practicality.

In the secondary suite, you'll find another ensuite bathroom accessible from the second king bedroom and the game room. Adorned with a walk-in shower and beautiful floral d√©cor, it provides a delightful space for refreshing moments.

The third bathroom, conveniently located near the main living area, offers the versatile combination of a tub and shower, merging style and functionality to cater to everyone's needs.


‚òÜ‚òÜ KITCHEN & LOUNGE ‚òÜ‚òÜ

The fully loaded kitchen is a haven for the culinary enthusiast in your group. It's adorned with beautiful granite countertops and top-of-the-line stainless-steel appliances, offering all the comforts of home for your culinary adventures. You'll find an abundance of utensils and dishware at your disposal, ensuring you have everything you need to prepare delightful meals.

Adjacent to the kitchen is a gorgeous dining table that comfortably accommodates up to 8 guests. Just steps away, the sliding glass door opens up to the pool patio, providing easy access to delightful an al fresco dining experiences with seating for an additional 12 guests.

The living room is a charming setting for socializing, with a range of seating choices to accommodate the entire family. This inviting space provides ample room for both friends and family to engage in traditional board games or snuggle up and enjoy a movie on the 55‚Äù smart TV. You can easily link to your preferred streaming service using your personal account, ensuring entertainment is right at your fingertips.

Situated between the kitchen and pool patio, the lounge area features comfortable seating, an 8‚Äô slate pool table and 55‚Äù flat screen TV making it the perfect place to relax and watch the big game.


‚òÜ‚òÜ OUTSIDE SPACE ‚òÜ‚òÜ

Stepping out through the back patio doors you'll be instantly captivated by the crystal-clear waters of the sprawling swimming pool. Measuring 35‚Äô long by 16‚Äô wide and 5‚Äô deep in the deep end, this brand-new aquatic paradise features an oversized pool heater and all-natural salt cell for year-round comfort and enjoyment. The tanning ledge offers a space for parents to relax and soak up the sun or for the little ones to splash and play in a mere 6 inches of water. Whatever you choose, you're bound to create cherished memories that will endure a lifetime.

When you're ready for a break from the sun, the expansive patio has you covered, literally! Relax on the outdoor sofa while watching TV or enjoy a delicious meal on at the beautiful teak dining table with seating for 12.

name: Blue Iguana! Private Pool, Close to AMI!
description:
Welcome to Blue Iguana!
‚öìShort drive to the World Class Beaches of Anna Maria Island
‚öìScreened-in HEATED pool, Hot Tub, Putting Green, Corn Hole, Tiki Hut, Fire Table & more!
‚öìFully stocked kitchen for everything you need
‚öì2 King Beds, 2 Queen Beds, Futon Bed, Air Mattress, Luxurious Sheets & 4k Smart TVs
‚öìFast Wi-Fi, Smart lock for Self Check-in

The space
Prepare to be captivated from the moment you step into our Bradenton coastal oasis, The Blue Iguana. Described as eclectic, with a splash of "Floridian Chic". But that description fails to do the property justice, as once you enter the abode, guests are faced with an interior that is lavishly decorated with brilliant sunsets, coastal art, and murals to capture your picture-taking moments.

From bright tropical wallpaper to flamingo and mermaid-themed bedrooms to a backyard where guests can enjoy the Tiki Hut with the fire table with ample seating, a putting green, corn hole, ring toss, and a charcoal grill. After enjoying the Florida sunshine enjoy the heated pool!

The fully equipped kitchen features modern appliances and ample counter space, making it a breeze to prepare meals. The adjacent dining area offers seating for eight with an additional table that seats four more.

The living room is the perfect place to relax and unwind with the entire crew with the most comfortable couches and chairs, complete with a large 4k Smart TV. Fast and reliable WiFi keeps you connected for both work and play. An additional Smart TV is located in the pool table room which overlooks the pool area and backyard. The perfect place to hang out and shoot some pool while watching your favorite sporting events!

The backyard oasis is the true attraction of this home. Whether you want to soak up the Florida sun, take a refreshing dip in the pool, or simply enjoy your morning coffee in the outdoor seating area, this space is sure to become a favorite during your stay. Everything you could want awaits you outside as there is a charcoal grill, putting green, cornhole set, plenty of comfy seating with a mobile ice chest, and even a tiki hut with a propane fire table!

Coming back from a long day at the beach? Conveniently located on the left side of the garage is an exterior surfboard shower. The perfect place to rinse yourself as well as all the beach equipment after a long fun day at Anna Maria Island!

Trying to figure out sleeping arrangements? The split floorplan provides maximum privacy with the master bedroom, ensuite, and walk-in closet on one side of the home and the other two bedrooms are on the other side of the house with a shared bathroom and hallway. All bedrooms are equipped with your comfort in mind along with luxurious sheets and linens.
Bedroom #1 is the master bedroom and has a King bed, Smart TV, and an additional futon that converts to sleeping for larger groups.
Bedroom #2 has one King bed and a Smart TV.
Bedroom #3 has two Queen Beds and a Smart TV.
Air Mattress is available for 1 additional guest

The Blue Iguana is situated in an enviable location with its close proximity to parks, boat ramps, preserves and the world class beaches of Anna Maria Island. You will enjoy the natural beauty of the area and all the recreational activities it offers like boating, golfing, kayaking, biking and so much more! Nearby attractions include IMG, Robinson Preserve, Anna Maria Island, and the charming village of Cortez, known for its seafood restaurants. Everything you need is just a short drive away. Publix, Starbucks, WAWA are just to name a few!

Book now for a lifetime of memories at the Blue Iguana! The space
As the newest STAYAWHILE property, Lakeshore is a 2,365 sq. ft. home that boasts 4 bedrooms, 2 full bathrooms, an office space with a daybed, a brand new modern and fully equipped kitchen, luxurious decor and a vast lakefront backyard with a private, lanai covered pool, surronded by comfy outdoor seating.

Most importantly, Lakeshore's located in one the friendliest and most serene neighborhoods in Bradenton. And no need to worry about activities to partake in, with all the attractions surrounding us - 5.8 miles to Downtown Bradenton, 7.2 miles to the famous IMG Academy, 6.8 miles to Anna Maria Island and its breathtaking beaches, and 9.2 miles to Coquina Beach.

And let‚Äôs not forget the Robinson preserve - only 1.9 miles away, where you can enjoy hiking, biking, kayaking, and so many more activities. Not a dull moment when staying with us.

We‚Äôve put our all when preparing our home for our guests, sparing nothing, and only furnishing it with the best amenities and appliances possible. We guarantee you the best and most comfortable stay when choosing us!

So Book Now and relish in nothing short of a 5 star experience!

KITCHEN

Bring your A-game chef when cooking in our newly refurbished and fully stocked kitchen! With all the high quality cooking appliances and utensils you could imagine, what more could you ask for in a kitchen?

Bedroom 2: King sized bed
Bedroom 3: Two full beds
Bedroom 4: One set of bunk beds (twin over full, with a trundle)

- High speed wi-fi.

Guest access
Guests will have access to entire house except garage and owner closet.

Other things to note
Furry Friends
- Prior approval is required. We allow up to 3 dogs for an additional fee of $150/pet/stay.
- Must be fully house trained
- Must be completely cleaned up after
- Leashed at all times when not in fenced area
- Crated indoors when not home with the pet
- If barking becomes an issue during your stay, alternative arrangements must be made
- Not allowed on the indoor furniture or bedding

KINDLY NOTE
- For your peace of mind, surveillance cameras are located around the exterior of the house (front garage and side garage). No inside cameras.
- Noise monitors inside and outside the house do not record voice or conversation, only monitor decibels.
- The heated pool feature is available for an extra $20/night or $400/month (offered from October till May). If you would like to purchase the pool heating feature, please note that it covers the entirety of your stay, and pool heater may take up to 24 hours to reach the desired temp, so kindly let us know before you check-in.
- Pool settings are all scheduled. When booked, pool heat is set to 85 degrees, however pool temps are impacted if the weather drops below 60 degrees. So, unfortunately, pool temperatures cannot be guaranteed.
- Safety features: fire extinguisher, smoke detector, first aid kit.
- For your comfort, our home is treated quarterly by a professional pest control company. But given our tropical climate, you may still see the occasional bug. Please keep doors and screens closed to help prevent bugs from entering, as no compensation will be provided for any bugs that may come inside.
- Please note that no motorsports are allowed in the lake, as it's too narrow, You can, however, fish off the dock.

IMPORTANT NOTE: For the security of our guests, every guest who enters the home during your stay MUST be listed on the reservation or disclosed to the host. Please, make sure to register the correct number of guests. Undisclosed guests who are not included in the official confirmation can place your stay at risk for early termination without a refund, and can incur an additional charge of $25/guest/night.

This home is the perfect vacation destination for families who want to be only a quick drive from world-class beaches on Anna Maria Island, but with the space and comforts of a full home packed with amenities, giant backyard, lake views, and picturesque sunsets!

The House: Park your vehicles safely in our private driveway. If more space is needed, you can park on the street directly in front of the house.

All bedrooms and living spaces boast a Roku TV with your favorite apps, memory foam mattresses, dressers, full length mirrors, ceiling fans, and closets.

The bathrooms each include shower heads, while one bathroom also includes a tub. The support bars in each bathroom are intended to help with ADA accessibility.

The game room is a fun-filled oasis when wanting a reprieve from the heat. Relive your own childhood with retro arcade games, or take on your family to a game of pool or shuffleboard. Or simply relax to a sports game or movie.

This home is truly designed for the best of Florida inside-outside living. Seamlessly move from the inside living room to the covered patio where you can lounge, dine, or take a dip in the saltwater pool! And the kiddos will love the play yard with mini golf, sand box and other yard games available. The parents will love the fully-fenced in area, too!

And don't miss the lake views from the pergola. Watch the pelicans nosedive for fish during the day, and later immerse yourself in Florida's famous Gulf Coast golden hour sunsets. Cap the evening off by roasting marshmallows or enjoying your favorite drink by the fire.

Make your memories here at Bradenton Bliss!

‚úàÔ∏è Sarasota Airport: Just 20 minutes away, with Tampa Airport about an hour from Juniper Cove.

üõçÔ∏è Thoughtful Extras Included
üßª Starter Supplies: Paper products, Keurig coffee pods, tea bags, dish soap, and dishwasher pods.
üç≥ Fully Stocked Kitchen: Equipped with a Keurig Duo, air fryer, Crockpot, blender, and more.
üì∫ WiFi & Smart TVs: Fast WiFi and Smart TVs in every room keep you connected and entertained.
üß∫ Washer and Dryer: Includes detergent for your convenience.
üßò Yoga Mats: Perfect for stretching or light exercise by the pool.

üåû Make Memories Together
‚ú® Juniper Cove: Your destination for relaxation, fun, and connection. Play pickleball, lounge by the pool, or enjoy game nights in the game room. We can‚Äôt wait to host you at our little slice of paradise!

Guest access
Guests are encouraged to enjoy all the amenities the property has to offer. Make yourself at home, unwind, and create lasting memories!

Other things to note
House Rule Agreement

By booking and staying at Juniper Cove, you agree to the terms outlined in this agreement. These rules are designed to ensure a safe, enjoyable, and respectful experience for all guests and our neighbors.

1. Occupancy and Guest Limits
‚Ä¢ The property accommodates a maximum of 10 overnight guests, as required by city ordinance.
‚Ä¢ A maximum of 12 people, including daytime visitors, are permitted on the property at any time.
‚Ä¢ Only individuals listed on the reservation may stay overnight.
‚Ä¢ Exceeding these limits may result in additional actions to ensure compliance with local regulations.

2. Noise and Neighborhood Respect
‚Ä¢ Quiet hours are observed from 10:00 p.m. to 7:00 a.m. to respect the residential neighborhood.
‚Ä¢ Parties or events are strictly prohibited. Gatherings exceeding the occupancy limit or causing disturbances may result in termination of the reservation without refund.

3. Smoking, Vaping, and Drug Use
‚Ä¢ Smoking, vaping, and drug use are strictly prohibited anywhere on the property, both indoors and outdoors.
‚Ä¢ Violations may result in additional cleaning fees.

4. Pool and Hot Tub Usage
‚Ä¢ Safety: Children must be supervised at all times when using the pool or hot tub. No diving, running, or rough play is allowed.
‚Ä¢ Pool Temperature: The pool is heated to 84‚Äì87¬∞F.
‚Ä¢ Hot Tub Temperature: The hot tub is set to 100‚Äì102¬∞F. Instructions for use will be provided in the house manual.
‚Ä¢ Guests use these amenities at their own risk.

5. Pickleball Court Rules
‚Ä¢ Use the pickleball court responsibly and keep play within the court area to avoid disturbing neighbors.
‚Ä¢ Do not retrieve balls from neighboring yards; extra balls are provided.

6. Trash Rules
‚Ä¢ Trash is collected on Tuesdays and Fridays.
‚Ä¢ If your stay overlaps with trash pickup, please place the green bin (not the blue bin, which is for yard waste) at the curb the evening before pickup.
‚Ä¢ After pickup, bring the green bin back to the side of the house by the end of the pickup day.
‚Ä¢ These steps help keep the property clean and pest-free‚Äîthank you for your cooperation!

7. Wildlife and Florida Environment
‚Ä¢ Florida‚Äôs natural environment includes wildlife and insects. Keep windows and doors closed to prevent unwanted pests indoors.
‚Ä¢ Hurricane Season: Monitor weather conditions and follow local evacuation orders if necessary.
‚Ä¢ Red Tide: Check local beach conditions before visiting.
‚Ä¢ Guests are encouraged to purchase travel insurance to cover weather-related disruptions.

8. Parking and Vehicle Restrictions
‚Ä¢ Parking is limited to 3-4 vehicles in the driveway.
‚Ä¢ Recreational vehicles, boats, and trailers may only be parked temporarily for loading or unloading.
‚Ä¢ Boat Parking: Depending on the size of your boat, parking may be available on the other side of the gated fence. Please contact the Host in advance to confirm availability and size restrictions.

9. Check-In and Check-Out
‚Ä¢ Check-In Time: 3:00 p.m. EST
‚Ä¢ Check-Out Time: 10:00 a.m. EST
‚Ä¢ Guests are kindly asked to complete the following check-out procedures:
1. Load and start the dishwasher.
2. Gather all personal belongings.
3. Leave towels in bathrooms and linens unmade on beds.
4. Lock all windows and doors.
‚Ä¢ Following these steps helps us prepare the home for future guests. Thank you!

10. Damages and Incidentals
‚Ä¢ Guests are responsible for any damages, missing items, or violations of house rules during their stay.
‚Ä¢ Please report any issues immediately so they can be addressed promptly.

11. Liability and Assumption of Risk
‚Ä¢ Guests assume full responsibility for their safety and the safety of their party during their stay.
‚Ä¢ The Host is not liable for accidents, injuries, illnesses, or loss of personal belongings that occur on the property or while using property amenities (e.g., pool, hot tub, pickleball court).
‚Ä¢ Guests acknowledge the inherent risks of using these amenities and agree to use them responsibly.
‚Ä¢ Travel insurance is highly recommended to protect against unforeseen circumstances.

12. Emergency Contacts
‚Ä¢ Host: Jenny Anderson
‚Ä¢ Emergency Services: Dial 911
‚Ä¢ Non-Emergency Bradenton Police
‚Ä¢ Bradenton Fire
‚Ä¢ Nearest Hospital: HCA Florida Blake Hospital, 2020 59th St W, Bradenton, FL 34209

By confirming your booking, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agreed to the terms of this Vacation Rental Agreement. These house rules are in place to ensure a safe, pleasant, and enjoyable stay for all guests.

The space
Welcome to Nautical Escape!
‚öìShort drive to the World Class Beaches of Anna Maria Island

This 4-bedroom 2 bath Key West style Pool home sleeps 9 comfortably and is situated in the exclusive Harbor Hills Community in NW Bradenton. Bring your boat with parking large enough for a 25ft trailer and boat on the left side of the house as well as the dock located just around the corner on the Bayou. The property is situated a short drive from Warners boat ramp which leads you out to the Manatee River. Located in a prime location in Bradenton you are also a short drive from local groceries, restaurants, and the white sandy beaches of Anna Maria Island!

When arriving at the property you instantly notice the matured landscaping and well-appointed property. The driveway is large and has plenty of space for 2 vehicles as well as a boat/trailer. The inside of the property has tile throughout and has been furnished with comfortable options helping you fully relax during your stay! The modern kitchen has plenty of counter space for more than one chef and everything you will need to prepare gourmet meals. The all-new stainless-steel appliances make cooking a breeze. Dining in--- the dining room table has seating for 6 with additional seating around the bar area. The living room offers a large flat screen smart tv and a sectional sofa to watch your favorite shows or movies!

Off the back of the house, you have a screened-in lanai that offers additional seating to relax and enjoy a meal or your morning cup of coffee. This area does have a smart tv as well. The backyard is a tropical oasis with a large pool (The pool does not have a spa feature) encompassed by an even larger backyard! (The pool can be heated for an additional charge, inquire for more info) You also have an additional shower in the back as well to rinse off after a long day at the beach or on the boat.

Trying to figure out sleeping arrangements? The house has 3 bedrooms located on the right side of the house and 1 on the left side of the house. The master bedroom offers a king-size bed, smart tv, ensuite bathroom and a private exit to the backyard. Bedroom 2 offers a queen bed, smart Tv and bedroom 3 offers a twin bunk bed as well as a single twin and is located on the right side of the house. The additional Queen bed with a smart Tv and is on the left side of the house this room also has a door that leads to the lanai.

Bedroom 1 - King Bed, Ensuite, Smart TV
Bedroom 2 - Queen Bed
Bedroom 3 - 1 Twin Bunk Bed, 1 Single Twin Bed
Bedroom 4 - Queen Bed

Are you looking to explore the area and enjoy the outdoors? Take a short drive to the De Soto National Memorial Park to watch the sunset. Desoto Memorial Park offers nature trails along the bay offering stunning views of the famous Skyway Bridge. Robinson‚Äôs Preserve which offers nature walking trails, a playground for the kids, and much more are located about 2 miles from the house as well. Looking to head to the beach? This home is located less than 3 miles from the Palma Sola Causeway and 6 miles from Anna Maria Island. Conveniently located close to Publix, Starbucks, as well as a few local favorites like Joey Ds or Habeneros Mexican grill.

*Dock is a short walk from the house, Bridge to Bay clearance is approximately 10 ft
*Dock has power and large enough for 25 ft boat, Lift is NOT available for renter use
*Garage is locked up and not available for guest use
*Pool heat available for an additional charge
*Pool heaters in private homes are locked for your safety and controls must not be tampered with as they are monitored by the pool company. 85¬∞ is the highest heat temperature setting. Pool temperatures will probably stay around 76¬∞ during the winter months. Please note if cold days occur, water temperatures will drop and may take longer to heat.

Other things to note
1. Please read the guestbook! Info like trash days, wifi passwords, and other things you need to know is located in the book.
2. Any people other than those in the guest party (renter) are the sole responsibility of the guest (renter). Parties and events are not allowed unless given prior
approval from the management company and paid an event fee. If a party or event did happen at the house an additional fee will be charged to the card on file
based on the property rented.
3. This home is privately owned. The homeowners are not responsible for any accidents, injuries, or illnesses that occur
while on-premises. The homeowners are not responsible for the loss of personal belongings or valuables of the guest. By
accepting this reservation, it is agreed that all guests are expressly assuming the risk of any harm arising from their use
of the premises or others whom they invite to use the premises.
4. Pets are only permitted with prior approval and upon completion of the Pet Addendum to the rental agreement. An additional pet fee does apply.
5. Please be considerate to the neighbors and not have loud music after 10 pm.
6. All items in the home and on the property, including DVD's, CD, books and games are intended for entertainment and
enjoyment of the guests while staying at the house and are not to be removed from the home or property. The only
exception would be those items which are intended for use at the beach.
7. Some properties have keys and garage/ gate remotes, if they are lost its $50 each to replace.
8. Please clean the grills after each use. There will be a $50 cleaning fee charged if grill is not cleaned.
9. No smoking allowed in the house. Smoking is allowed outside only.
($500 cleaning fee applies if found smoking in house or smoke smell)
10. Please follow the departure instructions to help keep our cleaning costs down. We do everything we can to keep the properties in the best shape possible
with your help! If you need anything during your stay please let us know!

Welcome to 11 Palms! A Palma Sola Bay vacation paradise! Nestled along the stunning Palma Sola Bay, 11 Palms offers a serene and unforgettable vacation experience. Whether you're seeking relaxation, outdoor adventures, or simply a tranquil getaway, this is the perfect destination.

Property Overview:


Location: Our vacation rental is ideally situated on the shores of Palma Sola Bay, just a short distance from the beautiful beaches of the Gulf of Mexico. You'll have direct access to the bay, where you can enjoy kayaking, fishing, or simply admiring the breathtaking sunsets. Don't forget to visit Portosueno Park, just a 5-minute walk to view the Manatees that frequent the waters!


Accommodation: The property features a spacious and beautifully appointed 4-bedroom, 4-bathroom home. With over 2500sq ft, there's ample space for 12 guests to spread out and feel at home. The interior boasts a blend of modern comfort and coastal charm, providing a welcoming atmosphere throughout.


Living Areas: The living room is a cozy retreat, complete with comfortable seating, a flat-screen TV, and large windows that frame the picturesque bay views. It's the perfect spot to unwind after a day of exploration. Additionally, the property includes a dining area where you can savor delicious meals prepared in the fully equipped kitchen, which features state-of-the-art appliances and all the cookware and utensils you may need.


Outdoor Space: Step outside onto the spacious patio, where you'll find a private oasis. Relax in the lounge chairs while basking in the warm sun or enjoy alfresco dining with a meal cooked on the barbecue grill. The well-maintained yard provides plenty of space for outdoor activities and games.


Amenities: Our vacation rental is designed to provide you with everything you need for a comfortable stay. Amenities include a HEATED POOL, high-speed internet access, air conditioning, laundry facilities, and ample parking space and even a MOVIE THEATRE to enjoy with an 85" OLED screen, and full surround sound. We also provide beach chairs, umbrellas, and towels for your convenience.


Local Attractions: Beyond the beauty of Palma Sola Bay, you'll find an abundance of attractions nearby. Explore the pristine beaches of Anna Maria Island, just a short drive away, or visit the charming historic district of Bradenton for unique shopping and dining experiences. Other popular activities in the area include golfing, nature trails, and visiting the South Florida Museum.


Nearby Services: The property is conveniently located near grocery stores, restaurants, and other essential services, ensuring that your stay is both convenient and enjoyable.


Come and experience the tranquility and natural beauty of this Palma Sola Bay vacation retreat. Whether you're seeking relaxation or exciting adventures, our property provides the perfect home base for your unforgettable vacation. Book your stay with us today and create cherished memories that will last a lifetime.

*Pool Heat is available upon request during September - April for $34 per day*

Other things to note
Pool on the property - be careful with the kiddos!
Rooftop decks - beautiful views, but again, watch the little ones.

Pets are welcome for an additional charge of $125/pet for the whole stay.

Our vacation rental is thoughtfully stocked with a complimentary start-up kit of essential amenities to help you settle in and begin your stay comfortably. This includes items like a small supply of toiletries, paper products, and basic kitchen necessities. Please note that this starter kit is not intended to last for the duration of your stay, but rather to give you time to get situated. Once these initial supplies are used, it is the guest‚Äôs responsibility to purchase any additional items needed for the remainder of the trip.

The space
Magnificently surrounded by lush greenery and with close proximity to the exciting hustle and bustle of Bradenton and its downtown area, you'll feel right at home when staying at Moroccan Moon.

KITCHEN
Our newly remodeled kitchen is nothing short of every chef's dream. Fully equipped with any appliance and supplies you may need, you'll feel right at home cooking in our cozy kitchen. Whether you're putting together a quick breakfast before going out to explore the beauty of Bradenton and AMI, or if you're planning on cooking a full dinner for your family, our kitchen will be your perfect canvas.

- 2 Pack n‚Äô Plays and a Highchair for your little ones
- Central Air Conditioning & Heating
- Unlimited Fast Wi-Fi

Guest access
Guests will have access to the entire house, except for the owner closets.

Other things to note
FURRY FRIENDS
- Prior approval is required. We allow up to 3 dogs for an additional fee of $150/pet/stay.
- Must be fully house-trained.
- Must be completely cleaned up after.
- Leashed at all times when not in a fenced area.
- Crated indoors when not home with the pet.
- If barking becomes an issue during your stay, alternative arrangements must be made.
- Not allowed on indoor furniture, bedding, or in the pool.

KINDLY NOTE
- For your peace of mind, surveillance cameras are located around the exterior of the house. No inside cameras.
- Noise monitors inside and outside the house do not record voice or conversation, they only monitor decibels.
- The heated pool feature is available for an extra $20/night or $400/month (offered from October till May). If you would like to purchase the pool heating feature, please note that it covers the entirety of your stay, and pool heater may take up to 24 hours to reach the desired temp, so kindly let us know before you check-in.
- Pool settings are all scheduled. When booked, pool heat is set to 85 degrees, however, pool temps are impacted if the weather drops below 60 degrees. So, unfortunately, pool temperatures cannot be guaranteed.
- Safety features: fire extinguisher, smoke detector, first aid kit.
- For your comfort, our home is treated quarterly by a professional pest control company. But given our tropical climate, you may still see the occasional bug. Please keep doors and screens closed to help prevent bugs from entering, as no compensation will be provided for any bugs that may come inside.

IMPORTANT NOTE: For the security of our guests, every guest who enters the home during your stay MUST be listed on the reservation. Please, make sure to register the correct number of guests. Undisclosed guests who are not included in the official confirmation can place your stay at risk for early termination without a refund, and will incur an additional charge of $25/undisclosed guest.

TITLE: Twin Palms! Private Pool/Spa, Game Room & More!
Listing Name: Twin Palms! Private Pool/Spa, Game Room & More!
name: Twin Palms! Private Pool/Spa, Game Room & More!
description:
Welcome to Twin Palms Oasis!
‚öìShort drive to the World Class Beaches of Anna Maria Island
‚öìScreened in Heated Private Pool & Spa
‚öìPool Table, Arcade Basketball, Pac-Man, Poker & More
‚öìBeach Chairs, Wagon, Cooler & More
‚öìFamily friendly with pack'n'play
‚öìFully stocked kitchen & BBQ Grill
‚öìHigh-speed Wi-Fi, Smart lock for Self-Check-in
‚öìHeating of the pool is not included in rent and is an additional fee

The space
Escape to tranquility in this private pool home, perfectly situated just off the shores of Anna Maria Island. Indulge in the serenity you've been longing for, with easy access to pristine beaches and a plethora of dining and entertainment options. Within a mere 5 minutes, discover popular shopping districts and culinary delights to satisfy every palate. If you're in town for a local tournament or camp, IMG Academy is conveniently less than 15 minutes away. For a day of riverside adventure, downtown Bradenton, just 3 miles away, beckons with its vibrant Riverwalk, offering family-friendly fun and fitness during the day, and a bustling nightlife scene with charming local bars and restaurants. With Sarasota airport a short 15-minute drive and Tampa airport only 55 minutes away, this centrally located gem ensures you can make the most of everything Bradenton and Anna Maria Island have to offer.

In addition to its unbeatable location, this property boasts charming comfortable furnishings and a beautiful, screened-in pool area surrounded by a palm tree paradise. The kitchen, dining room, and living room offer an open floor plan with different entertainment options for all! The living room boasts plenty of seating so everyone can grab a seat around the Smart TV and watch all your favorite shows or movies. If you are looking for some family fun convert the coffee table into a game table and enjoy your favorite board games. The kitchen comes equipped with a convection oven to help prepare everything you will need to make your favorite home-cooked meals. An additional beverage cooler as well as a fridge in the garage is available for all your favorite drinks. Nestled next to the kitchen, the dining room accommodates a table for six with room for six more at the island.

Just through the sliding glass doors, you will find the screened-in pool area with plenty of seating options to relax in the shade or soak in the Florida sunshine with your favorite book! Take a dip in your private pool to cool off after a long day at the beach or the pool can even be heated during those cold winter months or plunge into the heated spa! Enjoy the giant Connect Four or pull out the Cornhole boards for a competitive game in the tropical backyard. Looking for more entertainment? Head over to the game room/garage where you can enjoy arcade games on the Retro Game Center, a Pool Table, Poker, or Arcade Basketball!

Trying to figure out sleeping arrangements? Bedroom 1, the master bedroom, is on the back right side of the house. The other two bedrooms are on the opposite side of the house and share a bathroom and hallway.
Bedroom 1: King Bed, Smart TV, Ensuite Bathroom, Makeup Vanity
Bedroom 2: Queen Bed, Smart TV, Makeup Vanity
Bedroom 3: 2 Twin-Over-Double Bunk Beds, Makeup Vanity

Looking to explore? Only a short drive, Twin Palms ensures easy access to the sugar-white sands and turquoise waters that make the island a tourist paradise. Engage in thrilling water activities, explore the vibrant local boutiques, and indulge in delectable seafood at waterfront dining establishments that are within walking distance from the house. The island's pristine beaches, like Holmes Beach and Bean Point, offer sun-soaked relaxation and opportunities for water sports such as paddleboarding and parasailing. Pine Avenue serves as a charming hub with boutique shops, art galleries, and eclectic restaurants, providing a perfect blend of local flavors and coastal vibes. For wildlife enthusiasts, the Anna Maria Island City Pier offers spectacular views and the chance to spot dolphins and manatees. Biking along the island's picturesque streets, exploring the historic Anna Maria Island Historical Society, and enjoying fresh seafood at waterfront eateries like the Sandbar Restaurant make for unforgettable experiences. The island's friendly atmosphere and community events, including the Anna Maria Island Art League exhibits and weekly farmers' markets, add to its allure, making it a must-visit destination for those seeking a quintessential Gulf Coast getaway.

*Washer and Dryer Available!
*Garage NOT available for Parking
*The house is equipped with high-speed wireless internet. High-quality towels and linens are provided for your use.
*Pool heat can be added for an additional fee.

*Pool heaters in private homes are locked for your safety and controls must not be tampered with as they are monitored by the pool company. 85¬∞ is the highest heat temperature setting. Pool temperatures will probably stay around 76¬∞ during the winter months. Please note if cold days occur, water temperatures will drop and may take longer to heat.
Damage Waiver: The total cost of your reservation for this Property includes a nightly damage waiver fee (‚ÄúManagement‚Äù), plus tax if applicable (the ‚ÄúDamage Waiver‚Äù).
The Damage Waiver covers you for up to $1,500 of accidental damage to the Property or its contents (such as furniture, fixtures, and appliances) as long as you report the incident to the host prior to checking out. The Damage Waiver fee eliminates the need for a traditional security deposit.

Other things to note
1. Please read the guestbook! Info like trash days, wifi passwords, and other things you need to know is located in the book.
2. Any people other than those in the guest party (renter) are the sole responsibility of the guest (renter). Parties and events are not allowed unless given prior
approval from the management company and paid an event fee. If a party or event did happen at the house an additional fee will be charged to the card on file
based on the property rented.
3. This home is privately owned. The homeowners are not responsible for any accidents, injuries, or illnesses that occur
while on-premises. The homeowners are not responsible for the loss of personal belongings or valuables of the guest. By
accepting this reservation, it is agreed that all guests are expressly assuming the risk of any harm arising from their use
of the premises or others whom they invite to use the premises.
4. Pets are only permitted with prior approval and upon completion of the Pet Addendum to the rental agreement. An additional pet fee does apply.
5. Please be considerate to the neighbors and not have loud music after 10 pm.
6. All items in the home and on the property, including DVD's, CD, books and games are intended for entertainment and
enjoyment of the guests while staying at the house and are not to be removed from the home or property. The only
exception would be those items which are intended for use at the beach.
7. Some properties have keys and garage/ gate remotes, if they are lost its $50 each to replace.
8. Please clean the grills after each use. There will be a $50 cleaning fee charged if grill is not cleaned.
9. No smoking allowed in the house. Smoking is allowed outside only.
($500 cleaning fee applies if found smoking in house or smoke smell)
10. Please follow the departure instructions to help keep our cleaning costs down. We do everything we can to keep the properties in the best shape possible
with your help! If you need anything during your stay please let us know!

name: Cottage w/ Pickleball Outdoor Oasis 2 mi to Beach
description:
Immerse in fun at the charming Cortez Cottage in Bradenton! Enjoy close proximity to the beach and seafood restaurants, plus an outdoor oasis with a heated pool, hot tub, BBQ grill, fire pit, 65" outdoor TV, pickleball, ping pong, and cornhole. Clean and fully equipped, our 3-bedroom home sleeps 12. Praised for our cleanliness and hospitality, we have all you need for an unforgettable family vacation. Join our delighted guests: book your stay at Cortez Cottage, where the beach meets family fun!

The space
**Charming Cortez Cottage: Your Ultimate Family Vacation Haven**

** New for 2025: Brand New Pickleball court!!

Welcome to the charming Cortez Cottage, your perfect family retreat in Bradenton! Nestled just two miles off the spectacular Anna Maria Island, our home puts you right in the heart of fun, relaxation, and the best seafood in the area.

Families rave about our location: we're within a delightful bike ride to the serene beach or historic Bridge Street, while the famed Cortez Fishing Village, dotted with seafood restaurants, is less than a mile away. Yet, the true magic of our property lies in its vibrant outdoor oasis that has guests returning year after year.

Here, you can bask in the warmth of our heated pool (fee applies for pool and hot tub heat), unwind in the hot tub, and indulge in memorable BBQs with friends and family. "The pool and activities were awesome!" writes one guest. When the sun goes down, gather around the fire pit for starlit chats, or curl up with your loved ones on the couch for movie nights outside - our 65" TV brings the cinema to you.

Young ones, too, find endless entertainment at Cortez Cottage. Our range of beach toys, ping pong and cornhole keep you entertained for hours . "Our active family loved the outdoor games and watching movies outside!" notes another guest.

Inside, find your home away from home. Three beautifully furnished bedrooms can accommodate up to 12 guests: the master bedroom features a king bed, the second bedroom has a queen bed, and the third is a children's paradise with two twin bunk beds and a trundle. There's also a pull-out couch with a full bed in the living room and a versatile beanbag that opens into a full bed.

At Cortez Cottage, your comfort is our priority. We've stocked the house with everything you need for a hassle-free vacation, so you can spend less time packing and more time enjoying. And, as our previous guests confirm, cleanliness is paramount to us. "This home was the cleanest I have stayed in," one guest remarked.

Finally, our friendly and responsive hosts, Nathan and his wife, are always on hand to answer any questions and ensure you have a phenomenal stay. As one guest put it: "Nathan was a fabulous host...We are excited to book again for next year!"

So why wait? Reserve your dream family vacation at the Cortez Cottage today!

*Note: There is a fee for use of the pool/hot tub heat and jets.

Other things to note
The heating of the spa/pool and use of the spa jets is available for an additional charge. The cost depends on the time of the year.

SEAMLESS ACCESS TO YOUR VACATION HOME:

GUEST ACCESS:
During your stay, you'll enjoy full access to the entire house, allowing you to make yourself at home and immerse yourself in all the comforts we have to offer. Please note that the owner's closets inside and designated area in the garage are reserved for the owners and will remain inaccessible.

+Kindly be aware of the following points to ensure a smooth and enjoyable stay:

‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî-TERMS AND CONDITIONS
By choosing to book your stay with us, you are agreeing to our established terms and conditions. These terms outline the mutual expectations for both guests and hosts and ensure a positive experience for everyone involved. If you have any questions or concerns about our terms and conditions, please feel free to reach out to us for clarification.

KINDLY NOTE:
- For your peace of mind, surveillance cameras are located around the EXTERIOR of the house (front door camera and front of garage). NO inside cameras.
- Noise monitors are located inside and outside the house do not record voice or conversation, only monitor decibels.

‚Äî‚Äî‚ÄîNO SMOKING OR VAPING ON PREMISES: Smoking and vaping are strictly prohibited within the house premises. We kindly request that all guests refrain from smoking or vaping indoors. If you do wish to smoke, we ask that you use the designated smoking area located near the sidewalk. This policy includes e-cigarettes as well. For those who choose to smoke, we kindly ask that cigarette butts are properly disposed of. Keeping our surroundings clean and welcoming for everyone is a shared responsibility. We appreciate your understanding and cooperation in adhering to our smoke-free policy.

‚Äî‚Äî‚ÄîMUSIC & NOISE: Parties/Events are not allowed. No rowdy or loud music at any time.

‚Äî‚Äî‚ÄîQUIET HOURS: You are vacationing in a residential area and quiet hours are from 10:00pm to 7:00am. Noise levels are strictly enforced after 10pm. Per city ordinance, maximum permissible noise levels are 65 decibels between 7am and 10pm. Maximum permissible noise levels between 10pm and 7am are 50 decibels. Guests are responsible for any fines if police are called.

‚Äî‚Äî-PETS: Pets are not allowed at this time. Thank you for understanding. A fine will happen if unapproved or evidence of any kind of pet is found.

‚Äî‚Äî-MAXIMUM OCCUPANCY: The maximum number of guests is 12. Any other person in the property is the sole responsibility of guest. Guest agrees that any additional persons without approval shall be considered as default and will be asked to vacate the premises with no refund.

‚Äî‚Äî-CHECK IN AND CHECK OUT: Check in is after 4pm. Check out is 10:00am. Guests with a non approved late check out will be charged $50 per 30 minute increment after 10:00am, plus additional charge if it results in canceling of incoming cleaners/guests.

‚Äî‚Äî-USE OF PROPERTY: Keep the property, appliances, and all furnishings in good order. Guests may not make any changes to the property and must put furnishings back to its original placement if moved.

‚Äî‚Äî-MINIMUM AGE REQUIREMENTS: We take reservations only from adult guests age 25 and older. The Guest who reserves the property must be on site the full duration of your stay.

‚Äî‚Äî-PARKING: Parking is limited to 4 vehicles. Vehicles are to be parked in the driveway. Parking on the road is not permitted. Illegally parked cars are subject to towing; applicable fines/towing fees are the sole responsibility of the vehicle owner.

‚Äî‚Äî-POOl/SPA: No glass product whatsoever in or around the pool or spa. Our pool and spa are serviced weekly. We make every attempt to keep the pool/spa as clean as possible, but it is not unusual to find unexpected debris or some mineral stains in the pool because it's located outdoor. GUEST ACKNOWLEDGES THAT POOLS ARE INHERENTLY DANGEROUS, AND GUEST HEREBY ACCEPTS ALL RISK OF PERSONAL INJURY OR DEATH FROM THE USE OF THE POOL OR SPA AND SHALL HOLD PROPERTY OWNERS HARMLESS FROM ANY SUCH INJURY OR DEATH.

‚Äî‚Äî-AIR CONDITIONING: Keep all sliders, doors, and windows closed when the air conditioning system is on. Feel free to adjust the thermostat from 68-78 degrees. Do not adjust below 68 degrees as AC coil will freeze up.

‚Äî‚Äî-HOUSEKEEPING: There is no daily housekeeping service.

‚Äî‚ÄîGARBAGE: Garbage is collected Tuesday and Friday, but Guest needs to be set out Monday & Thursday night if their reservations aligns with those dates (except for holidays). The blue Garbage Bin is for yard wast only. Sadly, there are no recycling bins.

‚Äî‚Äî-WILDLIFE/PEST: Pest controls are scheduled quarterly, however we sometimes expect some unwanted visitors from nature.

‚Äî‚Äî-CANDLES: Use of candles are prohibited due to fire safety hazards.

‚Äî‚Äî-GAS GRILL: Grill and tank are provided, please refill propane at local Publix or CVS as needed. Please empty grease drip tray, turn off the gas valve securely after each and please be so kind to clean :)

‚Äî‚Äî-FIRE PIT: Turn off the gas valve securely after each use. Guest are responsible to refill propane tank at local Publix or CVS as needed.

‚Äî‚Äî-RIGHT OF ENTRY: Upon 24 hours notice, owner or owner's representative(s), have the right to enter the home for the purpose of showing the property to prospective tenants or purchasers, to make repairs, or to inspect the property. Owner, property manager, and/or its Representatives have immediate right of entry in cases of emergency, or to protect or preserve the premises.

We take great pride in maintaining our property to ensure that our guests have a comfortable and enjoyable stay. To that end, we have scheduled maintenance tasks that we would like to inform you about.

* Our pool is cleaned once a week, on Mondays (subject to change)
* Our landscaper comes once a week on Wednesdays (subject to change)
* We also have a scheduled quarterly lawn-care pest control service, although we cannot guarantee the specific days this will occur as it depends on the vendor's schedule

Our maintenance schedule may change due to weather or other unforeseen circumstances. If any changes do occur, we will do our best to inform you in advance.

‚Äî‚Äî-MAINTENANCE: Owner shall be responsible for maintaining the home unless damage is caused by the Guest's misuse or neglect. Guest agrees that no rent reduction or abatement will be given unless the property is deemed to be completely uninhabitable. Owner will order repairs in a timely manner once notice is given by Guest, but owner has no control over the scheduling availability of vendors. Owner shall not be liable for any losses or damages, including incidental or consequential damages, including those caused by owner's failure to perform repairs and maintain the home. All personal property of the Guests kept on the premises is at risk of the Guest. Nonscheduled pool cleans will be the responsibility of the guests).

‚Äî‚Äî-LIABILITY/RISK: The Owners are not responsible for any accidents, injuries or illness that occurs while on the premises. The Owners are not responsible for any accidents, injuries, or illness that occurs off the premises while using equipment provided as part of the rental, such as beach chairs, bikes, beach umbrellas, and beach wagon. The Owners are not responsible for the loss of personal belongings or valuables of the guest. By accepting this reservation, it is agreed that all guests are expressly assuming the risk of any harm arising, including death, from their use of the premises and equipment taken off the premises. This applies to others whom the guest invites to use the premises or equipment.

We kindly request that all guests join us in this endeavor by adhering to a few simple guidelines:
* Quiet Hours: We ask that guests observe quiet hours between 10pm-7am, ensuring a peaceful ambiance for everyone. Please be mindful of noise levels, especially during these hours.
* Respectful Behavior: Kindly treat our neighbors with consideration and respect. Refrain from loud music, conversations, or any activities that might disturb the area.
* Parking: If you have a vehicle, please park it in designated areas to avoid inconveniencing neighbors. If you require information about parking options, feel free to ask.
* Waste Disposal: Properly dispose of trash in designated bins. Keeping the neighborhood clean is a collective effort.

By adhering to these guidelines, you're not only ensuring a pleasant stay for yourself but also contributing to the well-being of the community we're proud to be a part of. Thank you for choosing "The Salt House." We look forward to hosting you in our peaceful haven!

TITLE: Coastal Escape: Htd Pool~Tiki Bar~Hot Tub~Fire Pit
Listing Name: Coastal Escape: Htd Pool~Tiki Bar~Hot Tub~Fire Pit
name: Coastal Escape: Htd Pool~Tiki Bar~Hot Tub~Fire Pit
description:
Endless Summer Cottage ‚Äì Ultimate Coastal Escape Close to Anna Maria Island w/ Tiki-Bar, Heated Pool, Hot Tub, Firepit, Arcade, Games, Beach Equipment, Pack-n-Play, High-Chair, Toddler Bed

Get ready to experience the perfect blend of relaxation and adventure at Endless Summer Cottage, our freshly remodeled Bradenton home just six miles from the pristine shores of Anna Maria Island, Florida. This well-appointed retreat is designed for large groups, comfortably accommodating up to 12 guests.

The space
EXCEPTIONAL ACCOMODATIONS: 4 beautifully furnished bedrooms with 3 King Beds and 2 Double Bed Bunks, providing ample sleeping space for up to 12 guests.

SPACIOUS BEDROOMS: Each bedroom features large closets with hangers, and two of the three king bedrooms are equipped with large televisions for your viewing pleasure. The bunk room also has a television.

BATHROOMS: 2 full bathrooms equipped with all essentials for your convenience, one of which is attached to the bunk room.

SCREENED POOL: Enjoy a dip in the screened pool, complete with heating option, sun-loungers, high-top table with bar stools, additional seating, and pool floaties for endless fun in the sun.

HOT TUB: Relax and unwind in the inviting hot tub.

GAS FIREPIT: Gather around the gas firepit (propane included) with 8 Adirondack chairs for cozy evenings under the stars.

TIKI-HUT BAR: Sip on your favorite beverages at the Tiki-hut bar, which seats six and has a large cooler for keeping your favorite beverages cold.

WELL-APPOINTED LIVING ROOM: A spacious living area with a comfortable section and an 65-inch television for ultimate entertainment.

ENTERTAINMENT: Cable TV with a wide selection of channels, Xumo StreamBox, Roku, and a large, air-conditioned lanai featuring a sectional and chairs, a Pool/Ping Pong and game table, dart board, large light up Bluetooth speaker, and a dining table for six.

COFFEE BAR/BEVERAGE CENTER: Fully stocked with a French press, electric tea pot, coffee grinder, microwave, mini-refrigerator, Keurig/Drip coffee combo with coffee and hot chocolate pods, creamer, and sugar/sweetener.

FULLY STOCKED KITCHEN: The kitchen is equipped with a full set of cooking pans, baking pans, cookie sheets, waffle maker, griddle, air fryer, cutting boards, serving platters, storage containers, 35 utensils, charcuterie boards, spices, measuring cups and spoons, cutting board with knives, steak knives, stainless steel mixing bowls, electric mixer, blender, children‚Äôs dishes, glasses and silverware, a toaster, rice cooker, wine glasses, plastic plates and glasses, and plates and silverware for a service for 12. Everything you need for a great cooking and dining experience.

OUTDOOR DINING: A large lit patio with seating for 10, a large umbrella, and a new gas grill with grill accessories (propane included) for delightful outdoor meals.

GAME ROOM: Features Foosball, Shuffleboard, Video Games machines (NBA and Pac-Man), kids chairs, and a large TV.

FAMILY FRIENDLY AMENITIES: Games, books, puzzles, and toys for families and children, plus a blow-up toddler bed with pump, high-chair, and pack-n-play.

BEACH EQUIPMENT: Includes a folding wagon, eight Tommy Bahama backpack-style beach chairs with matching sun umbrella, spike ball, beach toys, floaties with air-pump, and beach blanket for fun days at the beach.

LINENS AND TOWELS: Linens are supplied, along with bath and pool towels for your convenience.

OUTDOOR GAMES: Enjoy a large Jenga game, spike ball, and light-up cornhole/beanbag boards for extra fun.

YARD AMBIENCE: The yard is adorned with tiki torches and string lights, creating a magical evening atmosphere.

COLORFUL AND UNIQUE DECOR: The entire space was designed and decorated by a professional design company, making it colorful and unique.

NEARBY ATTRACTIONS:

Located close to a variety of fantastic attractions, which will be sent to you via our electronic guestbook, Endless Summer Cottage ensures that there‚Äôs always something exciting to do nearby:

* ANNA MARIA ISLAND: (5.9 miles) Visit Anna Maria Island for beaches, restaurants, and shopping, and outdoor adventures

* ROBINSON PRESERVE: (5.3 miles) Nature preserve featuring scenic trails, kayaking, and diverse wildlife habitats

* LECOM PARK: (4.4 miles) Historic baseball stadium serving as the training camp home for the Pittsburg Pirates

* PINEBROOK IRONWOOD GOLF COURSE: (1.5 miles) Beautiful 18-hole course for all skill levels

* BOWLERO : (1.9 miles) Perfect for a casual outing with family or friends

* SMUGGLERS COVE ADVENTURE GOLF: (3.2 miles) Pirate themed mini golf with lush landscaping and live alligator feedings

* DESOTO NATIONAL MEMORIAL: (4.6 miles) Historical exhibits, nature trails, and waterfront views

* YMCA: (.4 MILES): Access to fitness facilities and activities

* G.T. BRAY RECREATIONAL PARK: (0.8 miles) featuring a skate park, pickleball, clay tennis courts, an Olympic-sized pool, a pool with a splash pad (for a fee), playground, soccer field, frisbee golf, volleyball, rental pavilions, and basketball courts

* BRADENTON RIVER WALK : (5.9 Miles) A vibrant waterfront park along the Manatee River, featuring walking trails, art installations, a playground and skatepark and space for events and recreation

CORTEZ FISHING VILLAGE: (4.4 Miles) Enjoy some old-Florida charm and some fresh seafood in the various restaurants in this working fishing community

IMG ACADEMY : (3.1 Miles) World-renowned sports training facility and educational institution

PALMA SOLA BOTANICAL PARK : (5.2 Miles) A garden oasis featuring exotic plants, tranquil lakes, and charming picnic areas

AND SO MUCH MORE! Multiple fishing piers, guided fishing trips, kayaking adventures, boat and jet ski tours, vibrant bars, breweries, and restaurants and even a lively Saturday farmers market.

WHY YOU'LL LOVE IT HERE:
Located in a serene neighborhood, Endless Summer Cottage offers a peaceful escape while being close to the vibrant attractions of Anna Maria Island. From sun-soaked beach days to cozy evenings by the firepit, your stay here will be filled with unforgettable memories. Perfect for a family getaway, group vacation, or a relaxing getaway with friends.

TITLE: Private oasis close to AMI with Pool and Spa!
Listing Name: Private oasis close to AMI with Pool and Spa!
name: Private oasis close to AMI with Pool and Spa!
description:
Right on the water with canal access in the back yard
Private swimming pool and hot tub overlooking the water
Kayaks included at the property for you to enjoy
Private Dock to fish off
Short drive to Anna Maria Island

As you walk into the property from the main entrance you will be welcomed with an open gathering room. To the left you will find two bedrooms one that has a queen bed and one bedroom has three beds (2 twins and a full). Between those two rooms you will also have

The space
Right on the water with canal access in the back yard
Private swimming pool and hot tub overlooking the water
Kayaks included at the property for you to enjoyand
Private Dock to fish off
Short drive to Anna Maria Island

As you walk into the property from the main entrance you will be welcomed with an open gathering room. To the left you will find two bedrooms one that has a queen bed and one bedroom has three beds (2 twins and a full).

Between those two rooms you will also have a full guest bathroom as well. Walking back out into the open family room you will start to notice to see the beautiful large picture window in the back of the house which overlooks the pool, hot tub and canals.

As you walk towards the back to see the views you will go past the gourmet kitchen with all of the niceties you could need for your stay.

Before you walk out to the breathtaking back yard, across the from the kitchen you will find the master suite which has a king bed very large walk-in closet, and the master bathroom.

As you walk back out of the master the door to your left will be the garage which is where the washer and dryer are if you need to do laundry during your stay.

Walking back into the house, you will see the dining room set in front of the large picture window, so you can enjoy your dinner overlooking the water and beautiful scenery. As you walk towards the back door you will step down into another gathering area where you can watch tv and enjoy time with your family inside.

Once it's time to go outside, exit from that room through the sliding glass doors to the enclosed back yard and enjoy a swim in the pool, or a relaxing soak in the hot tub. When you get outside, you will notice that there is a dock that you can use to launch the kayaks that are available for your enjoyment, in the garage!! Make sure you're wearing a provided life vest though in the deck box on the dock.

Prefer something a little slower? Bring a chair down on the dock and do some fishing on the calm waters of the canal! Staying at the SUNSET OASIS, you will get to see just how beautiful those sunsets are over the pool and canals, while you are enjoying a cocktail sitting around the outdoor fireplace with your loved ones.

*Pool Heat is available upon request during September - April for $34 per day*

Other things to note
Lots of water, be mindful with little ones!
Steps down into Florida room and to get outside
Need to drive most places, short drive to AMI
Use of the hot tub and dock/canal are at guests own risk.

Our vacation rental is thoughtfully stocked with a complimentary start-up kit of essential amenities to help you settle in and begin your stay comfortably. This includes items like a small supply of toiletries, paper products, and basic kitchen necessities. Please note that this starter kit is not intended to last for the duration of your stay, but rather to give you time to get situated. TITLE: Canal front, dock, heated Pool, near AMI+IMG
Listing Name: Canal front, dock, heated Pool, near AMI+IMG
name: Canal front, dock, heated Pool, near AMI+IMG
description:
Fall in Love with the Gulf Coast Lifestyle!
This inviting and charming canal-front home located in the boating community of San Remo Shores with a beautiful pool area offers a perfect blend of indoor and outdoor coastal living to enjoy a relaxing vacation.
Enjoy the convenience of docking your boat right in your backyard, making it easy to explore the beautiful crystal-clear water of the Gulf of Mexico. Its just a short drive away from the wonderful white sandy beaches of Anna Maria Island.

The space
Come in, you are welcome to feel at home!
This beautiful and updated house offers a genius open living area, providing the ideal spot for family and friends to gather for meal relaxation and entertainment.
Every room in this home has a nice view of the water and a private access to the stunning outdoor area.
Open the sliding glass doors and you are instantly in vacation mode!

Wind down on the lounge chairs by the pool and enjoy the feeling of sun kissed skin.
Play a fun game of Corn hole along the canal. If you need to cool off, jump in the sparkling pool, take refreshing dips, relax on the floats or have a cool drink in the shadow of the covered patio with cozy lounge furniture.
The private boat dock can accommodate up to 22‚Äô boat, and you can lounge right into Sarasota Bay.
The dock is the perfect place to start the day with a freshly brewed coffee, sitting on the Adirondack chairs and planning new wonderful adventures while watching boats and Pelicans pass or lovely manatees swim behind the dock.
Cast your fishing line into water by the canal and cook your catch of the day on the outdoor BBQ grill.
You will love the calming experience, sitting outside watching the unique sunset.
The living room offers a comfortable sofa, three accent chairs and a 65‚Äù TV where you can spend the evening with your loved ones after a sun drenched day, watch your favorite TV show, play games or have fun with a match on the Foosball table.
The new kitchen is fully equipped with Quartz countertops, stainless steel appliances, and an extra beverage fridge to keep your favorite drinks cool. You will find all the pots and pans, the dishes and utensils you need to prepare a nice breakfast, a delicious dinner or to bake a cake.
A drip- and a Keurig coffee maker, hand mixer, blender, toaster and microwave a provided.
The pantry has a lot of space to store all your groceries. The nice kitchen island with four bar stools is ideal to entertain your guests while prepare a perfect meal.
Enjoy a formal meal at the dining table with seating for 6 or bring the party to the patio.
After an eventful day, rest and refresh in the calmness primary bedroom.
All bedrooms have a stunning room of the water and a private access to the pool area.
The split Floor plan is ideal for families or multiple couples.
The primary bedroom has a king-size bed, a 55" TV, a quiet workplace and a spacious walk-in closet.
There is a comfortable en suite bathroom with a double vanity, walk-in-double shower, and relaxing bathtub.
On the other side of the house, you will find the two guest rooms.
The second bedroom offers a king-size bed and a 43" TV.
The third bedroom is geared towards the kiddos and features 2 twin beds, various games and books for the young ones. It also has a walk-in closet adjacent to the room.
The shared hallway bathroom has a double vanity and a walk-in shower.
Guests will be happy about the direct access to the pool area so you won‚Äôt have wet footprints in the house. The laundry room offers a washer and a dryer. Detergent pods are provided.
Book your stay and make unforgettable memories in this idyllic vacation retreat!

Guest access
The entire house is for the guests to use except for one owner closet next to the laundry room.
Currently the garage cannot be used either.

There is a shed on the left side of the house. There you can find all the beach gear, like beach chairs, umbrella, cooler, beach wagon, corn hole and other outdoor games.

Other things to note
Signing guest must be at least 25 years old and must be present as a guest in the house during time booked.

Please be mindful of our neighbors!
We are lucky to have very kind and friendly neighbors. Quiet time hours 10pm ‚Äì 7am. No parties or events are allowed. Exceeding the noise audience could result in disciplinary actions including fines and/or termination of your rental agreement without refund.

Smoking is not allowed!
Pets are not allowed!

Pool and Deck:
Never leave children unattended!
There is a danger of drowning in the pool or in the canal!

The pool is heated up to 80 degrees Fahrenheit and can be heated upon request to 86 degrees for an additional $20/night. This is used to cover our energy costs, and is charged as an extra fee in order to keep our nightly rate low for guests who choose not to heat the pool. It is highly recommended to heat the pool, if you plan to swim October-May, as while 80 is an acceptable swimming temperature, 86 is much more comfortable for spending extended time floating in the pool. Should the Temperatures drop too low overnight (below 65 degrees) we are not heating the pool, since it will not be able to reach the desired temperature.
Please let us know in advance if you would like the pool heated, as it can take 12-24hours to warm up and we want to ensure you can enjoy it for your whole stay. Cold temperatures may impact the pool heaters ability to maintain the desired temperature. No refunds will be offered due to the weather conditions or other factors outside of our control.

! Please note that there is not a safety fence or alarm separating the pool and canal from the home, so additional supervision of children is required !
The Boat Lift is not included since we are using it for our own boat. But you can tie your boat to the dock.
Parking:
The property has 2 Car spaces in front of the garage.
There is one additional parking spot within the circular driveway.
Boats and RVs are not allowed.

This property is externally monitored (non-private areas) with security cameras.
The cameras cover the garage area and front entry and the boat lift / dock area. The pool area is not monitored.

We are just a phone call or text message away, if you have any questions or concerns. Please don't hesitate to contact us!

‚≠ê PET FRIENDLY!

- Prior approval is kindly required. We allow up to 3 dogs for an additional fee of $150/pet/stay.

‚≠ê Kindly Note!

- We provide free parking on the premises on driveway up to 4 medium cars.

- Pool settings are all scheduled. When booked, pool heat is set to 85 degrees, however, pool temps are impacted if the weather drops below 60 degrees. So, unfortunately, pool temperatures cannot be guaranteed.

- For your comfort, our home is treated quarterly by a professional pest control company. But given our tropical climate, you may still see the occasional bug. Please keep doors and screens closed to help prevent bugs from entering, as no compensation will be provided for any bugs that may come inside.

- Liability/Risk: The hosts/co-hosts are not responsible for any accidents, injuries, or illness that occurs while ON or OFF the premises while using equipment provided as part of the rental, including but not limited to pool, spas, stairs, or playsets. üöóPARKINGüöô
Driveway parking only. Room for 5 cars. Please no parking on the grass

Bbq üçñ notification. The bbq grill is cleaned after every guest. But this is only on the grill grates(where you cook on) below is very hard to clean, and is very time consuming to do so. It does get deep cleaned every few weeks. But know regardless of how it looks, the grate where you cook your food is clean and hygienic.

POOLSIDE
***please be aware that you will swim at your own risk, this is a private home, there is no lifeguard***

Chairs and games-
There are many lounge chairs as well as corn hole and bocci ball. If you move any furniture around or use any of the life vests or pool toys we do ask that you please put back where you got them from when you leave. Thank you

Grill and Fireplace-
The grill and fireplace are both gas and have a propane tanks provided. We do not refill the propane tanks. If it does not have any gas there is one spare under the sink in the lanai, we ask that if you use the spare you please go refill the tank at the local gas station, Uhaul, or home depot nearby and we will reimburse you.

Please shut off propane after each use.
Please clean grill after each use ( $50 charge if grill is not cleaned)

4 lounge chairs, 2 Boogie Boards, Beach umbrella, cooler with wheels, and sand toys.

If you take to the beach please bring back in same condition and put back the beach stuff where you got it

üóëGarbage
Garbage and recycling truck comes on Tuesdays 10am. Because it only comes one time a week there could be trash in the garbage can that does not belong to you. If your stay is during a Tuesday we ask if you could possibly take out the trash. It is to be placed near the side of the road by the mailbox. Please bring garbage cans back to the side of the house after they collect the trash.This is very important in keeping the house clean. Thank you so much for your help with this.

BUGS
Florida is a tropical place. We pay for pest control and they spray very often but please know there will occasionally be a bug found. Mosquitos can also be around usually in the evening, and more so after its rained. Lizards will be seen outside in the yard and sometimes on the screened in lanai.

BUSY ROAD
We are very centrally located in Bradenton, you can get anywhere relatively quickly, because of this our road can get busy during rush hour.

POOL SAFETY GATE
The yard is fenced in however, there is no fence going directly around the pool. Once exiting the home you go out into a screened in lanai area. From there you have to go out the screened lanai to get into the pool. Because there is not a fence directly around the pool! Children should NEVER be left unattended outside.
Thank you!!üòÉ

We always highly advise our guest to purchase travel insurance, that way if there is ever any family emergency or any unforeseen circumstances that come up, you are able to cancel and get refunded by the travel insurance company.
Thank you.üëçüèª

name: Heated Pool-Game Room-EV-Near AMI Beaches/IMG!
description:
Enjoy Florida's endless summer in this updated tropical home! Your private screened lanai is perfect for seamless indoor/outdoor living, with a heated pool and covered dining/lounge area with a 58" outdoor TV! The interior of the home is bright and open with cheerful coastal decor and plenty of room to spread out. We provide everything you need with a well-stocked kitchen, gas grill, game room, beach gear, towels, EV Charger! Quiet neighborhood yet quick to AMI, IMG, parks, shopping, and dining!

The space
Guests love that nearly every room in this 3 bedroom/2 full bathroom home flows to the heated swimming pool and newly renovated outdoor space! The backyard is very private, and faces a small lake that brings tropical birds and wildlife watching opportunities. You will love sitting outside with your morning coffee and watching the sunrise! The garage game room has a ping-pong table, dart board, and foosball table for extra fun when you need a break from the sun.

The split bedroom floor plan is ideal for families on vacation or in town for a tournament, multiple couples, or snowbirds who want to invite the grandkids on vacation.
- The primary bedroom has a king bed and large sliding doors that flow right out to the swimming pool. There is a large en-suite bathroom with a walk-in tile shower, double sinks, and a soaking tub.
- The second bedroom has a king bed with a large closet and sliding door access to the pool.
- The third bedroom has sleeping space for four with a twin and full bed, plus twin trundle bed.

The 2nd bathroom conveniently also opens directly to the pool! There is a queen sofa sleeper in the living room for additional sleeping space. We also have everything you need to keep your little ones comfortable, including a folding crib, pack n' play, high chair, life vests/puddle jumper, and baby dishes and toys.

The kitchen is newly updated and fully equipped for making meals at home, with granite countertops and full-sized stainless appliances, an extra beverage fridge to store your drinks, and all the dishes, pots and pans, and utensils you need. A drip and Keurig coffee maker, French press, blender, toaster, and microwave are provided. With counter stools for 4, a dining table with seating for 6, and a patio table outside, there is plenty of seating options for meals.
The living room is the perfect place to relax after a long day of fun, with a huge cozy sectional, electric fireplace, and Roku TV.

Amenities and Extras:
Included for our guests to use are a gas grill, washer and dryer, pool floats, board games, and beach gear (chairs, toys, umbrella, coolers and towels). Guests are welcomed to the home with a few samples of local coffee and hotel-sized toiletries. Laundry pods, dishwasher detergent, dish soap, trash bags, and toilet paper are included. Extra supplies may need to be purchased by guest depending on use/length of stay.

Guest access
Guests can access all of the home with the exception of one locked closet with the owner's personal items.

Other things to note
POOL INFORMATION:
- The pool is heated to 86¬∞ for no additional charge.
- Cold temperatures may impact the pool heater's ability to maintain the desired temperature. No refunds will be offered due to weather conditions or other factors outside of our control.
- While we have a professional service that regularly cleans and maintains the pool, we do not offer 24/7 pool maintenance you may find at a resort or hotel. It may be necessary to use the provided net and remove debris or other things that may fall into the pool before use just as a homeowner would. Pool service usually arrives on Wednesday mornings, but as we contract with an external company, we are unable to fully control their schedule.
- Please note that there is not a safety fence or alarms separating the pool from the home, so additional supervision of young children will be required.

FREE LEVEL 2 EV CHARGING! J1772 Plug Provided.

Please read all house rules before booking.
