name: A Wave From It All in Bradenton
description:
**ASK ABOUT LAST MINUTE DEALS!

You and your loved ones can get A Wave From It All at this big, family-friendly 4-bedroom house, conveniently located in northwest Bradenton!

You will be completely relaxed in the fantastic layout located in a close-knit, quiet residential community.

With three bedrooms and two bathrooms downstairs and a big primary bedroom suite upstairs, it's the perfect setup for your family. The entire second floor is dedicated to the primary bedroom suite.

The space
It features a grand king bed, 55" SMART TV, two walk-in closets, two separate sinks and vanities, a walk-in shower, with custom tiles, and a spa tub big enough to share. You may never come out!

On the main level, are three additional bedrooms including two rooms with a queen bed in each, and two sets of twin bunk beds tucked in the back corner bedroom for extra coziness. Each of the three downstairs bedrooms features a 43" SMART TV so everyone can enjoy their own programs!

These downstairs bedrooms share two additional bathrooms, one with a walk-in shower, and the other with a combination tub and shower and double vanity.

Family time is encouraged with loads of fun in the large living area, which offers an 82" SMART TV, as well as a game table and comfy chair and ottoman set up for reading a good book.

Meal prep for a family will be a cinch in the large, updated kitchen! With loads of counter space, plenty of cabinets, and more than enough tools and equipment for anything you might be planning to cook, your family won't go hungry! The long breakfast bar will be a great place for the non-chefs in your group to chat (or help with drying the dishes!) while their meal is being expertly handled in the kitchen. All are included at the large dining room table that comfortably seats 10and soon to be your family's favorite gathering place for meals, conversation, games, and memory-making.

Just off the dining and living areas, you'll enjoy the screened-in pool and patio area with access from each room. The pool is heated year-round to ensure it's always a comfortable temperature, weather permitting, for a swim. Off the patio to one side is a totally private open patio with chaises for sunbathing, along with a gas grill for when you're in the mood for barbeque.

To the other side of the pool area is a large space for your family's corn hole tournament, and beyond that, a fire table is set up for telling stories around the campfire. Don't forget the marshmallows!

The entire backyard is completely fenced in for privacy, as well as the safety of your small dog, should one be traveling with you.

With such a great house, you might decide to stay right there for your entire vacation! However, when you're ready to explore, you'll find northwest Bradenton and nearby Anna Maria Island to are filled with plenty of fun things to do and see.

For recreation opportunities, you couldn't be in a better spot! This home is perfectly situated for bike rides and walks that take you through quiet residential streets. Want to bring or rent kayaks? You can launch them at the public ramp at the end of 59th Street. A few blocks in the other direction you can discover the GT Bray Recreation Center, which is considered Manatee County's recreational hub. Complete with a dog park, fitness center, outdoor pool, baseball fields, racquetball courts, tennis courts, you name it!

As if all this wasn't enough, a stay at this wonderful home also gives you easy access to the world-famous beaches of Anna Maria Island, the DeSoto National Memorial, Robinson Preserve, downtown Bradenton, shops, restaurants, and, a little further afield, the myriad cultural, dining, and shopping opportunities to be found in Sarasota.

A Wave Away sleeps a maximum of 10 people in one king, two queens, and two twin bunk beds.

*PET OWNERS: This property is dog friendly for one dog with a maximum weight of 25 pounds and a non-refundable pet fee of $150 for the first week. There is a $50 fee per week for any additional weeks booked. Also, certain breeds are excluded. It is necessary that you check with our office prior to your trip for details on weight and breed limitations.

A NOTE ABOUT POOL HEAT: If you book online, your reservation will automatically populate with a pool heat charge for one week. If your reservation is for a longer period, someone on our staff will adjust the pool heat rate to reflect the longer stay. We recommend pool heat at this property, regardless of the time of year, as pools near shady trees stay cooler, even in the summer.

Welcome to The Cortez Retreat!

Additionally, Ana Maria Island is 11 miles, Lido Beach 12 miles, Coquina Beach 9 miles, and Longboat Key 12 miles from home!

The space
The tranquil Cortez Retreat boasts 3,500 square-feet of luxurious living, wide open and bright! It has been entirely remodeled with stylish new furnishings and d√©cor. The classy kitchen is open to a dining area that seats 8 in addition to 3 island stools. Kitchen also includes stainless steel appliances, center island and granite counters.

The kitchen is fully stocked and includes: drinking glasses, coffee mugs, kid-friendly dinnerware, pots and pans, cooking utensils, mixing bowls, baking dishes, cookie sheets, toaster, blender, can opener, wine opener, measuring cups/spoons, coffee maker (including complimentary coffee, filters and creamer)!

‚òÖ Gas Grill
Gas Griddle with propane tank is provided. We do not refill the tank. So, when it goes empty, please feel free to exchange the tank at a local gas station or Home Depot for around $20.Please empty grease drip tray, turn off the gas valve securely after each use.

Central air

Toilet paper, paper towels, basic food seasonings, dish soap, dishwasher detergent, shower soap, etc. provided!

-Pets allowed up to 15 lbs. on a case-by-case basis for an $150 additional pet fee per pet ( up to 2 pets max). They must be completely cleaned up after. name: Lux pool home w/ lakefront view just mins to beach
description:
Welcome to Tropical Tranquility!

Close proximity to Lakewood Ranch, Sarasota, and Tampa
Short drive to beaches
Fully stocked kitchen for all of your favorite home cooked meals
High speed Wi-Fi included
Smart lock for Self Check-in

The space
This beautiful, newly renovated, and furnished 4 bedroom 2 bath home in NW Bradenton with a screened-in pool area sleeps 12 and is in great proximity to everything you could want or need while on vacation! Located in a prime location in Bradenton, you are just a short drive from local groceries, shopping, and the white sandy beaches of Anna Maria Island!

When arriving at the property you will be greeted by the large yard with mature flora that will help you feel the relaxation of being on vacation. When walking in through the front door you will instantly be welcomed to the open floorplan that blends the living room, kitchen, dining room, and Florida room all into one. With this floorplan, you can cook, eat, watch TV, or even play pool without having to leave the company of your family or guests. To make the house feel even more like one big room full of excitement, through the Florida room you can open up the sliding glass doors and walk straight out onto the pool deck with plenty of seating options that look out onto a lake behind.

Heading to the kitchen you will be dazzled by the sleek, modern cabinetry that is accented with gold fixtures and shiny new stainless appliances. Here you will be able to make any dish you love from home and enjoy the finished project on the other side of the huge island where there are stools available for up to 5 people. Need more space? Just beside the kitchen, there is a sturdy wooden dining table with room for 6 more people. Enjoy a little competition? Have fun playing pool or table tennis while overlooking the pool area off the back. For your pleasure, an additional liquor/wet bar and mini fridge are located just off this area for easy access!

Trying to figure out sleeping arrangements? The master bedroom is on the left side of the house and offers a king bed, smart tv, and ensuite bathroom. The remaining bedrooms are on the right side of the house with various sleeping accommodations to make it easy for any family or group to choose their rooms. Bedroom 2 offers a Queen bed with a twin trundle and a TV, Bedroom 3 offers a Twin over Double Bunk Bed with a twin trundle and a TV, and bedroom 4 is located with access to the pool with a twin bed. There is also a sleeper sofa available in the living room for larger groups.

name: Coral Shores! Pool, Spa, Dock and Putting Green!
description:
Coral Shores by AMI Locals
5304 Coral Blvd, Bradenton, FL 34210

Welcome to Coral Shores! This beautifully updated three bedroom, two and a half bath canal-front home in Bradenton combines modern luxury with coastal charm. With a large private pool, hot tub, a putting green, and private dock, this vacation rental is perfect for families and friends seeking a Florida Gulf Coast getaway just minutes from Anna Maria Island‚Äôs white sandy beaches!

The space
Highlights
-Canal front with private dock
-4 miles to Anna Maria Island beaches
-3 Bedrooms / 2.5 Bathrooms
-2 King beds, Bunk with 2 Twins over 1 Full
-Private pool with spa and sun shelf
-Putting green
-Multiple living areas and TVs
-Near Ungarelli Preserve, Palma Sola Park, and shops
-4 Parking Spaces

Enjoy your own private oasis with a sparkling pool and spa, sun loungers, and a covered patio complete with dining table, TV, and plenty of seating. Test your short game on the putting green or relax on Adirondack chairs along the dock while casting a fishing line or watching boats cruise the canal. You‚Äôll have easy access to Sarasota Bay for kayaking, paddleboarding, and water adventures.

Inside, the open concept design is perfect for entertainment. The contemporary kitchen boasts stainless steel appliances, an expansive island with bar seating, and all the cookware you‚Äôll need for home dining. The dining room table seats six, while the living room features a plush sectional and TV. Additional seating areas, including a bonus den with stunning canal views, ensure everyone has space to spread out and relax.

The primary suite is a stylish retreat with a King bed, ensuite bathroom, double vanity, walk-in shower, and direct access to the backyard patio. A second King bedroom, including a TV, provides comfort for couples, while the third bedroom is kid-friendly with a unique bunk bed, built-in desk, and playful seating area. A shared hallway bathroom with double vanity and walk-in shower serves the guest rooms, and a half bath conveniently opens to the pool patio.

Room Details
-Primary Bedroom: King bed, patio access, ensuite bathroom with walk-in shower
-Second Bedroom: King bed
-Third Bedroom: 2 Twins over Full bunk beds
-Bonus: Half bathroom with pool access

Located in a quiet Bradenton neighborhood just minutes from Anna Maria Island. Explore Ungarelli Preserve or Palma Sola Park, enjoy dining at local waterfront restaurants, or spend your days fishing or lounging poolside.

Book your stay at Coral Shores today with AMI Locals and create unforgettable Gulf Coast memories!

Other things to note
*Please note: The boat lift is for owner use only*

4 cars maximum are able to park at this home. We ask our guests to please plan accordingly and coordinate with your group. There is no overnight parking available for additional vehicles.

This home is managed by AMI Locals, an Anna Maria Island property management company.

This property does not allows pets.

We do not accept reservations from anyone under 25 years of age. We do not allow persons under 25 to occupy a property unless accompanied by someone over 25 years of age.

Please see our AMI Locals Rental Policies for full details.

Please Remember: "You are vacationing in a residential area. Please be a good neighbor by keeping the noise to a respectful level during the day and night. Excessive and unreasonable noise can deprive neighbors of the peaceful enjoyment of their private property." *Exceeding the noise ordinance could result in disciplinary actions including fines and/or termination of your rental agreement without refund.

TITLE: Casa Di Amici Saltwater Pool Home on Canal by AMI!
Listing Name: Casa Di Amici Saltwater Pool Home on Canal by AMI!
name: Casa Di Amici Saltwater Pool Home on Canal by AMI!
description:
This beautiful home is the ideal vacation with its spacious layout, large living room with the comfiest couch & large TV, screened in & open patios, heated saltwater pool, & dock! Not only does it have all the best amenities but is in the perfect location- a 5 minute drive to Bradenton Beach, restaurants, & shopping! Here you'll find a fully equipped kitchen, comfy beds with quality linens, games, beach essentials, & more. With top notch host communication, we're sure you'll love your stay!

The space
This is an established vacation rental! Formerly "Bamboo Terrace", now under new ownership with the same Superhosts! This sought after 3BR/2 Bath vacation rental is adding amenities and upgrading furnishings! They recently added a whole home water filter, new landscaping, new patio furniture, and more! This beautiful home with large, newly heated saltwater pool sits on a deep, salt water canal with a boat dock.

This home is a mid-century treasure with a split layout, large fully equipped kitchen, two living areas conjoined into one open space, a beautiful pool on the canal, and a huge screened in lanai with outdoor furniture and dining table. Everything you need for you vacation in paradise!

Each bedroom has a TV (with streaming capabilities- bring your Roku or FireStick!) and the living room TV has cable (as well as the main bedroom).

Two full bathrooms, both with showers and one with a garden tub, are fully updated and sparkling clean. The laundry room, off of the main bedroom, is basically the size of another bedroom! You will feel at home here as you make paradise in Bradenton your destination.

The outdoor areas invite you to live on vacation time - slowing down to relax by the pool on a lounge chair or Adirondack chair, dine as one big group in the screened in patio while overlooking the canal and the manatee friends that frequently swim by.

Guest access
Uber and Lyft do service the area, but we suggest renting a car to get around most efficiently, especially if you are wanting to cart your beach gear to the beach! :)

The entire space is yours to use during your stay, minus two closets that are locked for cleaners use.

Other things to note
NOTE ABOUT THE BOAT DOCK: homeowners keep their personal boat on the boat lift year round. Guests DO NOT have access to this boat. Guests can bring boats to dock up here, but please note that there is a small part of the dock that is available for guests to dock their own boats. Being a small portion of the dock, we do not recommend that boats over 20' dock up here.

***5 minute drive (2.5 miles) from Bradenton public beach!

***Pool has the option to be heated for $15/day. Please let the hosts know ahead of time if you would like to use the heater during your stay.

The home is listed as "sleeps 8" because there are three bedrooms, with bed space for 2 per room, and then the living room has a pullout couch for two more to sleep comfortably. Linens, pillows, and blankets for this pull out bed are provided in the hallway linen closet.

This home has a pool on a canal, and there is very little space between the pool deck and drop off to the dock. We highly suggest that you keep a very close watch over children or any individual who is not totally comfortable with water, as it could be hazardous. Please use caution.



*****We are committed to following Airbnb's Major Disruptive Events Policy regarding natural disasters, including tropical storms and hurricanes, which are common occurrences in Florida during hurricane season (June-November) and are NOT considered for refund.

Please note: Our cancellation policy will be in effect for reservations during this time, as it is any other time.

To ensure maximum flexibility for your travel plans, we highly recommend purchasing travel insurance when booking your stay.

Here's a relevant excerpt from Airbnb's Major Disruptive Events Policy:

"Weather or natural conditions that are common enough to be foreseeable in a given location‚Äîfor example, hurricanes occurring during hurricane season in Florida‚Äîare covered only when they result in another Event covered by this Policy that prevents completion of the reservation, such as a mandatory evacuation order or large-scale outage of essential utilities."

For more details, please refer to Airbnb's Major Disruptive Events Policy https://www.airbnb.com/help/article/1320.

TITLE: Black Friday Deals NOW - Holidays at The Betts
Listing Name: Black Friday Deals NOW - Holidays at The Betts
name: Black Friday Deals NOW - Holidays at The Betts
description:
Holidays at The Betts offers the best of it all - luxurious finishes, a heated swim spa, fire pit, patio with outdoor eating area, or the full front porch for hours of family fun. Just steps from the downtown Riverwalk, enjoy festive strolls, boutique shopping for the special gifts, and waterfront dining. Take the ferry to the Island for more holiday magic - beaches, food, shopping, lights and sunsets. Whether relaxing at The Betts or out exploring, memories made here will last a lifetime.

The space
Welcome to The Bett's House where the elegance of a bygone era blends seamlessly with the conveniences of modern living in this luxurious 3500 Sq Ft home. Built in 1913 this luxurious home has been remodeled and designed with your comfort, rest and relaxation in mind. The main floor features three inviting sitting areas, a cozy game nook, a full bathroom with with large soaker tub, a spacious and fully equipped kitchen, a dining table large enough for everyone to sit around and enjoy a meal together, a classic butler's pantry with beverage fridge and a convenient laundry room with access to our amazing backyard, and that's just the first floor. Upstairs you will discover 4 large bedrooms with three luxurious king beds, a cozy queen bed and two sets of bunks - perfect for families or groups. You will also find four beautifully designed full bathrooms, including three spacious walk in showers and a relaxing soaker tub. Every guest will enjoy both comfort and privacy. Downstairs step through the beautiful French doors into outdoor luxury. A gas fire pit surrounded by cozy seating, a propane grill and outdoor dining area, a three-hole putting green and a heated above-ground pool spa. The entire space is enclosed by a privacy fence and enhanced with ambient night lighting - perfect for enjoying every amenity, even after dark. Immerse yourself in all downtown has to offer with it's charming shops, rooftop and waterfront dining, unique boutiques, and the scenic Riverfront, just steps from your front door. Or unwind with a relaxing afternoon on the spacious front porch - perfect for sipping coffee, reading a good book, or simply watching the world go by.


THE FIRST FLOOR
2 sitting areas
Family room with large screen Smart TV
Hi-speed Wi-Fi
Large well stocked kitchen ‚Äì gas stove, dishwasher, garbage disposal, large fridge/freezer, microwave, coffee station
Butler Pantry which houses the wine/beverage fridge outdoor dishes and glassware
Laundry room

Kitchen Island with seating
Game nook
Large, full bathroom with soaker tub/shower combo

THE SECOND FLOOR
4 Bedrooms:
1 King ensuite
1 King bed with set of bunks ensuite
1 Queen bed with bunk ensuite
1 King bed ensuite with newly remodeled, large bathroom with shower, double sink and private water closet

OUT FRONT
A large front porch with outdoor seating and lighting to relax and take in some fresh air while you enjoy some drinks/coffee.

A BACKYARD OASIS
Swim spa
Putting green
Firepit w/ seating
Deck with Grill
Privacy fence
Outdoor lighting
Beach equipment ‚Äì cooler, chairs, umbrella

Step in, relax and know our entire home is freshly cleaned, laundered and sanitized for your stay.

ITEMS WE PROVIDE:
LINENS/TOWELS:
Bath Towel - 1 per guest (1 extra per bathroom)
Hand Towel - 1 per guest (1 extra in each shared bathroom)
Wash cloths - 1 per guest
Make-up removal wash cloths - 1 per adult guest (1 extra per bathroom)

Clean bed linens, quilts, and pillows for each bed.

HOUSE SUPPLIES/TOILETRIES: Complimentary Starter Supply
2 rolls of toilet paper per bathroom
Shampoo/Conditioner/Shower Gel - dispensers in each bathroom

Hair Dryer

BEACH SUPPLIES:

1 cooler

COFFEE STATION: Complimentary starter supply
Small package of ground coffee
Creamers
Sugar

Guest access
Guests have access to the entire home all but a few owners closets.

Other things to note
We offer self-check-in, eliminating the need for an on-site key handover. Detailed check-in instructions are sent to quests 24 hours prior to their arrival. Each quest is assigned a unique door code, granting them access to the home throughout their stay.

Walking Distance to Fun, Food and Shopping:

Main Street in downtown Bradenton, boasts the charm of Old Florida, with its boutique shops, local restaurants, and the Farmer‚Äôs Market on Saturdays ‚Äì October ‚Äì May - from 9 a.m. ‚Äì 2 p.m. Enjoy local farm fresh fruits and vegetables, local eats, crafts, art and more.

Along Main Street are many restaurants, whether you want to sit inside, enjoy the warmth of the afternoon sun, or the evening breezes, the choice is yours. You can even shop at any of our local businesses supporting the work of local artists. Take a look through our historic downtown hotel which was redone to keep its original looks, while updating it with all the modern conveniences.
At the end of Main Street, you find our Marina, where you can enjoy the salt water breeze, while you sit and relax on one of the benches. Eat at the restaurant on the pier ‚Äì Pier 22. Enjoy lunch or dinner on the rooftop of Oak & Stone, where you can enjoy spectacular views of Manatee River or even catch the sunset. Our downtown library is also there. And NEW to the marina is our Gulf Coast Water Taxi. Do you want to enjoy all that Anna Maria Island has to offer, commonly referred to as AMI, but don‚Äôt feel like driving? No worries, park downtown and catch the ferry. Where you will enjoy a peaceful ride on the waters, see some beautiful homes along the way and arrive on the Island in style.

Our newly expanded Riverwalk has so much to offer. From parks, including a water feature, a playground, an outdoor exercise area with equipment and suggestions for a workout, sand volleyball courts, and a skatepark. Along the walk you will find benches, and even swings to sit and enjoy the views.

Downtown, you will also find our Bishop Museum of Science and Nature. And within walking distance is our Village of the Arts, where local homes have been converted into whimsical shops, and eateries, showcasing local artists.

The space
Welcome to Cape Vista Getaway located in Bradenton Florida. This 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom pool home is a short drive to Anna Maria Island as well as other local popular beaches. This property is the perfect retreat for families seeking a relaxing getaway to the beach or maybe even a local tournament at IMG. Only five miles from the pristine white sands of Bradenton Beach and just minutes from Longboat Key and Anna Maria Island, this location is ideal for those looking to experience all that the Bradenton, Sarasota, and Lakewood Ranch areas have to offer.

Enjoy a relaxing stroll to GT Bray Park, where you can let the kids play or enjoy the outdoors! GT Bray offers a skate park, multiple playgrounds, a water park, soccer fields, baseball fields, pickleball courts, frisbee golf, a dog park as well as basketball.

As you walk into this bright and airy home, you‚Äôll notice the elegant finishes and open floor plan, perfect for spending quality time with loved ones. The fully stocked kitchen makes preparing your favorite meals a breeze, and the dining table and kitchen bar area offer ample space for hosting the entire family. Enjoy cooking on the grill? The living room features plenty of comfortable seating and a large flat-screen smart TV, making it the perfect spot for indoor relaxation. Whether you‚Äôre visiting for a short vacation or a longer stay, you‚Äôll enjoy the vacation rentals in Bradenton that cater to all your needs.

Step outside to enjoy a covered seating area where you can relax with a beverage from the cooler and take in the privacy of the fenced-in backyard. For additional enjoyment the backyard offers a 3 hole putting green along with loungers and an umbrella. With the backyard facing west you will also get to enjoy stunning sunsets overlooking the pool area. The private pool can be heated for an additional fee (seasonal availability), making it perfect for year-round enjoyment.

The master bedroom, located on the right side of the house, boasts a king-size bed, a private bathroom, a walk-in closet, and a wall-mounted smart TV. The other two bedrooms each have queen-size beds and wall-mounted smart TVs, with a shared bathroom. This layout is ideal for families or groups looking for vacation home rentals in Bradenton Florida.

TITLE: Coastal Villa w/ Amazing Courtyard - Splash Pad!
Listing Name: Coastal Villa w/ Amazing Courtyard - Splash Pad!
name: Coastal Villa w/ Amazing Courtyard - Splash Pad!
description:
Looking for the perfect spot to escape to with family and friends? Envision a place where your most difficult decision is whether to stay home and enjoy the backyard oasis or to head out and experience all that surrounding Sarasota has to offer.

We have worked tirelessly to create this very experience for our guests.

Your vacation villa is conveniently located to the airport, several white sandy beaches, and downtown Sarasota with dining, shopping, and entertainment options.

The space
Nestled amidst the lush, sun-kissed landscape of Sarasota, Florida, lies a magnificent villa vacation property that promises an escape into a world of luxury, comfort, and relaxation. This villa, a four-bedroom and four-bathroom haven, is an embodiment of exquisite design and the epitome of a dream getaway. Perfect for multiple families or that reunion trip with friends that you've been putting off for too long.

As you approach the villa, you are greeted by a charming, Mediterranean-style facade. The property's architecture seamlessly blends modern aesthetics with a tropical allure, setting the tone for the beauty that lies within.

Upon entering the villa, you are welcomed into a spacious and inviting open living concept that allows for a seamless flow between the kitchen, dining area, and the living room. The sun-soaked interiors are bathed in natural light streaming through large windows, creating a warm and inviting ambiance. The decor is a harmonious fusion of contemporary elegance and coastal charm, featuring plush furnishings and tasteful decor in soothing hues.

The kitchen, a gourmet chef's dream, is adorned with top-of-the-line stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, and a large island with barstools for casual dining. It is equipped with all the essentials to whip up delectable meals, whether you are hosting a grand dinner party or just preparing a quick breakfast. The dining area, adjacent to the kitchen, offers an inviting space to enjoy a delicious meal or the perfect game night.

The villa boasts four well-appointed bedrooms, each designed to provide the utmost comfort and privacy. Among them, three are luxurious master suites, and one is detached from the main house, ensuring maximum tranquility. These spacious sanctuaries feature sumptuous king-sized beds, high-quality linens, and en-suite bathrooms that are pure indulgence. After a day of relaxation or adventure, retiring to one of these master suites is an absolute treat, promising restful nights and rejuvenating mornings.

What truly sets this villa apart is the breathtaking backyard oasis that awaits you. Stepping outside, you are greeted by a world of outdoor entertainment and recreation. The centerpiece is a lighted splashpad, a playful paradise for kids and adults alike. Cool off under the gentle jets of water on a sunny afternoon, or let the kids revel in endless hours of fun and laughter. Surrounding the splashpad, you'll find cozy lounges, hammocks swaying in the breeze, and swinging chairs that provide the ideal spots for relaxation and soaking up the Florida sun.

For those enchanting evenings when the temperature dips, a gas firepit beckons. Gather around the flickering flames, roast marshmallows, and share stories with your loved ones as you savor the warmth and ambiance of this serene outdoor haven. The entire backyard is framed by vibrant tropical landscaping, creating an idyllic sanctuary where you can unwind, dine al fresco, or simply revel in the beauty of the natural surroundings.

Back inside, there's more to enjoy. An entertainment room awaits with a pool table, where friendly competitions and late-night games can add a touch of excitement to your stay. Additionally, a dedicated TV area provides the perfect space for movie nights or catching up on your favorite shows. For the little ones, a selection of games and activities promises endless entertainment.

While the villa itself is an opulent paradise, it's also conveniently located for exploring the nearby attractions. Sarasota boasts a wealth of stunning beaches, where the powdery white sands meet the tranquil Gulf of Mexico. Spend your days building sandcastles, swimming in the crystal-clear waters, or simply basking in the Florida sunshine.

If you're in the mood for more adventure, downtown Sarasota is just a short drive away. This vibrant city offers a plethora of cultural experiences, from art galleries and museums to fine dining and shopping. Explore the thriving arts scene, dine at world-class restaurants, and immerse yourself in the local culture.

This four-bedroom, four-bathroom villa offers a luxurious and serene retreat that will leave you with cherished memories. The open living concept, exquisite master suites, and a backyard oasis that boasts a lighted splashpad, gas firepit, and relaxation zones make this villa an idyllic escape for families and friends. After sun-soaked days at the nearby beaches or exploring the lively Sarasota downtown, you'll relish the feeling of returning to this spacious and elegant vacation home, where relaxation and rejuvenation are assured.

Guest access
You will have private access to the entire property.

Other things to note
Please note that this is a smoke-free home, and that parties or gatherings over and above the stated maximum # of allowed guests, are strictly prohibited. Violations will incur a $400 fee.

Guest access
Guests will have private access to the entire home and yard...make yourself at home and enjoy your vacation! There is keyless entry for easy access and check-in.

We take a lot of pride in our property and ask that you treat it with respect, thank you!

Other things to note
Check-in is at 4pm
Check-out is at 11am

No pets allowed
No parties allowed
No smoking inside the home or on the patio.

If any of these rules are not followed, we will be forced to cancel your booking and charge you an additional fee. Any additional cleaning will result in an additional cleaning fee of $200.

Caution should be used around the pool and you swim at your own risk. No Diving or Running around the pool. If you have children who can not swim, we do offer the option to include a child safety fence.

We have a strict NO PET POLICY. There will be a $500 fine for EACH pet if brought to the home. We will do our best to accommodate service animals, but please notify us before your stay so that we can prepare properly.

There will be a $1,000 fee for any smoking inside the house or on the patio. Guests are responsible for disposing of any cigarette butts, do not leave these around the property or you will be charged an additional cleaning fee equal to the original cleaning fee.

There will be a $1,000 fee for any parties + the cost of any damage or additional cleaning fees. We do allow small events on a case by case basis, at the owners discretion. It must be approved by the owner before check-in.

Any additional visitors at the property, that are not listed on the reservation, must be approved before hand. The maximum number of guests allowed at the property at one time is 12, unless approved by owner before check in. There is a $50 fee per guest per night if over this limit.

Five vehicles max and no parking on the lawn or street is allowed.

Minimum age to book is 21+, unless accompanied by an adult 25 or older who must also be staying at the property.

Please note there are security cameras on the property with video & audio surveillance; a Ring doorbell monitoring the front door, a Ring floodlight camera over the garage monitoring the driveway and front yard, and one Ring camera on each side of the house monitoring pool equipment and side-gate access. These are in place for security purposes. All other areas (the inside of the home, the backyard, pool, putting green, firepit, screened-in patio, and garage) are completely private to our guests.

We use a Minut device in the living area to help maintain a peaceful and safe space. It monitors noise levels and detects potential smoke, but it does not record sound or conversations.

There is a local tourist tax of 6% that will be added to the reservation required by the county.

Due to the unpredictable weather in Florida, we recommend that you add travel insurance when making your reservation, especially if your booking is during hurricane season (June, 1st - Nov, 30th). This will add peace of mind in case something should arise.

TITLE: Privacy! Pool, Hot Tub, Putting Green, & More
Listing Name: Privacy! Pool, Hot Tub, Putting Green, & More
name: Privacy! Pool, Hot Tub, Putting Green, & More
description:
Welcome to Lake O'Woods!
‚öì1 Acre Lot with Privacy wall and Gated Entrance
‚öìShort drive to the world-class beaches of Anna Maria Island
‚öìPlenty of Parking for Boats/ RV/ Trailers
‚öìGame Room, Hot Tub, Heated Pool, Putting Green, Fire Table & More!
‚öìFully stocked kitchen for all of your favorite home-cooked meals
‚öìHigh-speed Wi-Fi, Smart lock for Self-Check-in

The space
Your Dream Florida Getaway Awaits! Step into Paradise!
Imagine waking up every day in your very own slice of paradise! This stunning lakefront gated home is the ultimate escape, where luxury and relaxation meet fun and adventure, all just minutes from the beautiful beaches of Anna Maria Island!

Nestled in a lush, private setting with over 1 acre of land, this home offers breathtaking views of Lake O‚Äô Woods, where you can unwind while watching wildlife and soaking in the spectacular sunsets. Picture spending time sipping a cool drink on the patio, surrounded by swaying palms and the soothing sounds of nature‚Äîthis is the true essence of a Florida retreat!

Unmatched Comfort and Luxury! This home is designed for relaxation and enjoyment, featuring three spacious bedrooms and a versatile game room that can easily serve as a fourth bedroom. The master suite is a sanctuary of comfort, complete with a king-size bed, a cozy recliner, and French doors leading to your private patio‚Äîa perfect spot for savoring morning coffee or indulging in evening stargazing.

The other bedrooms are equally inviting; one features another king-size bed, perfect for couples or friends, while the third bedroom boasts a full XL over queen bunk bed and an additional full bed, making it ideal for younger children or extra guests. Each room is equipped with Smart TVs, allowing everyone to unwind and enjoy their favorite shows after a day of adventure.

Master Bedroom and Ensuite Bathroom King size bed, Smart TV
Bedroom #2 ‚Äì King Size Bed, Smart TV
Bedroom #3 ‚Äì Full XL over Queen Bunk Bed and Full Bed, Smart TV
Game Room ‚Äì Queen Pull-Out, Smart TV

A Backyard Designed for Family Fun and Relaxation! Your outdoor paradise awaits with an array of amenities designed to entertain and delight the entire family!
Oversized Heated Pool: Dive into the sparkling waters of the oversized pool, perfect for a refreshing swim on hot Florida days. The pool area features ample seating and lounge chairs, allowing everyone to relax poolside while basking in the sunshine.

Bubbling Hot Tub: After a day of fun and exploration, unwind in the bubbling hot tub. It's the perfect spot to relax and watch the sun set.

Large Screened-in Lanai: The spacious screened-in lanai offers comfortable seating equipped with dining table and chairs, making it the perfect setting for family breakfasts or evening dinners under the stars.

Two Inviting Patios: Choose between two beautifully designed patios for lounging and relaxation. One patio features a cozy fire table, ideal for gathering around in the evenings to share stories, roast marshmallows, and enjoy the mesmerizing Florida sunsets. The other is perfect for soaking up the sun or enjoying a good book while listening to the gentle sounds of nature.

Entertainment Area: The backyard is designed for fun and games! A massive turf area features a 4-hole putting green, allowing family members to practice their golfing skills. There‚Äôs also space for cornhole and other lawn games, making it easy to host friendly competitions and create lasting memories.

Wet Bar with Fridge: The outdoor wet bar is a fantastic addition for entertaining. With seating and a fridge, you can keep your favorite drinks cold and easily accessible while enjoying time by the pool. The bar area is perfect for serving cocktails, snacks, or refreshing beverages to keep everyone hydrated during those sunny days.
Feel like a barbecue? Fire up the grill and prepare a feast while the kids splash around in the pool. Whether you want to soak up the sun, host a barbecue, or simply unwind with a glass of wine, this backyard is designed for unforgettable moments.

Culinary Delights Await! Cook up a feast in the well-appointed kitchen, featuring granite countertops and stainless-steel appliances. The kitchen is fully stocked with everything you need to prepare your favorite meals, plus an extra fridge in the garage for the gourmet overflow. Gather around the large dining table that comfortably seats ten, sharing laughter and stories over delicious meals. If you prefer dining out, the local restaurants are just a short drive away, offering everything from fresh seafood to gourmet cuisine!

Feeling lazy? No problem! Order in from one of the local eateries and enjoy a cozy night in while watching a movie on the big-screen TV in the living room. Even laundry isn‚Äôt a chore when you can throw a load of clothes in the washer or dryer, then go float in your private pool or just relax in the sun.

Game Room: The fun continues indoors with the versatile game room is a hub of activity, featuring a pool table for friendly competitions and a selection of arcade games that will delight both kids and adults. Challenge each other to see who can achieve the highest score or simply enjoy a classic game night together.

Board Games and Puzzles: The home is stocked with a selection of board games and puzzles, perfect for family bonding time. Gather around the dining table or in the living room for a night of laughter and friendly competition, creating memories that will last a lifetime.

Cozy Living Room: The spacious living room invites relaxation with comfortable seating and a big-screen TV, perfect for unwinding after a day of exploring. Enjoy a family movie night, play games, or simply share stories while enjoying the beautiful view of the lake and pool.

Safety, Security, and Convenience! Your peace of mind is a priority in this fully walled property with secure access, allowing your loved ones to roam freely while ensuring their safety. The spacious driveway accommodates RVs, boats, and extra vehicles, making it convenient for all your adventures.

Adventure Awaits, Just Minutes Away! Leave your daily routine behind and dive into the excitement of Florida living! Spend your days lounging on the pristine beaches of Bradenton Beach, just 5 minutes away, where you can build sandcastles, swim in the warm Gulf waters, or enjoy a leisurely stroll along the shoreline. Explore the charming shops and delicious dining options on Anna Maria Island, where fresh seafood and local flavors await you at every corner.

For the more adventurous, take a short drive to nearby Sarasota, where you can visit the Ringling Museum of Art, enjoy the beautiful Marie Selby Botanical Gardens, or catch a show at the Sarasota Opera. Golf enthusiasts will also love the numerous golf courses in the area, offering scenic views and challenging play for all skill levels.
Ready to Escape to Florida? Embrace the warmth and beauty of Florida living! This lakefront oasis is ready to welcome you with open arms. Just pack your bathing suit and toothbrush and leave your worries behind!

‚òÜ‚òÜ BEDROOMS ‚òÜ‚òÜ
After a busy day of swimming and playing in the sand you‚Äôll have no problem drifting off to sleep in one of the three beautiful bedrooms. ‚òÜ‚òÜ BATHROOMS ‚òÜ‚òÜ
Two sparkling bathrooms cater to your group‚Äôs needs. Each bathroom is maintained in pristine condition and provides you with a private sanctuary to freshen up.

The main ensuite bathroom is accessed via the primary suite or pool patio and offers a walk-in shower and quartz top vanity with dual sinks.

The second bathroom is accessible through the main living area and offers a beautiful shower/tub combination.
Both full bathrooms are stocked with fresh towels and essential toiletries like hand soap, body soap, shampoo, and conditioner. There‚Äôs also an outdoor shower for rinsing away the salt and sand after a day of fun at the beach.


‚òÜ‚òÜ KITCHEN & LOUNGE ‚òÜ‚òÜ
Family life in this spacious home naturally congregates around the open living space. The living room is just off the kitchen and provides a comfy gathering space for friends and loved ones to cozy up and enjoy a movie on the 65‚Äù Samsung smart TV ‚Äì simply log into your preferred streaming platform with your personal account or watch live TV using the Spectrum App. For a more traditional evening‚Äôs entertainment, help yourself to the multitude of family-friendly board games.

The fully loaded and spacious kitchen is the perfect place for the chef in your group to whip up some delicious meals. Beautiful quartz countertops and high-quality stainless-steel appliances ensure you can cook as comfortably as if you were at home. With plenty of utensils, dishware and sippy cups for the kids, you‚Äôll have everything you need to prepare a fantastic meal.

Pull up one of the stools at the breakfast bar to enjoy an aromatic morning coffee or a casual bite to eat. With a convenient outlet nearby, this spot can also double as a workspace if the need arises.
Adjacent to the kitchen, you‚Äôll find the ‚Äúformal‚Äù dining room ‚Äì in reality, it‚Äôs anything but! This comfortable space centers around a beautiful, hand-crafted, farmhouse style dining table that can comfortably seat 10. Best of all, you can step straight out to the patio, allowing you easy access to al fresco dining.


‚òÜ‚òÜ OUTSIDE SPACE ‚òÜ‚òÜ
Florida is known as the sunshine state for a reason so there‚Äôs no doubt that you‚Äôll want to spend as much time outdoors as you possibly can. The fully fenced, private backyard has been beautifully landscaped to provide you with a sweet escape from the daily grind.

The large paver pool patio has been designed as an entertainment hub where your whole family can gather, relax and play. With an outdoor dining table that seats 6 and an outdoor sofa that seats 6 more, there is room for everyone. When the dinner bell rings or the kids are just hungry, fire up some burgers or a few steaks on the large Webber propane grill.

A carefree dip in the heated, saltwater swimming pool is the perfect way to cool off from the hot Florida sun! Recline on one of the comfy chaise lounge chairs while watching the shade sails dance in the breeze or enjoy your favorite cocktail while soaking up some rays. Once the sun starts to set over the large coconut palm trees, you‚Äôll know why we call it Coconut Sunset.


‚òÜ‚òÜ GAME ROOM ‚òÜ‚òÜ
Escape the sun and shoot a game of pool or play some air hockey in our AMAZING Game Room! Video games more your style? The game room also has a Retro Arcade system featuring 412 of your favorited video games from the 80's such as Mrs. PacMan and Frogger. Equipped with a 65‚Äù Samsung Smart TV to watch your favorite sporting event, a full-size refrigerator to keep your beverages cold and an amazing mural by a local artist, the game room is a fun place for people of all ages.


‚òÜ‚òÜ PARKING ‚òÜ‚òÜ
Vacations should be carefree, and convenient doorstep parking can make all the difference. This beautiful home is located in a quiet neighborhood with free parking in the driveway for up to 6 cars. Additional accommodations can be made for guests with boats or RV‚Äôs however we do ask that you let us know in advance.


‚òÜ‚òÜ EV CHARGER ‚òÜ‚òÜ
A dedicated 50-amp service with 14-50 receptacle is available in the parking area to charge your electric vehicle. Please inquire for additional details.


‚òÜ‚òÜ GETTING AROUND ‚òÜ‚òÜ
Trade the pool for the beautiful waters of the Gulf of Mexico by heading to one of the nearby beaches (Bradenton Beach, Coquina Beach and Holmes Beach) on Anna Maria Island only a few minutes up the road. If you don‚Äôt feel like driving feel free to catch a ride on the complementary ‚ÄúMonkey Bus‚Äù which can pick you up right at your doorstep and show you all the wonderful places Anna Maria Island has to offer. Check out the Monkey Bus FB page for more details.


‚òÜ‚òÜ FOR THE KIDS ‚òÜ‚òÜ
Traveling with little ones? We got you covered! We know it can be challenging taking your young ones on vacation which is why we supply all the basic necessities to the accommodate the needs of all age groups, including:

‚òÄ Pack n Play

description:
üå¥Palma Paradise is a tropical oasis, offering unsurpassed privacy and elegance with the comfort of home.

The location is perfect to enjoy everything that Bradenton, Sarasota and nearby islands have to offer from the turquoise waters of the Gulf to fine dining and countless activities for the family.

üå¥ Location highlights:
~ AMI (10 mins), Longboat Key (15 mins), Siesta
~ IMG (10 mins)
~ SRQ Airport (25 mins), TPA (1 hr)
~ Robinson Preserve (7 mins)
~ Riverwalk (10 mins)
~ Smugglers Golf

The space
üå¥ Enjoy the beautiful Gulf coast weather by soaking up the sun in the crystal clear heated saltwater pool and spa or dine al fresco by cooking a homemade meal on the BBQ grill. The outdoor space is inviting with a myriad of activities, lounge chairs, full dining area and cornhole. Enjoy some cocktails by the pool, play some water basketball or simply relax on a pool float. The fun amenities and full game room will keep the whole family entertained! Palma Paradise has the perfect blend of elegance and comfort to make your stay truly memorable. This home has been fully remodeled, with every detail thoughtfully designed, to create a luxurious and airy space. We hope that you enjoy it as much as we do!

üå¥ Palma Paradise Highlights:
~ Heated Saltwater Pool with Basketball hoop and pool floats

~ In-Home Washer + Dryer (Detergent, Softener and Dryer Sheets provided)
~ Beach Equipment (Chairs, Coolers, Umbrellas, Beach Tent, Toys +)
~ Smart TVs throughout the home
~ Linens, Towels, and Bathroom Essentials provided
~ Kid-Friendly Amenities (Pack-n-play crib with mattress and high chair provided)

üå¥ Overview of the home:

~ Open Concept Living Room
As you enter the home you are welcomed into a large open concept living space with ceiling to floor sliding doors overlooking the incredible outdoor space and pool. Enjoy your time by watching your favorite entertainment on the Smart TV, playing board games, reading a book, or simply creating memories with your family and friends.

~ Kitchen and Dining
The Kitchen is fully stocked with all cooking essentials. A coffee bar is included with a drip coffee machine and a Keurig with pods and variety of teas. The kitchen leads to a full size dining table for a traditional meal, and an additional four guests can sit at the kitchen table.

~ Outside Area
The sparkling heated *saltwater* pool, spa and outdoor space are your own private, resort-style retreat. The dining area in the back is covered with an open air netting to keep the bugs away to maximize the time spent outdoors. The whole family can enjoy playing a variety of included activities and games...all in the comfort of home.

~ Main Bedroom Suite
Awaken to an exquisite poolside panorama each morning in this sanctuary with a regal king-sized bed, a Smart TV, a walk-in closet, and a lavishly appointed en-suite bathroom. The private bathroom has an opulent double vanity, and an invigorating double shower.

~ 2nd Bedroom
Comfortable queen-sized bed, full closet and dresser and a shared hallway bathroom with a tub.

~ 3rd Bedroom
Queen-sized bed with a twin bunk bed on top, with a full closet and a shared hallway bathroom with a tub.

~ 4th Bedroom and Family Den
This versatile space can be used as a bedroom, family room, movie theater, exercise room (included is a stationary bike, yoga mat and weights). This room has a queen size upholstered daybed with a twin pull out. There are games available for the whole family in the built in bookcases and kids activity booklets / art supplies. A 65" smart TV invites you to relax and unwind. Experience the tranquility of this space.

~5th Bedroom + Office
Twin size futon folds out for added sleeping space. This bedroom has a full size bathroom and modern shower with sliders leading out to the pool for easy access to the outdoor area. A dedicated workspace provides privacy and all necessary amenities.

~ Garage
The garage is equipped with a dream game room containing an Air Hockey Table, Pop-a-Shot Basketball, Mortal Combat Arcade & Foosball.

Guest access
üå¥ Palma Paradise is a private home, in a quiet family friendly neighborhood. The street is a cul-de-sac that doesn't have much traffic and is perfect for walking, riding bikes and golf carts. Our guests will have full access to the house, pool and property. We have a keyless entry and a backup lockbox in case it is needed. Enjoy your stay in the private, elegant and comfortable home.

description:
Welcome to Serenity in beautiful coastal Sarasota, Florida! This beachy and relaxing retreat is the epitome of tranquility, offering a soothing and laid-back atmosphere that will instantly put you at ease.

Step inside and be greeted by a completely renovated and tastefully decorated space that exudes comfort and serenity. With a soothing color palette and coastal-inspired decor, our property instantly puts you at ease. Enjoy high end amenities such as a heated pool, mini golf, and bocce ball!

The space
Step inside and be greeted by a completely renovated and tastefully decorated space that exudes comfort and serenity. With a soothing color palette and coastal-inspired decor, our property instantly puts you at ease. Sink into the plush sectional or the swinging egg chairs and unwind in the cozy living area, or gather with loved ones for a friendly game night with the family games provided.

Indulge in the ultimate relaxation by lounging beside the sparkling HEATED pool. Whether you're soaking up the sun on the comfortable lounge chairs or sipping on a refreshing beverage on the patio sectional, you'll feel a sense of serenity and bliss. As evening falls, gather around the firepit under the enchanting glow of bistro lights, sharing stories and toasting to a perfect vacation.

Conveniently located, our vacation rental is just a short 20-minute drive to the pristine beaches of Sarasota. Sink your toes into the warm sand, take a leisurely stroll along the shore, or soak in the breathtaking sunsets. Additionally, downtown Sarasota is only 15 minutes away, offering an array of dining, shopping, and entertainment options to explore.

The culinary enthusiasts among you will delight in our chef's kitchen, equipped with brand new, stainless steel appliances and a Breville espresso machine. Prepare gourmet meals with ease or savor a cup of freshly brewed espresso to start your day on a high note.

To add to the fun, we've also included a mini-golf course and bocce ball court for some friendly competition and family bonding. Enjoy a leisurely game, laughter, and create lasting memories. After a day of relaxation and adventure, there's nothing better than sipping your favorite wine under the stars, embracing the true essence of vacation.

Come and experience the beachy, laid back, and family-friendly vibes of our vacation rental in Sarasota. With its convenient access to the beach and downtown, along with its luxurious amenities such as the firepit, bistro lights, and mini golf, it's the perfect place to unwind, create lasting memories, and make the most of your vacation.

TITLE: Amazing pool home min from downtown!
Listing Name: Amazing pool home min from downtown!
name: Amazing pool home min from downtown!
description:
Welcome to Villa Bella!

Close proximity to Lakewood Ranch, Sarasota, and Tampa
Short drive to beaches
Fully stocked kitchen for all of your favorite home cooked meals
High speed Wi-Fi included
Smart lock for Self Check-in
Heating of the pool is not included in rent and is an additional fee

The space
This beautiful 4 bedroom 2 bath home in Downtown Bradenton sleeps 9 and is in great proximity to many different restaurants and attractions. Located in a prime location in Bradenton, you are also a short drive from local groceries, shopping, and the white sandy beaches of Anna Maria Island!

When arriving to the property you instantly notice the tropical fauna and modern yet historical design of the home. When first walking into the home you will be greeted by amazing tile floors leading you into the spacious open floorplan of the bottom floor. Here you can keep yourself entertained in the living room, enjoy a delicious breakfast in the dining room, or relax on the patio through the french doors! Going past all of that, you will find a kitchen stocked with everything you will need to make all of your favorite homemade dishes! Through here you can get to the back of the house where you will enter a lovely den that opens out to an amazing pool deck/patio area with a covered cabana that will make you feel like you are at a luxury resort!

When making your way out to the tropical oasis in the back, you will notice that there is plenty of seating available both with and without shade for you and your guests to relax as you please. Back here you can also find a BBQ and a couple of tables which combine perfectly for a backyard bbq by the pool or under the cabana where there are 2 50-inch TVs for the whole family to enjoy! (The pool can be heated for an additional fee, inquire for more info.) You also have a shower in the back to rinse off after a long day at the beach or on a boat.

Trying to figure out sleeping arrangements? 3 of the bedrooms are on the first floor with the 4th bedroom being a private getaway upstairs. The master is located just to the right of the front door once inside, it offers a king size bed, smart tv, and ensuite bathroom. The next two bedrooms are following the right side of the house towards the back. Both offer queen size beds. The bedroom right across from the stairs offers a smart tv while the bedroom in back of the house offers a great view of the pool. The bedroom upstairs is accompanied by a bonus room with a TV that can be separated from the rest of the upstairs by closing the doors.

Master Bedroom - King Bed, Ensuite Bathroom, Smart TV
Bedroom 2 - Queen Bed, Smart TV
Bedroom 3 - Queen Bed
Bedroom 4 - Double Bed, Twin Bed

Are you looking to explore the area and enjoy the outdoors? Take a short walk down to the Riverwalk and see all the great views it has to offer or drive just a few minutes to De Soto National Memorial Park where you can learn some great historical facts while enjoying stunning views of nature and the famous Skyway Bridge. Looking to head to the beach? The sandy white beaches of Anna Maria Island are only 10 miles away!

*Ring Doorbell located on Front Door
*Front Door and side gates are monitored with video surveillance.
*Pool heat available for an additional charge
*Pool heaters in private homes are locked for your safety and controls must not be tampered with as they are monitored by the pool company. 85¬∞ is the highest heat temperature setting. Pool temperatures will probably stay around 76¬∞ during the winter months. Please note if cold days occur, water temperatures will drop and may take longer to heat.

Damage Waiver: The total cost of your reservation for this Property includes a nightly damage waiver fee (‚ÄúManagement‚Äù), plus tax if applicable (the ‚ÄúDamage Waiver‚Äù).
The Damage Waiver covers you for up to $1,500 of accidental damage to the Property or its contents (such as furniture, fixtures, and appliances) as long as you report the incident to the host prior to checking out. The Damage Waiver fee eliminates the need for a traditional security deposit.

More information is available from the ‚ÄúRental Agreement‚Äù in the House Rules.

Other things to note
1. Please read the guestbook! Info like trash days, wifi passwords, and other things you need to know is located in the book.
2. Any people other than those in the guest party (renter) are the sole responsibility of the guest (renter). Parties and events are not allowed unless given prior
approval from the management company and paid an event fee. If a party or event did happen at the house an additional fee will be charged to the card on file
based on the property rented.
3. This home is privately owned. The homeowners are not responsible for any accidents, injuries, or illnesses that occur
while on-premises. The homeowners are not responsible for the loss of personal belongings or valuables of the guest. By
accepting this reservation, it is agreed that all guests are expressly assuming the risk of any harm arising from their use
of the premises or others whom they invite to use the premises.
4. Pets are only permitted with prior approval and upon completion of the Pet Addendum to the rental agreement. An additional pet fee does apply.
5. Please be considerate to the neighbors and not have loud music after 10 pm.
6. All items in the home and on the property, including DVD's, CD, books and games are intended for entertainment and
enjoyment of the guests while staying at the house and are not to be removed from the home or property. The only
exception would be those items which are intended for use at the beach.
7. Some properties have keys and garage/ gate remotes, if they are lost its $50 each to replace.
8. Please clean the grills after each use. There will be a $50 cleaning fee charged if grill is not cleaned.
9. No smoking allowed in the house. Smoking is allowed outside only.
($500 cleaning fee applies if found smoking in house or smoke smell)
10. Please follow the departure instructions to help keep our cleaning costs down. We do everything we can to keep the properties in the best shape possible
with your help! If you need anything during your stay please let us know!

The space
This beachy home is comfortable, clean and inviting. It's the perfect place to vacation as its close to world renowned beaches and IMG academy. It's been renovated and is setup to make life easy. Just bring your suitcase and swim suit!

For an additional fee we can heat the pool. Please contact us if interested.

Check-in: 5:00pm
Check-out: 11:00am

Due to high occupancy and strict cleaning schedules we are unable to accommodate Late check-outs or early check-ins. PLEASE refrain from inquiring about this.

Guest access
Non-shared Pool with private Fenced-in Back yard
Kitchen stocked with waffle maker, blender, toaster, microwave, Keurig, dishwasher, stove, plates and silverware, utensils
Washer & Dryer
Beach gear: 4 chairs, 1 umbrella with anchor shovel, portable caddy, 2 coolers
Outdoor grill (We have propane tanks on the property)
Pack & Play with mattress
Dog cage and dog towels

Other things to note
Garbage: You may be asked to take out the garbage during your stay (even if it isn't yours). Garbage is only collected twice per week. Occasionally a short booking may not include a garbage day (ex. Fri-Sun) and thus the outdoor garbage cans may not be empty on your arrival. We ask for your help in this matter by placing the garbage can on the curb for collection on Tuesday and Friday mornings. Once collected we ask that you return the garbage cans out of site through the back door of the garage. We will get fined if the cans are left at the road or in the driveway. Note: Bradenton doesn't offer recycling service.

Parties: We do not allow large parties. Family get togethers are acceptable if they are relatively tame. Mainly we ask that you respect the neighborhood and the house. We do not allow confetti and would prefer no decorations taped on the walls (all tape must be removed if so)

TITLE: Heated Pool/Grill & Minutes to Anna Maria Beaches
Listing Name: Heated Pool/Grill & Minutes to Anna Maria Beaches
name: Heated Pool/Grill & Minutes to Anna Maria Beaches
description:
Welcome to Montauks Point!
‚öìShort Drive to the World Class Beaches of Anna Maria Island
‚öìClose proximity to Lakewood Ranch, Sarasota, and Tampa
‚öìPet Friendly, Fenced in Backyard
‚öìLarge Exterior Lanai With Smart TV & Foosball
‚öìFully stocked kitchen for all of your favorite home cooked meals
‚öìHigh speed Wi-Fi, Smart lock for Self Check-in
‚öìHeating of the pool is not included in rent and is an additional fee

The space
This spacious 2,800-square-foot home is located in the highly sought-after Palma Sola Pines area, just a short 5-mile drive from the picturesque Anna Maria Island and a mere 5 minutes from the Palma Sola Causeway. Local restaurants and grocery stores are conveniently situated around the corner, ensuring that you have everything you need at your fingertips.

The home boasts a well-thought-out split plan layout with 5 bedrooms, offering ample space for relaxation and ensuring privacy during your vacation in paradise. As you step inside, you'll be greeted by a generously sized family room, complete with a flat-screen TV and plenty of seating for entertaining family game nights. Abundant natural light streams in through the sliding glass doors, creating an inviting space for web surfing or unwinding with a good book.

The kitchen area is a pleasant surprise, featuring a spacious cooking area with updated appliances and fully stocked cabinets that have everything you could possibly require during your vacation. The open floor plan seamlessly connects the kitchen, living room, and dining room, making it perfect for entertaining while preparing a delicious homemade meal or keeping an eye on the kids. The expansive dining table comfortably seats 8, with additional seating available at the kitchen counter bar. The living room is a cozy retreat, complete with a beautiful fireplace, large sofas, and sliding glass doors that lead out to the pool area. Enjoy evenings of relaxation with your family or guests in this inviting space.

The master suite, strategically positioned away from the other four bedrooms, ensures added privacy. It features a king-size bed, a flat-screen TV, ample storage, and closet space for all your belongings. The master bedroom also offers access to the pool area through a sliding glass door. The second and third guest bedrooms both boast queen-size beds and flat-screen TVs. One of the guest bedrooms even has a full bathroom attached, making it perfect for those traveling with additional family or friends. The fourth and fifth bedrooms each feature two twin beds.

Master Bedroom - King Bed, Ensuite, Smart TV
Bedroom 2 - Queen Bed, Smart TV
Bedroom 3 - 2 Twin Beds, Smart TV
Bedroom 4 - 2 Twin Beds, Smart TV
Bedroom 5 - Queen Bed, Smart TV

One of the standout features of this home is the large screened-in swimming pool and patio area. It provides ample space for spending your days poolside, entertaining family and friends. The pool area also conveniently connects to the third bathroom, eliminating the need to track water throughout the house. Additionally, the property allows parking for boats and RVs.

The entire house is equipped with high-speed wireless internet, and soft, comfortable towels and linens are provided for your convenience. This home is conveniently located near restaurants, cinemas, shopping, and the stunning local beaches, making it ideal for those looking to enjoy all that Bradenton and Sarasota have to offer. Moreover, this home is your very own island oasis and can comfortably accommodate up to 10 guests

*Pets are accepted with an additional Pet Fee, inquire for more info.
*Ring Doorbell located on Front Door
*Front Door and side gates are monitored with video surveillance.
*SMALL Pool can be heated for an extra fee.
*Pool heaters in private homes are locked for your safety and controls must not be tampered with as they are monitored by the pool company. 85¬∞ is the highest heat temperature setting. Pool temperatures will probably stay around 76¬∞ during the winter months. Please note if cold days occur, water temperatures will drop and may take longer to heat.

Damage Waiver: The total cost of your reservation for this Property includes a nightly damage waiver fee (‚ÄúManagement‚Äù), plus tax if applicable (the ‚ÄúDamage Waiver‚Äù).
The Damage Waiver covers you for up to $1,500 of accidental damage to the Property or its contents (such as furniture, fixtures, and appliances) as long as you report the incident to the host prior to checking out. The Damage Waiver fee eliminates the need for a traditional security deposit.

Other things to note
1. Please read the guestbook! Info like trash days, wifi passwords, and other things you need to know is located in the book.
2. Any people other than those in the guest party (renter) are the sole responsibility of the guest (renter). Parties and events are not allowed unless given prior
approval from the management company and paid an event fee. If a party or event did happen at the house an additional fee will be charged to the card on file
based on the property rented.
3. This home is privately owned. The homeowners are not responsible for any accidents, injuries, or illnesses that occur
while on-premises. The homeowners are not responsible for the loss of personal belongings or valuables of the guest. By
accepting this reservation, it is agreed that all guests are expressly assuming the risk of any harm arising from their use
of the premises or others whom they invite to use the premises.
4. Pets are only permitted with prior approval and upon completion of the Pet Addendum to the rental agreement. An additional pet fee does apply.
5. Please be considerate to the neighbors and not have loud music after 10 pm.
6. All items in the home and on the property, including DVD's, CD, books and games are intended for entertainment and
enjoyment of the guests while staying at the house and are not to be removed from the home or property. The only
exception would be those items which are intended for use at the beach.
7. Some properties have keys and garage/ gate remotes, if they are lost its $50 each to replace.
8. Please clean the grills after each use. There will be a $50 cleaning fee charged if grill is not cleaned.
9. No smoking allowed in the house. Smoking is allowed outside only.
($500 cleaning fee applies if found smoking in house or smoke smell)
10. Please follow the departure instructions to help keep our cleaning costs down. We do everything we can to keep the properties in the best shape possible
with your help! If you need anything during your stay please let us know!

TITLE: 4BR/2BA Saltwater Pool Oasis with Game Room
Listing Name: 4BR/2BA Saltwater Pool Oasis with Game Room
name: 4BR/2BA Saltwater Pool Oasis with Game Room
description:
Indulge in family enjoyment at this chic home moments away from nearby beaches. Dive into the saltwater pool or savor a glass of wine in the seasonal spa. Perfect for kids, the garage transforms into a playful game room. Just 4 miles from Bradenton/Manatee Beaches and 8 miles from Anna Maria Island. Abundant shopping and dining options surround the area, while sunny Bradenton beckons with a wealth of attractions, activities, and outdoor adventures.

The space
Discover this enchanting and recently updated 4-bedroom corner home featuring a jacuzzi spa and a fenced private backyard. The living room boasts beams and a vaulted ceiling, while the kitchen showcases stainless steel appliances, a wood bar, granite tops, decorative backsplash, and soft-close cabinets.

Adjacent to the kitchen, the dining room offers a dry bar, two drink coolers, granite top, and wood shelving. The master bedroom includes a walk-in closet, and its bathroom features a makeup counter, granite top, and a walk-in shower. The second bathroom presents a tub-shower combo and a granite sink top.

Step into the backyard, a true oasis of relaxation with a new inground saltwater pool, a high-quality jacuzzi spa, bar tops with six chairs, Astroturf grass, outdoor hanging lights, and a stone patio surrounded by tropical plants and trees‚Äîembracing the quintessential Florida lifestyle.

The garage transforms into a game room and is equipped with a washer and dryer, utility sink, and storage cabinets.

Just a mile away, Warner's Bayou Boat Ramp offers public waterfront access, providing space for mooring or docking boats and yachts. The marina offers services such as fuel, marine supplies, maintenance, boat repair, and bilge and sewage pumping. Experience the perfect blend of comfort and convenience in this exceptional home.

Guest access
Feel at home from the moment you arrive ‚Äì you have exclusive access to the entire house throughout your stay. From the cozy bedrooms to the fully equipped kitchen, the inviting living spaces to the tranquil outdoor areas, every corner of this residence is yours to enjoy. Make yourself comfortable, relax, and savor the complete experience of calling this place your home away from home.

Other things to note
Pool heating is an option during winter at $60/day, maintaining a cozy 86¬∞F. Our spa hot tub is ONLY open SEASONALLY from NOVEMBER through APRIL. Conveniently located near the crossroads of Manatee Ave and 59th St. To ensure a smooth and comfortable start to your stay, we provide an initial setup of supplies designed to last approximately 2 to 3 days. This thoughtful arrangement allows you ample time to settle in and get acquainted with your surroundings before embarking on any shopping adventures. From essentials to enhancing your convenience, we've taken care of the basics, so you can focus on enjoying your time in our welcoming space.

TITLE: Tiki Time by Beach Boutique Rentals
Listing Name: Tiki Time by Beach Boutique Rentals
name: Tiki Time by Beach Boutique Rentals
description:
*Features include*

* Huge heated pool with luminescent lighting
* Poolside Tiki bar with granite counters, built in grill and beer taps
* Resort-like yard with pool loungers and cornhole area
* 4 bedrooms, 2 1/2 full bathrooms
* Amazing master suite with walk-in closets and spa-like shower
* Beautiful formal dining room with table seating for 10
* High end features and furnishings
* Laundry room
* Dog friendly!

The space
This home is managed by Beach Boutique Rentals, a local Anna Maria Island vacation rental management company.

Enjoy the lap of luxury with high end everything at this custom 4-bedroom, 2.5 bath, just one mile from the Anna Maria Island beaches.

Upon entering Tiki Time you will be greeted by the open and spacious living room with dry bar, 65" smart TV and plenty of comfortable seating. Through the living room you come upon the fully stocked kitchen with all high end appliances, plenty of counter space and an island with stools for lounging, snacking and chatting. Through the kitchen is the charming formal dining room with a large dining table spacious enough to seat at least 10 comfortably. Wander out the back door to the beautiful backyard oasis with paver pool deck, heated pool, Tiki bar with outdoor kitchen, chaise loungers, fire pit, corn hole and tropical landscaping. You may never want to leave this oasis, but when you do the white sand beaches of Anna Maria Island are less than 5 miles away!

Retreat to the second floor at night and you will find 4 beautiful bedrooms for a restful night's sleep. The master bedroom features a king bed and smart TV, walk in closet, and attached bathroom with a luxurious shower with multiple shower heads. Another guest bathroom in the hall offers a rain shower head and a large double sink. The closest bedroom to the right is the boat room with a queen size bed a smart TV, and plenty of closet space. Next is the second guest bedroom with a beachy vibe, a desk, a queen size bed and a smart TV. Last but not least you will find another spacious bedroom with two full over full bunk beds which have trundles below for additional sleeping arrangements.

This magnificent home is located on a quiet, dead-end street with many young families. The street leads out to Palma Sola Blvd which follows along the water connecting Manatee Ave and Cortez Rd, the two main roads leading to Anna Maria Island. There are beautiful nearby nature preserves and trails for hiking and access to biking, kayaking and more. Tiki Time is the perfect home base for exploring all of the restaurants, activities, beaches and beauty the Sarasota/Bradenton area has to offer. Beach towels and chairs are provided so pack light and come explore the barrier islands!

*Please note, garage is not available for guests. No more than 4 vehicles allowed.

Palma Sola is a family community and the city imposes a strict noise ordinance. Please adhere to our good neighbor policy and observe the local quiet hours between 10 pm and 8 am. No loud music or use of the pool is allowed during these hours along with any other noise which may disturb the neighbors. Absolutely no parties.

We are DOG FRIENDLY! When booking through Airbnb, a fee of $175 + tax is required in advance for each dog you are bringing. A portion of this fee covers Airbnb‚Äôs platform service costs.

Other things to note
Housekeeping will provide a starter supply of toilet paper, soap, and garbage bags but guests will need to replenish the supply during their stay.

Our cleaning fee includes a professional linen service. When you stay with us you can rest assured that you will have high quality linens such as those at a fine hotel. We also provide plenty of luxury bath and beach towels.

- Toilet paper, paper towels, and trash bags
- Shampoo, conditioner, and body soap
- Salt/pepper

Guests will have access to entire house except the owner closets

Other things to note
FURRY FRIENDS
- Prior approval is required. We allow up to 3 dogs for an additional fee of $150/pet/stay.
- Must be fully house-trained.
- Must be completely cleaned up after.
- Leashed at all times when not in a fenced area.
- Crated indoors when not home with the pet.
- If barking becomes an issue during your stay, alternative arrangements must be made.
- Not allowed on indoor furniture, bedding, or in the pool.

KINDLY NOTE
- For your peace of mind, surveillance cameras are located around the exterior of the house (one Ring doorbell, two overlooking the driveway, and one by the back of the house). No inside cameras.
- Noise monitors inside and outside the house do not record voice or conversation, they only monitor decibels.
- The heated pool feature is available for an extra $20/night or $400/month (offered from October till May). If you would like to purchase the pool heating feature, please note that it covers the entirety of your stay, and pool heater may take up to 24 hours to reach the desired temp, so kindly let us know before you check-in.
- Pool settings are all scheduled. When booked, pool heat is set to 85 degrees, however, pool temps are impacted if the weather drops below 60 degrees. So, unfortunately, pool temperatures cannot be guaranteed.
- Safety features: fire extinguisher, smoke detector, first aid kit.
- For your comfort, our home is treated quarterly by a professional pest control company. But given our tropical climate, you may still see the occasional bug. Please keep doors and screens closed to help prevent bugs from entering, as no compensation will be provided for any bugs that may come inside.
- Please note that our neighbor across the street are having some work done on their home, but it shouldn't be much of a bother to you.

IMPORTANT NOTE: For the security of our guests, every guest who enters the home during your stay MUST be listed on the reservation or disclosed to the host. Please, make sure to register the correct number of guests. Undisclosed guests who are not included in the official confirmation can place your stay at risk for early termination without a refund, and can incur an additional charge of $25/guest/night.
