Welcome to Your Private Waterfront Oasis! This spacious home on a serene canal off Sarasota Bay features 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms & a HUGE climate-controlled game room! Enjoy direct water access for fishing, canoeing, kayaking and spotting manatees. Just 7 minutes from the airport & 15 minutes from Sarasota, you‚Äôll have access to beautiful beaches like Siesta Key & Anna Maria Island. Offering free WiFi, BBQ grill & firepit, this retreat is perfect for families seeking relaxation & adventure!

The space
Experience Your Tranquil Waterfront Getaway! Wake up to the sound of manatees surfacing just outside your window. This cozy waterfront retreat offers serenity, sunsets, and all the gear you need to explore Florida‚Äôs natural beauty.

Escape to our spacious waterfront home, nestled on a tranquil canal right off Sarasota Bay. This hidden gem sits on a sprawling one-acre lot, providing a perfect blend of privacy, stunning views, and a serene atmosphere. With three inviting bedrooms and two full bathrooms, our delightful retreat comfortably accommodates families and groups seeking relaxation and adventure.

As you step inside, you'll discover two large living rooms that create an open and airy atmosphere, ideal for gathering and making cherished memories. The expansive climate-controlled game room is sure to be a hit, featuring a foosball table, dartboard, cornhole, indoor basketball hoops, a domino table, mini putt, and three arcade machines, ensuring endless fun for both kids and adults.

Step outside to fire up the large BBQ grill for delightful cookouts and enjoy direct water access to fish right off the dock, complete with provided rods and a tackle box. Take a canoe or kayak out to explore the serene waterways and witness the fascinating wildlife, including the playful manatees that often visit the dock‚Äîan experience that makes our property aptly named Manatee Cove.

Additional amenities include free WiFi, complimentary coffee, and a Roku TV in every room for your entertainment needs.

Conveniently located just 7 minutes away from Bradenton/Sarasota International Airport and 15 minutes from the vibrant city of Sarasota, our property offers easy access to a variety of beautiful beaches, such as Manatee Public Beach, Bradenton Beach, Coquina Beach, Siesta Key, Crescent Beach, North Shore, Whitney Beach, Anna Maria Island, Cortez Beach, Longboat Key, Lido Beach, and Bayfront Beach.

Whether you're seeking a family-friendly spot, a quiet escape, or a lively atmosphere, the options are plentiful! With all these features, our waterfront property is your ideal home away from home. Book your stay today and create unforgettable memories in this charming oasis!

Guest access

7 minutes away from the Bradenton/Sarasota International Airport!!

Beach towels and chairs, cooler, boogie boards, life vest for kayaks, high chair, crib, porta cribs are available for use. Please note the hot tub is electric and does not heat instantly to a higher temperature. We ask that the temperature is kept at 104 degrees.

description:
BNB Breeze Presents: Just Beachy!
This coastal haven, located just 15 minutes away from Bradenton Beach, has been meticulously crafted with an unwavering commitment to comfort and extravagance. The lavish interior welcomes you with an abundance of seating and lounging spaces, while the outdoor space allows you to relax in your personal oasis!
- Heated Pool - heated at NO extra cost from Nov 21 - April 1st

The space
It's time to bask in the rejuvenating glow of the Florida sun! Nestled in the charming city of Bradenton, Florida, this residence embodies the coastal pace of life found in Florida! Enjoy cooking up masterpieces in the spacious fully-equipped kitchen, cozying up for an evening movie by the large Smart TV, taking a dip in the pool, or reading a book on the plush, furnished lanai! Whatever the occasion, this home has everything that you need for your next dream vacation!

We know, contracts aren‚Äôt the most exciting part of your getaway, but to keep our home safe, we‚Äôll need you to sign a quick rental agreement upon booking (this will be sent to you, after you book) ‚Äî then it‚Äôs all fun from there! THE INTERIOR SPACE:

Step outside to experience what makes this property shine! Whether you're savoring your morning coffee poolside, relishing your evening beverages by the inviting fire, or finding solace with a captivating book amidst the backdrop of the mature and lush landscape, this home serves as the perfect vacation haven.

THE EXTERIOR SPACE:

We cannot wait to (hopefully) host you at Just Beachy soon! Every detail of our home has been carefully considered to ensure an unrivaled stay. Embrace the coastal elegance, and discover a level of luxury that sets the standard for unforgettable Florida getaways. Book now to experience your dream vacation!

NEARBY AIRPORTS:
1. Sarasota Airport (SRQ)
2. Tampa International Airport (TPA)
3. St Pete/Clearwater Airport (PIE)

-----> Proximity to Local attractions <-----
1. Bradenton Beach 15 Min.
2. Coquina Beach (a personal fav) 20 min.
3. Smugglers Cove Adventure Golf 5 min.
4. Pinebrook Ironwood Golf Course 3 min.
5. G. T. Bray Park (has a dog park) 3 min.
6. Anna Marie Island (full of shops and fun restaurants) 20 min.
7. Sarasota Bradenton International Airport 20 min.

NAVIGATING THE AREA
The Bay Runner is a new, open-air trolley that provides complimentary service seven days a week, until midnight, with multiple stops along the way between Lido Key, St. Armands Circle, and downtown Sarasota! If you park in downtown Sarasota, this is a wonderful option for beating the beach parking lot traffic, and navigating downtown!

SEE HOW WE ARE GOING GREEN!
We love the environment, and are doing everything that we can to minimize our carbon footprint. Sarasota has been voted one of the cleanest and greenest cities in the US! Here are a few ways that we are loving on the beautiful Florida environment, and welcoming you to join us!
- This stay is central to beaches, restaurants, and shops! We encourage you to use our loved public transportation system to make traveling easy, and eco-friendly!
- We use high-quality, sustainable mattresses and linens
- We offer a drip coffee maker so that you can reduce your single-use pod disposable, while opting for a pot of coffee to eliminate waste!
- We offer reusable grocery bags to make shopping at your local farmers market both chic and sustainable!
- All of our toiletries are eco-friendly, clean products that come with reusable dispenser bags to eliminate waste.
- We use LED lighting throughout the home to minimize electricity usage. Thanks to the natural Florida sunshine, you can soak in the sun that floods this home through all of the large windows, without using excessive home lightning during the day!
- Our home is in a great location for Instacart! Make grocery shopping for the family easy while saving on gas!

ADDITIONAL AMENITIES:
- Linens for each Bed
- Towels and Washcloths
- Roll of Paper Towels
- Bottle of Dish Soap
- Trash Bags
- Coffee
- Laundry Detergent
- 2 Rolls of toilet paper, per bathroom
- Bath essentials - Body soap, shampoo & conditioner
*Please be prepared to bring any additional supplies that you will need during your stay.

Please Note:

1. Pet Policy: **This property is NOT pet friendly. Please note, if we find evidence of an unauthorized pet in the home, we will ask for it to be removed immediately and guests will be charged a $400 non-refundable fine. This is also grounds for immediate removal of the guests from the home.

2. No Smoking: If any signs of smoking are documented, the renter agrees to pay $200.00 / per day.

3. Note, that we do have security cameras at the home and it is recording 24/7, 365 days a year. It faces the exterior of the home and at the back of the house overlooking the pool. There are no cameras inside the home.

4. Quiet hours for the property are between 10:00 PM and 8:00 AM. Please keep the noise levels down over this time.

5. Upon booking, each guest will receive a guest rental agreement. This must be signed before the House Manual (which includes access instructions for the property) is sent.

6. This property is equipped with pool heat. Heat is turned on from November 21st through April 1st and is included with your stay at no extra costs. The FL sunshine does an incredible job at warming the pool for stays outside of these dates. Any request for pool heat outside of these dates will be considered individually and will incur an extra fee of $25 a day with a minimum of 5 days.

7. We provide complimentary 24/7 communication to ensure that your stay exceeds your expectations! Please feel free to reach out to us day or night and we will provide you with a swift response!

8. There are NO LONG CHECK-OUT INSTRUCTIONS! We want for you to be able to fully enjoy every minute of your stay in the Sunshine State!

Guest access
Guests will have access to the entire home excluding the locked maid's closet.

Other things to note
We cannot wait to host you @ Just Beachy!

Please treat the space with respect. If any problems arise, we will do our best to take action ASAP, but there is no one living on site 24/7.

Pool heater may raise the temperature by 20-25 degrees at most as long as the outside temperature remains above the 60F. When the outdoor temperature drops below 45 F pol heater operation is not possible as not enough heat in the air to warm the pool. The warmer the air and the more humid the air, the more heat is available for heating your pool. The ideal or rated condition for the heat pump is 80F air temperature, 80% relative humidity, and 80F water temperature. Under ideal conditions, heat pump should raise your pool temperature 1 F. per hour. As air temperature and humidity decrease, performance will also decrease.We provide life vests in child and adult sizes. description:
Welcome to Bloom Lagoon!
‚öìShort Drive to the World Class Beaches of AMI

The space
Bloom Lagoon from Anchor Down is an immaculate 3-bedroom home that can comfortably fit up to 7 people. Head here with your six friends to have a fun weekend, cool, week-long getaway, or a fun-filled summer vacation with your best pals.

Featuring a close location to the best local shops, restaurants, cafes, bars, pubs, convenience stores, and grocery stores, you will never want for anything while you stay here. Forget having to go in a car and drive hours and hours to get to local attractions ‚Äî we make it easy for you to get around with our perfect proximity to all that Anna Maria Island and Bradenton Beach have to offer!

Bloom Lagoon is located in a picturesque and beautiful part of Northwest Bradenton that is safe, secure, and walkable. Plus, as soon as you enter the inside of the home, you will notice the coastal and nautical feel. The personal decorations, relaxing atmosphere, and cool artwork make it feel like you are in a friend‚Äôs beach house!

Continue walking in and you will reach the comfortable and cozy living room complete with ample seating areas that can fit you and all of your family or friends. You can sit back or lay down on the couches or chairs and read a book, play a board game with your friends, prop your feet up on the coffee table, or watch your favorite movie on the smart TV on the wall. Turn on a flick at the end of the night and pop some popcorn to have a relaxing night in!

Master Bedroom - King bed, Smart TV, and Ensuite
Bedroom 2 - Queen Bed, Smart TV
Bedroom 3 - Twin over Full Bunk Bed, Smart TV
Living Room - Sleeper Sofa

If you want to make a fresh dinner or snacks for you and your friends, then head into the modern and spacious kitchen. Forget hotel rooms where you have to get room service or use the kettle that hasn‚Äôt been cleaned ‚Äî use our stainless steel and modern kitchen appliances to make a healthy lunch, whip up a fancy dinner, or just make some appetizers for you and your pals. Our kitchen makes it easy for even the most inexperienced chefs to make a fast and tasty meal!

If you are tired of being stuck inside, head to the backyard screened-in pool and seating area to sit al fresco and enjoy the cool outdoor breeze. Florida is known for its year-round warm weather, so the cool breeze in the evening is fully welcomed. We love sitting out here at night to sit with a glass of wine and talk about plans for the upcoming day.

If you need to do some remote work during your stay here, you don‚Äôt have to worry. We offer fast Wi-Fi that is reliable throughout the entire property, meaning you can take your important conference call in your bedroom or send through a key proposal while you are sitting at the dining room table.

After a long day of exploring and working, head into one of the bedrooms. Our house offers a split floor plan that separates the master bedrooms from the other sleeping areas. The luxurious master suite offers a king-sized bed, smart TV to watch a show to lull yourself to sleep, walk-in closet to hold your clothes, and an en suite bathroom to shower off the sand.

If you are staying in one of the additional bedrooms, you can rest assured you will get just as good a night of sleep! Relax in the queen-sized bed with your partner and have the kids stay in the full bunk bed set up ‚Äî they will love the sleepover on vacation!

For the next day of activities, you will never run out of things to do! Head to the famous De Soto National Park to go for a walk on one of the beautiful trails, go biking in the nearby Robinson‚Äôs Preserve, or kayak through Palma Sola Bay with your family!

Pool temperatures will probably stay around 76¬∞ during the winter months. Please note if cold days occur, water temperatures will drop and may take longer to heat.

Damage Waiver: The total cost of your reservation for this Property includes a nightly damage waiver fee (‚ÄúManagement‚Äù), plus tax if applicable (the ‚ÄúDamage Waiver‚Äù).
The Damage Waiver covers you for up to $1,500 of accidental damage to the Property or its contents (such as furniture, fixtures, and appliances) as long as you report the incident to the host prior to checking out. The Damage Waiver fee eliminates the need for a traditional security deposit.

based on the property rented.

while on-premises. The homeowners are not responsible for the loss of personal belongings or valuables of the guest. By
accepting this reservation, it is agreed that all guests are expressly assuming the risk of any harm arising from their use
of the premises or others whom they invite to use the premises.
4. Pets are only permitted with prior approval and upon completion of the Pet Addendum to the rental agreement. An additional pet fee does apply.
5. Please be considerate to the neighbors and not have loud music after 10 pm.
6. All items in the home and on the property, including DVD's, CD, books and games are intended for entertainment and
enjoyment of the guests while staying at the house and are not to be removed from the home or property. The only
exception would be those items which are intended for use at the beach.

($500 cleaning fee applies if found smoking in house or smoke smell)
10. Please follow the departure instructions to help keep our cleaning costs down. We do everything we can to keep the properties in the best shape possible
with your help! If you need anything during your stay please let us know!

description:
Welcome to ‚òÄÔ∏èSarasota Sunshine‚òÄÔ∏è! This family friendly, beautifully designed property is centrally located and offers a one of a kind experience. Sleeping up to 9 guests, this luxurious space offers comfort, amenities and is close to downtown Sarasota as well as numerous beaches.

The space
The home provides 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms
- 2 King beds
- Full size bunk bed with twin trundle
- Full size crib/baby gear
- Game room
- Work out area
- Smart TV in each bedroom, game room and living room
- Washer and dryer

Outdoor space includes:
- Heated saltwater pool (heated Oct-May)
- Dining table for 8 guests
- Fire pit (propane) and seating for 8 guests
- 2 lounge chairs

- Outdoor games (Corn hole, Giant Connect 4, Bocci)

Centrally located to Sarasota favorites:
- Downtown Sarasota: 6 miles

- Siesta Key: 13 miles
- Bradenton Beach: 12 miles
- Anna Maria Island: 17 miles
- IMG Academy: 4.5 miles
- Ringling Museum: 3 miles
- Publix & Target: 2.5 miles


The House:
Park your vehicles safely in the driveway that fits four vehicles. The keypad on the front door will grant you access to the home.

The house includes a spacious living room with a 65" Smart TV for all of your streaming apps. There is ample space for everyone to sit comfortably. There is even a toddler table with two seats as well as a play kitchen and other various toys.

Attached to the living room is a spacious dining room, as well as sideboard that holds the wine, champagne and low ball glasses. Off of the dining room is the well equipped kitchen with complimentary coffee. There is a Keurig K-Duo, electric kettle, french press, waffle maker, griddle, air fryer, toaster and blender for all of your needs.

Off of the kitchen is the game room equipped with a Pool/Ping Pong/Dining table, Pac Man and a 55" Smart TV.

The home has 3 bedrooms. The primary has a king bed with an ensuite walk in shower and ample closet space. There is also direct access to the pool patio. The second bedroom has a king bed and a full size crib. The third bedroom has full size bunk beds with a twin trundle. Each bedroom has a Smart TV, plush mattresses, comfortable linens and blackout shades or curtains to ensure a good night's rest. There is a main bathroom with a bathtub that has direct access to the pool area.

Baby Gear: In addition to the full size crib we also provide a Pack N' Play, high chair, sound machine, video/sound baby monitor, baby bath, bouncer, play mat, Skip Hop activity center, push walker, toddler plates/bowls/utensils/cups, waterproof sheets, mini stroller, beach toys, water table and 2 puddle jumpers. We also have optional child safety alarms on all doors leading the pool area that can be turned on and off by guests.

There is also a workout area (mat, bench, weights, mirror, yoga mats) in the garage, as well as a full size washer and dryer. We also provide beach chairs, umbrellas and a beach buggy.

Outside the fun continues with a pool, dining and fire pit seating for 8, a new Weber gas grill, lounge chairs and outdoor games, perfect for creating fun memories!

Guest access
The entire home is for the guests.

Other things to note
Check-in is at 4pm
Check-out is at 10am

No pets allowed
No parties allowed
No smoking inside the home or on the patio

Please note there are security cameras on the front of the property with video and audio surveillance; a Ring doorbell monitoring the front door and a Ring floodlight camera over the garage monitoring the driveway and front yard. All other areas are completely private to our guests.

The pool is heated to 86 degrees October through May. During unusually cold weather, it may be too cold for the pool heater to function fully. This is unfortunately out of our control.

name: Private Pool Home with Short Drive to AMI
description:
Welcome to House of Palms!
‚öìShort drive to the World Class Beaches of Anna Maria Island
‚öìClose proximity to Lakewood Ranch, Sarasota, and Tampa
‚öìScreened in Private Pool with Solar Heater
‚öìBeach Equipment, Corn Hole, and a Putting Green
‚öì Fully stocked kitchen for all your favorite home cooked meals
‚öì High speed Wi-Fi, Smart lock for Self-Check-in

The space
Welcome to the perfect Florida vacation getaway!

This home offers the peaceful serenity that you have been seeking while providing easy access to world-class beaches and many food and entertainment options. Located just off Anna Maria Island, this Private Pool home is close to popular shopping and dining options within 5 minutes of the house. Coming to the area for a local tournament or camp? IMG Academy is less than 15 min from the house. Looking to take a trip down to the Manatee River? Just 3 miles away, downtown Bradenton offers the Riverwalk during the day for kids and fitness, as well as great nightlife with local bars and restaurants. Sarasota airport is 15 minutes away and Tampa airport is about 55 minutes away. A great central location where you can enjoy everything Bradenton and Anna Maria Island have to offer!

In addition to its unbeatable location, this property boasts charming coastal furnishings and a beautiful, screened-in patio and pool area surrounded by a palm tree paradise. Offering great separation, the kitchen, dining room, and living room still flow together with a fun, seaside vibe. The living room boasts plenty of seating so everyone can grab a seat around the Smart TV and watch all your favorite shows or movies. The kitchen comes equipped with all-new appliances and everything you will need to make your favorite home-cooked meals as well as a Coffee/Liquor bar. Nestled next to the kitchen, the dining room accommodates a table for eight. If you need to get some work completed, a fully equipped workstation has been set up in the third bedroom.

Just through the sliding glass doors, you will find the screened-in pool deck with plenty of seating options to enjoy a meal by the pool or just relax with your favorite cocktail while watching a sporting event! Looking for some fun? Enjoy the putting green or pull out the cornhole boards for a competitive game in the tropical backyard.

Trying to figure out sleeping arrangements? Bedroom 1, the master bedroom, is on the right side of the house for total privacy. The other two bedrooms are on the opposite side of the house and share a bathroom.
Bedroom 1: King Bed, Fan, Smart TV, Ensuite Bathroom
Bedroom 2: Two Twin Beds, Smart TV
Bedroom 3: Queen Murphy Bed, Smart TV, Desk
Living Room: Sleeper Sofa

Looking to explore? Only a short drive, House of Palms ensures easy access to the sugar-white sands and turquoise waters that make the island a tourist paradise. Engage in thrilling water activities, explore the vibrant local boutiques, and indulge in delectable seafood at waterfront dining establishments that are within walking distance from the house. The island's pristine beaches, like Holmes Beach and Bean Point, offer sun-soaked relaxation and opportunities for water sports such as paddleboarding and parasailing. Pine Avenue serves as a charming hub with boutique shops, art galleries, and eclectic restaurants, providing a perfect blend of local flavors and coastal vibes. For wildlife enthusiasts, the Anna Maria Island City Pier offers spectacular views and the chance to spot dolphins and manatees. Biking along the island's picturesque streets, exploring the historic Anna Maria Island Historical Society, and enjoying fresh seafood at waterfront eateries like the Sandbar Restaurant make for unforgettable experiences. The island's friendly atmosphere and community events, including the Anna Maria Island Art League exhibits and weekly farmers' markets, add to its allure, making it a must-visit destination for those seeking a quintessential Gulf Coast getaway.


*Washer and Dryer Available!
*The pool is heated by a recently installed Solar heating system. The temperature settings are only controlled by Mother Nature and the abundant Florida sunshine
*The house is equipped with high-speed wireless internet. High-quality towels and linens are provided for your use.
*Ring Doorbell located on Front Door
*Front Door and side gates are monitored with video surveillance.

Damage Waiver: The total cost of your reservation for this Property includes a nightly damage waiver fee (‚ÄúManagement‚Äù), plus tax if applicable (the ‚ÄúDamage Waiver‚Äù).
The Damage Waiver covers you for up to $1,500 of accidental damage to the Property or its contents (such as furniture, fixtures, and appliances) as long as you report the incident to the host prior to checking out. The Damage Waiver fee eliminates the need for a traditional security deposit.

based on the property rented.

while on-premises. The homeowners are not responsible for the loss of personal belongings or valuables of the guest. By
accepting this reservation, it is agreed that all guests are expressly assuming the risk of any harm arising from their use
of the premises or others whom they invite to use the premises.
4. Pets are only permitted with prior approval and upon completion of the Pet Addendum to the rental agreement. An additional pet fee does apply.
5. Please be considerate to the neighbors and not have loud music after 10 pm.
6. All items in the home and on the property, including DVD's, CD, books and games are intended for entertainment and
enjoyment of the guests while staying at the house and are not to be removed from the home or property. The only
exception would be those items which are intended for use at the beach.
7. Some properties have keys and garage/ gate remotes, if they are lost its $50 each to replace.
8. Please clean the grills after each use. There will be a $50 cleaning fee charged if grill is not cleaned.
9. No smoking allowed in the house. Smoking is allowed outside only.
($500 cleaning fee applies if found smoking in house or smoke smell)
10. Please follow the departure instructions to help keep our cleaning costs down. We do everything we can to keep the properties in the best shape possible
with your help! If you need anything during your stay please let us know!

If you have a special request, feel free to ask me.

**Hurricane Policy
In the event of an official hurricane warning issued for our area during your stay or within a few days of your scheduled arrival, we will offer flexible options if you desire to leave including rescheduling or a full refund. Please reach out with any concerns‚Äîwe're here to help and want you to feel confident booking with us.

You cannot heat the pool and spa simultaneously. When you activate the spa, it takes 1 hour to warm. Pool heat is free but please let me know, prior to your stay if you plan on wanting the pool heated and I will set the pool heat to 86 degrees. Depending on the air temperature it can take 1 day for the pool to reach 86. When air temperatures drop below 70 degrees, pool temperature may be affected. We unfortunately cannot guarantee pool temps when this happens but this is pretty uncommon in South Florida.

**Guest safety is our first concern. Use caution with the pool/hot tub, grills and fire pit. Do not leave children unattended. Rental & use of the premises and house including the pool/hot tub, fire pit and grills and is at your own risk.

üåü WHY YOU‚ÄôLL LOVE STAYING AT COCO VISTA!

So, whether you're seeking a stay filled with calmness or outdoor adventure, Coco Vista will be the perfect getaway for you and your loved ones! BOOK NOW and experience your ideal waterfront escape with Stayawhilewithus!

üåü KITCHEN & DINING

The heart of Coco Vista is its fully equipped kitchen, thoughtfully designed for both convenience and connection. Whether you‚Äôre preparing a quick breakfast before heading to the beach or hosting a family-style dinner, this kitchen has everything you need to make cooking a pleasure.

Enjoy granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, and ample prep space for creating your favorite meals. You‚Äôll find a drip coffee maker, blender, toaster, microwave, and a complete collection of pots, pans, utensils, and dinnerware ‚Äî all ready for your use.

- Pool settings are all scheduled. When booked, pool heat is set to 85 degrees during the cool season, however, pool temps are impacted if the weather drops below 60 degrees. So, unfortunately, pool temperatures cannot be guaranteed.

- Liability/Risk: The hosts/co-hosts are not responsible for any accidents, injuries or illness that occurs while ON or OFF premises while using equipment provided as part of the rental, including but not limited to pool, spas, stairs or playsets. Natural light pours in through large windows, illuminating the space and creating an inviting ambiance.

The gourmet kitchen is a chef's dream, featuring top-of-the-line stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, and custom cabinetry. Whether you're hosting a lavish dinner party or preparing a casual family meal, this kitchen offers both functionality and style.

Step onto the screened lanai to find your own private oasis. The sparkling pool beckons for a refreshing dip, while the covered patio space offers the perfect setting for entertaining. Lush landscaping and tropical palms provide a backdrop of natural beauty and privacy, creating a seamless blend between indoor and outdoor living.

The primary bedroom is a haven of luxury, offering a tranquil retreat, a generous walk-in closet, and a private en-suite bathroom. Pamper yourself in the spa-like bathroom, complete with a walk-in shower and dual vanity sinks that provide a true sense of indulgence.

Three additional well-appointed bedrooms provide ample space for family, guests, or even a home office. The guest bathrooms showcase modern fixtures and sleek design, ensuring both comfort and sophistication.

Located in the heart of West Bradenton, you'll enjoy convenient access to pristine beaches, world-class golf courses, shopping boutiques, and a myriad of dining options. With its prime location and lavish amenities, this home offers a lifestyle that embraces both relaxation and recreation.

Owner mailbox not available for guest use. If you wish to receive mail during your stay, we recommend making arrangements with the local post office to secure a PO Box prior to your arrival. Amazon packages should be picked up at a local Amazon locker location.

Master: King

- Prior approval is required. We allow up to 3 dogs for an additional fee of $150/pet/stay.

- Must be completely cleaned up after
- Leashed at all times when not in fenced area
- Crated indoors when not home with the pet

KINDLY NOTE

- Noise monitors inside and outside the house do not record voice or conversation, only monitor decibels.
- The heated pool feature is available for an extra $20/night or $400/month (offered from October till May). If you would like to purchase the pool heating feature, please note that it covers the entirety of your stay, and pool heater may take up to 24 hours to reach the desired temp, so kindly let us know before you check-in.
- Pool settings are all scheduled. When booked, pool heat is set to 85 degrees, however pool temps are impacted if the weather drops below 60 degrees. So, unfortunately, pool temperatures cannot be guaranteed.
- Safety features: fire extinguisher, smoke detector, first aid kit.
- For your comfort, our home is treated quarterly by a professional pest control company. But given our tropical climate, you may still see the occasional bug. IMPORTANT NOTE: For the security of our guests, every guest who enters the home during your stay MUST be listed on the reservation or disclosed to the host. Please, make sure to register the correct number of guests. Undisclosed guests who are not included in the official confirmation can place your stay at risk for early termination without a refund, and can incur an additional charge of $25/guest.

The space
Welcome to Cortez Chic! Located in a prime location, this property offers the perfect combination of comfort, convenience, and relaxation.

This 3-bedroom, 2-bath private pool home (Can be heated for an additional charge) is in a quiet community in Bradenton close to many local attractions. The location is everything, being 3.5 miles from the prestigious IMG Academy, within 5 miles of Bradenton Beach, and only 8 miles of the famous Anna Maria Island! With this property in the heart of Bradenton, you are also a short drive to Restaurants, Wal-Mart, Publix, Starbucks, and anything else you would need on vacation!

As you step into the home, you will immediately notice the spacious and inviting atmosphere. The open-concept design seamlessly blends the living, dining, and Florida rooms, creating a warm and inviting space for you and your guests to spread out and relax. The living room features cozy seating for all guests and a smart TV, perfect for unwinding after a day of exploring all that Bradenton has to offer.

Just around the corner, the kitchen is fully equipped with everything you will need to make your favorite home-cooked meals, making it a breeze to prepare meals and snacks during your stay. Whether you prefer a quick breakfast or a gourmet dinner, you will find everything you need right at your fingertips.

Through the kitchen, you will find the hidden gem of the property, the ‚ÄúCinema Corner.‚Äù This room has been repurposed into a cinema-style theater room where you can watch your favorite movies or shows on the big screen, all from the comfort of the plush, L-shaped sofa!

Trying to figure out sleeping arrangements?
Bedroom 1: King Bed, Smart Tv
Bedroom 2: Queen Bed, Smart Tv, Ensuite Bathroom
Bedroom 3: Two Twin Bunk Beds

This property boasts three well-appointed bedrooms, each designed to provide a restful night's sleep. Bedroom 1 is located on the left side of the house and has a shared bathroom just outside the room. Bedrooms 2 & 3 are located on the right side of the house,

One of the highlights of this rental is the Florida room which sits just outside of the sliding glass door. This space offers plenty of exposure to the Florida air without the inconvenience of fickle weather. Step outside to the pool deck and immerse yourself in the refreshing waters of the fully screened-in pool, soak up the Florida sunshine on the poolside loungers or have fun shooting hoops in the summer. You will not believe the levels of serotonin you experience kicking back with the view of the pond just behind the home.

Take a short stroll down the road to GT Bray Park which is the perfect place for the kids to play and enjoy the outdoors! Skate Park, baseball fields, tennis courts, multiple playgrounds, frisbee golf, and much more!

Whether you are planning a family vacation, a couples' getaway, or a trip with friends, this short-term rental in Bradenton is the perfect choice. Book your stay with us today and create unforgettable memories of this delightful Florida retreat!

The space
Sunshine Retreat is your perfect getaway in NW Bradenton, offering a spacious and beautifully designed home with all the amenities you need for a relaxing stay. Enjoy the tranquility of a residential neighborhood while being just minutes away from the stunning Anna Maria Island and the vibrant downtown Bradenton. With its inviting interiors, pet-friendly policies, and fantastic outdoor spaces, Sunshine Retreat is your ideal home away from home.

Property Details:
Welcome to Sunshine Retreat, a stunning 4-bedroom, 2-bathroom single family home located in the serene NW Bradenton area. As you enter the home, you're greeted by an open floor plan and high ceilings, creating a spacious and inviting atmosphere. The game room, equipped with a pool table and wall games, offers endless entertainment.

The dining room, with its lovely backyard pool views, provides the perfect setting for family meals. The fully equipped kitchen, featuring updated appliances, has everything you need to prepare home-cooked meals, and additional seating at the kitchen table allows you to enjoy meals with a view.
The living room is a cozy haven with a smart TV, high ceilings, and abundant natural light. The couch also doubles as a sleeper sofa for additional guests.

This pet-friendly property includes a full-size washer and dryer in the laundry room for your convenience. The garage is stocked with beach amenities like chairs and a cooler, as well as baby essentials such as a pack-and-play and highchair.

The master bedroom is a private retreat with a king bed, patio access, an en-suite bathroom, and a walk-in closet. The remaining bedrooms are thoughtfully placed on the opposite side of the house: a second bedroom with a queen bed, a third bedroom with a full bed and twin trundle, and a fourth bedroom with two twin beds. Bathroom 2 is conveniently located between these bedrooms.

Step outside into the perfect backyard, featuring ample outdoor seating, a dining area, a lounging space, and a refreshing pool. The fully fenced yard is spacious and perfect for pets.

Location & Things to Do:
Sunshine Retreat is situated in a peaceful residential neighborhood in NW Bradenton, offering safety, tranquility, and a generous lot size. Minuets away is Anna Maria Island is renowned for its crystal-clear waters and sugary sand beaches, offering a variety of water sports, local restaurants, and charming boutiques. A short drive will take you to downtown Bradenton, where you can stroll along the marina, dine at delicious restaurants, and explore local shops. Additionally, Sarasota and Siesta Key are within easy reach.

Other things to note
No more than 2 dogs are allowed. Pet fees do apply to cover extra cleaning costs. If any "dog waste" is left on the property, that will be an additional charge as well. Please do not let dogs on furniture. Thank you for taking care of our property with your furry family members!

Please note that this starter kit is not intended to last for the duration of your stay, but rather to give you time to get situated. Once these initial supplies are used, it is the guest‚Äôs responsibility to purchase any additional items needed for the remainder of the trip.

-Renters must be over 25 years of age.

-We are located in a residential neighborhood so please observe quiet hours from 10pm to 8am. We want to continue to share our property so this is very important.

-Remove garbage bags from each bathroom and kitchen and take to garbage cans. We provide a complimentary garbage concierge that will take the garbage cans and recyclables to the edge of the driveway on Sunday and Wednesdays for pick up.

Welcome to Dancing Dolphin home, where every detail has been thoughtfully designed to transport you to the ultimate sunshine beach vacation. Step outside and you'll find a beautiful pool and hot tub surrounded by a lush outdoor living area, perfect for soaking up the sun and enjoying a refreshing dip. The kitchen is fully equipped with everything you need to whip up a delicious meal, and the dining area is perfect for enjoying a game night or leisurely dinner with loved ones. The kitchen island also provides a great spot for small bites and conversation with the cook.


Take advantage of the living area with extra-large screen TV and comfy furniture for a ready-made movie night. The living area couch also pulls out to a Queen bed should you need to host an overnight guest.


*One small well-behaved dog would be CONSIDERED with a paid pet fee of $200.00 plus tax. Check with the property manager for approval before booking.

NO DOGS IN POOL/ NO CATS

description:
Welcome to Fairway Green! An ultimate retreat home sitting in the middle of the 18-hole golf course of the world-famous IMG Academy.
With a meticulously designed house layout, you'll experience an amazing panoramic view of the golf course, enhanced by professionally maintained tropical landscaping, with golf front palm trees and 100-year-old oak trees. This home offers a true retreat and relaxation experience.

The space
This spacious retreat features:
‚Ä¢ 2 en-suite bedrooms
‚Ä¢ 3 large bedrooms
‚Ä¢ 2 of 5 bedrooms have office desk and chair
‚Ä¢ 3 full baths
‚Ä¢ An outdoor shower with hot water
‚Ä¢ 8 beds, comfortably sleeping up to 14 guests
With the backyard situated in the middle of the par5 hole 7th fairway, guests can easily walk straight to the fair green for the sunset walk and even collect some lost balls after 6:00 PM (or whenever twilight is over).

Fairway Green is located in IMG Academy boundary with 2 golf courses next to each other (IMG golf course and Manatee County golf course). Nearby attractions include:
‚Ä¢ Ringling Museum: Italian-influenced architectural wonder in Florida - less than 6 miles
‚Ä¢ LECOM Park: Home of the Pittsburgh Pirates' spring training - 6 miles

For dining, there are so many beachfront/waterfront restaurants on Anna Maria Island. A few of our favorites are Star Fish Company (1920s-era fish house), The Waterfront Restaurant, Sandbar Seafood and Spirits, Anna Maria Island Beach Caf√©, Anna Maria Oyster Bar on the Pier.

For those who love to cook and grill, Detwiler's Farm Market, a local favorite grocery store, is 2 miles away, Winn-Dixie is 3 miles and Publix Super Market is 3.5 miles away.

Be your own chef in a fully stocked kitchen equipped with name brand appliances, the latest cookware, dishes, utensils, and a spice rack with 20 jars of different spices. A blender, mixer, rice cooker, waffle maker, dinnerware, silverwares, kitchen linens and food wrap are all available for your convenience.

For all you coffee and tea enthusiasts, there is a coffee and tea bar furnished with an espresso/coffee machine, kettle and all the provisions.

Laundry room is available on-site equipped with large washer, dryer and laundry supplies.

Beach gear, including a beach bag, 4 chairs, 2 umbrellas, and a wagon, is available and ready for your beach day.

Traveling with small children? You can pack lighter because we have Pack n' Play, highchair, and kid's dinnerware.

For your peace of mind, surveillance cameras are located around the exterior of the house (front, back, and both sides). There are no inside cameras. Noise monitors inside and outside the house do not record voice or conversation; they only monitor decibel levels.

Other things to note
TERMS AND CONDITIONS OF RENTAL AND LIABILITY WAIVER

SMOKING/ VAPING:
Smoking and vaping are STRICTLY PROHIBITED in the house. This includes e-cigarettes. Smoking is allowed in the back yard with the door closed. Cigarette butts must be picked up.

MUSIC & NOISE:
Parties/Events are not allowed. No rowdy or loud music at any time.

QUIET HOURS:
We are located in a residential neighborhood so please observe quiet hours from 10:00 PM to 8:00 AM. We want to continue to share our property so this is very important.
Guests are responsible for any fines if police are called.

PETS: Prior approval is required. We allow up to 2 dogs, $250/each per stay.
- Must be fully house trained
- Must be completely cleaned up after ($250 additional charge if violated)
- Leashed at all times when not in fenced area
- Crated indoors when not home with the pet
- If barking becomes an issue during your stay, alternative arrangements must be made
- Not allowed on furniture, bedding, or inside the pool and spa.

CHECK IN AND CHECK OUT:
Check in is after 4pm. Check out is 10:00am. Guests with unauthorized late check out will be charged $50 per 30-minute increment after 10:00am, plus additional charge if it results in canceling of incoming guests.

USE OF PROPERTY:
Keep the property, appliances, and all furnishings in good order. Guests may not make any changes to the property and must put furnishings back to its original placement if moved.

MINIMUM AGE REQUIREMENTS:
We take reservations only from adult guests age 21 and older. The Guest who reserves the property must be on site the full duration of your stay.

PARKING:
Parking is limited to 6 vehicles. Vehicles are to be parked in the driveway. Parking on the road is not permitted. Illegally parked cars are subject to towing; applicable fines/towing fees are the sole responsibility of the vehicle owner.

HOT TUB/SPA:
No glass product whatsoever in or around the
spa. We make every attempt to keep the spa as clean as possible, but it is not unusual to find unexpected debris or some mineral stains in the spa because it‚Äôs located outdoor.
GUEST ACKNOWLEDGES THAT SPA ARE INHERENTLY DANGEROUS, AND GUEST HEREBY ACCEPTS ALL RISK OF PERSONAL INJURY OR DEATH FROM THE USE OF THE SPA AND SHALL HOLD PROPERTY OWNERS HARMLESS FROM ANY SUCH INJURY OR DEATH.

HOUSEKEEPING:
There is no daily housekeeping service.

GARBAGE:
Garbage is collected Monday and Thursday (except for holidays). Recycling is collected on Monday.

GAS GRILL/FIRE PIT:
Grill and propane tanks are provided, please refill propane at local Publix or CVS as needed. Please empty grease drip tray, turn off the gas valve securely after each use.

LIABILITY/RISK:
The Owners are not responsible for any accidents, injuries, or illness that occur while on the premises. The Owners are also not responsible for any accidents, injuries, or illness that occur off the premises while using equipment provided as part of the rental, such as kayaks, golf carts, beach chairs, bikes, beach umbrellas, and beach wagons. description:
SLEEPING ARRANGEMENTS

The space
3 BR / 2 BA / Sleeps 7

Second bedroom ‚Äì One King bed

______________________________________________________________________________


AMENITIES


1 small dog considered (under 50 lbs) with prior approval and non-refundable pet fee of $200 plus tax- NO CATS

Outdoor private pool. Heating is available in cooler months (November - April) for a charge of 35.00 plus tax a day, reserve with the property manager before arrival.

Screened Lanai with outdoor table and seating area.

Propane grill for outdoor cooking.

Close to Anna Maria Island and Bradenton Beaches. (12 min drive to Anna Maria Island and 11-minute drive to Bradenton Beach)

Spacious living room with large flat panel TV.

Fully stocked modern kitchen which is open to the living room.

Full-size washer and dryer

* No Smoking inside the home *

No Trailer, RV, or Boat Parking

** PLEASE NOTE- For extended stays of 60 days or more we require a mid-stay clean be done by our cleaners. A member of our team will reach out upon your booking to coordinate the fee and scheduling.


_____________________________________________________________________________


FULL DESCRIPTION


Casa Azul Retreat is a 3 Bedroom/ 2 Bath escape to private luxury, where tranquility and serenity surround you from the moment you step inside. Professionally decorated in a soft, tranquil color palette, this home exudes a sense of relaxation and ease. Every detail, from the fixtures to the appliances has been carefully chosen to create a peaceful and inviting atmosphere. You'll feel instantly at peace and completely at home in this serene private pool paradise. Book your stay now and experience the ultimate in relaxation and rejuvenation.


You're sure to be swept away by the stunning master bedroom suite, complete with an exquisite bathroom featuring gorgeous double vanities. Perfect for couples, the bathroom includes one vanity/sink inside the shower room and another just outside, making it not only beautiful but also so very functional. Step through the sliding doors in your master suite and find yourself in the private pool area where relaxation awaits. If you're working from home, you'll appreciate the dedicated workspace in a quiet corner of the bedroom suite, offering a peaceful view of the beautiful yard and pool. Treat yourself to a truly unforgettable stay in this master suite.


Kitchen is not only coastal chic but also absolutely stunning. With brand new appliances and beautifully done decor, this kitchen is a chef's dream come true. Everything you need to prepare and enjoy a beautifully healthy meal at home is provided, making dining in a breeze. The kitchen overlooks a dining room table with seating for 6, surrounded by numerous large windows that flood the space with natural light creating a bright and inviting atmosphere. If you're just looking to keep the chef company or enjoy a morning cup of coffee, the breakfast bar and stools is also just a great place to be!


Second bedroom is also a king-sized bedroom for your guests to enjoy, featuring a luxurious king bed that promises a restful night's sleep. The serene decor and bedding create an inviting atmosphere, while the large screen TV mounted on the wall offers entertainment at your fingertips. Enjoy the convenience of private access to a bathroom, shared with other guests in the home through a hallway door, but fear not, as this setup ensures both privacy and accessibility for all guests. Step outside the private sliding doors and discover a backyard oasis.


Families enjoy the third guest bedroom featuring the twin over queen bunk beds, where every detail has been carefully considered. Equipped with a large screen TV mounted on the wall, this cozy space is perfect for unwinding and relaxing. Adding to the charm of this guest bedroom is the trendy sliding barn door that separates it from the living room, adding a touch of style and functionality. Rest assured, this fantastic bedroom combines comfort, convenience, and a touch of modern flair.


If you can pull yourself away from the inviting living room atmosphere complete with deep seating comfortable couch, and wet bar sink allowing you to mix up a refreshing drink to enjoy the outdoors, the pool area is a true oasis waiting to be discovered. Step into the screened-in pool patio and feel the stress melt away as you soak up the sun in privacy. The expansive backyard offers a tropical view that will transport you to a world of relaxation. Whether you're looking to lounge by the pool with a good book, enjoy a refreshing swim, or take advantage of the BBQ grill, this private and beautiful setting is the perfect place to recharge. NOTE_ Pool Heating is available in cooler months (November - April) for a charge of 35.00 plus tax a day, reserve with the property manager before arrival.


1 small dog considered (Under 50 Lbs) with prior approval and non-refundable pet fee of $200 plus tax


Feel like venturing out for a day? This home is approximately 8 miles to Anna Maria Island, 5 miles to nature preserves, Riverwalk, and IMG Academy. Only 5 minutes from state-of-the-art GT Bray Recreation center featuring a fitness center, group exercise classes, an Olympic-sized pool, kiddie pool and splash pad, teen center, skate park, clay tennis courts, pickleball, and a gym to play basketball and volleyball.

The Shoppes of Paradise Bay Plaza is just 1.9 miles away (4 minutes) and offers grocery

SWIMMING POOL SAFETY ACKNOWLEDGEMENT & RELEASE:
1. Supervision is key to preventing drowning accidents: never leave children unsupervised in the pool or in the pool vicinity - not even for a second!

name: Villa Treasure Island - Beautifully Renovated Priv
description:
4 Bedrooms, 2.5 Bathrooms, Heated Private Pool & Hot Tub, Free Wifi

The space
LOCATED IN A QUIET NEIGHBORHOOD, our elegant Villa Treasure Island is exactly what you've been looking for.

Imagine spending a week, or better yet an entire month, of your vacation in our spectacular home. Renovated in 2021 and 2023, this close to 2,400 SF house boasts everything and more you are looking for to make your Florida stay unforgettable. The new oversized pool cage offers two wide panoramic view screens and keeps mosquitos, bugs and other non-welcome small animals, including no-see-ums out, so that you can enjoy the beautiful outside and view and of the lake as much as possible.

Located in the much thought after NW Bradenton area, this home is just a 10 minute drive away from the beautiful Anna Maria Island beaches. With 4 bedrooms and 2.5 bathrooms, a separate living and family room, grand kitchen, and most importantly a oversized screened in private heated pool and hot tub facing south, this home sleeps up to 8 and offers plenty of space for one to two families. Lots of beach items such as beach chairs, umbrellas and more is available at the home.

The open concept kitchen and family room area are ideal for spending quality time together. Take a seat on the oversized and comfy sofa after a long day at the beach or pool, put on your favorite show on the smart TV, also offering cable programs, and wind down the right way. Family meals or quick snacks are easily prepared in the fully stocked kitchen with beautiful finishes including granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, two ovens, and a nice highchair bar area. The breakfast nook will welcome you and your coffee every single morning.

The front living room offers you lots of comfortable seating, as well as a desk and chair, in case you have to get some work done.

The master bedroom with king size bed, smart TV, and en-suite bathroom is located on one side of the house, offering lots of privacy. The master bathroom offers a bathtub, walk-in shower, double sink vanity and cozy seating area. Pool area and lake views are never far away, just step through the french doors and gaze into the distance, or go for a swim in the heated pool.

Three guest bedrooms are located on the other side of the home and share one full and one half bathroom in a hallway. The first bedroom has a king size bed with smart TV, the second bedroom a queen size bed with smart TV, and the third bedroom two XL twin beds with smart TV. The full bathroom offers a dual sink and shower/ tub combination. All bed linens and lots of bath and beach towels are available during your stay.

The screened in outdoor area with private pool overlooking a lake has everything your heart desires: oversized heated pool, hot tub, large outdoor dining area, BBQ, lounge area, and plenty of sun loungers. Grab a floaty and go for a swim, grab some sun lotion and work on your Florida tan, or prepare the catch of the day or delicious burgers and steaks on the BBQ. In the evening, we highly recommend taking a seat in the lounge area with a preferred beverage of your choice and catch up on all the day's adventures.

The laundry room offers a full size washer and dryer and the garage offers parking for one vehicle, two more cars can be parked on the driveway.

Just a few minutes away is a big supermarket, as well as restaurants and stores for shopping.

PLEASE NOTE: After successfully booking the home, you will receive an email message with a link to a rental agreement, which will require your online signature.

description:
SLEEPING ARRANGEMENTS

The space
3BR /2BA / Sleeps 8

Master bedroom ‚Äì King bed with TV in the room.

Second bedroom ‚Äì King Bedroom with walk-in closet.

Third Bedroom - Queen bedroom

*All bedrooms have access to hallway bathrooms*


______________________________________________________________________________

AMENITIES

Ample parking in driveway and side of the home. RVs and boats are welcome!

Propane grill for outdoor cooking.

Private pool with inground SPA and large outdoor area for entertaining. (Pool can be heated in cooler months (November - April) for an extra 35.00 a day. Please let us know in advance so it's heated when you arrive.

2 Beach Chairs, 1 small cooler, 1 Beach Umbrella

IMG Academy 4.6 miles

Downtown Bradenton is 5 minutes away.

Spacious living room with large flat panel TV and comfy sofas and chair.

WIFI / Basic streaming cable package for TVs.

* No Pets or Smoking inside the home *

*******************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************8

FULL DESCRIPTION


Welcome to Serenity of the Sea!! You are right in the middle of the action, close to downtown Bradenton, Beaches, Sarasota, Tampa/St. Petersburg and more...‚Ä¶

Upon entering this spacious private home, you are greeted with the main kitchen area, bar stools, and cute sitting area which is great for entertaining while cooking your favorite meals. The living room is expansive with a comfortable seating area, a large 10-person dining table, and a wall-mounted TV. Glass doors open up to your private outdoor patio with a pool, inground SPA, and ambient lighting. Multiple seating areas make this outdoor space a great area to gather with family and friends. Two bedrooms have king-size beds and one guest room with a queen bed. There are lots of parking available and you are free to bring an RV or boat. There is a boat launch on the Manatee River very close to the home. The beaches are why you came, and they are just minutes away!! Anna Maria Island/Bradenton beaches are a 15-minute drive west on Manatee Ave. If you are looking for more beach adventure, Lido Beach and the famous Siesta Key beaches are a 40-minute drive south of the home. Just 20-30 minutes from SQR Airport and less than an hour from Tampa Airport giving you plenty of flight options.


Private pool with inground SPA and large outdoor area for entertaining. (Pool can be heated in cooler months (November - April) for an extra 35.00 a day. Please request heat added at least 3 days prior to stay for scheduling purposes. We may not be able to schedule it to be turned on once you arrive. Please note-this Spa is an in-pool Spa. It is equipped with jets but doesn't bubble like an out of pool spa.


PLEASE NOTE- For extended stays of 60 days or more we require a mid-stay clean be done by our cleaners. A member of our team will reach out upon your booking to coordinate the fee and scheduling.

******************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************

This comfortable private home is located just 5 minutes from downtown Bradenton. Downtown Bradenton is on the Manatee River and has bars, restaurants, and Village of the Arts. The Village of the Arts is an eclectic live-work community of colorful historic cottages that house everything from award-winning restaurants to specialty shops, studios, healing arts, bakeries, and Bradenton‚Äôs best art galleries. The Sarasota/Bradenton airport is a 35-minute drive (9.6 miles) south and downtown Sarasota and St Armands Circle are about 35-minute drive south which is a great place to watch a sunset from a rooftop bar with causal and upscale dining and shopping. You will also find dining options in nearby Longboat Key, Bradenton Beach, and Anna Maria Island which all have great places to eat and things to do by the beach. The home is centrally located to I-75 to take quick trips to Tampa or Orlando areas.

Other things to note
Please note that we may collect additional information from you after confirming your booking (usually an email address) in order to comply with local regulations and to provide the best possible experience.

Regulatory Information

The space
**Master Bedroom:**

---

**Food and Attractions Near Your Tropical Escape in Bradenton**

All the bedrooms are conveniently located on one level, featuring a plush king bed in each, with the master bedroom equipped with a crib in the master closet. The unique Bunk Room boasts two Twin over Full bunk beds, and the family room provides additional sleeping space with a pull-out full sofa.

The property includes two en-suite bathrooms, a hall bath, and a convenient pool bath accessible from outside or the garage. If you're traveling with small children, we've got you covered with provided amenities like Pack n' Plays, a stroller, highchair, baby monitor, and kid-friendly dinnerware.

Expect a hassle-free stay as all linens and towels, both for bath and beach use, are provided. The fully equipped kitchen is a chef's delight, featuring stainless steel appliances, granite counters, and a brand new center island. The kitchen comes stocked with everything you need, from pots and pans to a coffee maker with complimentary coffee, filters, and creamer.

A gas grill with a propane tank is at your disposal for outdoor cooking, and plenty of dining options await, including a kitchen island with stools, a dining table for 8, an outdoor table with 8 chairs, and a sitting area by the pool. The poolside furniture includes four lounge chairs and a table with 8 chairs, creating the perfect setting for relaxation.

Entertainment options abound with games such as cards, board games, pool toys, Wii, and outdoor games. The property also features central air and an in-unit brand new washer and dryer for your convenience.

As a thoughtful touch, we've included a range of amenities to enhance your stay, from beach equipment like sand chairs, a canopy, cooler bag, and sand toys, to essentials like toilet paper, paper towels, dish soap, dishwasher detergent, salt & pepper, and soap. Your vacation at this stunning property promises to be an unforgettable retreat filled with comfort, convenience, and cherished memories.

Guest access

Other things to note
Attention: If you‚Äôre looking for a party house, please DO NOT BOOK. Home is located in a quiet, friendly neighborhood and we monitor noise levels. There is no street parking and there is a 10 pm Quiet Time. Property is a great fit for family vacations.

The space
Welcome to your home away from home! This modern 2,000+ sq ft retreat features high-end finishes, open living spaces, and a fully fenced backyard ‚Äî perfect for families, groups, or dog lovers. ***HEATED POOL AND OUTDOOR SPACE***

***LIVING ROOM***

If you don't feel like eating a meal on the covered patio overlooking the pool and yard, there is a full dining room plus barstool countertop seating.

***BEDROOMS & BATHROOMS***
Memory foam mattresses in every room! We know a good night sleep is part of a good vacation! Master bath has separate shower and tub, and both bathrooms come well equipped with plenty of soft towels. The two bedrooms with king sized beds have 43 inch smart TVs.

Policies:
We want everyone to enjoy their experience at our property, but also want to highlight we DO NOT ALLOW PARTIES. Anyone breaking this rule will be evicted immediately without refund and are subject to a $500 eviction fee. This includes playing loud or vulgar music outside, any drug use on the property (even with a medical card - please do it elsewhere), and any excess cars or guests. We allow 4 cars maximum and no street or yard parking. Our garage is used only as a game room. We do not allow parking or storage in the garage. Please keep noise at a reasonable level during the day. Quiet time is 10pm. No indoor smoking including in the garage. Everyone in the booking must be 28+ unless accompanied by a parent. 8 adults maximum. We are located in a quiet family friendly neighborhood and care about our neighbors.

We are a dog friendly property. We allow 2 small dogs per booking with a $150 pet fee.

The space
‚ú¶ WHY YOU‚ÄôLL LOVE PALM HAVEN ‚ú¶

Nestled in a quiet neighborhood of Palma Sola, Palm Haven offers both relaxation and convenience. Guests consistently mention the amazing location ‚Äî just 4.4 miles from Anna Maria Island beaches and 5.4 miles from the world-renowned IMG Academy, with parks, preserves, and waterfront views all close by.

From the front door, stroll 0.8 miles to the Palma Sola Bay Fishing Pier or explore two nearby neighborhood parks. Portosueno Park (0.2 miles) and Palma Sola Point (0.9 miles) are both within walking distance, perfect for spotting manatees and catching breathtaking sunrises or sunsets. For outdoor adventures, Robinson Preserve (2.1 miles) and De Soto National Memorial (2.7 miles) are just around the corner, offering kayaking, biking, and nature trails.

Back at home, the private backyard oasis awaits with a sparkling pool, screened porch for alfresco dining, and a BBQ grill for family cookouts. Indoors, unwind in the open living area with plush seating, a 65" smart TV, and high-speed WiFi ‚Äî whether you‚Äôre streaming a movie, working remotely, or winding down after a beach day.

Gather around the formal dining table for shared meals, or keep it casual at the breakfast bar with four stools ‚Äî perfect for morning coffee or evening conversation while the chef cooks.

Each bedroom is designed for rest, featuring plush memory foam mattresses, hotel-quality linens, and plenty of storage.

- Master Bedroom ‚Äî King sized bed with ensuite bath
- Bedroom 2 ‚Äî Queen sized bed + one set of bunk beds (twin over twin)

‚ú¶ Why Guests Love It ‚ú¶

‚ú¶ Book Your Stay ‚ú¶

Whether you‚Äôre planning a family beach trip, an IMG tournament week, a long winter escape for snowbirds, or a Gulf Coast getaway with friends, Palm Haven has everything you need to create lasting memories. Book your stay today and see why guests love this unbeatable location near Anna Maria Island.

Guest access

description:

3 BD / 2 BA / Sleeps 6

__________________________


FULL DESCRIPTION


Enjoy the Florida lifestyle, Beaches, Parks and all that it has to offer while staying in this beautiful home in the well-established west Bradenton community of Village Green. Covered entry welcomes you into the spacious living room complete with large screen TV. The galley kitchen is fully stocked for enjoying meals at home or al fresco on the tranquil back patio overlooking the pool (Pool may be heated during winter months for an additional charge of $35/day plus tax. Please request to add on at least 3 days prior to reservation.) The expansive master bedroom has an en-suite bath and walk in closet. Two other guest rooms (one Queen and one Full) welcome family and friends. Enjoy your own private resort style pool and hot tub with large screen TV on the pool deck also, really makes this an outdoor lifestyle! When you need a break from all the lounging at this lovely home, Riverwalk, Robinson Preserve, DeSoto National Park and Palma Sola Botanical Gardens are just a short drive away, along with 10 minutes to GT Bray Park and Rec Center providing access to Pickleball, Tennis, Fitness Center, Skate Park, Playground, etc. Fun for the whole family!


* 1 dog allowed with prior approval and non-refundable pet fee of $200 plus tax* NO CATS


There is a Publix grocery store on Manatee Avenue that is 6 minutes away (1.2 miles) The Shoppes of Paradise Bay Plaza is just 1.9 miles away (4 minutes) and offers grocery shopping, restaurants, a Starbucks coffee shop, and a Dollar Store. The Sarasota/Bradenton airport is a 20-minute drive (10.5 miles) south and downtown Sarasota and St Armands Circle are about 30-minute drive south which is a great place to watch a sunset from a rooftop bar with causal and upscale dining and shopping. You don't need to go that far for dining options as Longboat Key, Bradenton Beach, and Anna Maria Island all have great places to eat and things to do by the beach. Don't forget a trip to downtown Bradenton which is on the Manatee River and also has bars, restaurants, and Village of the Arts. The Village of the Arts is an eclectic live-work community made up of colorful historic cottages that house everything from award-winning restaurants to specialty shops, studios, healing arts, bakeries, and Bradenton‚Äôs best art galleries.


PLEASE NOTE- For extended stays of 60 days or more we require a mid-stay clean be done by our cleaners. A member of our team will reach out upon your booking to coordinate the fee and scheduling.

Other things to note
Please note that we may collect additional information from you after confirming your booking (usually an email address) in order to comply with local regulations and to provide the best possible experience.

TITLE: 4BR Oasis w/Pool & Firepit ‚Äì Near AMI & IMG
Listing Name: 4BR Oasis w/Pool & Firepit ‚Äì Near AMI & IMG
name: 4BR Oasis w/Pool & Firepit ‚Äì Near AMI & IMG
description:
Welcome to Vista Palmeras ‚Äì your private, family-friendly paradise! Unwind in our heated pool, dine al fresco under the gazebo, relax by the firepit, or nap in the two-person hammock. Tucked in a peaceful neighborhood, yet close to IMG Academy, G.T. Bray Park, LECOM Park, SRQ Airport, and the stunning beaches of Anna Maria Island. Plus, you're just minutes from shopping and dining on Cortez Rd. and Manatee Ave. Make unforgettable memories at your home away from home.

The space
About the House & Layout:

This stunning, one-of-a-kind oasis features a heated swimming pool, cozy fire pit, gazebo with seating and dining areas, a two-person hammock, and outdoor games‚Äîeverything you need to unwind and enjoy the Florida sunshine. Find your perfect spot to relax and recharge!

For guests with electric vehicles, our property is equipped with a Lectron J1772 Level 2 EV Charger (NEMA 14-50). Please reach out for more details about access and fees.

Interior & Layout:

The spacious layout consists of two bedrooms on the east side of the house and two on the west, with the living and dining areas conveniently situated in between.

East Side:

The primary bedroom features two queen-sized beds and a Roku TV for your viewing pleasure.
The second bedroom is also on the east side, with a king-sized bed and a Roku TV. These two rooms share a spacious, well-appointed bathroom with a double vanity and Jack & Jill entry, offering easy access for both rooms.

West Side:

The third bedroom boasts a king-sized bed and a Roku TV.
The fourth bedroom has a queen-sized bed and a twin bed with a Roku TV. These rooms share a bathroom with hallway access.

Bonus: There's a pull-out sleeper sofa in the living room for additional guests.

Workspace & Entertainment:

Need to catch up on work or stay connected? We've got you covered with a dedicated workspace in the corner of the dining room, complete with a computer desk and chair. You can also take your work outdoors, as our high-speed Spectrum WiFi via Deco Wifi 6 mesh network extends all the way to the gazebo in the backyard!

For those wanting to relax with entertainment, the living room and ALL bedrooms are equipped with Spectrum TV, ensuring you won‚Äôt miss that important game or TV show.

Kitchen & Amenities:

The fully equipped kitchen is a chef‚Äôs dream, featuring granite countertops and full-sized stainless-steel appliances. For your convenience, there's also a separate beverage fridge to keep your drinks cool. Whether you're cooking, baking, or grilling, the kitchen has everything you need to make meal preparation a breeze.

Start your morning with a fresh cup of coffee using either the drip, French press or Keurig coffee maker, or brew a soothing cup of tea with the electric kettle. The kitchen also includes a microwave, toaster, and blender for added convenience.

For your laundry needs, a full-sized washer and dryer is available in the laundry room, so you can freshen up your clothes during your stay.

Guest access
Guests have access to all areas of the home including closets, with the exception of a locked owners closet in the main double queen bedroom and three small closets containing HVAC systems and supplies.

Other things to note
Beach Gear:

Enjoy the sun and sand with our complimentary beach gear. Borrow oversize beach towels, beach chairs, umbrella, cooler, beach toys, and a shell/shark tooth sifter. Don't forget your swimsuits and sunscreen!

Barbeque Facilities:

Use our propane gas grill for your outdoor cooking needs. It's for guest use only, so please no parties or use by outside guests. Remember to clean up after yourself and keep the grill free of grease and grime. Cleaning utensils and grill cleaner products are provided in the coffee bar bottom drawer.

Baby Gear:

We provide baby gear (pack and play & highchair) free of charge. It can be found in the closet of the third bedroom (king bed) located on the west side of the house.

Games and Entertainment:

Board games are located in the living room TV stand. Additionally, indoor and outdoor games for kids and adults are available and can be found in the laundry half bathroom.

Welcome Package:

To start your stay off right, we provide samples of local coffee, tea, sugar, cream, and toiletries upon your arrival. Laundry detergent, dishwasher pods, dish soap, trash bags, and toilet paper are also provided.

Extra supplies may need to be purchased based on usage and length of stay.

Pool Information:

The pool is heated to 80 degrees at no extra cost, which is an acceptable swimming temperature. However, if you prefer a warmer pool, for an additional $30 per night, we can heat it to 86 degrees. This fee helps us keep our nightly rate low for guests who choose not to heat the pool and helps offset the additional energy costs.
It's highly recommended to heat the pool if you plan to swim during fall, winter, and spring months (typically mid-October through early May); however, the pool heater is assisted by the hot Florida sun and temperatures can reach into the mid-80s when set to heat to 80. If you would like to experience the warmer extra-fee-based option, please let us know in advance as it can take 12-24 hours to reach the desired temperature. You'll be charged for each night of your stay to maintain the temperature. Cold spells may impact the pool heater's ability to keep the desired temperature. Unfortunately, we do not offer refunds due to weather conditions or other factors beyond our control.

While we have a professional service that cleans and maintains the pool weekly, we do not provide 24/7 pool maintenance. It may be necessary for guests to use the provided net to remove debris or other items that may fall into the pool before use. This is no different from what a homeowner would do, and our net is located adjacent to the pool deck. The pool is serviced on Mondays and Thursdays between 10am and 2pm and it typically takes 10-20 minutes to complete the job. Nemo's Pools will access the home through the gate to the backyard. Please allow them to clean the pool, and refrain from swimming during that time. Feel free to re-enter the pool as soon as they are finished.

IMPORTANT: Please note that there is no safety fence nor alarms separating the pool from the home, so extra supervision of young children will be necessary. Make sure to review pool rules (see welcome guide) and take all necessary precautions before use.

description:
Discover the ultimate affordable Gulf Coast Florida vacation rental near Anna Maria Island at Coconut Breezes!

The space
This remarkable 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom home is nestled in the serene Village Green community of Bradenton, offering a tranquil setting for your family getaway. With modern furnishings and top-notch amenities including a private pool, pool table, and a stylish bar for crafting cocktails, this corner lot property has everything you need for a memorable stay.

Within a convenient 10-minute drive to the beaches of Anna Maria Island, you'll have access to an array of family-friendly activities. Spend sun-soaked days on the glistening white-sand Gulf Coast beaches, try your hand at fishing or kayaking from Palma Sola Causeway Park, and explore the picturesque Robinsons Preserve on a bike ride. Dining and shopping options are also within easy reach, allowing you to fully embrace the island lifestyle during your tropical retreat.

Feel the vacation vibes as you arrive at Coconut Breezes, greeted by swaying palms and a beautifully landscaped entrance. Step inside the welcoming open layout and be captivated by the coastal hues that fill the space. Large windows and sliding glass doors open up to the pool area, infusing the home with natural light. Prepare delicious meals in the updated, well-stocked kitchen featuring stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, and a breakfast bar with stools. The great room boasts a spacious dining area overlooking the living space, where a plush sectional sofa invites cozy movie nights. Enjoy some friendly competition at the pool table while sipping on drinks from the bar during your nightly gatherings.

The home features three custom-designed bedrooms, each offering pure comfort and relaxation. Premium bedding, flat-screen TVs, and ample storage enhance your stay. The master suite boasts a king bed and an ensuite bathroom with dual sinks and a step-in shower for ultimate rejuvenation. The two guest bedrooms feature queen beds and share a well-appointed guest bathroom accessed from the hallway.

When you're not basking in the sun or catching waves, take a refreshing dip in the private pool, enclosed within a spacious lanai. The pool area offers plenty of lounging space for unwinding and soaking up the Florida atmosphere. As night falls, gather with your guests outdoors and prepare a delectable feast on the grill or sit around the cozy atmosphere of the propane fire pit**.

Explore the surrounding areas of Bradenton with easy driving distances to Sarasota, St. Armands Circle, and St. Petersburg. Uncover more incredible coastline and dining opportunities as you venture out. From beaches and fishing charters to kayaking and cycling, the possibilities for outdoor adventures are endless.

Escape from it all and indulge in relaxation and rejuvenation at Coconut Breezes. Book your stay now for an unforgettable Gulf Coast experience!

Home Layout:
Bedroom 1: King Bed with ensuite full Bath
Bedroom 2: Queen Bed
Bedroom 3: Queen Bed
Living Room: Queen Sofa Bed (Pull-out)

**If you would like to use the fire pit during your stay, please message us and let us know and we will have a propane tank hooked up and ready to go. There is an additional fee as follows depending on your length of stay:
3 nights or less - $30
4-6 nights - $40
7-13 nights - $55
14-30 nights - $85
31+ nights - $30 per week

Other things to note
Paper Towels, Toilet Paper, Trash Bags, Dish Soap, Dishwasher Pods and Laundry Detergent are provided, as well as travel-sized Shampoo, Conditioner, Hand Soap, and Body Wash. Any additional items that you may need during your stay can be purchased at one of the local grocery stores.

The pool is heated from approximately mid-October to Easter and is set no higher than 85 degrees. During especially colder weather, we are unable to guarantee that the pool can maintained to the desired temperature.

Parking includes 3 vehicles maximum

From sun-soaked beach days to golf outings or cultural adventures, Florisun is your private haven for relaxation, connection, and unforgettable memories.

- Must be fully house-trained.

Our home features a spacious, fully equipped kitchen with oodles of vacation amenities including both indoor and outdoor dishware and glassware! Our fabulous location has you within walking distance of G.T. Bray Park which includes a huge pickleball complex, dog park, indoor recreation center, and many ball fields.
