TITLE: Black Friday Deals NOW - Holidays at the 'Grove'
Listing Name: Black Friday Deals NOW - Holidays at the 'Grove'
name: Black Friday Deals NOW - Holidays at the 'Grove'
description:
Spend this holiday at the Grove, where quality time with friends and family comes easy. Located in the heart of Bradenton the Grove provides endless opportunities to make lasting memories. Enjoy evening strolls along the Riverfront, sunny days at nearby beaches, or festive fun in the game room. Unwind in the heated saltwater pool, gather round the fire for family time, or settle in for popcorn and movie night. Whatever you choose, your stay at the Grove will be a holiday to remember.

The space
Welcome to The Orange Leaf. This newly remodeled home is designed with a modern take on old Florida style. Our 3 bedroom, 2 bath home is spacious, bright, comfortable and filled with many opportunities for relaxation and fun. Step inside, kick off your shoes, and get ready to relax. Or step into our air conditioned garage game room filled with arcade games, a full air hockey table that can also allow for a competitive game of ping pong. Or relax on the couch and enjoy a movie on our smart tv.

Out back you will find an escape. Our backyard houses a pool, screened in lanai, grill, putting green and a wood burning firepit. We also have corn hole and life sized connect 4. Back inside our kitchen is fully stocked with all the necessary tools to allow you to prepare wonderful meals throughout your stay. If you really want to leave our property and enjoy some of the other attractions around our beautiful city, we are just minutes from the AMI beaches(6-8 miles), restaurants, ocean horseback riding, jet skis and more. No need to overpack, we have provided you with beach chairs, towels, a cooler, and a beach umbrella to make your excursions a little easier. We look forward to hosting you in our beautiful home.

The Orange Leaf:

*King bedroom with ensuite
*Queen Bedroom
*1 Twin Bed/1 Full Bed
*Roku Smart TV in each bedroom and Living Room
*Coffee Station with your choice of drip or Keurig with a starter supply of coffee, creamer and sugar
*Full kitchen with many extra small appliances (blender, air fryer, toaster, etc) ‚Äì stocked with starter supply of dishwasher pods, new kitchen sponge, dish soap, paper towels
*Large Kitchen Island with seating
*2 Full bathrooms/1 walk-in shower/1 shower tub combo
*Open concept family room, kitchen, dining room
*Garage Game Room ‚Äì pool table/arcade games/ping pong
*Propane Gas Grill
*Fully fenced backyard
*Outdoor, covered and screened eating area
*Wood burning fire pit area with seating
*Outdoor Games: connect 4, corn hole
*Turf 3 hole putting green (glow in the dark balls and adjustable clubs provided)
*Parking in driveway
*Beach supplies: towels/chairs/cooler/umbrella
*Starter supply of toiletries: shampoo, conditioner, shower gel, toilet paper
*Freshly laundered linens, including 2 bath towels, 1 hand towel and 2 wash cloths per guest. We also supply make-up removal wipes.
*Full size washer and dryer in air conditioned garage
*Fast, FREE Wi-Fi
*Our newly designed guest book is full of information for your convenience.
*ALL FURRY FAMILY MUST BE REGISTERED AND FEE PAID
*NO SMOKING OR VAPING INSIDE

Guest access
Guests have full access to the entire house. We have 2 owners closets that are locked.

Other things to note
*Full kitchen with many extra small appliances (blender, air fryer, toaster, etc) ‚Äì stocked with starter supply of dishwasher pods, new kitchen sponge, dish soap, paper towels

*Please note we do have cameras ONLY outside for everyone's safety.

These cameras are located by the front doors and around the back of the house.

They will record audio and video.

Please note we do not offer refunds of any kind for any reason if it‚Äôs outside of the cancellation policy in place. Airbnb offer trip insurance for each reservation.

TITLE: Beach Vibes Vacation Home w/ Heated Pool
Listing Name: Beach Vibes Vacation Home w/ Heated Pool
name: Beach Vibes Vacation Home w/ Heated Pool
description:
Beach Vibes is the perfect vacation destination for fun in the sun! This spacious retreat features a heated pool and a screened lanai with a serene lake view. The laid back coastal vibe inspires you to unpack your suitcase and slip into your flip flops.

The space
‚Ä¢ Location Perks:
- 4 minutes to Anna Maria Oyster Bar
- 8 minutes to the Village of Cortez
- 10 minutes to Bradenton Beach
- 12 minutes to Anna Maria Island beaches

This large 3-bedroom, 2-bath home comfortably accommodates up to 8 guests, making it perfect for family gatherings or fun with friends!

Outdoor Bliss: Unwind poolside in the heated pool, sip on refreshing drinks, and enjoy stunning views of the lake. In the evenings, gather around the cozy fire pit for warm conversations under the stars. Take advantage of the outdoor grilling area for delicious barbecues, and challenge your friends to a game of bags in our designated area!

Beach Access: Explore a variety of nearby beaches, each offering its own unique charm. On Anna Maria Island, hop on the free trolley or the Monkey Bus for convenient transportation around the island.

Local Adventures: Enjoy vibrant bars, charming boutiques, and delicious restaurants. Visit Historic Bridge Street for a day of fun or relax on the beautiful sandy beaches while shelling. Discover the vibrant local scene, including the home of the Pirates minor league baseball team and Pirate City, their spring training complex. Enjoy nearby breweries and distilleries, explore the downtown Bradenton arts district, and visit IMG Academy. Plus, take advantage of the 20 new pickleball courts in GT Bray Park, located just about a mile from the house.

Extras Included: Your stay comes with complimentary beach umbrellas, chairs, and towels‚Äîno need to worry about extra rental fees! Plus, we provide a starter supply of toiletries and cleaning/laundry essentials. Come experience the laid-back paradise of Beach Vibes‚Äîyour unforgettable getaway awaits!

Travel with confidence. The #PMIPurify program is implemented in every rental, providing a pristine clean for all guests.

Pool Heating is complementary from November 1 through April 30 to approximately 85-87 degrees. Warmer pool temperatures may be available for a fee depending on ambient air temperatures. Please note once you book you will be directed through to our pre arrival check-in process where you will be asked to supply us with additional documents to verify your identity. Travel Protection Insurance is offered, but optional.

Guest access
Guest have access to the whole property.

Other things to note
CANCELLATIONS, CHANGES, AND REFUNDS.
All bookings are subject to the following cancellation policy:

1. PMI Sarasota Permitted Cancellation Periods:
a. 30 days or more prior to your check-in date for rental periods of 7 days or less
b. 60 days or more prior to your check-in date for rental periods of 8 days or more
c. For stays that are for rental periods of more than 30 days, 50% of the deposit is non-refundable.

You may cancel your booking according to either a. OR b. above, given by written notice (email accepted with time-stamp) to PMI Sarasota. If the cancellation meets the criteria of either a. or b. the full amount of your reservation deposit will be refunded, less a $200 cancellation fee and any non-refundable charges including booking fees and management/admin fees.

2. All refunds, whether in whole or pro-rated, will be subject to the deduction of third party non-refundable charges.

For cancellations made after the Permitted Cancellation Periods above, Guest is responsible for the full amount of the total booking charges. Guest‚Äôs only recourse for refund after the Cancellation Period is a claim on a previously purchased vacation travel insurance policy. To protect against loss of your advance deposit or booking payment resulting from cancellations caused by certain unforeseen events, such as illness, death, natural disasters, etc., we recommend that guests purchase Vacation Travel Protection Insurance.


STARTER SUPPLIES: We offer a starter supply of toiletries and cleaning/laundry supplies.

name: Happy Hacienda! Heated Pool-Hot Tub-Resort Yard!
description:
Heated Pool, Hot tub, Outdoor TV! Turf/Putting Green! Family Games!
Enjoy a spacious, tropical oasis at this centrally-located pool house. Take a day trip to Gulf beaches just minutes away or stay in and enjoy the LARGE pool and backyard! House is FULL of games and activities! With comfy beds, plenty of space, and colorful, d√©cor you'll feel relaxed vacation vibes the whole time. Stay as long as you need with a full kitchen, close to parks, and restaurants, beaches, all only 5-20 minutes away.

The space
The Happy Hacienda is a vibrant oasis perfect for a family vacation!

1. Private LARGE POOL
(**Heated for an additional cost during cooler months**)
2. Private HOT TUB
3. Outdoor TV and Blue tooth Soundbar
4. BLACKSTONE GRILL
5. 4 Beach Cruiser BIKES included with stay!
6. 10 BEACH CHAIRS, Beach Umbrella, Coolers and extra Beach bags!
7. Gourmet Kitchen
8. Washer and dryer
9. Perfect for families or couples get away, 2 Master Bedrooms with KING BEDS!
10. Fire pit
11. Extra blankets and pillows
12. Centrally Located to Restaurants, Beaches and IMG Academy!
13. PLENTY of Pool loungers and seating
14. SMART TV's in EVERY BEDROOM!
15. SO MANY GAMES and POOL TOYS!

Outdoor/Indoor Games INCLUDED:
1. Glow in the dark Kan Jam
2. Cornhole
3. Giant Jenga
4. 4 Hole Putt Putt Golf w/ clubs and glow balls!
5. 4 Bikes
6. Basketball Hoop for Pool Basketball
7. Disc Golf Hole w/ discs
8. Boogie Boards
9. Skim Board
10. Board games and Card games
11. Little Tykes Slide



***Pool HEAT is available for fall and winter months and will be an additional charge ($25 per day) IF you want to heat pool to 82-88 degrees! Please note, if air temperature drops below 70-75 degrees it can affect the pool temperature so unfortunately, pool temperature cannot be guaranteed. You will need to decide if pool heat is needed AT LEAST 3 days before your stay. You will receive an extra request for payment and it will NEED TO BE PAID IN FULL before heat is turned on!

**NO SMOKING on premises and NOT PET Friendly.

Picture this: as you approach the house, you're greeted by a lush, tropical garden bursting with colorful flowers and swaying palm trees. The exterior of the house itself is painted in cheerful, beachy hues like sunny yellow, coral pink, or aqua blue, instantly putting you in a vacation state of mind.

Stepping inside, you're welcomed by an open and airy layout, with large windows letting in plenty of natural light and offering views of the resort style backyard. The living room is adorned with cozy furnishings in bold patterns and bright shades, perhaps featuring accents like turquoise wall accents or citrus-colored pillows.

The kitchen is a chef's dream, equipped with modern appliances and sleek countertops. A giant, tropical mural adorns the wall from the kitchen to the dining area and adds a fun flair to the space. You can imagine whipping up delicious meals while chatting with friends and family seated at the breakfast bar or dining table.

As for the bedrooms, each one is uniquely decorated with its own color scheme and theme. Each bedroom has custom art work and hand picked paint colors with soft linens and furnishings.

But the real highlight of your rental home is the outdoor resort space. Step outside onto the spacious patio, where you'll find a sparkling pool surrounded by lounge chairs, a gazebo, fire pit, and outdoor TV, all perfect for soaking up the Florida sun. There's also a covered dining area with a barbecue grill, ideal for al fresco meals and entertaining guests. Lush landscaping and colorful flowers border the perimeter of the backyard, creating a private and serene atmosphere.

In the evenings, gather around the fire pit, roasting marshmallows and sharing stories with loved ones. Whether you're gathering for a poolside barbecue, enjoying a sunset cocktail, or simply relaxing in the sun with a good book, your colorful and fun Florida rental home offers endless opportunities for relaxation and enjoyment.

Guest access
Entire house and outdoor living space is open to guests.

Other things to note
The Happy Hacienda is not just a place to relax indoors; it's also a hub for outdoor fun and beach adventures! Step into the backyard, and you'll discover a treasure trove of outdoor games and your own private pool and hot tub, perfect for soaking up the sunshine!

For those who love a bit of friendly competition, there's a stash of classic outdoor games like cornhole and giant Jenga. Set up a tournament with friends and family, or simply enjoy some leisurely play while soaking in the Florida sun. The vibrant colors of the game sets complement the cheerful atmosphere of the Happy Hacienda, adding to the festive vibe.

If you're heading to the nearby beaches, you'll find everything you need for a day of sun and surf right at your fingertips. Beach chairs are stacked neatly in the garage as well as extra pool and beach towels in the linen closet.

Whether you're catching waves or exploring the colorful underwater world, these beach supplies ensure that your coastal escapades are filled with excitement and adventure.

description:
Welcome to Once Upon A Pond, by Stayawhilewithus!

If travel is on the horizon, set your sails to luxury and tranquility at this newly updated 4BR/3BA getaway. The heated private pool offers gorgeous vistas of the pond in the backyard, so take your relaxation to another level with the scenic views and some mesmerizing bird watching. And don't forget to enjoy the pickleball court in our side yard - it'll be great fun for the whole family!

The space
Once Upon a Pond is ideal for large families with multiple generations, snowbirds, sports tournaments attendees, business groups, friends and couples, or anyone who desires a generous space to unwind with style. If you love the water, look no further! Start by spending your day at the beach, then settle into our backyard paradise to watch the ducks in the pond, swim, and relax in the spacious 1/3 acre lot - plenty of vibrant green space to watch your children or pets play.

‚≠ê PROPERTY HIGHLIGHTS!

‚úÖ Prime location! What can be better than swimming in a POOL overlooking the POND, with only 7 miles separating you from Anna Maria Island, restaurants and shopping.

‚úÖ Private Pool! Enjoy our heated pool, overlooking the pond, perfect for birdwatching right from the backyard, with an outdoor shower.

‚úÖ Game! Gather around the Foosball table, and in our brand newly built PICKLEBALL COURT (court's 14'x44'. Concrete's 16'x48').

‚úÖ Expansive Layout! Possessing an open floor plan, with an updated kitchen and interior.

‚úÖ Outdoor Dining! BBQ grill, with spacious outdoor seating and dining areas.

‚úÖ Pet Friendly! No need to leave your furry friends behind. With a fenced-in private courtyard for your pets to roam, our home will accommodate them perfectly.

‚úÖ Family Friendly! 2 Pack n‚Äô Plays, a highchair, and kid‚Äôs dinnerware.

‚úÖ Beach Gears! (4-6) beach chairs, (1-2) umbrellas, (1) beach mat, (1-2) cooler bags, (1) beach wagon, beach towels (1/guest).

‚úÖ Essential Supplies Provided! Laundry detergent, paper towels, toilet paper, trash bags, dish soap, shampoo, conditioner, body wash, etc.

Whether you're basking in the sun by the pool, or enjoying a friendly game night, our home promises an unforgettable experience. BOOK your dream vacation with us!

‚≠ê WHERE YOU'LL SLEEP

With 4 spacious bedrooms and 3 baths, our home will be the perfect getaway for you, your friends and your family! We can comfortably accommodate a family of 10.

‚ú¶ Master Bedroom suite: a King bed, an ensuite bathroom, and a workspace/makeup station.
‚ú¶ Second Bedroom : a King bed, sharing a bathroom with our third bedroom.
‚ú¶ Third Bedroom : a King bed, sharing a bathroom with our second bedroom.
‚ú¶ Fourth Bedroom (Slumber Quarter): 2 sets of sailor beds with trundles that turn into 4 twin beds, ensuite bathroom (please note that this room is a walk through from the master bedroom, however you can access each room through the courtyard).

‚≠ê KITCHEN

Cook whatever your heart may crave in our fully equipped, state-of-the-art kitchen. Make your favorite gourmet dishes with the best appliances, pots and pans. You‚Äôll find whatever you may need in our kitchen, from a blender and a toaster, to a drip coffee maker with complimentary ground coffee and sugar.

Your beach getaway is waiting for you at our Once Upon a Pond, so what are you waiting for? BOOK WITH US NOW!

Guest access

- We provide free parking on the premises on driveway up to 4 cars.

- The heated pool feature is available for an extra $20/night or $400/month (offered from October till May). If you would like to purchase the pool heating feature, please note that it covers the entirety of your stay, and the pool heater may take up to 48 hours to reach the desired temp, so kindly let us know a week before you check-in.

- Pool settings are all scheduled. When booked, pool heat is set to 85 degrees, however, pool temps are impacted if the weather drops below 60 degrees. So, unfortunately, pool temperatures cannot be guaranteed.

- For your comfort, our home is treated quarterly by a professional pest control company. But given our tropical climate, you may still see the occasional bug. Please keep doors and screens closed to help prevent bugs from entering, as no compensation will be provided for any bugs that may come inside.

- Liability/Risk: The hosts/co-hosts are not responsible for any accidents, injuries, or illness that occurs while ON or OFF the premises while using equipment provided as part of the rental, including but not limited to pool, spas, stairs, or playsets. By accepting this reservation, it is agreed that all guests are expressly assuming the risk of any harm arising from their use of the premises and equipment taken off the premises. name: Heated saltwater pool at this tropical paradise!
description:
Private tropical paradise with a heated saltwater pool, outdoor kitchen and dining area, and a lakeside dock. This clean, spacious tastefully decorated home is the perfect getaway! Enjoy coffee in the sunroom, or unwind in the lanai with relaxing views of the lake and lush tropical landscaping that provides privacy! Located in a quiet neighborhood, just a quick drive(5mi) to the white sand beaches & shops of AMI, IMG, and local attractions!Nearby parks offer walking, biking, fishing& kayaking!

The space
Guests love this updated three bedroom, two bath home conveniently located in northwest Bradenton, just 5 miles from the beaches of Anna Maria Island and a quick trip to just about everything else!
One level, this is a great spot for everyone in your group. Step through the front door into an open floor plan featuring an updated kitchen with breakfast bar, dining area, and living area with comfy sectional seating where almost everyone gets their own recliner while watching a game or a movie.
Step out of the living room to the sunroom to play games, read or just enjoy the view. There is also a foosball table and large Connect 4 game. Beyond that is a screened lanai and porch with outdoor dining for 6-8. On the lanai there is a comfortable couch and chairs with views of the waterway and tropical landscape! Don't forget the pool area with lounge chairs, floats and another small table and chairs. The heated pool is perfect for floating and relaxing, 12x20 with a deep end, it‚Äôs super cozy for chilling with friends and family! There is also an outdoor shower. And right around the corner you will find the outdoor kitchen with grill, sink and mini-fridge!
The home features a split bedroom floor plan, perfect for families or multiple couples. The primary bedroom sits to one side of the great room, with two other bedrooms on the other side. Each bedroom offers a SMART TV for everyone's enjoyment. The spacious primary bedroom has a king bed and a large en suite bathroom with a walk-in shower, along with direct access to the outdoor pool area.
Bedroom 2 has a king bed and TV. The third bedroom has twin beds with trundle and closet with shelves and TV secretly mounted on the wall of the closet!
Outside the screened lanai lies the gorgeous tropical landscape that runs down to the water. Beautiful views of tropical birds and casual fishing on the waterway.

PLEASE NOTE: While this is a waterfront home, the waterway is not accessible for boats, nor does it connect to open water. Casual fishing may be enjoyed from the dock.

*Child safety-this home is equipped with door chimes on doors to pool area, it is the sole responsibility of the renter to ensure the chimes are plugged in and in working order. The home is also equipped with a screen/fence to separate the patio living/dining area from the pool area, neither of these features are to be considered a substitution for adult supervision.

Guest access
Guests have full access to the property (with the exception of owners cabinet, shed and garage refrigerator).

Other things to note
Terms and conditions
By choosing to book your stay with us, you are agreeing to our established terms and conditions. Please know that these rules are intended to protect you and our home and property. We created a space to give you a comfort like home, and not just another Airbnb. These terms outline the mutual expectations for both guests and hosts and ensure a positive experience for everyone involved. If you have any questions or concerns about our terms and conditions, please feel free to reach out to us for clarification.

Kindly Note External Security:

LIABILITY
OWNER/HOST ASSUMES NO LIABILITY for any injury resulting from any dangerous or defective conditions existing on this property. Should any such conditions be observed by guests on the property, guests shall notify the host immediately. Guests assume all responsibility for any loss of personal property while in the unit.

Pool & Safety Notice
No glass product whatsoever in or around the pool. Our pool is serviced weekly. We make every attempt to keep the pool/spa as clean as possible, but it is not unusual to find unexpected debris or some mineral stains in the pool because it's located outdoors.

Guest has been advised that the house is not equipped with (1) a pool safety fence/barrier, (2) a pool safety cover, (3) an exit alarm on main door and windows providing access to the pool, nor (4) a self-closing and self-latching device on all doors providing direct access to the pool. Adult Supervision
Children must be supervised by adults at all times, both inside and outside of the house. We have tried to child proof many aspects of the house but it is not fully child proof as we‚Äôre keeping a large age range in mind, so please watch your children at all times. Pool settings
Settings are all scheduled. Pool heater is available during cooler months from Nov to March. When pool heat is on, it is set to 85 degrees, however, pool temps cannot be guaranteed. Outside temperatures will play a huge factor against the pool heater. Pool water is heated as it's being filtered, unlike a hot tub. Pool robots are also available to use on site: one solar powered skimmer and the other is battery powered to clean the walls and bottom). Please do not use the pool while you're using these bots for your safety.

Gym Equipment
Anyone under 18 years of age must have adult supervision while using gym equipment. All gym equipment is used at your own risk.


Storms
In case of a storm or hurricane, no refunds outside of policy will be given unless:

- Refunds will be issued for only days the State and Local authorities enforce a ‚ÄúMandatory Evacuation‚Äù in a ‚ÄúTropical Storm/Hurricane Warning Area.‚Äù

- All other refunds will be based on a set refund policy.

Parking
Lots of visitors rent and drive their car to the area. All vehicular parking must be in the driveway. Only 1 car per 4 guests is allowed. There‚Äôs absolutely NO parking on the street allowed (per county ordinance). At this home, up to 4 standard sized vehicles can be accommodated in the driveway. Music & Noise: Parties/Events are not allowed. No rowdy or loud music at any time.
Quiet Hours: You are vacationing in a residential area and quiet hours are from 11:00pm to 7:00am. Noise levels are strictly enforced after 11pm. Per city ordinance, maximum permissible noise levels are 65 decibels between 7am and 11pm. Maximum permissible noise levels between 11pm and 7am are 50 decibels. Guests are responsible for any fines if police are called.

Pets
No pets are allowed. As much as we love fur babies, we kindly ask that you respect our no pet policy. We will post a $300 fine if unapproved or evidence of any kind of pet is found.

No Smoking or Vaping
Smoking and vaping are strictly prohibited within the house premises. We kindly request that all guests refrain from smoking or vaping indoors. If you do wish to smoke, we ask that you please keep all doors and windows closed when smoking outside. Please do not allow smoke to blow into the house. This policy includes e-cigarettes as well. For those who choose to smoke, we kindly ask that cigarette butts are properly disposed of. Keeping our surroundings clean and welcoming for everyone is a shared responsibility. A $500 fine will happen if smoking indoors is evident or cigarette butts are found on the premises. We appreciate your understanding and cooperation in adhering to our smoke-free policy.

Candles: No open flames are permitted inside the home to prevent accidental fires.

Trash & Recycling
All your trash should fit in the outside bins next to the garage: green = trash
- Trash Schedule: Please place the trash bin at the end of the driveway on Sunday or Wednesday nights for pick up the next morning.
- Recycling: Please note that the City of Bradenton discontinued recycling. The blue bin at this home is repurposed for yard waste.

Air Conditioning
Keep all sliders, doors, and windows closed when the air conditioning system is on. Thermostat is set to 71 degrees. Please reach out if you would like this to be adjusted for your comfort. Note: We won't be able to adjust temps below 70 to prevent equipment failure.

Housekeeping: There is no daily housekeeping service

Drains & Laundry
Our house was built in the 1970s and it still uses older pipes. As such, we have to treat what goes down our drains. Here are some rules we will need you to abide by during your stay:
- Only soap and water may go down the drains, even in the kitchen sink. Absolutely no bleach, oils, harsh chemicals of any kind or any other liquids may go down the drain.
- In the bathrooms, only the toilet paper may go down the toilet. Do not flush any feminine products or any type of wipes, even if they‚Äôre labeled as flushable! These are notoriously known to create instant plumbing issues. Plumbing bill will be passed to guest if called during their stay.
- The washer and dryer can be used if needed. Please use the provided detergent or HE only detergents.

Maintenance
Host shall be responsible for maintaining the home unless damage is caused by the Guest's misuse or neglect. Guest agrees that no rent reduction or abatement will be given unless the property is deemed to be completely uninhabitable. Host will order repairs in a timely manner once notice is given by Guest, but host has no control over the scheduling availability of vendors. Host shall not be liable for any losses or damages, including incidental or consequential damages, including those caused by host‚Äôs failure to perform repairs and maintain the home. All personal property of the Guests kept on the premises is at risk of the Guest. Nonscheduled pool cleans will be the responsibility of the guests using provided cleaning bots.

Property Maintenance
We take pride in maintaining our property to ensure that our guests have a delightful and comfortable stay. To that end, we have scheduled maintenance tasks that we would like to inform you about.

- Our pool is cleaned and maintained once a week, on Tuesdays (subject to change)
- Our landscaper comes once a week on Tuesdays (subject to change)
- Our pest control service is scheduled monthly (subject to change)

Our maintenance schedule is maintained by our service vendors and we cannot guarantee a rigid schedule. Changes may come up due to weather, holidays, or other unforeseen circumstances. If any changes do occur, we will do our best to inform you in advance.

description:
Holidays by the Riverfront mean evening strolls surrounded by the sights and sounds of Christmas, all set to the calming rhythm of the water. Enjoy waterfront dining, discover unique gifts in our local boutiques, or take in the festive atmosphere. Saturday mornings buy fresh, local crafts and produce at the downtown market. Back home, unwind on the porches, take a dip in the heated pool, or spend quality time with family and friends in our beautiful, welcoming space. Make memories that last.

The space
The Riverhouse Retreat,
FIRST FLOOR
*King bedroom - spacious room with large walk-in closet.
Large closet is home to an iron, steamer, pack n play (with fresh mattress sheet and blanket), two high chairs, and so much more. Attached Jack n Jill bathroom with step in shower, robes and pocket door for privacy from bathroom.

* Twin bed with access to Jack n Jill bathroom with step in shower and Pocket door for privacy from bathroom.

*Foyer, reading nook with tons of books and a comfy recliner, game nook with games, a table and chairs and a Pac Man game with several games, living room with fire place (electric heat), dining room, large kitchen with coffee station, eat in counter, laundry room and second full bathroom with step in shower.

* Access our privacy screened lanai and inground pool from the kitchen/dining room area. In our screened lanai you will also have access to our fit pit lounging area, outdoor eating space, grill and garage access. The garage houses the bikes and many other pool supplies and all our beach supplies.

SECOND FLOOR:
* Bunk room - bunk bed with twin top and full on the bottom. A second full size bed. Spacious closet with robes and dresser.

* Large Master bedroom with King bed, bay window, and walk in closet. Walk in closet with robes, pack n play (with sheets and blanket).

*Dedicated office space with gaming system, adjustable height desk, printer, comfy office/gaming chairs and loveseat with pullout bed.

*Large, shared bathroom with tub shower, double vanity sinks, and 2nd laundry room

*Long drive way parking - 4 car off street parking

* All bedrooms and living room are equipped with smart TV's. The downstairs is cooled/heated by 4 mini splits. They operate individually so you can regulate the temps in each area. Upstairs is cooled/heated by central ac/heating system.

* Fast, FREE WiFi

* Steps to Pier 22 Restaurant, Twin Dolphin Marina, Oak & Stone Rooftop Dining, Pubs, Ice cream, Bishop Museum, Manatee Rehab, Arts, Shops, Festivals & Riverwalk.

* 4 miles to IMG, 7 miles to Anna Maria Island/Holmes, Bradenton & Coquina Beaches.

* Great for two families, friends, wedding groups, extended families, dedicated office for business travel. Beautifully restored antique heart of pine floors & original staircase. Spacious rooms, 10‚Äô ceilings. Original fireplace now converted to electric for safety.

TITLE: Snead Island Getaway
Listing Name: Snead Island Getaway
name: Snead Island Getaway
description:
We've thought of everything for a group of adults or a large family.

We haveTV's, kayaks, ping pong, corn hole, foosball, board games, and a pool table. 64 Channel Sling TV package and Netflix.

Signed Rental Agreement required within 72 hours of booking. Inquire to us if you'd like to read it prior to.

The space
Not too many homes available on the water that can accommodate a large group at this price point. walks right out to the pool and the dock for fishing!

Guest access
The entire property is available for use. Please be advised that the house is a bi-level ranch. The lower level (rec room) has 1 bedroom and walks out to the pool/spa. The main living area is the upper level, so guests need to realize that going up and down stairs is necessary.

Other things to note
We have a $250 per stay charge which covers the propane for the firepit, heated spa and heated pool. Its a good sized firepit and a large pool and spa. This fee barely covers the cost of the propane per week, and in some case doesn't if its colder than normal. During the summer, what we save in propane, we use in electricity in the 3 AC units that run 24/7. Also a $150 non-refundable pet fee is due before arrival for those bring up to 2 pets. . The space
Welcome to your perfect vacation retreat in Bradenton, Florida! This stunning short-term rental located in the sought-after community of Sabal Harbour offers a charming and relaxing getaway for you and your loved ones. The 4 bedroom 2 bathroom pool home comfortably sleeps 8 and is in an excellent location for travelers who are looking to not only travel to the wonderful white sandy beaches of the Gulf Coast, Its also a close drive to Lakewood Ranch, Sarasota, and I-75. The property is conveniently located close to Publix, Starbucks, WAWA, and several restaurants!

As you step inside, you'll be greeted by a spacious and beautifully furnished living area, providing the ideal space for relaxation and entertainment. The living room offers a large sectional sofa, two swivel accent chairs along with a Smart TV mounted on the wall, perfect for watching your favorite TV shows or sporting events or just relaxing with your friends and family. The open floor plan seamlessly connects the living room, dining area, and fully equipped kitchen, allowing for easy interaction and socializing.

Completely refurbished in 2023, Turtle Bay Cottage comes with all the appliances you would need and is fully equipped for your stay. A few of the bonus items are a Keurig, a Ninja Blender, and a combo microwave oven/air fryer. Enjoy cooking on the grill? A propane grill is available for use as well to complete the perfect BBQ!

One of the highlights of this property is the private screened-in pool area, where you can bask in the warm Florida sunshine and take refreshing dips at your leisure. Comfortable exterior seating along with a large umbrella offers the perfect setting for outdoor dining and relaxation. The pool overlooks a picturesque pond, providing a tranquil backdrop for your vacation experience. Looking to bring your furry friend? The backyard is fully fenced in, pets are allowed with prior approval and an additional cleaning fee.

As part of the Sabal Harbour community, you'll have access to an array of fantastic amenities. Enjoy a friendly game of tennis or basketball on the community courts, take a leisurely stroll or bike ride along the scenic roads, or let the little ones have fun at the newly rebuilt community playground. There's something for everyone to enjoy within the community.

Trying to figure out sleeping arrangements? The master bedroom is located in the back of the property with a view of the pool and offers a king-size bed and the master bathroom. The additional three bedrooms are located on the left side of the property and share a full bathroom. Bedrooms 2 & 3 offer queen-size beds and bedroom 4 has two twins. All bedrooms except for the 4th bedroom come equipped with smart TVs.

Master Bedroom - King Bed, Ensuite Bathroom, Smart TV
Bedroom 2 - Queen Bed, Smart TV
Bedroom 3 - Queen Bed, Smart TV
Bedroom 4 - 2 Twin Beds

The location of this rental is also a major plus. Just a short drive away, you'll find beautiful Gulf Coast beaches, including the renowned Anna Maria Island, where you can soak up the sun, swim in crystal-clear waters, and indulge in delicious seafood. Bradenton also offers a variety of attractions, such as golf courses, shopping centers, and cultural venues.

Whether you're seeking relaxation or adventure, this short-term rental in Bradenton, Florida, has it all. Book your stay today and make unforgettable memories in this idyllic vacation retreat.

exception would be those items which are intended for use at the beach.

8. Please clean the grills after each use. There will be a $50 cleaning fee charged if grill is not cleaned.
9. No smoking allowed in the house. Smoking is allowed outside only.
($500 cleaning fee applies if found smoking in house or smoke smell)
10. Please follow the departure instructions to help keep our cleaning costs down. We do everything we can to keep the properties in the best shape possible
with your help! If you need anything during your stay please let us know!

description:
This four bedroom two bath house is in west Bradenton just minutes from beautiful Anna Maria Island with miles of white sandy beaches. 15 minutes from Sarasota airport and 5 minutes from IMG Academy. Within walking distance of shopping, restaurants and golfing. Only minutes away from entertainment and the Pittsburg Pirates spring training facilities. The world famous Siesta Key beach is a short drive away. Disney, Busch Gardens, Sea World and Universal are all within a two hour drive.

The space
This four bedroom two bath house is in a quiet neighborhood in West Bradenton, close to restaurants, grocery stores and the beach. There are large screen smart TV‚Äôs in every room except the twin bedroom. The house also has high speed wireless internet. The kitchen has all new appliances and everything needed for cooking/baking. Parking is in the driveway and on the street.

Guest access
Access is easy with keyless entry. A personalized code will be sent to guests on the day of arrival. Guests have full access to the entire house including the backyard and side yard.

Other things to note
Pets are permitted with prior approval from host. There is a non refundable $125 pet fee.

During your stay, the home is all yours. Our check-in process is easy and keyless. Make yourself at home!

SUPPLIES
We'll get you started with items such as toilet paper, soap, detergent, and cleaning supplies. However, you will be responsible for purchasing additional, if needed.


FAQ's...

Do you offer early check-in or late check-outs?

- No. Our home is in high demand! We use this precious little time we have to prepare the home following the CDC Cleaning Guidelines, as well as to complete any maintenance tasks so your stay is uninterrupted. If additional time is important to you, we recommend booking an additional night for your stay.

Do you allow luggage drop-off for early arrivals or late departures?

- No, unfortunately, we are unable to offer luggage drop-off at this time.


Is the home suitable for children?

- Our home is great fun for children of all ages. We do offer a pack-n-play, kids' dinnerware, and life jackets.


How far is it to the beach?

-We have 5 great beaches within driving distance. They range from 6-15 miles away.

Cortez Beach/Bradenton Beach 8 miles - Beach House Waterfront Restaurant

Coquina Beach 9 miles - Long public swimming beach featuring picnic tables, cabanas & play areas, plus a casual cafe.

Mantee Public & Holmes Beach 6 miles - Park featuring a beach, a playground, picnic tables, grills, bike racks, restrooms, showers & more.

Bean Point Beach 10 miles - Peaceful locale known for its wide sandy beach, tranquil waters & stunning sunset views.

Whitney Beach - Top Rated 10 miles Certified as a Clean Beach by the federal Clean Beaches Coalition.

Can I walk to the beach?

-That depends on how far you have to walk :) 99.9% take a car. There are public places to park and a FREE trolley that drives up and down the coast to be able to check out multiple areas.


Do you offer a cleaning service?

- Yes! If our schedule allows, we can accommodate additional cleaning services on a weekly basis for an added cost. Just ask us!

Can I book on behalf of a friend, family member, or co-worker?

- No. While we would love to host whoever you are booking for, we do need them to book for themselves with their own Airbnb account. You can potentially earn travel credit by referring someone to book their first reservation with Airbnb. Go to Account Settings and click on Invite Friends for more details.

Traveling for a Business Trip?

- For business trips or if you book travel for your company, Airbnb allows designated bookers at companies enrolled in Airbnb for Work to book trips on behalf of others.

TITLE: Waterfront/Kayak with Manatees/Pool/Fish
Listing Name: Waterfront/Kayak with Manatees/Pool/Fish
name: Waterfront/Kayak with Manatees/Pool/Fish
description:
Relax with the whole family at this peaceful home on a natural waterway/cove with saltwater pool, bikes, kayaks & firepit! Lots of wildlife, water fowl, manatees, turtles & flying fish.

This home is completely remodeled with the most modern & best features. This home has 3 Bedrooms, 2 Spa Baths & a Queen sleeper sofa in a open, spacious floor plan with cathedral ceilings.

On the Sarasota/Bradenton border, conveniences are just blocks away & beaches & airport are a short drive away.

The space
Discover Florida‚Äôs beautiful waterways with miles of kayaking fun, through mangrove tunnels all the way to the Gulf! Sugar sand beaches are just a short drive away!

This gorgeous open floor plan, coastal home with soaring ceilings is sure to please! Our home has been completely remodeled with brand-new bathrooms and kitchen!

The Gourmet Kitchen is perfect for any top chef with new, top-end stainless steel appliances, fully equipped with all the pots, pans, dishes, spices, condiments etc. Gorgeous Quartzite counters and full slap backsplash finish this high-end kitchen with huge entertaining island, high-end range hood, farm sink and faucet.

Brand new vanities, top-of-the line fixtures, custom tiling, soaking tub in master, both baths are gorgeous and opulent! Freshly painted, LVP flooring throughout, ceiling fans in each room, etc, no detail has been overlooked! Everything has been replaced!!

All on one floor, this home is perfect for older folks and toddlers! Enjoy the huge covered back porch with comfortable seating for the whole family. Stairs down will take you to the screened pool with another private and shaded deck to watch the children splash in the spacious, saltwater pool (optional heating is $25/day).

There are 3 bedrooms, all with ceiling fans and large closets. There are 3 Smart TVs with Spectrum, premium cable and you can stream your own service too, high-speed internet and WiFi.

Brand new vanities in spa-like baths, top-of-the line fixtures, custom tiling, soaking tub in master, both baths are gorgeous and opulent! Freshly painted throughout, LVP flooring, ceiling fans in each room, etc, no detail has been overlooked! This home shows like a brand-new model!

**Bedroom Info**

-Master Bedroom: one King, one Single Convertible chair

-Bedroom: one Queen

-Bedroom: one Full, one Single (Bunk)

-Living Room: Queen Sleeper Sofa

Wonderful restaurants, shopping, Anna Maria Island, St Armands Circle, Longboat Key, Lido Beach and downtown Sarasota are all within 10-20 minutes. IMG Academy is less than 5 miles away.

We have never personally been to a more magical place! The kayaking is amazing with nature views and the most tranquil canals that stretch for miles! The canal leads to the Gulf of Mexico and you will be thrilled at all the wildlife that call it home here. You will not be disappointed!! Relax and float on our 4 kayaks (one is a double), one Paddle board, or you can bring your own boat or rent one.

Wonderful fishing! Feel free to use one of our fishing rods. There are flying fish such as Mullet, Snook etc. and so many different kinds of birds, turtles and of course manatee families who live here!! Friendly blue herons are fed by neighbors and they are so tame that they will follow you around the yard wanting to make friends with you (don't be scared they would never hurt you).

Swim in the large, saltwater pool (optional heating $25/day) and in the evening, relax by the fire pit with a glass of wine. You won't ever want to leave!

In the garage, you will find tons of beach equipment, Tommy Bahama chairs, umbrellas, toys, floats, coolers, etc. There are also 2 adult bikes, yard and beach games for children, an Arcade machine with 60 games to choose from, Foos Ball machine and a gorgeous bar. (The garage is NOT air conditioned though and we ask that you keep the inside door closed.)

For those with limited mobility, we have a shower seat, walker and a sturdy cane for your use. Our one level home is perfect for entertaining young and old! We also have a pack-n-play and a high chair for little ones.

Pets are welcome for a fee, depending on number, size of pet and length of stay. Please let us know if you are planning on bringing your fur babies in advance.

As Super Hosts, we have welcomed guests to our vacation homes for over 23 years, this home is one of our favorites! We cannot wait to share it with you!

**Jan-Apr, minimum rental of 4 weeks unless approved.

Guest access
Your Super Hosts are just a phone call/text away but you are on your own to access our home using the keyless entry lock. Each guest will have their own unique code for security.

Other things to note
Nearby Beaches:
Lido Key
Cortez
Sarasota
Anna Maria

Venice

-St. Petersburg/Clearwater International (PIE-42 miles, 50 minutes)

Our spacious single-level house is perfect for families or groups as it comfortably sleeps 10 people. The space
Less than a mile from Sarasota Bay, where you can launch a kayak or paddleboard. 8 miles to Lido Beach, 12 miles to Siesta Key and countless beaches around the Sarasota/Bradenton area. 6 miles to downtown Sarasota and 2 miles down the street from the historic Ringling Museum! 25 Minutes to the adorable Anna Maria Island with its Holmes and Coquina Beaches.

‚òÄ Living area has a 65" smart TV with local channels as well as sofas with recliner seats for 6
‚òÄ Swimming pool that is 4 to 8 ft deep. The pool can be heated up to 78-82 F for an extra charge ($25/day).

Limitations of pool heating:
- The maximum temperature it can be heated to depends on the air temperature but is about 78-82 F (26-28 C).
- The pool is only heated when the pump runs, which is generally during the daytime only. The pool naturally cools down at night.

Sustainability
Here is what we do for the environment and how you can help:
‚òÄ A recycling cart is provided.

‚òÄ Our kitchen is fully stocked so you could cook meals. Instant pot is available.
‚òÄ We are subscribed to our utility's voluntary FPL SolarTogether green energy plan.
‚òÄ Most of our appliances and lights are energy-efficient. We also use a smart thermostat and a smart irrigation controller.
‚òÄ We use refillable dispensers for toiletries.
‚òÄ There are water leak sensors under sinks. Please check for a water leak under a sink if you hear a siren.

description:
Welcome to Poolside Paradise, in West Bradenton near the Manatee River, 15 minutes away from the beautiful gulf waters of Anna Maria Island. The island has parks and picnic areas, jet ski rentals, parasailing, dolphin cruises, shopping, dining, outdoor entertainment and of course endless beautiful beaches. Palma Sola Causeway Beach has horseback riding and kayaking adventures. Head downtown to the Manatee Riverwalk with restaurants & bars, a museum, skatepark and visit The village of the Arts.

The space
After your fun in the sun, come home to your backyard paradise. Lounge around in the large heated pool, in a private setting, surrounded by dozens of large palms and dense tropical landscaping. Have drinks poolside or in the screened porch, fire up the BBQ grill, watch TV on the covered deck and just chill with friends and family. Inside there is plenty of space to spread out with separate adult and children's areas and 6 large flatscreen TVs. After a fun filled day, you'll appreciate a restful night of sleep on a comfortable bed. There are 2 ensuite king bedrooms, 2 additional private bedrooms and a bunk room. Three bathrooms have walk in showers and the hall bath has a shower tub.
Poolside Paradise is sanitized and cleaned to the highest standards. We work with our cleaning team to make sure the entire home, linens and towels are immaculate so you can relax and enjoy your vacation. The house was designed and renovated purposefully for large groups of family and friends to come together and have fun with enough space to be comfortable. We look forward to welcoming you to poolside paradise. We hope you enjoy fun adventures in Bradenton and Anna Maria Island, and make a memorable vacation with family and friends.

The Sapphire Sea Star

Staying at this gorgeous single-story house on a deepwater canal will feel like a vacation in itself. Venture out by land or by sea, with beaches just a quick drive away and direct canal access by boat from the private dock. One of the best vantage points for watching passing watercraft is the private pool in the beautiful professionally landscaped backyard. Underneath the adjacent tropical gazebo, you'll find the Blackstone griddle and outdoor dining table ideal for hosting an intimate cookout or sipping a frozen cocktail while listening to the pool spa's cascading fountain. If you need a little shade without sacrificing the sunshine, hang out in the lounge area on the screened porch for the best of both worlds.

The home's interior features abundant natural light in an airy space tastefully decorated in a coastal theme appropriate for being so close to the local beaches.

Things to know
High-speed WiFi
Private dock - accommodates boats up to 20 ft., tie-downs available, but guests must provide own ropes/equipment

Kayaks available for guest use
Boat access and boat slips
Snowbird-friendly

Please note: this home resides in a noise-sensitive area and the owners participate in our Good Neighbor protection program. Our smart home technology will alert our team if excessive decibel or occupancy levels are detected, allowing us to reach out directly with a reminder of maximun occupancy and quiet hours. This technology is privacy compliant, and only monitors the presence of decibels and devices -not any personal conversation or information. Thank you for supporting our efforts to be good neighbors!


Damage waiver: The total cost of your reservation for this Property includes a damage waiver fee which covers you for up to $3,000 of accidental damage to the Property or its contents (such as furniture, fixtures, and appliances) as long as you report the incident to the host prior to checking out. More information can be found from the "Additional rules" on the checkout page.

TITLE: Sarasota Oasis: Convenient/Heated Renovated Pool
Listing Name: Sarasota Oasis: Convenient/Heated Renovated Pool
name: Sarasota Oasis: Convenient/Heated Renovated Pool
description:
Welcome to Coastal Serenity, your perfect Sarasota escape! This charming, fully remodeled coastal home is designed with relaxation and fun in mind. Just three blocks from the breathtaking Sarasota Bay and only a few miles from stunning beaches like Siesta Key, Lido Key, Bradenton Beach, and Anna Maria Beach, it‚Äôs an ideal location for beach lovers. Plus, you‚Äôre only steps away from vibrant tiki bars and luxurious Sarasota restaurants, perfect for unwinding in a relaxed, inviting atmosphere.

The space
Step into a relaxing oasis with a beautiful renovated heated pool (available only during the winter season, from November to May), perfect for enjoying a refreshing swim. The pool area is equipped with loungers, puffs, and Swing Egg chairs, ideal for lounging in the sun or relaxing with a cool drink. The patio also features a BBQ area, hammock, and a cozy fire pit, perfect for unwinding with a glass of wine in the evening.

Inside the house, the beautiful pool table is a charming feature, perfect for fun moments, along with a dartboard, foosball, a retro gaming console, and board games. The game room is the perfect spot for families or groups to enjoy together.

With over 200 nearby restaurants and tiki bars, as well as beautiful walking and exercise spots by the water, you‚Äôll have plenty of options to enjoy the vibrant local atmosphere.

After a day of exploration, return to your cozy oasis where you can relax and recharge. We work very hard to ensure our home is always impeccably clean and fully equipped, with every detail considered for your comfort. Cleanliness is our top priority, so you can enjoy a fresh and comfortable environment. Whether you're unwinding in the living room, enjoying the coastal breeze on the patio, or cooking in the kitchen, you'll feel right at home.


Prime location offers easy access to the best of Sarasota and Bradenton‚Ä¶

- Lido Key Beach: 8 miles
- Siesta Key Beach:12 miles
- Bradenton Beach: 10 miles
- Coquina Beach: 12 miles
- Anna Maria Island: 15 miles
- Downtown Sarasota: 6 miles
- Downtown Bradenton: 6 miles
- St. Armand's Circle: 7 miles
- Mote Marine Aquarium: 8 miles
- The John and Mable Ringling Museum of Art: 2 mile
- Edwards Theater (Sarasota Opera House): 5 miles
- IMG Academy: 5 miles
- Sarasota International Airport: 2 miles
- Marina Jack Plaza: 5.5 miles
- The Mall at University Town Center: 9 miles
- Ellenton Premium Outlets: 12 miles



SLEEPING ARRANGEMENTS:
Bedroom 1: King Bed with a smart TV, private bathroom and walk-in closet.
Bedroom 2: Queen Bed with a smart TV and walk-in closet.
Bedroom 3: Queen over Queen Bunk Bed with a smart TV and walk-in closet.

There is also a full-sized sleeper sofa in the gaming room.

BEDDING/TOWELS:
We provide sheets, bedspreads, pillows, bath towels, pool towels, and hand towels for each guest to ensure a comfortable stay.

WORKSPACE:
If you need to combine work and relaxation, our home is the perfect place. With spacious and comfortable areas, you'll enjoy a peaceful and productive environment. We offer a workspace equipped with a desk, chair, and a 40-inch monitor, along with fast, unlimited internet access. We also have ottomans with views of the outdoors and the pool, allowing you to work or relax while enjoying the serene surroundings. Whether you prefer working from the living room sofa or the patio with garden views, you'll have everything you need to be productive while enjoying your stay. With a comfortable and tranquil atmosphere, you'll perfectly balance work and relaxation.

KITCHEN:
Our kitchen is fully equipped to ensure your comfort, featuring a variety of appliances, sleek granite countertops, and plenty of space to prepare your meals. We provide a complete set of dinnerware, including kid-friendly dishes, silverware, drinking glasses, coffee mugs, and various glasses for different beverages. You‚Äôll also find pots and pans, cooking utensils, BBQ tools, mixing bowls, baking sheets, cookie sheets, a toaster, a blender, a can opener, a corkscrew, measuring cups and spoons, and a coffee station with machines for all types of coffee, as well as a variety of teas to suit every taste. To make your experience even more enjoyable, Alexa is available so you can play music while you cook and relax in the atmosphere.

GAME ROOM:
Our game room is equipped with a beautiful, well-equipped pool table, a foosball table, and a dartboard, as well as several puzzles for all ages and other board games. The game room also features a console gaming area equipped with a 55-inch smart TV and a retro gaming console to reminisce and share memories with your children.


POOL AREA
Our beautiful heated pool is the perfect place to relax and enjoy the sun. Surrounded by comfortable loungers, puffs, and a thoughtfully designed decor to create a relaxing atmosphere, it‚Äôs ideal for cooling off on hot days or enjoying a pleasant swim at any time of the year. The pool area is perfect for reading, sipping a glass of wine, or enjoying a cup of coffee while you unwind. The pool features a spacious design that allows for swimming and playing, with a shallow area for the little ones to have fun safely. Additionally, the pool is surrounded by a lanai that allows you to enjoy it at any time, whether you want to take a refreshing dip or simply relax by the pool with a good book. This space will be your private oasis. The pool is regularly serviced to ensure proper chemical balance and cleanliness.

Note about the pool heater: The heater is available from November to May, with no additional charge for heating. It only works while the pool pump is running, and raises the pool temperature by 1¬∞F per hour.

CLEANING
In our property, we have a highly dedicated cleaning team that ensures everything is spotless for each of our guests, following CDC guidelines to guarantee your safety and well-being. The property is inspected before each stay to ensure everything is in perfect condition. Additionally, we provide household cleaning supplies, such as Windex, Clorox spray, a broom, mop, and other essential items so you can keep the place as clean as you'd like. We also leave extra trash bags and provide a washer and dryer, with detergent included, for your total convenience during your stay.

PARKING:
Our home is located in a very quiet neighborhood, offering a peaceful and relaxing environment. You may park up to 2 cars in the driveway through the front gate. Free street parking is also available.

ADDITIONAL EQUIPMENT:
If you ever have any specific requests feel free to ask us, we would love to accommodate you the best way (baby‚Äôs equipment, disabled equipment‚Ä¶)

Guest access
Guests will have access to the entire house, except for the staff cabinet located in the hallway to the left of the entrance, which is locked; the backyard shed; and the area where the pool pump and heater are located.

Other things to note
* Dogs are allowed upon request with an additional $120 pet fee per stay. Our insurance provider does not accept certain breeds. This fee does not cover any damage caused by the pet; any damage will be the guest's responsibility. Dogs are not allowed on the bed, furniture, or in the pool. Additionally, by booking, you accept responsibility for any damage or extra cleaning your pet may cause during the stay. Dogs must not be left alone in the house unless crated. Please clean up after your pet at all times.

* To respect your privacy, surveillance cameras are located only on the exterior of the house (at the front door and on the exterior sides). These cameras are equipped with motion sensors and alert systems. There are no cameras inside the house or in the pool area.

* The house has multi-point internet access to ensure connectivity throughout the entire home.

* The noise monitors outside the house do not record voices or conversations, only monitor decibel levels. No parties or loud music are allowed. There is a $1,000 fee for any unauthorized parties. We are in a very nice residential neighborhood with great neighbors, so please be respectful.

* Please note that smoking is not allowed inside the house or in the pool area, under any circumstances. This includes any type of cigarette. A $500 fee will be charged if this rule is violated. We appreciate your understanding and cooperation.


Check-Out Policy:

* Check-Out Time: Check-out time is at 10:00 a.m. Please ensure that the property is vacated on time to allow our cleaning staff to perform their work and prepare the place for new guests.

* Late Check-Out: If check-out is not completed by the indicated time, an additional charge of 25% of the daily rate will be applied for each hour of delay to cover the costs of preparation and cleaning.

* Late Departures: If you need to check out later than usual, please contact us in advance. Depending on availability, we may offer a late check-out for an additional fee.

* Responsibility for the Property: Upon check-out, please ensure the property is in reasonable condition. Kindly remove all personal belongings, turn off lights and appliances, and lock the doors when you leave.

name: Stylish Residence 2 Bedrooms and a Modern Pool
description:
Escape to paradise in our charming 2 bedroom pool house, located just a short drive from the pristine beaches of Anna Maria Island. This beautifully appointed home offers the perfect blend of comfort and style, making it ideal for families or couples seeking a relaxing getaway.

The space
Private Heated Pool and Hot Tub
Short Drive to Anna Maria Island
Fully Equipped for a Comfortable Stay


Escape to paradise in our charming 2 bedroom pool house, located just a short drive from the pristine beaches of Anna Maria Island. This beautifully appointed home offers the perfect blend of comfort and style, making it ideal for families or couples seeking a relaxing getaway.

Step inside and be greeted by a spacious living area, adorned with tasteful d√©cor and an abundance of natural light. Curl up on the plush sofa and watch a movie on the flat-screen TV, or gather around the dining table for a delicious home-cooked meal prepared in the fully equipped kitchen.

After a day of exploring the island's treasures, unwind in the glistening pool, surrounded by the lush greenery of our private backyard. Or, soak up the sun on the patio while enjoying a refreshing beverage.

When it's time to rest, retreat to one of our two cozy bedrooms, each featuring a comfortable bed and ample storage space. The master bedroom boasts an en suite bathroom with a walk-in shower, while the second bedroom offers access to a shared bathroom with a tub/shower combination.

Venture out and discover the wonders of Anna Maria Island, renowned for its pristine beaches, charming shops, and delectable dining options. Take a leisurely stroll along the soft sand, rent kayaks to explore the serene waters, or indulge in fresh seafood at one of the many waterfront restaurants.

For those seeking adventure, embark on a thrilling water sports excursion, rent a bike to explore the island's scenic trails, or visit the Mote Marine Aquarium to learn about the fascinating marine life that inhabit the Gulf of Mexico.
About this space

This 2 bedroom,2 bathroom pool house is nestled in a tranquil neighborhood, just a short drive from Anna Maria Island.

The home features a spacious living area with a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen, and a dining area.

The master bedroom has a Queen-size bed and an en suite bathroom with a walk-in shower.

The second bedroom has a queen-size bed, twin bed and a shared bathroom with a tub/shower combination.

The living room has a sleeper sofa.




Location:

5 minutes to Anna Maria Island
10 minutes to Bradenton Beach
20 minutes to Sarasota
45 minutes to Tampa

Swimming, sunbathing, and fishing at the beach

Click the "Book now" button to reserve your dates today!

We hope to see you soon and to help create wonderful memories for you and your loved ones.

Other things to note
Be cautious with kids because of the pool.
No smoking

Maximum of 2 pets allowed. Pet fee is $125/pet for the entire stay.

Our vacation rental is thoughtfully stocked with a complimentary start-up kit of essential amenities to help you settle in and begin your stay comfortably. This includes items like a small supply of toiletries, paper products, and basic kitchen necessities. Please note that this starter kit is not intended to last for the duration of your stay, but rather to give you time to get situated. BEACHES-

*12 minutes to Anna Maria Island

*12 minutes to Bradenton Beach

FULL DESCRIPTION


Welcome to the Laughing Pelican Pool Home- Your family's perfect getaway!


Step into your dream vacation and make lasting memories at our beautifully decorated beach-style home, just a short drive from stunning sandy shores and vibrant beach life. This spacious three-bedroom, two-bath retreat is designed with families in mind, offering the perfect blend of comfort, fun, and relaxation.

As you enter, you'll be greeted by a bright and airy open concept living space, adorned with charming coastal decor that sets the tone for your beach escape. The fully equipped kitchen featured a delightful coffee bar, perfect for brewing your morning pick-me-up or enjoying a cozy evening with loved ones. Gather around the outdoor dining table to true Florida style family meals by the pool.


Speaking of the pool, our serene oasis is the ultimate spot for family fun! Take a refreshing dip, soak up the sun on comfortable loungers, or enjoy a book under the umbrella in this private retreat. (Please Note- Heating is available in cooler months (November - April) for a charge of 35.00 a day. Please reserve with the property manager before arrival.) The screened enclosure keeps pesky bugs at bay, allowing you to fully enjoy your pool paradise. The excitement continues in the game room/family room, where laughter and friendly competition await! Challenge each other to classic arcade games like Pac-Man and Frogger or engage in thrilling foosball and air hockey. With plenty of board games available, you can create unforgettable family memories that will last a lifetime.


Our home comfortably accommodates 6-8 guests with spacious bedrooms designed for restful nights after a day of adventure. Each room is tastefully decorated in beach hues, ensuring a tranquil environment for everyone to unwind.


Located just a short drive from breathtaking beaches, vibrant local attractions, and delicious dining options, our home is the perfect launching pad for all your family adventures. Whether you're building sandcastles, exploring nature trails, or simply soaking up the sun, you'll find endless opportunities just moments away.


PLEASE NOTE- For extended stays of 60 days or more we require a mid-stay clean be done by our cleaners. A member of our team will reach out upon your booking to coordinate the fee and scheduling.


There is a Publix grocery store on Manatee Avenue that is 6 minutes away (1.2 miles) The Shoppes of Paradise Bay Plaza is just 1.9 miles away (4 minutes) and offers grocery shopping, restaurants, a Starbucks coffee shop, and a Dollar Store. The Sarasota/Bradenton airport is a 20-minute drive (10.5 miles) south and downtown Sarasota and St Armands Circle is about a 30-minute drive south which is a great place to watch a sunset from a rooftop bar with causal and upscale dining and shopping. You do not need to go that far for dining options as Longboat Key, Bradenton Beach, and Anna Maria Island all have great places to eat and things to do by the beach. Do not forget a trip to downtown Bradenton which is on the Manatee River and also has bars, restaurants, and Village of the Arts. The Village of the Arts is an eclectic live-work community made up of colorful historic cottages that house everything from award-winning restaurants to specialty shops, studios, healing arts, bakeries, and Bradenton‚Äôs best art galleries.

Other things to note
Please note that we may collect additional information from you after confirming your booking (usually an email address) in order to comply with local regulations and to provide the best possible experience.

FULL DESCRIPTION


This is a beautiful, large 3 bedroom, 2 bath ranch home on the Northside of Sarasota with a heated (optional) swimming pool and jetted spa. Pool heat is an additional charge of $35 plus tax per day. The spa is heated even if you do not wish to add pool heat. With a two-car garage, it's conveniently close to the Sarasota/Bradenton airport and just 10 minutes to downtown Sarasota. Walk to view Sarasota Bay and bring your friendly Fido's because this ranch has a fenced yard! This is a brand-new offering as a vacation home with a lived-in homey vibe.


There is a lovely front porch with beautiful landscaping, outdoor lighting, a paver walkway, and a bistro table for two where you can enjoy a glass of wine and watch nature at its best even if raining as it's partially covered from the elements. Upon walking in the door you have a large entrance area that leads to a formal living room with plenty of seating and a row of windows for natural light. Off the lanai and open from the kitchen there is den/TV room with desk, sofa and chair a large screen TV and Blu-Ray dvd player. Catch up on emails, read a book, relax or take a nap.


The kitchen is fully equipped and newly renovated with new solid stone granite countertops in light brown earth tones, a black glass top double oven stainless steel range with wall mounted pot/kettle filler faucet, neutral tone ceramic tile floors, new kitchen cabinets with glass and wood front doors, brushed silver hardware, a small island with granite top and electric outlet, stainless dishwasher, stainless double door refrigerator, bottom freezer with water/ice front door access. The kitchen has a pass though opening out to the lanai and swimming pool for quick, easy access for family barbecues. The enclosed lanai is quite large with a daybed for additional sleeping and two additional dining areas for friends and family. Music is available in the lanai/pool area but please be mindful of your neighbors.

Right off the open kitchen, there is a large dining table that can seat up to 6 people. You have a large private laundry room with a second small refrigerator, a full-sized washer and dryer with a utility sink for your convenience and ease after a day at the beach playing in the warm sand.


The master bedroom has a queen bed with a brand new, highly rated, memory foam bamboo mattress, tiled floors, small flat screen TV and en-suite bath with handicap accessible tub/shower. The second bedroom has a King bed,(this change was recently made and pictures still show Queen bed) small flat-screen TV, desk with a chair for catching up on emails. The bathroom and newly renovated with solid stone counters and a step-in tiled shower. The bathroom in the bedroom off of the dining area has a walk-in handicapped tub/shower combination. There is ample space to store your personal belongings. The third bedroom has a full bed and a twin floor mattress and is accessible off the lanai. This bedroom is perfect for someone who is looking for privacy as it has its own entrance from the pool area. This room is not connected to the main home. Please note that this bedroom is not suitable for younger kids as they will be secluded from the rest of the home, but perfect for a teen or adult who might want a little more privacy. There isn't a TV in this 3rd bedroom and it's off the lanai so if you lock the sliders to the house at night, that person won't have access to the house.


This beautiful home is located in the Historic Whitfield Estates Section of Sarasota where numerous homes are listed on the National Register of Historic Places. Less than 15 minutes to downtown Sarasota with incredible restaurants, shopping and nightlife. Enjoy every kind of food like Indian, Greek, Thai, Sushi/Japanese, Seafood and Italian to serve to everyone's palate. Located only 8 minutes away from the Sarasota-Bradenton International Airport. Less then 5 minutes away is the famous John & Mable Ringling Museum of Art. Watch amazing sunsets from the grounds anytime you like with free parking

Restaurants & shopping are minutes from the home. Have fun playing pool, corn hole or ping pong and enjoy the evening watching a movie on your favorite app or DirecTV.

The space
This beautiful home has an open floor plan with a relaxing living space. All of our bedrooms have Nectar beds dressed in comfortable microfiber bedding.
The sofa has a pull-out queen bed for guests 7 & 8. Every room has a TV, including the patio. All TVs are Roku, giving you the opportunity to watch your favorite App's. The TV in the Living Room and Master bedroom come with the choice of DirecTV or Roku. Netflix and Disney+ is provided on all TV's.

Our newly renovated kitchen is fully stocked, blender, Keurig (k-cup/Brew), blender, cast iron and non-stick cookware to name a few. There is a double oven which is fantastic for family cooked meals or special occasions.

The Master bedroom has a unique makeup vanity, perfect for anyone who enjoys space when getting ready for the day or that special event. The home has a beautiful Banyon tree in the backyard, perfect for photos with friends and family.

Our twin bedroom has books, games and lots of fun things for your young companions to use on laxing days.

The pool has an attached hot tub. The ledge inside the pool under the hot tub waterfall provides the perfect seat to pamper your neck and shoulders from the flow of water. The pool is heated, and our guests are provided with easy instructions for use.

Have fun playing on the pool table, tossing beanbags into the corn hole set or beating someone in ping pong. There is a small tiki bar on the patio with stools to hang out with family and friends.

Entire space

Minutes from Palma Sola Botanical Gardens, Desoto Memorial.

TITLE: Charming Historic Home In Palmetto
Listing Name: Charming Historic Home In Palmetto
name: Charming Historic Home In Palmetto
description:
Whether you‚Äôre visiting for a wedding, or just looking for a great spot to explore the area, Little Blue House Palmetto is the perfect perch! Enjoy this historic 1907 home that has been completely renovated, but still has the historic charm. It‚Äôs a great spot for families, couples or even a bachelorette trip. It‚Äôs location is close to the beaches, restaurants and parks. Enjoy soaking up the sun and the water views from the upstairs balcony.

The space
This property is a perfect vacation rental because it is a gorgeous historic home that is in incredible condition. They don‚Äôt make homes like this anymore which makes it truly one of a kind. The location is perfect, in a quiet historic neighborhood directly across the street from the Manatee River. It is located on 4th street, which is the most popular street in the area for walking, biking or jogging. Everyone is very pleasant as they stroll the neighborhood. Little Blue House Palmetto has three bedrooms upstairs, two of the bedrooms have direct access to the huge second floor balcony that has gorgeous views of the water. Having coffee in the morning as the sun comes up or a glass of wine watching the sunset over the river is something that cannot be properly captured in a picture or description. The kitchen is perfect for entertaining. Cooking with natural gas is a huge plus for those who are culinary experts. The tankless hot water heater is an added bonus with larger parties. Never having to worry about running out of hot water is great, especially if you‚Äôre the last one to get a shower that day. In addition to a wonderful house, the property is excellent for multiple families. The driveway is huge and can hold at least six cars or an RV or boat if you are traveling with one. There is a public boat ramp 5 minutes(or less) away and can handle launching even the biggest boats. Great restaurants are also close to this property which makes dining out a breeze. If you enjoy being active on your trip, this house is also located within a few miles of Emerson point which is perfect for riding bikes, beach BBQ or trail hikes with historic preserves.

Other things to note
Unique benefits to the property: gorgeous water views from the balcony, beautiful historic home, space for trailered boat or RV, active neighborhood with bikes available upon request, kayak available upon request, gas stove, tankless hot water heater, front porch swing.

description:

Close to Siesta+Lido beaches! 5 miles to IMG +14 miles to AMI!

The space
Guest rave about this spacious, single-level, private Sarasota home. Enough room for the whole family, whether you come together for a reunion, family getaway or travel as a team. Located in North Sarasota, close to everything you could want during your vacation.

DISTANCE TO:
ANNA MARIA BEACHES 14 MILES
SIESTA KEY BEACH 14 MILES
DOWNTOWN SARASOTA 7 MILES
LIDO BEACH 9 MILES
ST. ARMANDS 8.5 MILES

Siesta Key Beach, St. Armands Circle and Lido Key Beach, Restaurants, Golf, Downtown Sarasota, I-75, Sarasota Memorial Hospital, Sarasota Jungle Garden and Ringling Museum all within a short driving distance. Our guests comment on how much they enjoyed the outdoor TV/lounge area, private pool, and screened lanai, even during rainy days.

You'll walk into a spacious but comfortable living room with a 72" Smart TV to enjoy with the family at the end of the day. The open concept continues to an elegant dining room with plenty of room for a lovely dinner with friends or family.

Next to the dining room, you will enter the well equipped kitchen. Here you'll find everything you'll need to host a wonderful meal with plenty of dishes and pans available for your use. Out the large sliding doors, you‚Äôll step into the the best way to enjoy Florida weather, with a large covered area, the screened lanai has a cushioned seating area with a 75‚Äù TV for your enjoyment.

To the right you‚Äôll find a Weber grill for all the grill-masters! A dining set with seating for 6 completes all you need to enjoy relaxing outside but out of the elements even during the summer rains.

The large 25‚Äù pool goes from 3 to 7 feet in depth and is in direct sunshine for warmer year-around water temperatures. 4 lounge chairs are perfect for working on your FL tan. Truly a paradise outdoors!

The split layout of the home is perfect for everyone to enjoy some privacy and relaxation.

To the right of the entrance there is a small hallway leading to 2 bedrooms, each with 2 twin beds and plenty of storage space in the closets and dressers.
The larger master suite is located to the right of the dining room and has an en-suite shower as well as French doors that open into a little seating area, perfect for enjoying your coffee or book.

Down a quiet hallway on the other side of the house there is another master suite with a queen bed and an en-suite shower. This suite also has direct access to the patio through the glass sliding doors that open up into the screened patio.

There is a desk available for those needing to spend some time working remotely along with fast internet access. You can even work outside at the patio table with views of palm trees waving in the breeze, your choice, although we might be a bit biased to the outdoor office.

** Parties and events are not allowed and reservations will be terminated immediately if we receive notice of any violations.
** If neighborhood noise ordinances are not observed between 9pm to 8am, reservation will be terminated.
