description:
A Coastal Paradise by AMI Locals
5820 3rd Ave W, Bradenton, FL 34209

Welcome to A Coastal Paradise by AMI Locals, a beautifully remodeled three-bedroom, two-bath luxury vacation rental located in the peaceful West Bradenton neighborhood. Just 5.8 miles from the beaches of Anna Maria Island. Combining modern comfort with coastal sophistication, this spacious retreat offers a private heated pool and spa, game room with pool table, and a large fenced-in backyard, making it ideal for families,

The space
Highlights
‚Ä¢ Private Pool and Spa
‚Ä¢ 3 Bedroom / 2 Bath
‚Ä¢ 1 King, 1 Queen bed, 1 Twin/ Full bunk, 1 Queen sleeper sofa
‚Ä¢ Game Area with Pool Table
‚Ä¢ 5.8 miles to Anna Maria Island beaches
‚Ä¢ Large Fenced-In Backyard
‚Ä¢ Outdoor Shower
‚Ä¢ Dog friendly
‚Ä¢ Close to De Soto Memorial, IMG Academy, and Bradenton Riverwalk
‚Ä¢ 3 Parking Spaces

Step through the sliding glass doors to discover your screened-in lanai and backyard oasis, complete with a lagoon-style private pool, spa, and sun shelf for all ages. The lush backyard is perfect for family fun or outdoor entertaining with plenty of outdoor seating and a shaded patio for relaxing under the Florida sun. Prep meals on the grill or challenge your friends to a game of pool in the indoor game area. Whether soaking in the hot tub, enjoying a family cookout, or spending time in the scenic backyard, every feature is designed to enhance your Florida stay.

Pull into the private driveway surrounded by swaying palms and step into a beautifully designed home filled with coastal hues, upscale furnishings, and modern comforts. The open concept great room includes a plush sofa (that converts into a queen sleeper sofa), a large TV, and a spacious chef‚Äôs kitchen complete with quartz countertops, stainless steel appliances, and a farmhouse dining table that seats the whole group.

All bedrooms are thoughtfully styled with luxury linens, TVs, and ample storage for beach gear. The primary suite is a peaceful retreat with a king bed and an ensuite bathroom with a double vanity and upgraded walk-in shower, your private haven for rest. The second bedroom features a queen bed with elegant decor, while the third bedroom provides a twin over full bunk bed, perfect for kids or extra guests. The hall bathroom is fitted with a shower/tub combo and stylish fixtures to serve the guest rooms. A washer and dryer complete the comfort and convenience of this home.

Room Details
‚Ä¢ Primary Bedroom: King bed, ensuite with double vanity and walk-in shower
‚Ä¢ Second Bedroom: Queen bed
‚Ä¢ Third Bedroom: Twin over Full bunk bed

Guests enjoy complimentary Wi-Fi, a washer and dryer, and dog-friendly accommodations with a spacious fenced yard. Perfectly located near restaurants such as Joey D's Chicago Style Eatery and Popi's Place Bradenton, or parks like De Soto National Memorial, this home provides easy access to both Bradenton attractions and Anna Maria Island. Spend your days kayaking, paddleboarding, or strolling along the Bradenton Riverwalk, and your evenings watching brilliant Gulf Coast sunsets just minutes away.

From morning swims in your private pool to sunset dinners, A Coastal Paradise by AMI Locals offers the ultimate Bradenton vacation home experience. Enjoy the best of Florida‚Äôs Gulf Coast with luxury amenities, family-friendly comfort, and convenient access to beaches, parks, and attractions. Book your stay today and start planning your perfect Anna Maria Island getaway!

Other things to note
3 cars maximum are able to park at this home. We ask our guests to please plan accordingly and coordinate with your group. There is no overnight parking available for additional vehicles.

This home is managed by AMI Locals, an Anna Maria Island property management company.

This property allows dogs with host approval prior to arrival - with a large fenced in backyard. Please note there will be an additional pet fee associated, see our AMI Locals Rental Policies for full details.

We do not accept reservations from anyone under 25 years of age. We do not allow persons under 25 to occupy a property unless accompanied by someone over 25 years of age.

Please see our AMI Locals Rental Policies for full details.

Please Remember: "You are vacationing in a residential area. Please be a good neighbor by keeping the noise to a respectful level during the day and night. Excessive and unreasonable noise can deprive neighbors of the peaceful enjoyment of their private property." *Exceeding the noise ordinance could result in disciplinary actions including fines and/or termination of your rental agreement without refund.

The space
Property Details:
Welcome to Coastal Escape, a stunning 4-bedroom, 2-bathroom single-family pool home nestled in the quiet residential community of NW Bradenton. As you step inside, you'll be greeted by a beautiful open floor plan that offers a seamless view of the backyard pool area. The spacious dining room, with enough seating for all, is perfect for family meal nights, holiday dinners, and quality time together. The fully stocked kitchen, complete with a large island, has everything you need to prepare and serve your favorite meals. Relax in the cozy living room with a comfortable couch and smart TV.

The master bedroom is a spacious retreat with a king bed, a desk for any work-from-home needs, patio access, a large walk-in closet, and an ensuite bathroom featuring dual sinks, a walk-in shower with a bench, and great lighting.

The second, third, and fourth bedrooms each offer a comfortable queen bed, smart TV, and plenty of storage. The second bathroom has a bathtub/shower combo.

description:
SLEEPING ARRANGEMENTS

The space
3 BR / 2 BA / Sleeps 6

Master bedroom ‚Äì One King bed and en-suite bathroom and wall-mounted TV

Second bedroom ‚Äì Queen Bed with TV

Third Bedroom - Two twin beds with a large walk-in closet.

The second and third bedrooms share in hall bathroom with a tub/shower combination.

______________________________________________________________________________

AMENITIES


*One dog considered with $200 plus tax non refundable pet fee/NO CATS*

Two-car garage and ample driveway parking.

Outdoor private pool. The pool can be heated between November- April for an extra charge of $35.00 plus tax per day)

Screened Lanai with outdoor seating area and picnic table for dining al fresco.

Propane grill for outdoor cooking.

2 Beach Chairs, 1 small cooler, 1 Beach Umbrella

Close to Anna Maria Island and Bradenton Beaches. (12 min drive to Anna Maria Island and 11-minute drive to Bradenton Beach)

Spacious living room with large flat panel TV and leather couch and chair.

Fully stocked kitchen with stemware, dishes, and everything needed to make meals at home.

Full-size washer and dryer located in the garage.

WIFI/Cable included.


*No Smoking inside the home*

_____________________________________________________________________________

FULL DESCRIPTION


This home has a private in-ground pool with outdoor seating which is the perfect spot to relax with a cool drink after a day at the beach. There is an outdoor grill perfect for a BBQ by the pool on days you are not at the beach. Located on West Manatee Ave, you are only minutes to the beaches of Anna Maria Island and Bradenton Beaches.


The living room is spacious and newly decorated with leather seating that is perfect for watching shows or news on the large screen TV. The master bedroom has a king-size bed with a walk-in closet to unpack. The second bedroom has two twin beds, and a large walk-in closet, and the third bedroom has a queen bed with a dresser and a large closet. The kitchen is fully stocked with dishes, stemware, and basic appliances to enjoy meals made at home. Eat in the dining room in the home or on the large picnic table outside on the lanai.


Outdoor private pool. The pool can be heated between November - April for an extra charge of $35.00 plus tax per day)


* PLEASE NOTE- if you plan to bring your dog. Although this is a prime location so close to the beaches, it isn't a fenced in yard and there is a fairly busy street nearby. Please be aware of that when booking and plan to keep your dog leashed or with you at all times. We want everyone to enjoy a safe vacation. *


*PLEASE NOTE- For extended stays of 60 days or more we require a mid-stay clean be done by our cleaners. A member of our team will reach out upon your booking to coordinate the fee and scheduling.


The Beachway Plaza is just a 3-minute drive (0.7 miles away) and offers a Publix grocery store and restaurants. The Sarasota/Bradenton airport is a 20-minute drive (10.5 miles) south and downtown Sarasota and St Armands Circle are about 30-minute drive south which is a great place for watching a sunset from a rooftop bar with causal and upscale dining and shopping. You don't need to go that far for dining options as Longboat Key, Bradenton Beach and Anna Maria Island all have great places to eat and things to do by the beach. Don't forget a trip to downtown Bradenton which is on the Bradenton river and also has bars, restaurants, and Village of the Arts. The Village of the Arts is an eclectic live-work community made up of colorful historic cottages that house everything from award-winning restaurants to specialty shops, studios, healing arts, bakeries, and Bradenton‚Äôs best art galleries.


The best part of being in West Bradenton is that you are minutes to the white sand beaches of Anna Maria Island. There are also several wildlife preserves nearby, great for hiking and biking. If you would rather fish for the afternoon, there are also great spots at piers around the area.

Other things to note
Please note that we may collect additional information from you after confirming your booking (usually an email address) in order to comply with local regulations and to provide the best possible experience.

Please be careful of the cinder blocks in the yard, as well as lawn sprinklers.

**Please be respectful of the neighborhood.**

Do not block traffic on street.
No overnight parking on street.
no boat, RV, or trailer parking.

The Main house:

There are 4 bedrooms included in this listing.

**Do not open or use the sofa beds, they are no longer functional.*

Master bedroom:
King size regular bed, do not open pull out couch. Sleeps up to 2 adults.

Bedroom 2:
King size regular bed and portable mattresses in closet, do not open pull out couch. Sleeps up to 2 adults.

Bedroom 3:
Queen size regular bed. Sleeps up to 2 adults.

Bedroom 4:
Queen size regular bed and portable mattresses in closet do not open pull out couch. Sleeps up to 2 adults.

Living room:
Full size day bed with tuck under trundle bed and one regular couch. Sleeps up to 5 adults.

2 queen size foldable foam portable mattresses in closet that sleep 4, with sheets and pillows.

This is a beautiful but unique and eccentric home, decorated with local artist work and furnished by the non-profit PEL, one of our favorite non profits. If you prefer simple, brand new, ultra modern spaces, this may not be the property for you.

Main house maximum occupancy (2 per bed): 16

Using living room Couch: 17

Pool:
Gorgeous salt water in ground pool (pool cage lost due to hurricane Ian).

Not responsible for weather or unseasonably cold winters.

There is no BBQ grill on the property. If you provide your own grill, it must be used only on grass away from any buildings, trees, fences or other structures and not on the pool deck.

We make every effort to provide our guests with an excellent stay, therefore the pool is routinely tested, treated and cleaned.

By choosing to book this home, you accept that: If the pool fails weekly safety testing - it may be temporarily closed for maintenance. The pool is available roughly for 99% of guests but not guaranteed for this reason.

If you absolutely must have a pool, you may want to consider a hotel who has on site engineers and maintenance staff. This location has neither.

Ask about adding one of our extra rooms for an additional fee. Sorry, you can‚Äôt access these units unless you pay for them at least a month upfront.

** PAY MORE TO UPGRADE YOUR STAY**

Bedroom 5:
King size bed and pull out couch and streaming Tv. Sleeps 4 and is on our second floor. $50/night, must book for the entire length of your stay. This room does NOT have an extra bathroom.

Mother in law suite:
This cozy studio unit is by the front entrance. This unit has a Queen size bed and pull out couch with private bathroom, galley style kitchen and streaming TV. Cost: $100 per night for your entire stay. This room DOES have an extra bathroom.

The game and bunk room:
Sleeps 7 and has a ping pong table.

Bed 1: Queen over queen bunk bed. Sleeps 4

Bed 2: twin over full futon bunk bed. Sleeps 3

Small Couch (small child might fit but we don‚Äôt count this in total sleeping arrangements)

Cost: $100 per night for your entire stay. This room does NOT have an extra bathroom.

Add on Bedroom 5: sleeps 4
Add on Mother in law suite: sleeps 4
Add on game and bunk room: sleeps 7

If you pay more to add on all upgrades, you can sleep 32!

Children:
Being a parent of 8 kids myself I‚Äôm always surprised when children are left unsupervised while on family vacations.

This is a home easily damaged by an unsupervised child who wouldn‚Äôt know better. I‚Äôve had grill fires, broken appliances, electrical shorts etc from guests children. If anything is broken or damaged during your stay, it will be your responsibility to replace or repair it.

This home is not child proof, you are expected to keep a very close eye on your children and not leave them unsupervised.

1. Make sure they‚Äôre not in the pool area unsupervised. Keep pool doors locked when an adult is not present.

2. Be careful with cleaning chemicals in garage, kitchen or other areas of the house. This house is not child proof.

3. Small children must be kept away from outlets, appliances or the WiFi extenders. Do not let them press buttons on appliances or tamper with electronics.

4. Do not leave children unattended in any area of the property under any circumstances!

Service Providers:

I have regularly weekly service providers for pests, home cleaning, repairs, lawn or pool care. They have my express permission and full access to the property for regular service.

If a service provider requires access to the interior, I will always coordinate with you unless it‚Äôs an emergency.

At no time should you provide anyone access to the interior of the house if you have not received confirmation and instructions from me. Feel free to communicate with me to confirm their identity if someone requests to enter the property during your stay for any reason.

Guest access
Please let me know if you have any questions.

WiFi:
There are several networks with WiFi extenders due to the size of this location. You‚Äôll find networks called Netgear83 available for guests.

Doors:
When you book this home you agree that you will take excellent care of it and that includes preventing excessive electric or environmental waste. Most doors have sensors on them that will alert me if left open for longer than a couple minutes. If that happens I will ask you to confirm these are closed, as the guest who booked the home, it is your responsibility to ensure your guests protect and care for the home properly by not wasting energy through an open door.

Other things to note
The upgrades are NOT available as separate rentals, nor are they booked to other guests during your stay.

This is Florida, although the property is regularly treated for bugs, understand that some do find their way in occasionally.

You may also see snakes, biting ants, spiders or other wildlife around the property so be careful where you step.

Smoking is NOT allowed! There is a $250 charge for smoking.

Cleaning:
Guests are expected to clean up after themselves. This is not a hotel, you must treat the home with respect. You‚Äôll be charged additional cleaning fees if you don‚Äôt follow the simple check out process as posted in the rooms and the guest book.

WiFi:
You‚Äôll see several networks with the same name of but have different extensions. They all have the same password. Use whichever gives you best reception.

Garbage and Recycling:
Garbage goes in trash cans and is picked up every Monday and Thursday. Recycling goes in blue cart and is picked up on Thursday. Yard waste is picked up every Wednesday. DO NOT PUT GARBAGE IN BLUE BIN.

**If your garbage doesn‚Äôt fit in the many cans provided, you must take it with you.**

Studio apartment, and the upstairs of the house are off limits to guests unless you‚Äôve paid for add on bedrooms.

name: Paradise Cove - Modern Home with a Private Pool! O
description:
Private Pool, Free Wifi, Lake views

The space
Modern finishes meets laid back Florida lifestyle in this gorgeous 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom home located just minutes from Anna Maria Island.

With plenty of room for the whole family to enjoy a movie, there are also sweet little sitting areas for quiet moments with a book and cold glass of lemonade after a long day of soaking up in the Florida sunshine!

The heated pool and screened lanai area boast views of a lovely lake from every angle. Enjoy festive family feasts at the large outdoor dining area or simply close your eyes and let the soft breeze sing you the song of rest and relaxation you deserve while napping in a sun chair.

The master suite has warm floors, soft sheets, a large TV, HUGE bathroom with soaking tub, and your own private entrance and exit to the screen lanai and pool area. Also equip with a TV, the second bedroom has a king bed and is simply the most comfortable place you will ever rest your head. The third room has two twin beds in the most adorable layout. Perfect for little sunkissed noses and tired giggles at the end of an adventurous day!

Not that you will want to cook on vacation, but rest assured, this kitchen has absolutely everything you will need to make anything from a Pina Coloda to Thanksgiving dinner!

Paradise Cove is in a PRIME location. Close to the beach, yes... but a bike ride or hike at Robinson's Preserve is a MUST DO while staying at Paradise Cove! Bring your camera for some of the most breathtaking scenes nature has ever acted out at this well preserved wildlife area. Plan dinner at Pier 22, directly on the Manatee River and get a glimpse of some of the most spectacular boats you've ever seen! Take in a show at the brand new performing arts building, or take the kids to experience the Bradenton Riverwalk!

There is 1 parking space inside the garage.

Maximum Parking: 3 vehicles

TITLE: Camping adventures! Pool, putting green & more!
Listing Name: Camping adventures! Pool, putting green & more!
name: Camping adventures! Pool, putting green & more!
description:
Discover the charm of this beautifully renovated 5-bed, 3-bath home with a welcoming open layout. CHECK OUT THE CAMPING THEMED BUNK ROOM. The backyard oasis features a new three-hole putting green, disc golf baskets, cornhole & many other family friendly games!! Enjoy the heated pool for ultimate relaxation. Bask in the sunlight during the day & savor the evenings under charming string lights illuminating the outdoor space. Your family will adore the multitude of offerings this home presents..

The space
Discover the charm of this beautifully renovated 5-bed, 3-bath home with a welcoming open layout. Relax by the heated pool among family fun amenities, there's something for everyone! Located near a public boat launch for fishing or kayaking on the Braden River, and conveniently close to shopping. Just a short drive to Anna Maria Island or Siesta Key. Ideal for multi-generational getaways, offering a chair lift and safety rails for added comfort. The backyard oasis features a new three-hole putting green, disc golf baskets, cornhole and many other family friendly games!! Reminisce while swinging on the bench. Enjoy the heated pool for ultimate relaxation. Delight in the new patio with a pergola, adirondack seating, and coffee loungers. Listen to the gentle rustle of the bamboo and palms while reading a book on the hammock, or take a leisurely stroll along the boardwalk bordering the shell-covered yard. Bask in the sunlight during the day and savor the evenings under charming string lights illuminating the outdoor space. Your family will adore the multitude of offerings this home presents.

Check out our NEW Camping Themed Bunk room for the kiddos!! We're sure your kids will love the outdoor atmosphere with the indoor A/C and no BUGS!!


This property is ideal for multi-generational family vacations, situated in a family-friendly neighborhood and equipped with a CHAIR LIFT and SAFETY HANDLES in the walk-in shower. It is also conveniently located near other homes with small children. Plus, the nearest beach is less than 10 miles away! You'll have easy access to Anna Maria Island, Siesta Key, and Lido Key.

Convenience is key, as this home is situated near local grocery stores, breweries, and just a short drive down Manatee Avenue to Anna Maria Island. Interstate 75 provides quick access to Siesta Key, Lido Key, and the airport.

Enjoy the option to heat the pool for an additional fee ($120) and make use of the smart TVs and super-fast WiFi. Relax on the abundant lounge chairs and seating around the pool, taking in the beautiful Florida weather.

Rest comfortably in the well-appointed bedrooms, including a King Bed in Bedroom 1, Queen Beds in Bedrooms 2, 3, and 4, and a Full Bunk Bed with Two Fold-out Chair Mattresses in Bedroom 5. The house accommodates up to 12 guests in beds, with additional kid-friendly bedding options available. A Pack n' Play is provided for the little ones, along with a stroller, highchair, and kids' dinnerware.

All linens and towels, both for the bath and beach, are provided for your convenience. The fully equipped kitchen boasts stainless steel appliances, granite counters, and ample place settings, including kid-friendly dinnerware. You'll find all the necessary cooking utensils, as well as a toaster, blender, air fryer, and coffee maker (with complimentary coffee, filters, and creamer!).

A gas grill with a propane tank is available for your use. Please note, we do not refill the tank, so feel free to exchange it at a local gas station or Home Depot for around $30 when it runs empty.

Dining options include a kitchen counter with 4 stools, a dining room table that seats 8 (with the option to seat an additional 2), and outdoor dining by the pool that seats 6. Relax on the 6 chaise loungers, two rocking loungers, a hanging bench swing, 2 hammocks, or two Adirondack chairs by the poolside.

Pool settings are scheduled, and when purchased, the pool heat is set to 85 degrees. However, please be aware that if air temperatures drop below 70 degrees, it may affect the pool temperature, and we cannot guarantee pool temperatures.

Games such as cards, board games, pool toys, shuffleboard and cornhole are provided for your entertainment. The home also features central air and a washer and dryer for your convenience.

We've thought of everything to make your stay comfortable and enjoyable. Amenities such as toilet paper, paper towels, dish soap, dishwasher detergent, salt, pepper, laundry detergent, dryer sheets, shampoo, conditioner, body wash, and hand soap are all provided!

For your beach adventures, we've got you covered with beach towels, sand chairs, a large beach mat, a cooler bag, sand toys, 4 boogie boards, a beach umbrella, and a beach cart. Everything you need to make your beach day AWESOME!

If you're in the mood for fishing, we've provided 4 fishing rods and a basic tackle box for your use at the nearby sandy beaches or boat launch.

We can't wait to welcome you to this exceptional family vacation home!

Guest access
Entire home is available during your stay. The garage is not accessible to guests.

Other things to note
We offer self check in, which means we do not meet you on site to provide keys. Check in instructions are sent to guests 24 hours prior to check in. Every guest is provided with a unique door code that allows them access to the home during their stay.

Please let us know if you will be requiring pool heat for $120 per stay AND/OR if you will have a pet (dog) joining your group.

Downtown Bradenton 2 miles.

St Pete Beach - 30 minutes.

Vintage 1950‚Äôs cottage.

Located in a charming older neighborhood in historical Bradenton - mornings and evenings can be spent strolling along the waters edge and watching the boats in the River. A short drive away is the pristine award winning Ana Maria island beaches.

This updated 2 bedroom 2 bathroom home includes a huge Florida room to relax, watch tv, or play a game of ping pong. The kitchen is fully equipped with items to enjoy your stay. Coffee starters are provided. The home has a fairly open floor plan with 2 living areas, a large dining area and a dedicated work space complete with docking station, laptop stand and extra monitor. The home is equipped with a netgear high speed router to help with work calls and streaming throughout the home. The large Florida room overlooks the backyard and dock on the canal.

The Sofa bed in the Florida Room is a queen size and the sliding door leading to the rest of the house closes, so the room can function like a private bedroom as well. The trundle under the twin bed (In the 2nd bedroom) is a twin size.

Items for your little one includes:
highchair
pack and play (with sheets)
Toddler utensils/plates/bowls
Sippy cups
Additional lock as well as alarm /chime at the top of the back door leading to the backyard.

No pets allowed.

2 fishing poles and tackle box
beach gear (chairs, umbrella, towels, sand toys, beach cart, etc).
Lots of games for the whole family.

The Riverwalk expansion is about a half mile down the road and is a full 3 miles long. The Pittsburgh Pirates practice less than 2 miles away and the famous 3 Keys Brewery is less than a quarter mile away and easily walkable. Cook on the grill, fish off the dock with the provided fishing poles, play a game of jenga, practice your putting, or just relax, overlooking the water.

There is also an outdoor shower for rinsing off after a day at the beach.

Fish often jump out of the water on the canal, so don't be alarmed. Fun to sit and watch.

At night, be aware there are possums, racoons and other nocturnal creatures around the back and front yard. And it's Florida - plan on bugs all times of the year.

During busy season, plan to get to the beach early to find parking. Any time after 11am and parking fills up.

If you're in the mood for fine dining, Michael Johns (MJ's) Restaurant is 1.5 miles away. It's rated in the top 10 Sarasota/Manatee French-American Steakhouse.

Closest public boat ramp is right of 64 (3020 Manatee Ave E), less than a mile from the house.

The detached garage in the backyard is not part of the space available for rental. This is unavailable for use.

www.airbnb.com/h/cottageoncanal

Entire space minus the garage / locked closet in bathroom and hallway are included in this rental. Please make yourself at home.

Other things to note
No boat docking allowed. Use of boat lift unavailable.

No diving in pool or water in the canal. NO ANIMALS in pool. $150 fine plus any damages incurred from animal in pool are responsibility of guest.

No Pets Allowed. Exception for service animals.

Always supervise children. There is a fence separating the back patio from the pool area and canal in the backyard. There is an additional lock on the Florida room door at the top of the door that needs to remain locked at all times when children are present. Please leave the chime / alarm to back door set, so it sounds when the door is opened. There is an additional alarm chime on slider leading to Florida Room.

For pool:
no glass of any kind outside.
No running around pool.
No jumping into pool.
No standing on edge of pool. This is plastic and it will break.
No animals of any kind in pool at any time. If found to have animal in the pool, there will be a $150 fine for the extra cleaning required as well as any damages to the pool.

This holiday, give the gift that builds memories and strengthens bonds. Enjoy peaceful mornings by the creek- feel the refreshing breeze while listening to the birds who call it home. Nearby UTC sparkles with holiday lights-music, activities, shopping, carriage rides, and so much more. Back home, unwind with a dip in the heated pool, battle in our new game room, or settle in for a cozy movie night in our spacious, comfortable living room. Making memories-the gift that keeps on giving.

The space
Welcome to the perfect family vacation destination! This incredible vacation home offers 2,000 square-feet of luxurious open living space. It features a backyard oasis with FREE heated pool, outdoor dining/lounging areas, and waterfront views. Bowles Creek is home to many bird species that provide endless hours of serene surroundings.

Located in a family-friendly neighborhood, this property is ideal for family vacations. Plus, you'll be less than 10 miles away from the nearest BEACH. With its central location you can easily access Anna Maria Island, Siesta Key, and Lido Key.

Convenience is key, as this vacation home is only 3.5 miles away from SRQ Airport and less than 5 miles from IMG Academy.

Inside the home, you'll find four bedrooms to accommodate your family and friends.

Bedroom 1: King bed with attached Bathroom
Bedroom 2: Queen bed
Bedroom 3: Queen bed

A stroller, highchair, and kids' dinnerware are provided for your convenience.

The fully equipped kitchen is a highlight of the home. It boasts stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, and plenty of place settings. Kid-friendly dinnerware, pots and pans, cooking utensils, a toaster, blender, instapot, and
coffee maker with complimentary coffee, filters, and creamer are all at your disposal.

There are several dining options available. Enjoy a quick bite at the kitchen counter with 2 stools, gather around the dining room table that seats 6, or have a cozy breakfast at the high-top table with 4 stools. Out by the pool, you'll find an outdoor sofa and an outdoor dining area that seats 6.

Rest assured, this vacation home is equipped with central air and a washer and dryer for your convenience.

This comfortable private home is located just 5 minutes from downtown Bradenton. Downtown Bradenton is on the Manatee River and has bars, restaurants, and Village of the Arts. The Village of the Arts is an eclectic live-work community of colorful historic cottages that house everything from award-winning restaurants to specialty shops, studios, healing arts, bakeries, and Bradenton‚Äôs best art galleries. The Sarasota/Bradenton airport is a 35-minute drive (9.6 miles) south and downtown Sarasota and St Armands Circle are about 35-minute drive south which is a great place to watch a sunset from a rooftop bar with causal and upscale dining and shopping. You will also find dining options in nearby Longboat Key, Bradenton Beach, and Anna Maria Island which all have great places to eat and things to do by the beach. TITLE: Endless Summer Escape -  Amazing Heated Pool/Spa
Listing Name: Endless Summer Escape - Amazing Heated Pool/Spa
name: Endless Summer Escape - Amazing Heated Pool/Spa
description:
This tropical retreat is loaded with charm. The backyard is your own private resort featuring a massive and amazing heated pool and spa, modern outdoor shower, plenty of seating & dining space, & quaint courtyard with a fire pit. The spacious and modern home has 2 living spaces and over 2100 square feet. Each bedroom has it's own private bathroom! Located just 5 miles from the beautiful beaches of Anna Maria Island but even closer to beautiful parks for biking, walking, & stunning sunsets.

The space
Our home is filled with unique character and charm. From the floating fireplace and reading nook in the sunroom to the secluded fire pit courtyard in the backyard - this is not a cookie cutter home! The 3rd bedroom is set up as a large king bed with extra thick mattress topper but can be separated into 2 twin beds upon request! Our backyard oasis is private and peaceful. The massive and amazing pool is heated for year round fun! It‚Äôs one of the biggest pools in the area..plenty of room for all the water games and also has lots of deck space to soak up all that Florida sun. We have a couple of new loungers, outdoor table and umbrella, outdoor seating area, and 4 Adirondack chairs. The pool and deck are brand new with beautiful travertine and a slip resistant deck finish. You'll also love soaking in the hot tub at the end of the day under the romantic patio string lights. There is even a quaint courtyard with a fire pit for you to enjoy some roasted marshmallows & campfire stories in the cooler winter months. We have a propane grill for you to cook meals for the whole group if you choose to stay in, and the kitchen is well stocked with all the essentials. We also have a lot of things for the kiddos - high chair, kiddie pool, pack n' play with mattress and sheets & more - just ask for the full list if you're interested and if there is anything we don‚Äôt have we‚Äôll try to arrange for it to be there! We have a large 72" tv in the living room, leather sofas and a giant comfy bean bag for extra seating and relaxing at the end of the day. There is also an office space and desk with high speed WiFi if you can't completely get away or want to work from Florida for a month or so. The laundry room is conveniently located right next to all the bedrooms, each of which has its own en-suite bathroom. The rooms are all outfitted with the comfiest mattresses and high quality linens. Each room has a dresser and/or closet shelves and drawers. Lastly, there is plenty of parking in the oversized driveway along with the 2 car garage!

Guest access
The whole home is yours!

Other things to note
Our pool and spa is truly amazing and one of a kind! Completely remodeled and thoughtfully designed for your enjoyment with a large deep end and a swim up channel to the hot tub, you're sure to have a blast! It is heated for year round enjoyment. Pool & spa heat is separate for just $25/night - let me know if you'd like to use that!

We also have a huge tv in the living room and a subscription to Youtube TV so you won't miss a beat while you're away from home. There are 2 separate living areas if you want separate hang out spaces as well.

name: Parrot Landing in Bradenton
description:
Whether you're a bird or a bird-watcher, you can't find a better place to perch than Parrot Landing, a three bedroom, two bath charmer on the outskirts of Cortez, just a hop, skip and a jump to the beaches of Anna Maria Island!

Filled with Old Florida vibes, Parrot Landing is stocked with loads of personality and all the accoutrements to make your family happy, including big, comfy sofas in the living room, plenty of beds for everyone, games to play, smart TVs to watch, a pool to splash ...

The space
...in, and tropical landscaping that never lets you forget you're in Florida!

And don't forget the native species! You don't have to be a binocular-toting bird watcher to enjoy the flocks of bright green parrots that make this neighborhood their home. Their loud cries make them particularly noticeable, but loads of other feathered creatures flock here as well, including the occasional roseate spoonbill, ospreys and hawks searching for their next meal, pileated woodpeckers, and even the occasional bald eagle!

The charm starts even before you reach the front door, with unique tropical plantings lining the path to a deck filled with colorful Adirondack chairs, the perfect spot for gathering for a drink. Inside the house, you'll find a large living room with loads of comfortable seating where the whole family can stream movies or play games. Kids might want to slip off to the large twin bedroom on one side of the kitchen; its generous floor is a great place for games or puzzles, or they can stream their own programs on the smart TV.

Time for some rest? That twin bedroom also has two twin trundles that pull out easily at bedtime. Two other bedrooms are nestled on the other side of the living room. One features a king-size bed, and the other offers two queen beds and an ensuite bathroom with a walk-in shower. A second bathroom is located outside these two bedrooms and is easily reached from the twin room.

The retro eat-in kitchen, which is well-equipped for preparing family meals and snacks, is open to the living room. However, you'll probably want to do most of your cooking outsidewith a gas grill, a Big Green Egg, and a smoker, cooking and dining al fresco is a natural choice! A large octagonal picnic table located by the pool is the perfect place for everyone to feast.

Of course, you're in Florida to swim in the pool and take the family to the beach! The big above-ground pool has plenty of room for everyone, and can be heated for an additional charge. You can also swim in the crystal clear waters of the Gulf of Mexico, just across the Cortez Bridge. In between you'll find restaurants, shops, and even the free Anna Maria Island Trolley that runs from Coquina Beach in Bradenton Beach all the way up to the Historic Anna Maria Pier in the village of Anna Maria.

This wonderful Florida home sleeps 10 people in one king, two queens, two twins, and two twin trundles. Need to sleep a few more? Check our website or call our office for information about Kapok and Banyan, located just across the street.

A NOTE ABOUT POOL HEAT: If you book online, your reservation will automatically populate with a pool heat charge for one week. If your reservation is for a longer period, someone on our staff will adjust the pool heat rate to reflect the longer stay. We recommend pool heat at this property, regardless of the time of year, as pools near shady trees stay cooler, even in the summer.

Our Cancellation Policy: In order to protect our owners from loss of income, ALL MONIES PAID TOWARDS YOUR RESERVATION MAY BE NON-REFUNDABLE AFTER A CERTAIN DATE! FULL AND PARTIAL REFUNDS MAY BE GIVEN UNDER CERTAIN CONDITIONS. Ask our office for details, or check your rental agreement.

The true magic of our property lies outdoors. Step onto the large patio and be greeted by a newly constructed pool that sparkles under the warm sun. The surrounding lounge area is an oasis of comfort, where you can soak up rays, enjoy a good read, or sip on refreshing beverages. The air is perfumed with the fragrant blooms of flowers that line the edges of the patio, while fruit trees offer a bounty of delicious treats ripe for the picking.

Whether you're lounging by the pool, or exploring the nearby beach, you're sure to create cherished memories that will linger long after your stay. Book now and experience coastal living at its best!

description:

This spacious retreat boasts 4 bedrooms and 10 beds to accommodate your group comfortably. Experience luxury and nature's beauty in perfect harmony for an unforgettable stay.

The space
Welcome to Sunset Shores, your idyllic retreat nestled in the heart of Sarasota, Florida! This charming Airbnb offers a perfect blend of convenience and coastal charm, providing an unforgettable getaway experience.

Step into this beautifully appointed space and feel instantly at home. The airy and bright living area features comfortable seating and coastal-inspired decor, creating a welcoming atmosphere for relaxation and rejuvenation. With modern amenities including a smart TV and high-speed Wi-Fi, you'll have everything you need for a comfortable stay.

description:

The space
Welcome to our well-lit and spacious living room! Enjoy relaxing on comfortable sofas while watching TV. The room is adorned with two ceiling fans, ample lighting from lamps, and even a convenient storage bench for your belongings.

Our kitchen is fully equipped with everything you need for cooking and dining, boasting a dishwasher, refrigerator, oven/stove, microwave, blender, coffee maker, and various other thoughtful amenities. Casual meals can be enjoyed at the breakfast bar, which is complemented by two comfortable bar stools.

Designed for convenience and socializing, the kitchen features a ceiling fan for comfort, a pass-through window to the living room enhancing communication and spaciousness. A patio door provides direct access to the pool area, making outdoor dining and a refreshing swim easily accessible. If you would like to heat the pool, it will be available for a 50$/night additional charge for the length of your stay, which must be paid prior to your check-in date. Whether you're preparing a meal, mixing drinks, or simply grabbing a quick snack, our kitchen serves as the perfect hub for both culinary adventures and relaxation.

Gather around our dining table designed for six, set in an inviting space adorned with a touch of elegance. A bar trolley stands ready nearby, perfect for mixing cocktails. With direct access to all parts of the house this dining area is not just a place to dine but a central hub for relaxation and socializing.

Indulge in comfort in the carpeted master bedroom featuring a king-size bed, TV, ceiling fan, single couch, dresser, nightstand with bedside lamp, a spacious walk-in closet and a bassinet. Enjoy the convenience of the exclusive ensuite bathroom.

Bedroom #2 features a comfortable queen-size bed and ceiling fan, perfect for restful nights. A nightstand with a bedside lamp offers ambient lighting for relaxed evenings, and a dresser provides storage for your personal items. Need to catch up on work or simply unwind with a book? A monitor, a dedicated desk and chair provide a comfortable workspace, ensuring you can stay productive or indulge in quiet moments at your leisure.

Bedroom #3 features a cozy queen-size bed, a bedside lamp for evening reading. The walk-in closet offers ample storage for your belongings, and guests have easy access to the main bathroom. Stay comfortable with a ceiling fan, and enjoy entertainment with the included TV.

The Guest bathroom features a tub and shower combination, a toilet bowl, a hair dryer and a vanity sink with mirror. Meanwhile, the Master bathroom offers a his and her's vanity sinks with mirrors, a stand-up shower, a hair dryer and a toilet bowl situated in enclosed area. To enhance your stay, we provide fresh towels, ensuring a refreshing beginning to your day.

Our serene outdoor haven features a sparkling pool, a relaxing hot tub, comfortable outdoor furnishings, and a convenient BBQ grill. Embrace the tranquility as you lounge by the poolside or soak in the hot tub, then gather around the grill to savor delicious meals under the open sky. This inviting space is designed for ultimate relaxation and enjoyment, offering the perfect setting to unwind and create lasting memories with loved ones.

Washer and dryer are conveniently located in the laundry room, offered at no additional charge. Additionally, there are 2 parking spaces available in the driveway. This is a non-smoking property, and this home has Wi-Fi.

We provide a starter supply of liquid soap, dish soap, dishwasher soap, paper towel, toilet paper, and garbage bags.


About the Area

Uncover an idyllic escape in the heart of Bradenton, Florida. This delightful and well-furnished home provides an excellent mix of comfort, convenience, and proximity to the area's top attractions. Situated in a tranquil, family-friendly neighborhood, it offers a serene setting for your visit. Whether your stay is for a week or a month, you‚Äôll instantly feel at home.

Start your adventure by exploring the nearby Bishop Museum of Science and Nature, where you can immerse yourself in the wonders of natural history and the cosmos. For golf enthusiasts, the Bradenton Country Club is a must-visit, offering a premier golfing experience in a beautiful setting.

Culinary delights await you just around the corner. Enjoy authentic Italian flavors at Taverna Toscana, where each dish is crafted with passion and tradition. For a more casual outing, head to O'Bricks Irish Pub & Martini Bar to savor classic pub fare and a variety of drinks. If you prefer dining with a view, Pier 22 provides an exceptional waterfront dining experience with a diverse menu, including sushi, steaks, and seafood.

The stunning beaches of Bradenton are a short drive away, perfect for those looking to bask in the Florida sunshine. Bradenton Beach, Coquina Beach, and Manatee Public Beach offer pristine sands and clear waters, ideal for swimming, sunbathing, and beachcombing. Nature lovers will find paradise at Peace Community Park, Robinson Preserve, and DeSoto National Memorial Park, each providing beautiful trails, kayaking spots, and opportunities to connect with the great outdoors.

Convenience is paramount, and you‚Äôll find all your essentials at the nearby Dollar General. For boating enthusiasts, Twin Dolphin Marina and Regatta Pointe Marina are close by, offering excellent facilities and picturesque views, making it easy to explore the waterways.

Our home is your gateway to the best of Bradenton. Whether you‚Äôre seeking a peaceful retreat, outdoor adventures, or cultural experiences, this home offers the perfect base for your vacation.

The standard pricing is for the first two guests. We understand large families or multiple guests may want to stay, and that is perfectly fine! Please make sure you include the correct number of guests for your reservation. If only booking for one guest, the master bedroom only will be set up and access to other rooms will not be available unless paid for. Prices are intentionally kept low to make affordable for one guest and when calculated with a full house, set to the normal price.

Guest access
Everything! The place is all yours :)
Outdoor grill on pool patio (guest provides propane), heated saltwater pool (during cold weather months) and additional sitting area to relax.
Have fun and games using the mini golf holes and corn hole on the artificial turf.

Other things to note
We want you to have the perfect stay. Let us know if there's anything missing and we will make sure to get it for you!

Please note regarding the heated pool. To have accurate expectations, reading this message is necessary. The pool is heated during cool months, not the summer. Usually, October - May the pool is heated. Also of importance, this is a heated pool and NOT a hot tub. The water will never be hot, it will be warm. Temperature is set to 85 degrees. If by chance the weather is extremely cold, pool temperature may not reach 85 degrees. In short, if it‚Äôs very cold it‚Äôs not likely a time you‚Äôll want to be swimming as again, this is not a hot tub.
Pool heater does not run 24/7. It runs 10 hours a day, per pool pump and heater regulations and standards. If you are trying to swim at 10:00 at night, the pool will not actively be heating and will remain at or near the set temperature.

If you are interested in heating outside of these standards, additional heating can be provided at $25 a day. Advanced notice will need to be given and payment collected for your stay.

Everything mentioned is standard practice for a heated pool. This is not to deter guests, but over recent years, guests expectations have become unreasonable and unrealistic
If your expectations for the pool are anything other than what is listed below, please contact me to set up the cost for additional heating, or feel free to book elsewhere.

Regarding the pool, there are a couple robots that help with leaves falling from the neighbor‚Äôs yard.

The one robot swims at the top and is powered with solar. You can turn off and take out as you wish. There‚Äôs a switch in the back to do so.
There is another robots that crawls on the bottom is wireless and charges with the charger on the back. It works better when the pool pump is not running at night time. It is in the outside covered area, with its charger. There is a green plug cover that you pull out to recharge it. That must be covered back up before putting in the pool. Please make sure you do that part before putting in the water or it will cause damage. Guest will be responsible if item is damaged as it costs over $1,000 and instructions are clearly listed.

To turn it on, simply change the dial where the power button is. You rotate the dial to select the various modes. Just put it on the pool floor mode, the icon located at the 6 o‚Äôclock position.

Keeping leaves out of the pool will be necessary for long term guests as it will block the filter and prohibit the filter from working.

When not visiting the beautiful local beaches, you will probably spend most of your time in and around the private heated and screened in pool. A gas powered fire pit around a seating area, gas BBQ, recreational room with a ping pong table and a couple of kayaks are available.

It really is a perfect location, close to shopping, restaurants, two public boat ramps, golf courses, theme parks in Tampa and Orlando, Siesta Key if you choose to go south to Sarasota, and so much more!

Other things to note
We love pets. Max 2 pets per stay. $250/1st pet. $150/2nd pet. Any service animals will need to submit paperwork and proof of vaccinations.


SUPPLIES


We'll get you started with items such as toilet paper, soap, detergent, and cleaning supplies, however, you will be responsible for purchasing additional if needed.


FAQ's...


Do you offer early check-in or late check-outs?


- No. Our home is in high demand! We use this precious little time we have to prepare the home following the CDC Cleaning Guidelines, as well as to complete any maintenance tasks so your stay is uninterrupted. If additional time is important to you, we recommend booking an additional night for your stay.


Do you allow luggage drop-off for early arrivals or late departures?

- No, unfortunately, we are unable to offer luggage drop-off at this time.



Is the home suitable for children?

- Our home is great fun for children of all ages. We do offer a pack-n-play, baby bath, kid's dinnerware, strollers, and life jackets.




How far is it from the beach?

-We have five great beaches within driving distance. They range from 5-15 miles away.



Can I walk to the beach?

-That depends on how far you have to walk :) 99.9% take a car. There are public places to park and a FREE trolley that drives up and down the coast to be able to check out multiple areas.



Do you offer a cleaning service?
- Yes! If our schedule allows, we can accommodate additional cleaning services on a weekly basis for an added cost. Just ask us!


Can I book on behalf of a friend, family member, or co-worker?
- No. While we would love to host whoever you are booking for, we do need them to book for themselves with their own Airbnb account. You can potentially earn travel credit by referring someone to book their first reservation with Airbnb. Go to Account Settings and click on Invite Friends for more details.


Traveling for a Business Trip?
- For business trips or if you book travel for your company, Airbnb allows designated bookers at companies enrolled in Airbnb for Work to book trips on behalf of others.






SAFETY @ the Pool


*Always have someone 18 and up on Lifeguard Duty and in charge of keeping track of all swimmers.

*Communicate with others the ability of all the swimmers present.

*NO DIVING - the pool has a deeper end, but NOT DEEP ENOUGH FOR DIVING

*Keep doors facing the pool locked at all times.

*Use the life jackets provided as needed. Please let us know if you have a need for larger sizes or want to be sure we do have them available for your trip.

description:

Fenced yard
2 living spaces with large flat screen Smart Tv's

Experience the best getaway at Popeye's Poole Paradise, a beautifully designed 2-bedroom retreat in a peaceful Bradenton neighborhood, minutes away from AMI. The open layout, featuring a spacious living room, fully equipped kitchen, and a bonus living space, ensures quality family time. Step into the outdoor oasis with a heated pool and entertainment amenities. Well-appointed bedrooms promise restful nights. The private garage is stocked with beach essentials for island adventures. This is more than a vacation home; it's designed for lasting memories!

Location:
Nestled in a quiet and beautiful neighborhood in Bradenton, our 2 bedroom single family pool home is the ideal retreat for your family vacation. Just minutes away from Anna Maria Island, you're perfectly positioned between both bridges, providing easy access to the pristine beaches of Anna Maria and Bradenton Beach. The surrounding area is a safe, family-friendly community, ensuring a peaceful and secure environment for your stay.

Property Details:
As you step into our spacious home, you're greeted by an open layout perfect for family time and entertaining. The living room features a large and comfortable couch with an oversized smart TV, doubling as a pull-out queen sleeper sofa for added convenience. The fully equipped kitchen and dining room are perfect for hosting, and a bonus living space behind the kitchen offers another oversized smart TV and a huge sectional for relaxation. This home was just completely furnished, everything is brand new!

Outdoor Space: Escape to the backyard oasis, seamlessly accessible from the dining and living room. This outdoor haven is perfect for entertaining, boasting comfy furniture, a dining table, loungers, smart TV, BBQ, a mini fridge, and much more. Enjoy the heated pool, keep your drinks cold in the outdoor fridge, and grill your favorite meals under the Florida sunshine‚Äîa dream spot to spend your days.

Bedrooms: After a day of sun-soaked adventures, retreat to the bedrooms, each equipped with a smart TV. The primary bedroom features a large, comfy king bed, a beautifully decorated space, a walk-in closet, and a bright, modern en-suite bathroom. The second bedroom offers a queen bed and is conveniently located next to the second bathroom in the home.

Amenities:
Park your car in the private garage, complete with a full-sized washer and dryer for your convenience. The garage also houses beach amenities for your use, including a wagon, beach chairs, umbrella, and more‚Äîeverything you need for a perfect beach day on Anna Maria Island. Property also has a highchair and games for the little ones.

Proximity to Anna Maria Island:
Cross the bridge and immerse yourself in the famous Anna Maria Island experience, featuring seven miles of uninterrupted crystal-clear water and white sand beaches. Explore local beachfront restaurants, charming shops, and indulge in endless outdoor activities that will fill your days with fun and relaxation.

Other things to note
Pool - be careful with the kids
Residential neighborhood
Short drive to AMI

Please note that this starter kit is not intended to last for the duration of your stay, but rather to give you time to get situated. Once these initial supplies are used, it is the guest‚Äôs responsibility to purchase any additional items needed for the remainder of the trip.

TITLE: Renovated Chic Home Near Beaches, IMG & Downtown

name: Renovated Chic Home Near Beaches, IMG & Downtown
description:
This stylishly renovated bungalow blends classic charm with modern comfort. Features include a brand-new kitchen, 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, deck, fenced yard (pet-friendly!), BBQ, fire pit & outdoor shower. Just 20 minutes from Sarasota Airport, it‚Äôs near Anna Maria Island‚Äôs award-winning beaches (Travel+Leisure Best Places to Travel 2024). Also enjoy proximity to downtown Bradenton, Sarasota, St Pete, Tampa, IMG Academy, LECOM Park & scenic kayaking, paddleboarding & hiking in local preserves.

The space
Please note:
- the bungalow is located at an intersection with traffic noise noticeable from the porch, yard, and deck.
- we use small bottles of natural essential oils to create a calming atmosphere. If you're sensitive to scents or have allergies, just let us know ‚Äì we're happy to remove them before your stay.

'The Florida Bungalow' is the newest addition to the family-owned and operated @boutiquerentals_ collection (find us on IG) and thoughtfully designed to blend vintage charm with modern elegance. The interior features chic and comfortable furniture, creating an atmosphere that invites you to relax and unwind.

‚òÜ Accommodates up to six people and four pets.

‚òÜ Fenced yard provides safe play area for furry companions.

‚òÜ Newly renovated and fully stocked kitchen with gas stove, butcher block countertops, French-door refrigerator, farm sink, full-size dishwasher, Nutri Ninja compact blender, as well as a spacious adjoining coffee bar room featuring a coffee maker, French press, iced coffee maker, microwave, and toaster oven.

‚òÜ Newly renovated bathrooms with waterfall showers and bathtub. One of the bathrooms is en-suite, offering private access from the primary bedroom.

‚òÜ Dedicated laptop-friendly workspace (small desk) and fast Wi-Fi for remote work or catching up on emails.

‚òÜ Full-size front-loading LG washer and dryer in separate laundry room. We also provide an iron. ironing board, and drying rack.

‚òÜ Outdoor deck features outdoor shower, dining area, sofa, coffee table, gas grill, sun umbrella, and string lights.

‚òÜ Fire pit in the yard with Adirondack chairs.

‚òÜ Large private driveway equipped with a Level 1 EV charger (110V).

TRAVEL CRIB/PLAY YARD
We offer a travel crib/play yard (40 x 28 x 27.5 inches) with a mattress and fitted sheet for children under 36 inches in height. Please note that other bedding is not provided. Guests must request the travel crib in advance, and there is an additional $25 fee, which will be added to the rate listed at the time of booking.

BEYOND THE BUNGALOW
Bradenton is located on Florida's 'Sun Coast', which boasts the highest number of sunshine days annually. Beyond the bungalow, the Bradenton area offers countless attractions.

üåä Anna Maria Island beckons with its sugar-white sands and crystal-clear waters (8 miles). Popular beach access points include Manatee Beach, Coquina Beach, and Bradenton Beach, each offering family‚Äëfriendly amenities, free parking, restrooms, and calm waters ideal for swimming and relaxation.

üè¢ Downtown Bradenton offers charming historic streets, a picturesque 'Riverwalk' with scenic views of the Manatee River, a vibrant art scene, and waterfront dining options (1.5 miles).

üé≠ Sarasota, a short drive away, is known for its cultural richness and boasts theaters, museums, and botanical gardens, providing a wealth of experiences for visitors (12 miles).

üé® St. Petersburg enchants with its lively arts scene, Salvador Dal√≠ Museum, and waterfront attraction (27 miles).

üéæ Sports enthusiasts will appreciate the proximity to baseball fields LECOM Park (1 mile), and Robert C. Wynn Field at the campus of the State College of Florida, Manatee-Sarasota (3.7 miles), as well as to the IMG Academy, a renowned sports training facility attracting athletes from around the world (3 miles).

üõ∂ Nature lovers can explore the nearby Robinson or Emerson Point Preserve: go for a hike or embark on a scenic kayak, canoe or paddleboard through the mangroves, immersing yourself in the unique ecosystem of the region (6-7 miles).

üö§ With ample space for your boat in our driveway and boat launches located within just minutes from the bungalow, boating enthusiasts can enjoy quick water access for a day of fishing or leisurely cruising (the closest one, Warner's Bayou Boat Ramp, is 3 miles from the bungalow).

‚õ≥Ô∏è Bradenton is also a haven for golf enthusiasts, with lush fairways and challenging landscapes awaiting avid golfers (the closest one, Pinebrook Ironwood Golf Course, is 2 miles from the bungalow).

üóø History buffs can explore the area's historic sites, including the De Soto National Memorial, offering a glimpse into the rich heritage of the region (6 miles).

‚úàÔ∏è Visitors enjoy the convenience of three international airports nearby: Sarasota-Bradenton International Airport/SRQ (8 miles), St. Petersburg-Clearwater International Airport/PIE (31 miles), and Tampa International Airport/TPA (46 miles).

THE BOUTIQUE RENTALS COLLECTION
Owned, designed, and operated by Melinda Martino and Mati Ekholm, the boutique rentals collection includes The Original Bungalow and The Treehouse Bungalow in the Catskills, The Brooklyn Inn in New York City, and The Florida Bungalow in Bradenton on the Gulf of Mexico Coast. These short and mid-term rentals are designed to be your comfortable and stylish home-away-from-home.

Unlike hotels and 'professional host Airbnbs,' our spaces offer more character and charm, and we take pride in providing a personalized and special experience. We are always ready to answer your questions and ensure a 5-star stay. We strive to offer more than just a place to stay; we hope you create lasting memories in our rentals.

HOUSE RULES
* Check in after 4 pm; check out before 11 am. Sometimes we can offer early check-in and/or late check-out. Inquire if you are interested.

* Please take off your outdoor shoes at the door as it will keep the house much cleaner (and it's a Swedish custom - your hosts are Swedes). Please note that our cleaners will be able to tell if shoes have been worn inside and in these cases we will use the deposit/file a claim to cover the additional cleaning costs.

* No parties or events

* Four well-behaved and house trained pets per stay are allowed under the condition that they are included in the reservation. Pets left unattended at the bungalow must be in a crate or pet carrier. Pet waste must be picked up and discarded.

* If you have a complaint about any aspect of the property, you are obligated to reach out to us immediately and it cannot wait until after checkout or addressed in a review. Upon voicing this complaint to us, you are authorizing us to come into the property and to repair, or solve the issue.

* No smoking or vaping inside or on the porch.

* The booking is only for the number of people in the reservation and only registered guests are allowed to stay overnight in the house. We do not allow additional people.

* Do not use our bungalow for any illegal activity.

* Please note that wi-fi is not guaranteed. We are not responsible for power outages and weather conditions.

TITLE: 20% Off Monthly stays-Oasis Escape: Private Pool!
Listing Name: 20% Off Monthly stays-Oasis Escape: Private Pool!
name: 20% Off Monthly stays-Oasis Escape: Private Pool!
description:
3 BR / 2 BA / Sleeps 6

The space
Master bedroom - King bedroom with en-suite bath, ROKU enabled TV, and large walk-in closet.

Second bedroom - Queen bedroom with wall mounted ROKU enabled TV and shared bathroom in the hallway.

Third bedroom - Two twin beds with shared bathroom in the hallway plus rollaway twin stored in close. Wall-mounted ROKU enabled TV



______________________________________________________________________________

AMENITIES


NOTE: One well-behaved small dog is welcome with pre-approval AND a pet fee. Check with the property manager before booking. The pet fee is not added into the rental amount and will be charged once approved and added to your reservation. NO CATS


Garage - One car with ample driveway parking.

Spacious living room kitchen combo with large screen TV enabled with DISH satellite channels.

WIFI/Cable

Outdoor private pool with screened patio. *Pool can be heated in cooler months (November-April) for an additional charge of 35.00 day. Must be requested before arrival.

Propane grill for outdoor cooking.

2 Beach Chairs, 1 small cooler, 1 Beach Umbrella

Large outdoor area with ample seating and one dining table near the pool

Fenced-in backyard with hammock in the yard.

Fully stocked modern kitchen.

Full-size washer/dryer in garage

Professionally cleaned and sanitized per CDC guidelines between each guest stay. PLEASE NOTE- For extended stays of 60 days or more we require a mid-stay clean be done by our cleaners. A member of our team will reach out upon your booking to coordinate the fee and scheduling.

_____________________________________________________________________________

FULL DESCRIPTION


You will feel right at home in this lovely, updated family and dog-friendly, heated pool home located in sunny Bradenton, Florida. Let your well-behaved furry friend check out the backyard as it‚Äôs fenced-in and private. (prior approval for your dog required). Please note the home has a private regular-sized pool and the park nearby has an Olympic-sized pool.


This comfortable private home is located just 1 mile away from John H. Marble Park with tennis courts, a basketball court, public swimming pool and much more. Take a short stroll to the neighborhood park and enjoy the family time under the roof providing shade and multiple picnic tables for brunch on a lovely Sunday afternoon or anytime you wish. Play basketball or bring your tennis racquet because both these courts are available. Prefer an Olympic-sized swimming pool over your private swimming pool? No problem because this park has one. It has 6 lanes from 4 to 12 ft. deep for those who love to swim laps‚Ä¶. jump in!


Plenty of world-class beaches all close by. Try a different one every day. Bradenton Beach is 22 minutes, Lido Beach is 25 minutes and Anna Maria Island is 28 minutes. Holmes Beach and Coquina Beach are both 30 minutes and Siesta Key Beach is 35 minutes. Plenty of convenient shopping and restaurants all within 3 minutes. 2 hours and 40 minutes to Disney Parks. i75 is 10 minutes away, so moving north or south in the state is a breeze. Downtown Sarasota is 18 minutes and downtown St. Pete is 40 minutes. Tampa and Ybor City is only 47 minutes away and this place even makes sense for some of the Tampa conferences where hotel rooms can be pricy. Great public golfing about 22 minutes.


Plenty of shopping nearby, too. The famous Ellenton Outlets is only 18 minutes away and the brand new huge Mall at University Town Center is only 13 minutes away. Walmart Supercenter is 4 minutes (just 1 mile) and the nearest Publix supermarket is 6 minutes or 1.7 miles.


Walk into the house through the 2-car garage into the kitchen. It's fully stocked with dishes, stemware and basic appliances. Nicely updated with white cabinets, large pantry, new tile floors and stainless-steel appliances. There is plenty of counter space to easily prepare all your meals if you prefer.


The living room space is comfortably furnished with sofa and chairs. Enjoy the Wi-Fi and Direct Streaming TV on the 46" Samsung. Sliders in the living room open up into the enclosed patio. Enjoy a meal out on the patio as there is a dining table for 4 people. Just enter through the patio door to the optionally heated swimming pool that is also enclosed. On the end of the pool under shade is a sitting area with outdoor love seat, coffee table and two chairs. Relax with a glass of wine and enjoy the fresh air.


The second bedroom has a queen bed decorated with neutral colors of beige and soft white. A large window allows the morning sun to gently roll in. Wood tile floors are comfortably cool under your suntanned feet. The third bedroom has two twin beds that can be pushed together to make one king bed. Another twin mattress is available to use with a stow-away bed frame. Extra sheets are available.


PLEASE NOTE- For extended stays of 60 days or more we require a mid-stay clean be done by our cleaners. A member of our team will reach out upon your booking to coordinate the fee and scheduling.


Should you want to bring your well-behaved dog, no problem. Prior written approval is required however along with a pet fee.

Pool heat is available for the cooler months. Please let us know before arrival date if you want to heat the pool as there is an extra charge that will be applied. We only want to cover the cost to heat the pool.

Other things to note
Please note that we may collect additional information from you after confirming your booking (usually an email address) in order to comply with local regulations and to provide the best possible experience.

name: Coastal Oasis/big pool heating option /3bd2bth
description:
Welcome to "Coastal Oasis ‚Äù where every detail has been thought of for your ultimate comfort and satisfaction.
Our home has been newly renovated and is located in the quiet and residential area of Whitfield Estates, close to many world-class beaches and attractions such as Lido Beach, Siesta Key, The Ringling Museum of Art, Jungle Gardens, Downtowns and Sarasota International Airport. We look forward to seeing you and hope you enjoy it!

The space
Coastal Oasis is a single-family home that has 3 bedrooms and 2 baths. It features a large and open living room and dining space, with a fully equipped and functional kitchen ideal for entertainment.

There is also a very spacious master suite with a king bed, doubled bunk bed with twin size mattresses, walk-in closet and bathroom with a shower and double sink vanity. The master opens to the pool.

The second bedroom has a queen bed, a pull-out couch bed, walk-in closet and a full bathroom.

The third bedroom is very spacious with two queen beds, a pull-out couch bed, full closet and opens to the patio.

This spacious and cozy home is equipped with Wi-Fi, and four smart TV's, located one in each bedroom and one in the living room.

Step outside to your private oasis, where a screened heated pool invites you to cool off year-round or just relax in our lounge chairs. Pool heater is available at an extra fee per day. Just let us know if you would like to enjoy this amenity.

The outdoor seating is perfect for sipping your morning coffee or enjoying a cocktail at sunset by the pool. Fire up the grill and host a barbecue or gather around our cozy backyard fire pit for the perfect night with your family.

There is a full-size washer and dryer, iron and ironing board. Beach chairs, towels and an air pump are also available for your use. We also provide hair dryers in each bathroom for your convenience.

Our home is Baby/Child friendly. We have a play pen, highchair, plastic silverware, cups and plates ready for your little one.

Please enjoy your stay and make yourself at home!

Guest access
Guest will have access to the entire property except for the locked closet in the master bathroom. This is for the owners, please respect their privacy.

Other things to note
- Self Check-in with a smart lock. You will be provided a personalized code prior to your arrival.

- We provide a BBQ grill with propane gas.

- Pool Heater is available for an extra fee per day of your stay, it is kept at 92 Fahrenheit degrees, and it will run for 8 hours from 10am to 6pm.
**PLEASE NOTE pool heater needs to be booked and paid for before your arrival a week or at least 3 days in advance it needs to be turned on by our staff and we need to make proper arrangements on time to have it ready for your use. Otherwise we won‚Äôt be able to provide the service, thanks for understanding.

- We have cameras ONLY outside for everyone's safety. They are located by the front door, driveway and around the back of the house. They record video and audio at all times.

- Quiet hours are from 10pm to 8am. Please remember you are in a residential area, be respectful of your neighbors.

You'll be staying in someone's home, please treat it with care and respect. Everything is well kept for your comfort and satisfaction, please enjoy your stay!

name: Private Pool + Tropical Vibes - Vacation Mode!
description:
NEW, refreshed spaces and photos! All new privacy fencing, additional landscaping and an interior refresh, just in time for your sunny getaway!

Welcome to The Palm, a spacious and open concept home with privacy for our guests! Large family groups will find plenty of room to relax and our heated pool provides hours of fun and relaxation for all. We think we've thought of everything - just pack your bags and come stay a while!

The space
We're excited to offer you a beautiful vacation home with some amazing amenities to make your stay truly enjoyable.

You can focus on your vacation and not worry about extra expenses at our place. We offer free pool heat during your stay, so you can enjoy the pool even on cooler days.

Our home is conveniently located just 5 miles from the best beaches in SW FL, making it easy for you to explore and enjoy the area's natural beauty. With 4 bedrooms (including 2 king beds), our spacious layout is perfect for large groups. The open concept kitchen and living spaces make it easy for everyone to gather and spend time together.

Outside, you'll find a private backyard with a large heated pool and outdoor games, perfect for entertaining or just relaxing. And don't worry about staying connected, we offer fast, free WiFi so you can stay in touch with friends and family.

Finally, we provide everything you need for a complete beach vacation, so you can just pack your bags and enjoy your stay at The Palm.

Guest access
*Access to entire, private home
*Self check-in at any time after 4:00pm - convenient for traveling families and late arrivals

Other things to note
‚Ä¢ All linens and towels provided (bath and beach)
‚Ä¢ Pack n Play with sheets provided; highchair provided
‚Ä¢ Gas grill with propane tank is provided. We do not refill the tank, so when it goes empty, please feel free to exchange the tank at a local gas station or Home Depot for around $20.
‚Ä¢ Washer and dryer available for guest use (laundry detergent provided)
‚Ä¢ Board games and playing cards, including our favorite - Anna Maria Islandopoly!
‚Ä¢ Beach equipment provided - chairs, blanket, sand toys, umbrella & cooler, beach wagon!
‚Ä¢ Other amenities included: toilet paper, paper towels, dish soap, dishwasher detergent, hand soap. We provide a starter supply of these items and more can be purchased nearby if needed during your stay.
‚Ä¢ Tons of restaurants and shops close by!

ATTENTION: If you are looking for a party house, DO NOT BOOK. Property is ideal for family vacations.

HOUSE RULES

- ID to be provided upon request.
- No wet clothing or swim suits on the indoor furniture please.
- No check-outs allowed on Thanksgiving Day or Christmas Day.
- Only the person that booked the reservation will be allowed to check-in and you must have a valid working phone number. Guest who books the property must be staying at the property for the duration of the reservation.
- Maximum number of guests is 12 people at this property. 8 adults maximum.
- 4 cars MAX at the home at all times - please park on the driveway. No street parking allowed.
- Safety in and around the pool is sole responsibility of guests while you are here. Children should never be left unattended while in or around the pool area.

Welcome to our stunning Sarasota Airbnb! This exquisite property offers the ultimate blend of luxury, comfort, and convenience, making it the perfect choice for your vacation in sunny Florida.

The space
Welcome to our charming Sarasota getaway! Nestled in the heart of Florida's Gulf Coast, this delightful Airbnb property offers a perfect blend of relaxation and escape. Located in the vibrant city of Sarasota, known for its stunning beaches, cultural attractions, and vivid arts scene, our vacation rental provides an ideal home base for exploring everything this coastal paradise has to offer.

As you step inside, you'll be greeted by a bright and inviting space that exudes coastal charm. The open-concept living area is tastefully decorated, featuring comfortable furnishings and large windows that flood the space with natural light. Kick back and relax on the plush sofa or catch up on your favorite shows on the flat-screen TV. The fully equipped kitchen is more than enough for any cook‚Äôs needs, complete with modern appliances, ample counter space, and all the essentials you need to whip up delicious meals. Enjoy your creations at the adjacent dining area, where a stylish table awaits, perfect for intimate meals with loved ones.

When it's time to rest and rejuvenate, you'll find three cozy bedrooms that provide a peaceful sanctuary. As well as a renovated kid‚Äôs bunk suite that comfortably sleeps 8. Each room is thoughtfully designed with your comfort in mind, soft bedding, ample storage space, and a serene ambiance.

The highlight of this Sarasota retreat is undoubtedly its outdoor vibe. Step outside to discover a private patio equipped with a blackstone grill and fire pit family dining table, along with more comfortable seating, where you can savor your morning coffee or enjoy a meal while basking in the warm Florida sunshine. For those seeking relaxation, take a dip in the pool, surrounded by lush landscaping. Or if you prefer some active fun, head to the nearby beaches and indulge in swimming, sunbathing, or water sports.

Conveniently located, our Airbnb property offers easy access to the area's top attractions. Explore the vibrant downtown area, filled with art galleries, boutique shops, and award-winning restaurants. Immerse yourself in culture at the Ringling Museum of Art or catch a performance at the Sarasota Opera House. And, of course, don't miss the breathtaking sunsets at Siesta Key Beach, consistently ranked among the world's best beaches. Whether you're seeking a relaxing beach getaway or an action-packed adventure, our Sarasota retreat is the perfect choice. Book your stay today and create unforgettable memories in this coastal haven.
