description:
Looking for warm place to experience gulf coast Florida life style? This home features 3Br/2Ba with office and a private heated salt water pool/hot tub. The home is located in a golf country club with rich amenities like 4 pools, a championship golf course, tennis, Pickleball, club house, social events and more. The home is in a desirable location, 5 mins to costco, short drive to all the beaches, shops and restaurants, an Ideal place for snowbirds and coastal lovers to enjoy the sunshine!

The space
THE PROPERTY ‚Äî
2071 Sq ft | Gated Quiet community | 28 nights minimum |Golf and country club membership | Sunny Private Pool| Free WiFi | outdoor dining | BBQ| Beach Gear

Bedroom 1: King bed | Bedroom 2: Queen Bed | Bedroom 3: two twin beds | Office: folding bed for extra guests | many extra linens

RIVER STRAND GOLF & COUNTRY CLUB:
our house is located in a 5 star River Strand Golf & Country Club. A resort style club full of amenities includes:Game room, 24-hour fitness center, golf, 4 Olympic-size pools, spa, tiki bar, club house, restaurant and bar, social events, 24 holes championship Golf club, tennis center, basketball court, pickle ball courts, business center & more .( Club house amenities is for 30+ stay only.)

STEP OUTSIDE:
Private heated salt water south facing sunny pool and hot tub in a large screened lanai w/ 6 seats outdoor dining table, ceiling fan & lake views; two pool lounge chairs, two Adirondack chair, pool toys in a pool container, and a 3 burner BBQ grill for you to enjoy Florida life style.

INTERIOR LIVING:
Coastal-themed interior, 2 cable TVs in living room and family room, and TV in master bedroom and kids twin bedroom, six seat formal dining table, ceiling fans in each room, office with view to the pool and lake view, executive office desk and chair

KITCHEN:
Fully equipped, granite countertops, drip coffee maker, cooking basics, complimentary spices, breakfast bar, tea kettle, and more

GENERAL:
Central heating & A/C, linens & towels provided, free high-speed WiFi, complimentary toiletries, private washer/dryer in-unit

Utility:
For monthly stay, All utilities are included with a cap on electricity at $200/month.

PARKING:
Two car garages, drive way ok, and no overnight street parking .

POOL AND HOT TUB: We have salt water heated pool and hot tub, and can be heated separately. However, the heating fee is not included. If you like both pool and hot tub to be heated, we ask $65/day for the heating cost. If you just want to heat the hot tub only, we ask $30/day to heat the hot tub to 100F degree, and the pool only will be $35/day to heat to 80F degree. And all require 3 days minimum with 48 hours notice. Discount will be available for 30+ days stay!


PET POLICY:
Small dog or cat under 20lbs are ok, two pets maximum, we charge pet fee ($10/night/pet) , and extra pet cleaning fee $200.

CLUB POLICY:
You have to have the club membership to access the amenities in our resort (both golf and social). In order to have the membership, you have to stay for 30+ days to qualify for the membership transfer. There will be one time transfer fee at $535+tax which you pay to the club house directly on your arrival. you will get two membership card with your picture on and one car transponder for the gate.

The golf tee time fee will be in member's rate and varied in season and time of the day. you can check our resort's website for detail.

The restaurant in our club house is open to public, no need for club membership.



--Other POLICIES --
- No smoking
- No events, parties, or large gatherings
- No outdoor light and noise after 10pm

Guest access
Entire home

Other things to note
Gate access:
Our home is in a gated private community with 24/7 guard on duty. We have multiple gates in our community. only the main gate has live guards on duty, all the other gates are required for car transponder only.
For your first time visit, you will need to go through the main gate with your ID and the house info you visit. Your GPS will take you to the side gate, so the best way is to put our club house address on your GPS for your first time visit. ( The club house address will be on your check in instruction.)
Once you activate your club membership, you will have a car-transponder which will allow you to access from each gate automatically.

description:
3 Bedrooms & 2 Bathroom Home with Private Heated Pool, Lounge Seating Area and More

The space
Newly renovated in 2022. this gorgeous 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom private pool home is located just 10 minutes from Anna Maria Island.

The moment you walk into the door you will notice the great attention to detail, inside and outside, and your vacation will be off to a wonderful start. Go for a swim in the heated pool, gather for a meal around the outside dining table, or turn on the Edison lights above the lounge area at night and make unforgettable memories with friends and family.

The master bedroom has a king size bed, large TV, and en-suite bathroom with double vanity and walk-in shower. The second bedroom also has a king size bed and TV, the third bedroom two twin beds and a small office desk. The second and third bedroom share a hallway bathroom with shower/ tub combination.

The open living, dining and kitchen floorplans invites the whole family to spend time together after a long day at the beach. The kitchen boasts quartz countertops, stainless steel appliances and is equipped with everything you need to prepare breakfast, lunch, dinner and more. The countertop offers seating for two, and six more comfortable spots are available at the dining table. The living room offers plenty of plush seating for everyone and a large smart TV is ideal for movie nights, or to catch up on your favorite show.

Beach essentials such as chairs, umbrella and cooler are available, as well as one parking spot inside the garage and another 3 on the driveway. Robinson Preserve, a 600+ acre nature preserve is only a 10 minute car ride away, and GT Bray, a large recreational park, only 2 minutes by car.

name: Waterfront home, boat dock, ocean access, HOT TUB
description:
Welcome to Dockside Paradise, an absolutely rare find! This large oceanfront home features 4 large bedrooms, 3 full baths, and 9 beds (easily sleeps 14), with direct access to the Manatee River. Guests have access to a boat dock and lift that can accommodate boats up to 26 feet, with additional sea wall parking for extra boats or jet skis.

The space
This home provides a luxurious master suite upstairs with an expansive walk-in closet. Downstairs, you'll find an en-suite bedroom, 2 more bedrooms, two living areas, and a game room, providing ample space for relaxation.
The backyard oasis boasts a pool, canal deck, boat dock, and a kayak launching floater. With plenty of parking, waterfront access, and the chance to spot manatees right from the backyard, you can enjoy a unique experience of Florida living right here at this vacation home. Dockside Paradise offers a perfect getaway!

Dockside Paradise is centrally located in Bradenton and Palmetto city. Nearby attractions include:
‚Ä¢ Emerson Point Preserve on Snead Island (2.5 miles): A great spot to watch sunsets and/or walking trails.
‚Ä¢ Palmetto/Bradenton fishing pier (2 miles): A great place to fish, watch the sunset or go for an evening stroll.
‚Ä¢ LECOM Park (3.8 miles): Home of the Pittsburgh Pirates' spring training.
‚Ä¢ Bradenton Riverwalk (3 miles)
‚Ä¢ Bradenton Yacht Club (1.4 miles)
‚Ä¢ Public boat ramp (2 miles)
‚Ä¢ Downtown Palmetto (1 mile)
‚Ä¢ Downtown Bradenton (3 miles)
‚Ä¢ Ana Maria Island's beaches (less than 12 miles)
‚Ä¢ Ringling Museum: Italian-influenced architectural wonder in Florida (less than 12 miles)
‚Ä¢ Historic fishing village of Cortez: where seafarers hauling in their daily catch on sea-weathered boats (12.5 miles)
‚Ä¢ Sarasota Bradenton International Airport (14 miles)
‚Ä¢ St. Armands Circle on Lido Key (17 miles)
‚Ä¢ Siesta #1 Beach in the US (22 miles)
‚Ä¢ Tropicana Field (24 miles): The ballpark of Major League Baseball‚Äôs Tampa Bay Rays
‚Ä¢ St. Pete Beach (24 miles): Home of award-winning beaches
‚Ä¢ St. Pete Pier (30-minute drive): 26 acres of water sports, parks, restaurants, and outdoor concerts

For dining, there are many popular waterfront restaurants nearby. A couple of our favorites are Riverhouse (5 minutes) and Pier 22 (8 minutes).
For those who love to cook and grill, Detwiler's Farm Market, a local favorite grocery store, is 3 miles away, and Publix Super Market is 2 miles away.

Be your own chef in a fully stocked kitchen equipped with name brand appliances, the latest cookware, dishes, utensils, and a spice rack with 16 jars of different spices. A blender, mixer, rice cooker, waffle maker, dinnerware, silverwares, kitchen linens and food wrap are all available for your convenience.

For all you coffee and tea enthusiasts, there is a coffee and tea bar furnished with an espresso/coffee machine, kettle and all the provisions.

Laundry room is available on-site equipped with large washer, dryer and laundry supplies.

Beach gear, including a beach bag, 4 chairs, 2 umbrellas, and a wagon, is available and ready for your beach day.

Traveling with small children? You can pack lighter because we have Pack n' Play, highchair, and kid's dinnerware.

For your peace of mind, surveillance cameras are located around the exterior of the house (front, back, and both sides). There are no inside cameras.

Being located on the water, mosquitoes are unavoidable, and you may encounter a few during your stay. Please also be mindful of Florida biting midges, noseeums and gnats. Although pest control treatments are scheduled quarterly, we cannot fully prevent these insects. We recommend using gnat and mosquito repellent spray when you are outside.
Other "uninvited nature guests," such as lizards, centipedes, frogs, and crabs may also roam around the house.

By booking with us you're agreeing to our following terms and conditions.

Guest access
Guests will have access to entire house except for the owner closets

Other things to note
TERMS AND CONDITIONS OF RENTAL AND LIABILITY WAIVER

SMOKING/ VAPING:
Smoking and vaping are STRICTLY PROHIBITED in the house. This includes e-cigarettes. Smoking is allowed in the back yard with the door closed. Cigarette butts must be picked up.

MUSIC & NOISE:
Parties/Events are not allowed. No rowdy or loud music at any time.

QUIET HOURS:
We are located in a residential neighborhood so please observe quiet hours from 10:00 PM to 8:00 AM. We want to continue to share our property so this is very important.
Guests are responsible for any fines if police are called.

PETS: Prior approval is required. We allow up to 2 dogs, $250/each per stay.
- Must be fully house trained
- Must be completely cleaned up after ($250 additional charge if violated)
- Leashed at all times when not in fenced area
- Crated indoors when not home with the pet
- If barking becomes an issue during your stay, alternative arrangements must be made
- Not allowed on furniture, bedding, or inside the pool and spa.

CHECK IN AND CHECK OUT:
Check in is after 4pm. Check out is 10:00am. Guests with unauthorized late check out will be charged $50 per 30-minute increment after 10:00am, plus additional charge if it results in canceling of incoming guests.

USE OF PROPERTY:
Keep the property, appliances, and all furnishings in good order. Guests may not make any changes to the property and must put furnishings back to its original placement if moved.

MINIMUM AGE REQUIREMENTS:
We take reservations only from adult guests age 21 and older. The Guest who reserves the property must be on site the full duration of your stay.

PARKING:
Parking is limited to 6 vehicles. Vehicles are to be parked in the driveway. Parking on the road is not permitted. Illegally parked cars are subject to towing; applicable fines/towing fees are the sole responsibility of the vehicle owner.

POOl/SPA:
No glass product whatsoever in or around the pool or spa. We make every attempt to keep the pool/spa as clean as possible, but it is not unusual to find unexpected debris or some mineral stains in the pool/spa because it‚Äôs located outdoor. Guest have the option to purchase pool heat, which includes spa heat for $35 per day or $500/month (b/w Oct to May). The pool/spa settings are all on schedule. Pool heat is set to 85 degrees and 95 degrees for spa after purchase. However, if air temps drop below 60 degrees it can affect pool temperature, so unfortunately pool temperatures cannot be guaranteed. No refund, discount, credit, and/or rate adjustments can be given for circumstances beyond our control. GUEST ACKNOWLEDGES THAT POOLS/SPA ARE INHERENTLY DANGEROUS, AND GUEST HEREBY ACCEPTS ALL RISK OF PERSONAL INJURY OR DEATH FROM THE USE OF THE POOL OR SPA AND SHALL HOLD PROPERTY OWNERS HARMLESS FROM ANY SUCH INJURY OR DEATH.

HOUSEKEEPING:
There is no daily housekeeping service.

GARBAGE:
Garbage is collected Monday and Thursday (except for holidays). Recycling is collected on Monday.

GAS GRILL:
Grill and tank are provided, please refill propane at local Publix or CVS (right around the corner) as needed. Please empty grease drip tray, turn off the gas valve securely after each use.

KAYAKS AND EQUIPMENT
We have 2 tandem kayaks available for our guests to use. Since they belong to us and are located on our property, we require guests to accept the liability waiver below whether they use the kayaks or not.

I, hereby, for myself, my family members, my friends, and all guests who are staying with me ("WE", "OUR", "OURS", "US") and use the kayaks of Premier Vacation Stay located at 905 25th Ave W, Palmetto, FL 34221 (the "Rental Property"), knowingly and voluntarily enter into this waiver and release of liability. WE hereby waive any and all rights, claims, or causes of action of any kind whatsoever arising out of OUR participation in kayaking (the "Activity"), and do hereby release and forever discharge the owner and the management team at this Rental Property from any physical or psychological injury, including but not limited to illness, paralysis, death, damages, economic or emotional loss, that WE may suffer as a direct result of OUR participation in the aforementioned Activity, including traveling to and from an event related to this Activity.
WE understand that these injuries or outcomes may arise from OUR own or others' negligence, conditions related to travel, or the condition of the activity location(s). Nonetheless, WE assume all related risks, both known and unknown to US, of OUR participation in this Activity, including travel to, from, and during the Activity.
In addition, WE understand that WE are fully responsible for returning the kayaks, paddles, life vests, and all other equipment belonging to the Rental Property in the same condition as they were found. WE agree to clean the kayaks and the equipment with fresh water (using the hose from the side of the house) and store it on the rack in the garage as it was before OUR use. Failure to do so will result in an additional $250 charge for these services, up to the cost of replacement for new equipment and/or new kayaks in case the kayaks are lost at sea.

The terms and conditions of this waiver only apply when guests/renters are using the kayaks and the equipment from the Rental Property.


LIABILITY/RISK:
The Owners are not responsible for any accidents, injuries, or illness that occur while on the premises. The Owners are also not responsible for any accidents, injuries, or illness that occur off the premises while using equipment provided as part of the rental, such as kayaks, golf carts, beach chairs, bikes, beach umbrellas, and beach wagons. The Owners are not responsible for the loss of personal belongings or valuables of the guest.

By accepting this reservation, all guests expressly assume the risk of any harm arising, including death, from their use of the premises and equipment taken off the premises. This also applies to others whom the guest invites to use the premises or equipment.

TITLE: Queen Palm - Private Pool, Beach, Pet-Friendly!
Listing Name: Queen Palm - Private Pool, Beach, Pet-Friendly!
name: Queen Palm - Private Pool, Beach, Pet-Friendly!
description:
3 BR /2 BA / Sleeps 6

The space
Master Bedroom - King bed with en-suite bathroom with walk-in shower, double vanities, large walk-in closet and TV

Guest Bedroom 1 - Queen size bed

Guest Bedroom 2 - Queen size bed


*both guest bedrooms have access to hallway bathroom tub/shower combination*


______________________________________________________________________________

AMENITIES


One small well-behaved dog would be considered with a paid pet fee of 200.00 plus tax. Check with the property manager for approval before booking. NO CATS

Saltwater Pool

The Air Conditioner is locked to not go below 72 at this home per owner request.

Professionally cleaned and sanitized per CDC guidelines between each guest stay. PLEASE NOTE- For extended stays of 60 days or more we require a mid-stay clean be done by our cleaners. A member of our team will reach out upon your booking to coordinate the fee and scheduling.

Centrally located between Bradenton and Sarasota

Seven minutes from the Sarasota/ Bradenton airport.

Garage is not available for guest use however driveway can accommodate two cars.

Outdoor private saltwater pool with covered seating areas. (Pool can be heated in cooler months (November - April) for an additional 35.00 a day. Please let us know before arrival so it is heated when you arrive.

Propane grill for outdoor cooking.

Beach chairs, Beach Umbrella, and 1 small cooler

Small outdoor refrigerator for keeping drinks cool.

Large spacious living room with 60 inch TV and two leather sofas and a chair

Family room with comfortable leather seating and a desk and storage cabinet, perfect for remote workers.

Fully stocked modern kitchen

Dining area for up to six people

Laundry room with Full-size washer and dryer

Free WIFI at 400 MBPS

Streaming cable

No Smoking in the home!


_____________________________________________________________________________

FULL DESCRIPTION


Welcome, to Queen Palm Pool Home!


This tropical oasis will fulfill all your dreams and aspirations you may have for a vacation rental. This 1700 square feet 3 bedroom, 2 bath home is equipped with beautiful tile floors, stainless steel appliances, Corian countertops in the kitchen and bathrooms, a washer and dryer, and all amenities you may think of. Enjoy the convenience of a one-story home on a spacious lakefront lot with high ceilings and french doors that lead out to your own secluded private saltwater pool and seating area. Sit back and relax in the quiet outdoor space sipping on a cool drink and enjoying nature and the warm feeling of the sun. In the evening the pool has colored lights that add to the ambiance of this outdoor space. Prepare a meal and sit out at the outdoor dining table for an alfresco meal and relax from of day of sightseeing or beach activities. (Pool can be heated in cooler months (November - April) for an additional 35.00 a day. Please let us know before arrival so it is heated when you arrive.


The living room is spacious and has two leather sofas that are perfect for watching your favorite programming on the large screen Smart TV. The master bedroom has a king-size bed, an en-suite bathroom with a master shower, double vanity, and a large spacious walk-in closet and a TV to relax and watch your favorite show at the end of the day. This master suite has two double french doors that lead to the pool or in cooler months left open for a cool breeze while you sleep. Both guest rooms have queen beds and access to a hallway bathroom with a tub/shower combination. The family room has comfortable leather seating and a large deck with a storage cabinet if you need to work or catch up on emails. The pool area has two covered seating areas, chaise lounges, a storage area for pool toys, and a propane BBQ grill. The pool area overlooks a lake and you'll want to spend most of your time in this outdoor oasis.


The garage in this home is not available for use however, plenty of driveway parking is available.


PLEASE NOTE- For extended stays of 60 days or more we require a mid-stay clean be done by our cleaners. A member of our team will reach out upon your booking to coordinate the fee and scheduling.


This home is located just 9 miles (20-minute drive) from the University Town Center Mall which is great for shopping and upscale restaurants. The Sarasota/Bradenton airport is only 7 minutes away (3.7 miles) and downtown Sarasota is 14 minutes (6.9 miles). There is a Publix grocery store at Bayshore Gardens that is 8 minutes away (2.6 miles) and a Walmart Neighborhood Market that is just 9 minutes away (4.6 miles) to stock up on snacks, drinks, and food items or last-minute items you forgot to pack for the trip. No trip to Sarasota would be complete without going to one of the world-class beaches nearby. Siesta Key Beach is a 31-minute drive (13.3 miles) or Lido Key Beach is 22 minutes (9 miles). Check out St Armand's Circle near Lido Key Beach for additional shopping and great restaurant choices. There are many great restaurants within a short car ride such as the Sunnyside Caf√© which among other things has the best lobster roll sandwich in town!! Downtown Sarasota is a short 13-minute drive and abounds with restaurants, rooftop bars, and shopping. Other nearby restaurant selections are Mirna's Cuban, Mama G's Coffee shop for German baked goods, and Anna Maria Oyster Bar on US-41.

Other things to note
Please note that we may collect additional information from you after confirming your booking (usually an email address) in order to comply with local regulations and to provide the best possible experience.

name: Luxury Awaits! 10 Min to AMI, Heated Pool
description:
Private Heated Pool, Pool Table, Ping Pong, High Quality Finishes, Free WiFi, Sleeps 8

The space
Luxury awaits you as you step into our Sandy Toes & Salty Kisses Villa. High quality finished throughout, a tall airy ceiling and open floorplan concept in the main living area, custom designed bathrooms with lots of attention to detail, a private heated pool and so much more make this vacation home stand out from all the others.

You are always close to the water. Just a two minute stroll away is Rose Park, which is located right by Palma Sola Bay. Walk out on the deck, which faces West, and capture some unforgettable pictures with family and friends as the sun sets in the background. During the day, take a drive to Anna Maria Island, just 10 minutes away, and spend countless hours at the beach, go shopping on Pine Avenue, or eat at one of the many great restaurants.

The grand master bedroom with en-suite bathroom is a dream come true. A king size bed with large TV, connecting private bathroom with dual sink vanity, walk-in shower and large jetted soak-in tub will have everyone else jealous. Luckily the other bedrooms are all just as adorable and with two more full size bathrooms there is plenty of availability to get ready in the morning, after a visit to the beach or evening before heading our to dinner.

The second and third bedroom both have queen size beds, smart TVs, and the fourth bedroom offers a daybed with trundle, as well as a small desk area, should the need for work or online school ever arise.

The kitchen is a chef's dream with an oversized dual fridge, farm sink, separate beverage fridge, wall mounted filler faucet, induction stove top, and enough seating for everyone at the bar countertop. The dining area comfortably seats up to 8 people.

The living room area offers lots of seating for everyone in the group and a large wall mounted TV is perfect for catching up on favorite shows or watching big sporting events.

The outdoor area offers a large heated private swimming pool, sun loungers, a seating and dining area, as well as a gas BBQ.

PLEASE NOTE: After successfully booking the home, you will receive an email message with a link to a rental agreement, which will require your online signature.

TITLE: Charming 3BR | Pool | Deck | W/D
Listing Name: Charming 3BR | Pool | Deck | W/D
name: Charming 3BR | Pool | Deck | W/D
description:
The space
Captain America Dream

Located just a short drive from Bradenton Beach, this 3BR/2BA home keeps you close to sandy shores and in-town fun. At home, sunbathe by the sparkling heated pool on the screened lanai in your backyard. Gather around the outdoor firepit on starry nights.

Inside, a comfortable open floor plan invites you to unwind. Highlights include plush furnishings, smart TVs in each bedroom, and a modern kitchen.

LIVING AREA

The living area is outfitted with an extra-large sectional, providing plenty of seating around the wood-burning fireplace. Stream new Netflix releases on the 55‚Äù smart TV.

KITCHEN & DINING

Upscale stainless steel appliances shine next to sleek granite countertops in the kitchen. Serve afternoon snacks at the kitchen bar for four.

At mealtimes, gather around the table for six in the dining area.

BEDROOMS & BATHS

This single-story home sleeps up to six guests in three bedrooms. Each bedroom includes a 42‚Äù smart TV that allows you to log-in to your preferred streaming service.

The master bedroom features a queen-size bed. The en-suite bathroom is configured with a luxe walk-in shower.

The second bedroom offers two twin-size beds, while the third bedroom holds a queen-size bed.

The second bathroom has a tub/shower combination.

OUTDOOR AREAS

Head to the backyard to enjoy the Florida weather on the screened lanai. Ceiling fans provide a gentle breeze as you prepare your catch-of-the-day on the gas grill.

The sparkling pool is also screened-in. Dip in the refreshing water after a fun-filled beach day. An adjacent outdoor half bath provides added convenience.

In the fenced backyard, you‚Äôll find a wood-burning fire pit surrounded by four Adirondack chairs.

EXTRA AMENITIES & MORE DETAILS

Guest amenities include complimentary Wi-Fi, a washer/dryer, and parking for four cars (with two in the garage and two in the driveway).

The backyard pool can be heated upon request for a daily fee of $32.

THE LOCATION

Located near downtown Bradenton, you can drive 5 miles to the Bishop Museum of Science & Nature. Later, be sure to check out the parks, art, and botanical attractions along the Riverwalk. Discover upscale dining and beautiful views of the Manatee River on Memorial Pier.

Travel 7 miles to Coquina Beach to spend blissful days on the soft sand.
No dog(s) are welcome in this home. No other animals are allowed without specific Vacasa approval.

This rental is located on floor 1.

Parking notes: There is free parking available for 4 vehicles.

An optional fee of USD 32 per day plus tax is available to be paid prior to check-in. Guests can contact Vacasa after booking to purchase pool heat for your stay.


Please note: this home resides in a noise-sensitive area and the owners participate in our Good Neighbor protection program. Our smart home technology will alert our team if excessive decibel or occupancy levels are detected, allowing us to reach out directly with a reminder of maximun occupancy and quiet hours. This technology is privacy compliant, and only monitors the presence of decibels and devices -not any personal conversation or information. Thank you for supporting our efforts to be good neighbors!


Damage waiver: The total cost of your reservation for this Property includes a damage waiver fee which covers you for up to $3,000 of accidental damage to the Property or its contents (such as furniture, fixtures, and appliances) as long as you report the incident to the host prior to checking out. More information can be found from the "Additional rules" on the checkout page.

Due to local laws or HOA requirements, guests must be at least 25 years of age to book. Guests under 25 must be accompanied by a parent or legal guardian for the duration of the reservation.

Welcome to Blue Heron House!
‚öìClose proximity to Lakewood Ranch, Sarasota, Tampa, and Gulf Coast Beaches

The space
This open and airy 3 bedroom 2 bath is the perfect vacation pool home and sleeps 8 comfortably. The single-family home is located in Bradenton and situated in a community called "Sabal Harbor". The location is perfect for travelers who are looking to not only travel to the wonderful white sandy beaches of the Gulf Coast but also a close drive to Lakewood Ranch, Sarasota, and I-75. The property is conveniently located close to Publix, Starbucks, WAWA, and several restaurants in the area!

This 3-bedroom property is very spacious with plenty of room for entertaining and has a relaxing tropical vibe throughout the whole house. It also comes with lots of seating if you are just looking to kick back and relax. The kitchen comes with all the appliances you would need to make any meal you miss from home and is fully equipped for your stay. BBQ Grill is also available for your use.

The pool deck is completely screened in and has plenty of seating to hang out on a beautiful Florida day. The pool deck offers an additional location to watch your favorite shows or sports team while hanging out in the pool. You also have access to a propane fire pit which offers the perfect place to enjoy at night. Just outside the screens, you can also see a beautiful view of the pond. For your use, there are also pool toys and floats stored on the deck.

For your enjoyment when renting the property you receive access to the community tennis courts, basketball court, playground, and heated community pool.

Trying to figure out sleeping arrangements? The master bedroom is located in the back of the property with access to the pool and offers a king-size bed and the master bathroom. The additional two bedrooms are located on the right side of the property and share a full bathroom. The master bedroom and second bedroom come with smart TVs. Additional sleeping is offered on the sleeper sofa in the family room.

Master Bedroom - King Bed, Ensuite, Smart TV
Bedroom 2 - Queen Bed, Smart TV

The space
Important: This home can sleep a maximum of 6 adults.

Welcome to our beautiful Viva La Flamingo home. Newly decorated in the fall of 2020, this approximately 1,600 SF private pool home offers plenty of space for everyone. Three bedrooms, two bathrooms, private heated pool, oversized fenced in backyard with tropical landscape design and much more will make your next vacation unforgettable.

Although you will probably be spending lots of time by the pool area, going for a swim or catching some warm sun rays on a lounger, don't forget that the beautiful white sand beaches of Anna Maria Island are only a 10 minute drive away. Downtown Bradenton with plenty of restaurant choices, Riverwalk, LECOM Park baseball stadium and much more is only 10 minutes the other direction.

The large master bedroom has a king size bed, large smart TV, walk-in closet, and an en-suite bathroom with walk-in shower. The second and third bedroom are located on the other side of the house, sharing a hallway guest bathroom with a shower-tub combo. The second bedroom has a king size bed and smart TV, while the third bedroom has a bunk bed and daybed. It is important to note that the third bedroom can accommodate up to 2 adults or 4 children.

The living room has plenty of comfortable seating options and a large smart TV to watch your favorite shows and movies. The kitchen with stainless steel appliances is well equipped with everything you would need to prepare breakfast, lunch and dinner and the dining room comfortably seats 6 people. When the kids are playing outside and you are wanting to catch up on a book, the plush chairs in the dining room can make for a great reading corner and a small desk across the kitchen could be a makeshift work place.

The outdoor space offers a covered patio with outdoor dining table, a propane BBQ, colorful Adirondack chairs, sun loungers, umbrellas and most importantly a newly constructed private heated pool.

PLEASE NOTE: After successfully booking the home, you will receive an email message with a link to a rental agreement, which will require your online signature.

Enjoy a screened-in, heated renovated pool (new pictures coming), vacation-friendly layout, fully stocked kitchen, & ample games & amenities. Located in a great neighborhood, it is within walking distance to historical sites and parks. With only a 5.8 mile drive to the beach and close to eateries and theaters, it is an ideal retreat to create cherished memories.

"Manatee Manor" is a uniquely renovated and beautifully furnished retreat named after Manatee County, the nearby Manatee River, and the Manatee ‚Äúsea cow."

In this charming home, each bedroom reflects the coastal canvas of Florida with pastel-colored walls and unique sea life themes found in the Manatee River. Step into the front hall, appointed by a ‚ÄúManatee‚Äù nautical navigation map, and follow the current of the river-waved painted corridor leading to the poolside family room featuring jellyfish accouterments. From the king-sized bed in the Blue (walled) Dolphin Master Bedroom, and the king-sized bed in the Lilac (walled) Seahorse Bedroom, to the queen-sized bed in the Green Starfish Bedroom to the twin/full bunk beds in the perky yellow turtle room, Manatee Manor is creatively designed to cater to guests‚Äô unique preferences while offering personality and tranquility. The house has a split floor plan and the Master Bedroom boasts a private ensuite bathroom.

The pool cage screen has a NO-SEE-UMS screen a tightly woven mesh to help keep out indigenous Florida gnats and mosquitos which can be rampant. There‚Äôs a real roof-covered patio sitting and dinning area with 2 ceiling fans to ward off Florida sun/heat beating down. The oversized, fenced-in backyard offers privacy, a gas grill, a ping-pong table, large sized Connect Four and corn hole. Plenty of pool rafts, loungers, and beach-related items are provided including coolers, beach chairs, and a beach cart.

Manatee Manor affords a range of amenities for fun, relaxation, and maximum guest comfort. Whip up a delicious meal in the fully equipped kitchen to enjoy around the large family-styled dining table. The kitchen is well-stocked with cooking utensils for all of your culinary creations. Throw your evening meal in the crockpot in the morning and come home to cooked dinner after a relaxing day at the beach, or if you have a hankering for waffles, try the waffle machine for breakfast. Or instead, cook steaks or burgers on the large gas grill located poolside while frying up accompany potatoes in the air fry oven. A spacious indoor dining table or an outdoor covered dining area provides the perfect setting for al fresco meals with family and friends.

Inside, are separate living room and family room areas where families can cozy up together, while also offering separate space to take some quiet time apart from the gathering. TVs are in both sitting areas and the 4 bedrooms. In the front living room, you will find a wide variety of board games for family entertainment, a fooseball table or curl up with a book made available for your enjoyment.

Situated just 5.8 miles away are the stunning Anna Maria Island/Bradenton Beaches with miles of silky white sand and an array of restaurants. Manatee Manor provides the perfect location for beach lovers and outdoor enthusiasts.

For nature lovers and history buffs, within less than 2 miles of Manatee Manor, you will find outdoor attractions like the DeSoto National Memorial National Park, Robinson Preserve (offering kayak rentals and trails and the ‚Äúnest‚Äù play area), and Palma Sola Botanical Gardens. They provide a glimpse into the rich cultural and natural heritage of Florida.

With easy access to beaches, a family-friendly neighborhood, and a heated pool, "Manatee Manor" is the ideal retreat to float away your cares and create cherished memories that will last a lifetime. Reserve your stay today to embrace the allure of this delightful coastal getaway.

Guest access
Guests have full access to over 2,200 SF of living area of the house except for a small secondary closet and an upper cabinet in the utility room reserved for the cleaners. Guests also have access to the entire outdoor permitter. There is no garage access.

Other things to note
CLEANLINESS
Surfaces are cleaned and sanitized between guests. Pillows are encased with protectors. Mattresses and box springs are fully encased with allergen/bed bug zipped protectors. Mattresses are further topped with waterproof mattress covers. Linens are cleaned after guests' stay. A washer and dryer is also available for guests' use.

POOL AND BEACH ITEMS
The pool was just renovated in 2025 and the cage was recently upgraded with NO-SEE-UMS screens, to help keep out indigenous Florida bugs like gnats and mosquitos for guests‚Äô outdoor comfort and poolside enjoyment

Pool and beach towels, beach chairs, coolers, beach sheet, and a beach cart are supplied.

The pool heater is set for 82 degrees during cold winter months for a fee from October 1, to March 31. The set temperature of 82 degrees is a target temperature for the pool. However, when outside temperatures get quite low, pool heaters are not like jacuzzis and will not necessarily heat a pool to the set temperature. Pool heaters are not designed to run overnight and the heater is off in the evening when the pool pump is off. The pool heater is designed to shut off when the pool water reaches the temperature as set on the heater. If a guest wishes for the heater to be turned on during the guests‚Äô stay, the guest should inform the host at least three days in advance of their stay and the heater will be set to 82 degrees for a fee of $20 per day. If guests request the pool heater be turned on, the heater will be set to on for the entire guest stay. If guests prefer the heater to be set to higher than an 82-degree set temperature, the set temperature may be increased for an added fee. The daily fee ranges from $20 to $30/day depending on the guest‚Äôs special request for the set temperature. Host asks that guests not tamper with pool equipment.

ADDITIONAL HOUSEHOLD SUPPLIES, ITEMS & CONVENIENCES
The bedrooms all feature room-darkening curtains in addition to either regular blinds or light-filtering curtains for your maximum sleep and lighting experience. Charging units in bedrooms for cell phones (seahorse bedroom charging units are on the back of lamps). Ironing board and iron in the hall closet.

Bathrooms: Starter shampoo, conditioner and bath/hand soap. Blow dryers in each bathroom. Washcloths, hand towels, bath towels and pool/beach towels are supplied.

Utility Room: starter laundry soap pods.

Bathroom: at least one full roll of toilet paper per bath.

Kitchen: paper towel roll, initial dish and dishwasher soap and initial kitchen garbage bags supplied.

Complimentary coffee is provided for the first morning.

Several board games are located in front living room cabinet behind the couch. Please keep the game pieces in tact.

KID FRIENDLY
Pac-n-play with an additional mattress for baby's sleeping comfort and highchair are available upon request. Kids‚Äô dishware, books and toys are available.

SAFETY MATTERS
First aid kit (under sink), fire extinguisher (in the washroom/utility room.

Please shut off the gas grill and the propane tank underneath after each use to prevent fire hazards.

Please double check doors upon arrival and upon leaving to make sure they are locked. All doors, including sliding doors accessible to the pool, should be locked or monitored at all times to assure the safety of children. There is no baby fence for the pool. It is recommended that if you have young children, you turn on the door alarms and locks (located along the top of the sliding doors) leading to the pool. Alarms emit a very LOUD sound when the door is opened.

Please do not let your children jump on or off the bunk bed or climb in the trees or shrubbery. Apart from the risk of getting hurt from a fall, poison oak or ivy can be indigenous to Florida and can cause rashes. Guests agree to incur the liability and responsibility for protecting their safety and that of invitees or guests' minors. Landlord is not responsible for any of guests' accidents or injuries and guests agree to indemnify and hold host harmless as to any damages, accidents, or injuries.

VENDOR SERVICES/MAINTENANCE
Pool Maintenance is twice weekly to assure your safety, usually Mondays and Thursday. Lawn care is weekly, usually on Mondays except cold winter months, care may be every other week. Pest control is quarterly. Garbage and Recycling service is Tuesday morning. Handyman changes A/C filters monthly. A service provider or host may occasionally adjust pool pump/heater settings/ pool water levels/sprinkler or grounds/maintenance/amenity issues as needed.

ACCIDENTS AND MALFUNCTIONS
If you break something, please contact host so host can report it to insurance. If something malfunctions or breaks on or in the property, please promptly inform host so host can take care of the problem as promptly as reasonably feasible, but please understand, there are no concessions for items which break.

GUEST AGE CONFIRMATION/RENTAL AGREEMENT:
Primary guest booking with host must be 21 years of age or older. Host may require primary guest to provide a government issued ID (ie driver‚Äôs license or resident card) and a signed vacation rental agreement before check-in or upon host‚Äôs request to confirm identity and to ensure that guests understand their responsibilities and the house rules. The primary guest is asked to provide the names of the other guests, their ages, if minors, and total number of guests whose names are agreed are incorporated into the rental agreement. Host permits guests to enter the property after these requirements are met and documents are submitted.

POOL / RENOVATION
Host remarcited and re-titled the pool and did foundation work on the pool in May 2025. New pictures will soon be forthcoming. Sewer pipes were also relined.

SECURITY
A security camera is installed at the front doorbell facing the yard. To assure your privacy, there are no security cameras in or pointing toward any the living areas in the home or in the pool area. Areas inaccessible to guests may be under security. Should a security alarm be triggered, guests agree authorities and/or host can access the premises to investigate the alarm-triggering event.

description:

The space

Third Bedroom - Upstairs King Guest Room


______________________________________________________________________________

AMENITIES

outdoor table and seating area.

*******************************************************************************************************************************************************************************

Full Description-


Welcome to our charming home nestled in the heart of Bradenton. This home exudes character and offers a truly unique experience for your getaway. As you step through the front door, you'll be greeted by the tastefully decorated living area. The perfect place to relax and unwind after a day of exploring the many parks, museums, and beaches. Sink into the sofa and cozy up for a movie on the large screen TV or gather around the dining table for a memorable meal with loved ones. The large windows in the dining room offer plenty of natural light, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere. The fully equipped kitchen makes it easy to whip up a delicious meal using fresh, local ingredients and savor it in the charming breakfast nook overlooking a bay window or in the dining room. Through the door in the kitchen, you can head to back deck and lounge in the sun or enjoy a meal at the outdoor table overlooking the above ground pool and large backyard with plenty of palm trees for that tropical feel.


Located on the Main floor you'll find an inviting Master Bedroom King Suite complete with en-suite bathroom and its own private small living room tucked in back of the suite. You have a large screen wall mounted TV and another in the private living space, which also contains a full-size pullout sofa. (Not advertised as a bedroom as there is no closing door that separates this living space from the Master Suite) Master Suite has its own door to the backyard deck.


Also on the Main floor is a guest bedroom with a bunk bed (Full on bottom twin on top) and a guest bathroom.

Head upstairs to the spacious Guest Suite, also a King bed. Note - this suite does not have its own bathroom but does afford plenty of privacy for your guest as it is the only room upstairs.


This comfortable private home is located just 5 minutes from downtown Bradenton. Just 5 minutes from Bradenton Riverwalk where you can enjoy a stroll along the water and kids will enjoy a spray ground and skate park. Nature enthusiasts will enjoy being a short 18-minute drive from the Robinson Preserve Nature Park, Downtown Bradenton is on the Manatee River and has bars, restaurants, and Village of the Arts. The Village of the Arts is an eclectic live-work community of colorful historic cottages that house everything from award-winning restaurants to specialty shops, studios, healing arts, bakeries, and Bradenton‚Äôs best art galleries. 25-30 minute drive to Bradenton Motorsports Park. The Sarasota/Bradenton airport is a 35-minute drive (9.6 miles) south and downtown Sarasota and St Armands Circle are about 35-minute drive south which is a great place to watch a sunset from a rooftop bar with causal and upscale dining and shopping. You will also find dining options in nearby Longboat Key, Bradenton Beach, and Anna Maria Island which all have great places to eat and things to do by the beach. The home is centrally located to I-75 to take quick trips to Tampa or Orlando areas.


* 1 dog allowed with prior approval and non-refundable pet fee of $200 plus tax* NO CATS

Other things to note
Please note that we may collect additional information from you after confirming your booking (usually an email address) in order to comply with local regulations and to provide the best possible experience.

TITLE: Charming Home Near Anna Maria Beach|Pool +Games
Listing Name: Charming Home Near Anna Maria Beach|Pool +Games
name: Charming Home Near Anna Maria Beach|Pool +Games
description:
Discover some of the best beaches in the state when you stay at Casa Bonita! This beautiful, modern four-bedroom home is the perfect place for a large family or group of friends seeking peaceful enjoyment. Relax on the spacious deck, splash in the private pool, gather around the fire Pit or enjoy a variety of board games.
6 Min Drive to North River Body Therapies
20 Min Drive to Robinson Nature Preserve
22 Min Drive to St Pete & Anna Maria Beach
Experience Palmetto With us & Learn More Below

The space
KEY FEATURES:

*4 Comfortable bedrooms
*3 Full bathrooms
* Full kitchen w/ stainless appliances
* Large living area w/ modern decor
* Free wifi+ Smart TV
* Game Room + Movie Room
* Private Deck w/ outdoor seating+ balcony
* Backyard w/ heated Pool + Fire Pit
* Free Parking

Here Are a Few kind Words From Our Pasts Guests:

Beautiful,Clean and Comfortable home! I look forward to booking this home for future trips!
Thanks Landi for your quick response time and great customer service!" - Nicky

"Beautiful house great host" - Chris

" A great place to stay at. Very friendly host" - Raul

** BEDROOMS + BATHROOMS**

Drift to sleep in one of the four
beautifully - designed bedrooms. Each
bedroom features high-quality sheets and comfortable mattresses, so you can
enjoy a restful sleep each night of your vacation.
The beach-inspired decor provides the perfect backdrop for a coastal holiday.

Three of the bedrooms are furnished with large beds, while one room offers
two sets of bunk beds, perfect for the children!
The clever storage staircase design of these bunk offers plenty of space to store
your belongings.

The three of the bathrooms provide plenty of space for everyone in the whole
family to get ready. Fresh towels , hair dryers, and complimentary toiletries are provided for your convenience.
Two of the bathrooms offer beautiful walk-in showers with pretty tile work.
The third full bathroom has a shower and tub combination, so you can choose between a relaxing soak or a refreshing shower.

** KITCHEN & LOUNGE **

The open-concept kitchen and dining area are the perfect gathering place for the entire family.
The fully - equipped kitchen has stainless steel appliances and all the cookware, dishes , and basic spices you'll need to create tasty meals.
Keep yourself energized for another beach day, courtesy of the coffee maker.
A washer and dryer are tucked discreetly behind some green curtains so you can take care of your laundry needs.
There is also an additional kitchenette available for your convenience.

When you're ready to tuck into a great meal, make your way to the large dinning table beneath a charming industrial-style light fixture.
This area is flooded with natural light thanks to the large sliding glass doors that lead out to the balcony. Share meals and laughs with your group after a wonderful beach day.

The Dinning area opens up onto the tastefully-decorated lounge.
Sit back on one of the plush sofas and watch a show or a movie on the flat-screen Smart TV. Help yourself to our selection of board games and use the stereo to play your favorite music.

There is endless entertainment between the movie room and the game room.
This family-friendly space also offers a pack n'play, two high chairs, and children's books and toys so you don't have to worry about bringing your own to keep your little ones entertained.

** OUTSIDE SPACE**

Head out to the spacious private balcony which features plenty of comfortable seating and great views. This is a place you can enjoy day or night, thanks to a restaurant-style heaters available to fire up and keep you warm on chilly evenings. This is the perfect place to enjoy a morning cup of coffee or a sundowner.

A shimmering private pool awaits you for a refreshing swim whenever you feel like a dip. Work on your tan in one of the poolside loungers or curl up with a book in one of the egg chairs. The grill master of your group can use the BBQ to cook up a delicious outdoor meal . By night, gather around the fire pit under the starry sky and swap stories about your adventures around Palmetto.

The great location is just a few minutes from the white sand of some of the best beaches in the area, as well as restaurants and shops, making it a beautiful place to enjoy a relaxing holiday with friends or family. Visit Anna Maria Beach and St Pete Beach and be sure to take a relaxing stroll through the Nature Preserve.

** Book Today & Let Us Take Care Of You In Palmetto!**

Guest access
As a guest, you have full access to the entire house ,including the full kitchen, private bathrooms, outdoor dinning area, laundry facilities, board games, WiFi, a swimming pool, and more. Check-in is a breeze, thanks to a Smart Lock! There is parking for 2 cars in the garage and room for 6/8 outside

The pool is heated and set to 85 degrees during winter months. When outside temperature is on the cooler side , the pool may not heat to the set temperature. You will have to request it upon booking and it will have to stay on for the duration of your stay. There is an extra $50 per day.

Please note that this is not a party house. This is a residential area and we ask that you keep the noise level to a minimum, especially in the evenings, as others are trying to enjoy peaceful vacations.

Guests must be 21 years old to book

We have weekly pool service at the property, we also have ongoing pest services
please know since we are in Florida and close to the water that it's not abnormal to see a bug(s) especially after it rains
We recommend bug spray startingat dusk if outside

Other things to note
We highly recommend each guest to purchase travel insurance for their vacation investment in the event they must cancel for an unforseen reason. It'stypically inexpensive and will help cover if an emergency should arise and the travel is not possible
CFAR( cancel for any reason) is typically the best option for travelers. We strictly follow our cancelation policy

Welcome to *7th Heaven*! This luxurious 3-bedroom, 2.5-bath private pool home near Anna Maria Island combines coastal charm with modern elegance. Just 13 minutes from pristine beaches and 15 minutes from Bridge Street's dining and shopping, this retreat is perfectly located for your getaway. Enjoy a sparkling private pool, sun deck, and patio surrounded by lush landscaping. Inside, the airy layout features a chef‚Äôs kitchen, two inviting living areas, and spa-inspired primary suite. Pet-friendly.

The space
Welcome to 7th Heaven, professionally managed by Gulf Coast Vacation Rentals! This stunning 3-bedroom, 2.5-bathroom private pool home is located near the sun-kissed shores of Anna Maria Island, Florida. This property offers the perfect combination of luxurious living and coastal charm.

This home offers the perfect location for it all! You are just 13 minutes away from the gorgeous white sands of Anna Maria Island and just 15 minutes from magnificent Bridge Street, where you will find restaurants and shopping galore.

As you step inside, you'll be immediately impressed by the home's spacious and airy layout. There is the first living room that has two plush couches and plenty of space to unwind. The open-plan living and dining area is bathed in natural light from the French Doors and features chic furnishings, and tasteful decor that perfectly captures the relaxed Florida lifestyle.

Outside, you'll find your own private oasis, complete with a sparkling pool, a spacious sun deck, and a patio area perfect for al fresco dining and entertaining. Surrounded by lush landscaping and swaying palms, you'll feel like you're in your own little slice of paradise.

The fully equipped kitchen is a chef's dream, with all the appliances you could need, ample counter space, and all the tools you need to whip up delicious meals for family and friends.

The home's three bedrooms are all beautifully appointed and provide plenty of space to unwind after a day in the sun. The primary bedroom boasts a king-size bed, and has aa large attached bathroom that is spa-inspired. The primary bathroom has a beautiful vanity, a soaking tub, and a walk-in shower. The second bedroom has a queen-size bed, a TV, and an attached bathroom that has a walk-in shower. The third bedroom has a queen-size bed a couch to relax after a day at the beach.
Come, and relish in all the fun this home has to offer.

House Rule: No smoking. No burning candles inside of lodging. No parties.

Furry friends welcome. Up to 2 pets allowed.

Pool heating is optional, for an additional non-refundable fee of $25 per day + taxes to be paid directly to the management company after the reservation is confirmed. Pool heat request made after guest arrival will incur an additional $45 trip charge.

Other things to note

Arrival instructions will be emailed and text to the contact details on file 1 hour before check-in.

Listing Name: Whispering Palms: Pool, Near Beaches, Dog Friendly
name: Whispering Palms: Pool, Near Beaches, Dog Friendly
description:
3 BR / 3 BA / Sleeps 7-8

The space
Master bedroom ‚Äì One King bed with en-suite bathroom which includes a large walk-in closet and en-suite master shower with jets and steam room.

Second bedroom ‚Äì One King bedroom with large screen TV and access to the hallway bathroom.

Third bedroom - Bunk bed style with three twin beds.

* Blow up mattress available to accommodate the eighth person *


______________________________________________________________________________

AMENITIES


One well-behaved dog is allowed with a pet fee. Please get approval from the property manager before booking. NO CATS

Air Conditioner at this property does not go below 72 degrees per owner.


Outdoor private pool with covered seating areas, covered gazebo, and ambient lighting. (Pool can be heated in cooler months (November - April) for an additional $35.00 a day. Please schedule in advance of your stay.


Professionally cleaned and sanitized per CDC guidelines between each guest stay. PLEASE NOTE- For extended stays of 60 days or more we require a mid-stay clean be done by our cleaners. A member of our team will reach out upon your booking to coordinate the fee and scheduling.


Centrally located between Bradenton and Sarasota

Five minutes from the Sarasota/ Bradenton airport.

Two-car garage and ample driveway parking.

Outdoor private pool with covered seating areas, covered gazebo, and ambient lighting. (Pool can be heated in cooler months (December - April) for an additional 35.00 a day. Please schedule in advance of your stay.

Large fenced-in backyard perfect for children to play or pets.

Propane grill for outdoor cooking.

2 Beach Chairs, 1 small cooler, 1 Beach Umbrella

Large spacious living room with 60 inch TV and large leather sectional sofa.

Fully stocked modern kitchen with breakfast bar and large dining table.

Full-size washer and dryer

Free WIFI at 400 MBPS

Streaming cable


No Smoking in the home!


_____________________________________________________________________________

FULL DESCRIPTION


Welcome, to Whispering Palms Private Pool Home!


Once you walk into this home you are greeted with an indoor Atrium that can be seen from every room. The living room is spacious and has a large sectional sofa that is perfect for watching your favorite programming on the large screen TV. The master bedroom has a king-size bed, en-suite bathroom with master shower, jets, and steam room. Plus a large walk-in closet, a lighted makeup table, and plenty of space to unpack. The second bedroom has a King bed with a large TV in the room as well as a desk. The final bedroom is a bunk bed style with three twin mattresses. The top bunk should only be used by a small child and the other two could be used by adults or other children. There is a large open kitchen that is fully stocked with dishes, stemware, and basic appliances to enjoy meals made at home. It has a large dining room table and seating at the breakfast bar.


The large fenced-in grassy backyard is the highlight of this comfortable home with a private outdoor pool. The pool area has two covered seating areas, a covered gazebo, and a gas grill for having that weekend BBQ! Pool heat may be added (Nov-April) for a fee of $35/day.


PLEASE NOTE- For extended stays of 60 days or more we require a mid-stay clean be done by our cleaners. A member of our team will reach out upon your booking to coordinate the fee and scheduling.


This home is located just 9 miles (22minute drive) from the University Town Center Mall which is great for shopping and upscale restaurants. The Sarasota/Bradenton airport is only 6 minutes away (2.9 miles) and downtown Sarasota is 13 minutes (6.1 miles).

There is a Publix grocery store at Bayshore Gardens that is 5 minutes away (1.8 miles) and a Walmart Neighborhood Market that is just 8 minutes away (3.8miles) to stock up on snacks, drinks, and food items or last-minute items you forgot to pack for the trip. No trip to Sarasota would be complete without going to one of the world-class beaches nearby. Siesta Key Beach is a 30-minute drive (13.3 miles) or Lido Key Beach is 20 minutes (9 miles). Check out St Armand's Circle near Lido Key Beach for additional shopping and great restaurant choices.


There are many great restaurants within a short car ride such as the Sunnyside Caf√© which among other things has the best lobster roll sandwich in town!! Downtown Sarasota is a short 13-minute drive and abounds with restaurants, rooftop bars, and shopping. Tarpon Bay Grill in the Ramada Inn, just north of US41 is a fun place to sit and have a beverage on the Marina. Other restaurant selections are Mirna's Cuban, Mama G's Coffee shop for German baked goods, and Primo's Italian restaurant all within a 3-mile radius of the home.

Other things to note
Please note that we may collect additional information from you after confirming your booking (usually an email address) in order to comply with local regulations and to provide the best possible experience.

The space
Redesigned and completely updated in 2023, Angels Place is now available!

BEDROOM AND SLEEPING DETAILS
Bedroom 1: King Bed
Bedroom 2: Queen Bed
Open Room 3: Two Twin Beds (can convert to 1 King using kit provided)

House sleeps 6 + pull-out full size sleeper couch in LR & additional kid friendly pack n play.

KIDS STUFF
So you are not packing more than you have to, we provide:
1 Pack n‚Äô Play with cushion and sheet
1 Baby Gate
1 Stroller
1 Highchair, and
Kids‚Äô dinnerware.

THE HOUSE
All TVs are Smart TV's with Roku and there are TVs in every room, including the garage and pool areas! Connect to your favorite programs using the free WIFI!
The home has luxurious features such as granite counters, vinyl & tile flooring throughout, and a luxurious master suite.

‚Ä¢ The master suite includes a king bed, en-suite shower, walk-in closet, luggage rack, wall mounted Roku TV and a desk & chair for remote work, adding even more comfort and charm.

‚Ä¢ The second bedroom has a queen bed, bench/hooks/shelves, luggage rack & wall mounted Roku TV for your enjoyment.

‚Ä¢ The third open sleeping area has two twin beds that can be pushed together and using the provided conversion kit, turns them into a single King bed. There are also two tables/chairs, side tables & wall mounted Roku TV.

The open living room boasts a cozy large L shaped couch with full-size pull-out sofa sleeper, chair & Large TV w/Roku stick.

The 2nd bathroom has a large double sink vanity with a tub/shower combination.

GAME ROOM/GARAGE/LAUNDRY

POOL AND LANAI
We have a large screened outdoor private pool/lanai area with outdoor table/seating for 6, 2 bar stools, 2 egg chairs, 4 lounge chairs, floaties/kids toys & basketball hoop/basketballs.
Pool Heat is available (85 degrees) upon request for an additional fee of $25/day. Please schedule in advance of your stay to ensure heat is on! If outside temperatures drop too low, it can affect pool temp, so unfortunately pool temperatures cannot be guaranteed.

KITCHEN AND DINING
There is a beautiful, fully equipped kitchen open to the rest of the living space because we always hang out by the food! The kitchen includes stainless steel appliances, granite counters, and large peninsula.

Dining room table seats 4-6 plus adjacent peninsula has 4 bar stools. Additionally, there are two kids tables in the open sleeping area w/2 chairs each.

Plenty of place settings including drinking glasses, coffee mugs, wine glasses plus kid friendly dinnerware, pots and pans, cooking utensils, mixing bowls, baking dishes, pizza pan, cookie sheet, toaster, electric tea kettle, blender, mixer, crock pot, can opener, wine opener, measuring cups/spoons, salt/pepper, coffee makers (including complimentary tea bags, coffee, filters and creamer!)

GRILLING
Fire department regulations prohibit the use of grills on all decks, porches, under homes, and under lanai. A gas grill & propane tank is provided. We do not refill the tank, so when it goes empty, please feel free to exchange it at a local gas station or Home Depot for around $25. Please pull the grill away from the home/lanai when in use (reference card attached to grill).

INCLUDED AMENITIES
Cards, Board Games, Pool Toys and Poolside Basketball hoop! Toilet paper, paper towels, dish soap, dishwasher detergent, trash bags, laundry soap, soap, linens, bath & beach towels, beach chairs/umbrella/cooler, fans, central air, WIFI and full size Washer and Dryer. Please leave any unused amenities in their place for future guests.


LOCATION
This beautiful home is located in a family-friendly neighborhood and conveniently close to a variety of activities and amenities:

6 miles to the white sand beaches of Anna Maria Island
3 miles to Desoto National Memorial
1.4 miles to GT bray park and rec center with pickleball under cover - 20 courts! Tennis courts & workout gym too!
4 miles to Palma Sola Botanical Park
7 miles to the Bradenton Area Convention Center
1 mile to nearest hospital: Blake Medical Center 2020 59th St W
3 miles to Bradenton Country Club
2 miles to Publix
2 miles to Shoppes of Paradise Bay (grocery shopping, restaurants, Starbucks, dollar store)
12 miles to Sarasota/Bradenton Airport (20 minute drive)


IMPORTANT SAFETY RULES

It is extremely important to us that everyone staying is safe in and around our home, and we're happy to provide you with a few items and rules to help ensure that.

First, there is NO smoking or vaping inside the house or by the pool. An ash tray outside the door to the lanai to accommodate those who do smoke. We have smoke/CO detectors. There is a fire extinguisher and a first aid kit in case of any emergencies. Detailed emergency & evacuation information can be found on City of Bradenton's website.
The home is equipped with 2 outdoor cameras for everyone‚Äôs safety. The first is a "ring" camera and automatic light fixture on the front of the garage. The lights will turn on when you arrive at the house to ensure the area is well lit. There is also a ring doorbell that is also equipped with a camera. The doorbell does ring inside but it cannot be heard from the pool area.

POOL SAFETY
Children, anyone unable to swim, and vulnerable adults MUST be watched at all times; especially while using and by the pool. We have also provided items for you to use to protect your family and guests:
* Pool door and window alarms (MUST be turned on by you)
* Pool door locks that are out of reach of young children (clear plastic ‚Äì flip up to engage).
* Pool hook and pool ring next to the pool, if needed.
* Water watcher card is hanging on side of refrigerator to remind you to identify who is in charge of pool safety at all times.
* Pool light (switch is located on post between lanai and pool)
* Pool rules are displayed by the TV in the lanai
* Pool depth markers ‚Äì NO DIVING
* Anyone pregnant is to check with their doctor prior to swimming
* PLEASE use ONLY plastic by the pool for your safety.
Life jackets are not provided as you will need to purchase/fit them properly yourself.
Please advise ASAP if any pool safety related device is inoperable or missing.


MOST IMPORTANT ~ NO PARTIES
I want everyone to enjoy their time however I cannot express enough that we DO NOT ALLOW PARTIES AT ALL and anyone who breaks this rule WILL be immediately evicted without refund and subject to an additional $500 eviction fee. This includes playing loud or vulgar music outside, any drug use on the property including marijuana with a medical ID (do it somewhere else), any excess cars or guests. We allow 4 cars maximum (No street or yard parking and no trailers). Absolutely no indoor smoking including the garage. Everyone in the booking must be 25+ unless accompanied by parents and send ID upon booking. We care about our neighbors, and our home, and this behavior is not allowed at this property. If this is your intention, PLEASE do not book!!

Guest access
You will have access to the entire home! This does not include the locked closet in the garage.

Other things to note
- Please do not leave doors and windows open as the home is temperature controlled to 74 degrees. Do not reduce the temperature more than 2 degrees at a time or the AC can freeze up.
- Noise must be kept at an acceptable level not to disturb the peaceful enjoyment of others. Bradenton 10 PM City Noise Ordinance must be observed - ZERO TOLERANCE
- Trash service is EARLY Tues & Friday mornings. Please bring trash to end of driveway MON & THURSDAY if they fall during your stay.
- The city of Bradenton does not offer recycling pickup currently.
- Any repair concerns are to be promptly reported to the host, and access granted to perform necessary work.
- There will be weekly landscaping & pool maintenance (typically Friday between 10-1) that may fall on a day of your stay.
- This is FLORIDA! We have our pest control team out regularly however you may see an occasional pest or gecko! Please be sure to close the doors because they will sneak in behind you when you go in and out!
Thank you for following our rules to ensure everyone in the home is safe!

FULL DESCRIPTION


Beautiful pool home located in a safe and quiet neighborhood of Sugar Ridge. This comfortable private home is located just 5.1 miles from downtown Bradenton. Downtown Bradenton is on the water and also has bars, restaurants, and Village of the Arts. The Village of the Arts is an eclectic live-work community made up of colorful historic cottages that house everything from award-winning restaurants to specialty shops, studios, healing arts, bakeries, and Bradenton‚Äôs best art galleries. The Sarasota/Bradenton airport is a 15-minute drive (7.5 miles) south and downtown Sarasota and St Armands Circle are about 30-minute drive south which is a great place to watching a sunset from a rooftop bar with causal and upscale dining and shopping. You will also find dining options in nearby Longboat Key, Bradenton Beach, and Anna Maria Island which all have great places to eat and things to do by the beach. The home is centrally located to I-75 to take quick trips to Tampa or Orlando areas.


There is a private pool that can be accessed from the kitchen, master bedroom, or third bedroom. The whole house looks out onto the pool that also has a water view of the pond in the backyard. (Pool can be heated in cooler months (November - April) for an extra fee of 35.00 a day. Please schedule before arrival.


The living room is spacious with a large chair/ottoman and couch that are perfect for watching TV on the large 70" screen. The master bedroom has a king-size bed and en-suite bathroom, walk-in closet, shower stall, and large soaking tub. The second bedroom has queen-size, and the third bedroom has two twins. The eat-in kitchen is fully stocked with dishes, stemware, and basic appliances to enjoy meals made at home. There are several areas to sit down and have a meal either in the kitchen, bar area, outdoor by the pool or in the more formal dining area. All areas have great pool views, so it feels like your little oasis.


PLEASE NOTE- For extended stays of 60 days or more we require a mid-stay clean be done by our cleaners. A member of our team will reach out upon your booking to coordinate the fee and scheduling.

Other things to note
Please note that we may collect additional information from you after confirming your booking (usually an email address) in order to comply with local regulations and to provide the best possible experience.

The space
This cozy 4 bedroom 2 1/2 bath Pool Home has all the charm and character of a downtown 100yr old property in the historic district of Palmetto. This single-family home is located in the Downtown Palmetto area minutes away from the Manatee River and some of the best restaurants around. The location is perfect for travelers who are looking to not only explore the wonderful white sandy beaches of the Gulf Coast but also to Bradenton, Sarasota or St Pete/ Tampa. The property is conveniently located close to the Bradenton Convention Center, Downtown Bradenton, Grocery stores, Palmetto fishing pier, a boat ramp, and some of the best waterfront restaurants around. If you are looking for a little adventure you can travel across the bridge to the downtown riverwalk with scenic views along with a playground, splash pad and skate park for the kids! Looking for a little nightlife? Check out downtown Bradenton which offers bars and restaurants as well as some great local history!

This 4-bedroom property is very spacious and has a relaxing ocean cottage vibe from the decor to the furniture. Outside it has privacy from the surrounding streets with mature trees and a small fence that pair well with lots of windows to enlighten the property naturally. It also comes with lots of seating if you are just looking to kick back and relax. The kitchen comes fully equipped with all the appliances you would need to make any meal you miss from home.

The pool deck is completely screened in and has plenty of seating under a shady awning to hang out on a hot Florida day. Or you could hang out by the side of the pool in one of the lounge chairs and work on your tan. The views from the pool deck provide lots of Florida fauna to really show off the tropical aura of the area.

Trying to figure out sleeping arrangements? The master bedroom is downstairs and offers a king-size bed, and ensuite bathroom which has a walk-in shower. The additional three bedrooms are located upstairs and share a full bathroom.

2208 3rd Ave W, Bradenton, FL 34205
BTR4522

Welcome to Sabai Sabai, a tranquil retreat in the heart of Bradenton offering comfort, style, and incredible amenities for families and groups seeking a relaxing Florida getaway. This luxury vacation home offers three bedrooms, three bathrooms, and a tropical backyard oasis with a pool, outdoor shower, and BBQ grill. Located just minutes from Bradenton‚Äôs Riverwalk, the Village of the Arts, and the white-sand beaches of

The space
Highlights
‚Ä¢ Private Pool
‚Ä¢ 3 Bedroom / 3 Bath
‚Ä¢ 1 King, 1 Twin/ twin Bunk with Trundle, Queen Sleeper Sofa
‚Ä¢ BBQ Grill
‚Ä¢ Outdoor Shower

Escape to your tropical paradise in this luxurious Florida vacation rental, where relaxation and comfort meet. Soak up the Florida sun by the sparkling private pool, complete with floats for endless fun, or unwind in the fully fenced yard for ultimate privacy. Enjoy dining on the patio with meals prepared on the BBQ grill, surrounded by stylish Adirondack seating and ambient lighting, perfect for evening gatherings. Refresh under the outdoor shower after a swim, then retreat indoors to sink into plush sofas and embrace the cozy ambiance. This idyllic home offers the perfect setting for a memorable Florida getaway filled with tropical breezes and family-friendly moments.

Step into a stylish, open concept living space filled with natural light, neutral tones, and a refined rustic charm. The gourmet kitchen is fully stocked and features a farmhouse sink, quartz countertops, stainless steel appliances, and a breakfast island with barstools. Gather at the dining table beneath a glowing chandelier or enjoy casual meals outdoors. The living area offers plush seating and TV, ideal for relaxing after a day of adventure.

The primary bedroom includes a king bed, decorative fireplace, TV, and an ensuite bathroom with a walk-in shower and dual vanity. The second bedroom is great for kids or friends with a twin-over-twin bunk bed and a twin trundle, plus a hallway bathroom with a shower/tub combo. Step out into the private guest studio, which features a small kitchen, a dining table for four, a sofa that converts into a double bed, and a modern bathroom with a walk-in shower.

Room Details
‚Ä¢ Primary Bedroom: King bed, ensuite bathroom with double vanity and walk-in shower
‚Ä¢ Second Bedroom: Twin-over-Twin Bunk with Twin Trundle
‚Ä¢ Guest Suite: Queen Sleeper Sofa, kitchenette, private bathroom with walk-in shower

Situated in a historic Bradenton neighborhood, you‚Äôre within walking distance of the Village of the Arts and the Bradenton Riverwalk, with its public art, playgrounds, and waterfront dining. Catch a game at LECOM Park or take a short drive over the bridge to Anna Maria Island, known for its white-sand beaches, turquoise waters, and quaint island vibes.

Experience comfort, charm, and space for everyone at Sabai Sabai. Book your stay today and make lasting memories in the sunshine!

Other things to note
This property does not allow pets of any kind.

2 cars maximum are able to park at this home. We ask our guests to please plan accordingly and coordinate with your group. There is no overnight parking available for additional vehicles.

This home is managed by AMI Locals, an Anna Maria Island property management company.

We do not accept reservations from anyone under 25 years of age. We do not allow persons under 25 to occupy a property unless accompanied by someone over 25 years of age.

Please see our AMI Locals Rental Policies for full details.

Please Remember: "You are vacationing in a residential area. Please be a good neighbor by keeping the noise to a respectful level during the day and night.
