description:
Welcome and enjoy a relaxing vacation house with your family. This heated POOL house is well situated and well-maintained in a cul-de-sac and is central to the beach (15 minute drive to Anna Maria Island), IMG Academy, The Bradenton Country Club, famous Riverwalk, downtown and numerous restaurants and shopping options. Enjoy your own private oasis with plenty of space for your family and friends with 3 bedrooms that can sleep 8 guests and a fourth bonus room that can sleep 2 additional guests

The space
As you drive up to the home, you are greeted by a VERY large front yard that leads to the carport on the right and the modern and beautiful front door on the left. Opening the front door reveals the living room space with 75 inch smart TV with the dining room area behind it and a view into the enclosed Florida room. All the 3 bedrooms have ceiling fans and the additional bonus room can sleep two additional guests and can also be used as a dedicated workspace with a work desk and a relaxing work chair.

BEDROOMS
Welcome into the arms of comfort. You‚Äôll love each and every one of our bedrooms, where you can cozy up under the softest blankets

Master Bedroom: Queen sized bed with two large closets
Bedroom 2: Bunk double bed and twin on top and additional slide out twin bed
Bedroom 3: Full bed
Bonus room: Two twin beds. This room also has a brick fireplace and a dedicated workspace
Fully equipped kitchen
Dining in--- the dining room table has seating for 6

ALL THE COMFORTS OF HOME
- Free parking on the premise (up to 4 vehicles)
- Toilet paper, paper towels, dish soap, dishwasher detergent, salt & pepper and soap provided
- Washer/Dryer
- Beach equipment: sand chairs, cooler bag provided.
- Central Air & Heating, (bonus room with portable window vent AC/Heater)
- Fast wi-fi

Enclosed Florida room is a great place to relax on relaxing outdoor furniture and the room flows to the caged big heated pool 32" by 16". The pool has a deep end so watch your little ones and any non swimmers. Also relax and enjoy the seating area next to the pool with a relaxing outside furniture set and a gas firepit (propane will not be refilled). Outside pool cage there is a large fenced backyard for outside activities. On another side there is a patio with relaxing chairs and hammock. Hammock can withstand maximum 300 pounds of weight.
So whether you choose to spend your day visiting Bradenton and Anna Maria Island‚Äôs many attractions, or simply wish to lounge around our heated pool with a drink in hand, our home will definitely be the right pick for you!

Guest access
Guests will have access to entire house except the outside shed

Other things to note
1. Please read the guestbook Info like trash days, wifi passwords, and other things you need to know is located in the book.
2. Any people other than those in the guest party (renter) are the sole responsibility of the guest (renter). Parties and events are not allowed.
3. This home is privately owned. The homeowners are not responsible for any accidents, injuries, or illnesses that occur while on-premises. The homeowners are not responsible for the loss of personal belongings or valuables of the guest. By accepting this reservation, it is agreed that all guests are expressly assuming the risk of any harm arising from their use of the premises or others whom they invite to use the premises.
4. Please be considerate to the neighbors and not have loud music after 10 pm
5. All items in the home and on the property, including books and games are intended for entertainment and enjoyment of the guests while staying at the house and are not to be removed from the home or property. The only
exception would be those items which are intended for use at the beach.
6. No smoking allowed in the house. Smoking is allowed OUTSIDE ONLY.
($500 cleaning fee applies if found smoking in house or smoke smell)
7. Pool settings are all scheduled. Pool heat is set to 85 degrees from 11 AM - 7 PM, however pool temps are impacted if the weather temp drops. So, pool temperatures cannot be guaranteed.
8. Safety features: fire extinguisher, smoke detector, first aid kit are provided
9. No vehicle should be parked on grass area. Parking is allowed on driveway and can accomodate upto 3 vehicles

name: Seastar! Newly Renovated Home, 10 Min to Anna Mari
description:
3 Bedroom and 2 Bathroom Home with Private Heated Pool, Close to AMI, Free Wifi

The space
Welcome to our Seastar home. Renovated in 2020, this 3 bedroom and 2 bathroom with a wonderful pool area and lush landscaping is the ideal place for you to enjoy your vacation to the fullest.

Located in the prestigious Northwest Bradenton neighborhood, this home is ideally situated. The beautiful beaches of Anna Maria Island are only a ten minute drive away, and the Palma Sola Bay waters just a three minute walk down the road. Also very close by is the 600+ acre Robinson Nature Preserve, where you can go for long relaxing walks while observing wildlife, as well go biking or kayaking.

The inside of the home is nothing short of amazing. The stained concrete floors throughout most of the house is a unique feature and the colors and furnishing will make you feel on vacation time the moment you step into the door. The master bedroom has a king size bed, TV, plenty of closet space, as well as an en-suite bathroom with walk-in shower. The queen size bedroom with TV, and twin bedroom are located on the other side of the house, also with plenty of storage space, and share a guest bathroom with tub-shower combo. Highspeed Wifi internet is available.

The open floor layout of kitchen, dining room and living room is the perfect area for the everyone to spend quality time together. Granite counter tops, stainless steel appliances and white shaker style cabinets will certainly be appreciated by the chef in the family. Gather for wonderful meals on the dining table that seats 6 or more people or watch your favorite shows in the living room on the big screen TV.

The private fenced in backyard offers plenty of space for everyone and the oversized heated pool will make for countless hours of fun and memories during your stay. A propane BBQ is available to cook steaks, your catch-of-the-day and much more.

PLEASE NOTE: After successfully booking the home, you will receive an email message with a link to a rental agreement, which will require your online signature.

TITLE: The Florida House HOT TUB &POOL by IMG & AMI
Listing Name: The Florida House HOT TUB &POOL by IMG & AMI
name: The Florida House HOT TUB &POOL by IMG & AMI
description:
Welcome to The Florida House!

This fun, family friendly 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom home is located in West Bradenton, just 8 miles from Anna Maria Island and 5.5 miles from Bradenton Beach. We're also only 3 miles from IMG Academy.

Kick back and relax in the spacious living room equipped with a smart TV. Then, venture into the backyard to grill out and play some corn hole.
Relax and unwind with a dip in the pool or hot tub and lounge in the hammocks.

There's something here for everyone!

The space
***After the hurricanes we have two less trees in the backyard + one less hammock**

Upon opening the front door you will see a postcard style mural and a spacious living room. There is a welcome binder on the entry table full of recommendations for things to do, restaurants, where to grab a drink, and brochures/flyers for nearby attractions. All our favorites and insider tips are in here!

Look further and you will see an Insta-worthy accent wall covered in oranges with a neon sign that reads "stay awhile". Have a seat in one of the comfy green velvet chairs to enjoy a morning cup of coffee or tea from our coffee bar, or a cocktail in the evening.

In the kitchen you'll find all the cooking basics: pots, pans, baking sheets, spatulas, measuring cups, mixing bowls, tongs, a toaster, blender, etc. There is also vegetable oil, olive oil, salt, & pepper.
You'll also find stylish wine glasses and a shaker set on the open shelving. There are extra glasses in the cabinet.

The dining room table is large and comfortably seats 8. There is a high chair (stored in master closet) for your little one to join you at the table.

On one side of the house you will find two guest rooms, one with a queen bed and one with a double and twin size bed. There is a guest bathroom with bathtub next to these rooms.
On the other side is the spacious master, with a large king bed and a dedicated work space. There is a mini crib and rocking chair in the large master closet. There is also an AC vent in the closet that keeps it nice and cool. The master bathroom features a walk in shower and double sink vanity.

Finally - the backyard! When you step out the back sliding glass door you will find the screened in patio, complete with a seating area and string lights overhead. In the backyard there is something for everyone. Grill your favorite meal, enjoy a drink in the Adirondack chairs, lounge in a hammock, play some corn hole, take a dip in the pool, or unwind in the hot tub. WE DO REQUIRE GUESTS TO SIGN A HOT TUB LIABILITY WAIVER.

In the garage there are beach chairs, an umbrella, and kids toys you are welcome to borrow during your stay. Beach/ pool towels are also provided

BEDS:
- king bed (master)
- queen bed (guest room 1)
- double and twin bed (guest room 2)
- queen pull out bed in sofa (living room)
- crib (master closet)

Guest access
Guests have access to the entire house aside from two owners/cleaners closets.
All bedroom closets are accessible to guests.

Other things to note
Please note we do have cameras outside the home (front door & driveway). This is to protect the property. They record audio and video.

There are no cameras inside the home.
title: The Florida House HOT TUB &POOL by IMG & AMI

description:
Explore COQUINA HAUS, a tropical getaway just minutes from Anna Maria Island, Holmes, Manatee, and Coquina beaches! Only a 5 minute walk from the water at the scenic Riverview Point Reserve, this beautifully renovated and styled 5BR gem boasts 3x KING beds, a screened-in veranda, a deep pool, a comfy lounge area, and a kids' playland. With high-speed WiFi, beach supplies, and work-from-home options, the COQUINA HAUS offers a luxurious blend of style and relaxation for an unforgettable stay!

The space
Our Bradenton / Palma Sola home is stylish and spacious, yet incredibly cozy! With a luxurious, hip vibe and warm ambiance, it is the perfect place to relax, unwind, lounge by the heated pool (moderate upcharge) and cook an amazing meal at home after a fun day out at one of the nearby beaches! The Coquina Haus is the perfect place for someone looking for a tropical family vacation in a beautiful and safe area, or simply needing a change of scenery, with multiple work from home options, as well as 3x KING bedrooms!!

Rich in amenities, with access to both beach supplies and on-site laundry, as well as a fully and beautifully equipped kitchen, you will have everything you need to have an incredible time.

0.5 miles to Riverview Point Reserve (side entrance) /Desoto Memorial (end of street car parking) - incredible sunset walks right on the water (salt water, can swim in the Bay, locals' secret spot)!

TITLE: Vacation home heated pool Turf yard putting green
Listing Name: Vacation home heated pool Turf yard putting green
name: Vacation home heated pool Turf yard putting green
description:
Private 3 bedroom single family home 3 miles to beautiful gulf beaches. Recently updated backyard with artificial turf and a two hole putting green.
Three bedroom, two bathroom, heated pool home with sidewalk access to ride bikes to the beach (3 miles away). Spread out in the backyard with 1/4 acre of land and your own private, heated pool.
Please review the listing and ask any questions you may have! We look forward to hosting you.

The space
This is the vacation home you're looking for. Take a load off out back at the pool, take our bikes down the road to beautiful white sand beaches. All of your cooking needs can be met between the beautiful kitchen or grill that's outside.

The standard pricing for the rental is for the first two guests. We understand large families or multiple guests may want to stay, and that is perfectly fine! Please make sure you include the correct number of guests for your reservation. Prices are intentionally kept low to make affordable for one or two guests and when calculated with a full house, set to the normal price. If you intend on booking for 2 and using all bedrooms, you will be found out and charged an excessive fee accordingly.

The gas grill and fire pit table propane tanks are the responsibility of guests. This includes cleaning the grill and filling the propane tanks. As some guests may want to use a full tank of propane while sitting at the fire pit table, propane cannot reasonably be provided by the host. Propane can be filled at the ACE Hardware that is located in the neighborhood for less than $25. If you intend to use the grill or fire pit, please ensure the propane tank is full. Please do not switch tanks between the grill and fire pit to prevent having to fill it. They should not be moved. If renting the home specifically for having a grill, please choose elsewhere as we provide the amenity but everything else is the responsibility of the guest. As guests have been problematic with the propane and grill, this is the result. We strive to make all accommodations for guests, but being a propane refill service is not manageable for the host.

Guest access
Everything! The place is all yours, no other parties will be in the home for your stay.

A four digit code will be provided for you during your stay, using the last 4 digits of your phone number.

No parties, no loud music at night, and do not bring more guests than you're booking for. This is monitored due to abuse. Please respect the house rules and we ensure you‚Äôll have an amazing time.

Other things to note
We want you to have the perfect stay. Let us know if there's anything missing and we will make sure to get it for you!

Please note regarding the heated pool. To have accurate expectations, reading this message is necessary. The pool is heated during cool months, not the summer. Usually, October - April the pool is heated. Also of importance, this is a heated pool and NOT a hot tub. The water will never be hot, it will be warm. Temperature is set to 85 degrees. If by chance the weather is extremely cold, pool temperature may not reach 85 degrees. In short, if it‚Äôs very cold it‚Äôs not likely a time you‚Äôll want to be swimming as again, this is not a hot tub.
Pool heater does not run 24/7. It runs 10 hours a day, per pool pump and heater standards and standards. If you are trying to swim at 10:00 at night, the pool will not actively be heating and will remain at or near the set temperature. Do not attempt to change the pool temperature. A $500 fee will be assessed due to the possibility of ruining the heater.

If you are interested in heating outside of these standards, additional heating can be provided at $25 a day. Advanced notice will need to be given and payment collected for your stay.

Everything mentioned is standard practice for a heated pool. This is not to deter guests, but in recent years, guests expectations have become unreasonable and unrealistic.
If your expectations for the pool are anything other than what is listed below, please contact me to set up the cost for additional heating, or feel free to book elsewhere.

The pool is cleaned and maintained professionally once a week, with visits usually occurring on Thursday. There is no set time for the pool company and they will enter via the side gate for scheduled maintenance.

There is some road noise from Cortez Road. Noise machines are provided and can be used for anyone sensitive to noise while sleeping or those who prefer a noise machine!

description:
@Aloe_Stranger

Dreamy + fresh! This 1-bedroom guesthouse has a king bed, full bath, kitchen, washer/dryer, daybed + sleeper sofa. NEW STOCK TANK POOL! Full of style - it feels like you're in your own art installation. 1 mile from SRQ Airport, it boasts a great location as well cushy comforts.

1/2 mile from Sarasota Bay, 15 min from Lido Beach, 15 min from Siesta Key and many beaches around the Sarasota/Bradenton area. 10 min from downtown Sarasota, 1 mile from the historic Ringling Museum

The space
Less than a mile from Sarasota Bay, 5 miles from Lido Beach, 10 miles from Siesta Key and countless beaches around the Sarasota/Bradenton area. 4 miles from downtown Sarasota and 1 mile down the street from the historic Ringling Museum! 25 Minutes from the adorable Anna Maria Island, 20 minutes to Holmes Beach and Coquina Beach.

Enjoy your very own private stock tank pool! Easily fits 4 people, the kids are obsessed with it, as well as couples. It is maintained daily with a full filtering system and pump, chlorinated as well. Lay out on the custom bench seating for some sun, reading a book, sipping your favorite beverage.

The TV swivels from living room to bedroom and the 7 foot long shower is made for 2. Keurig coffee machine with unlimited coffee, assorted teas and honey, and bottomless bottled water welcome you to Aloe Stranger.

The kitchen is FULLY stocked with everything you may need including a full sized fridge. The bathroom is also FULLY stocked with towels, soaps, shampoo, conditioner, many other amenities like sunscreen and soothing aloe.

There are 2 beach chairs, a beach umbrella, a beach cooler and 4 beach towels ready for you!

This is a guesthouse to a main property, that is also an Airbnb. The guesthouse pool and courtyard are completely separate from the main house property, which has it's own yard and pool. Check out the main house property here:

https://www.airbnb.com/slink/B6oUP9L6

Guest access
Entire guesthouse

TITLE: Waterfront Home w/ Private Dock, Kayaks, and Yard!
Listing Name: Waterfront Home w/ Private Dock, Kayaks, and Yard!
name: Waterfront Home w/ Private Dock, Kayaks, and Yard!
description:
Families, friends, and work groups welcome! This spacious 4 bedroom 2 bath house is located on a canal with direct access to the Manatee River. The private dock is the perfect place to relax, fish, or just enjoy the outdoors. We are only 2.5 miles from I-75 and close to many restaurants, grocery stores, shopping, and entertainment.

Anna Maria Island Beaches: 13 Miles
IMG Academy: 10 Miles
Bradenton Motorsports: 14 Miles
Lakewood Ranch: 7 Miles
SRQ: 11 Miles
TIA: 51 Miles

The space
The master bedroom features a king sized bed, closet, Roku TV, and a private full bath.

Bedroom 2 has a queen bed, a twin bed, a large closet, and a smart TV.

Bedroom 3 has a queen bed, twin bed, and twin trundle bed. This bedroom also features a closet and Roku TV.

Bedroom 4 is on the second story with a king bed and a balcony overlooking the canal. This is the perfect spot for a morning cup of coffee and some yoga! A desk, office chair and closet are also located in this room. Please note: this room is airconditioned by a window unit A/C. All other rooms use central heating and cooling.

Both bathrooms include a shower-tub, toilet, soap, shampoo, and conditioner. Towels, wash cloths, and beach towels are provided.

The large living room features a sectional sofa and a smart TV. Roku is provided in 3 bedrooms, however, you will need to use your own log in/account. High speed Wifi is also provided.

The fully equipped kitchen includes a stove, oven, microwave, dishwasher, fridge, pots/pans, and baking necessities. Dishes and silverware to accommodate 12.

Bringing little ones? We provide plastic dishware, a highchair, and pack n play. The home also has additional safety locks on 3 exterior doors. We also have alarms on 3 exterior doors for added child safety.

In the utility room you will find yard games, beach chairs, camping style chairs, and a cooler. We also provide a washer and dryer for our guests. Additionally, we have 4 adult beach cruiser bikes available on the property. Please contact us prior to booking if you plan to bring your boat to store at the dock. 2 single kayaks and 1 double kayak are available to guests who are 14 years and older and who are able to swim. All guests must sign a liability waiver to have access and use of the kayaks and bikes. Please contact the host prior to your arrival to request the waiver.

The dining room table will comfortably fit 6. There is seating at the bar for 3 and additional seating at the breakfast nook for 4. The breakfast nook looks out to the canal and backyard. We also have a backyard patio area with table seating for 4 and lounge seating for 7.


Our house is best suited for families and guests traveling for work. Events and parties will not be tolerated. Please no loud music or fireworks. Smoking in the house, on the balcony, or near exterior doors is not permitted.

Please be aware that 1 bedroom is accessed from 1 flight of stairs. Additionally, there are 2 small step downs within the house to access the living room and breakfast nook/backdoor.

An electronic door keypad is used to access the house. For added security, our codes are changed for each group of guests.

The yard and dock are under 24 hour active video surveillance. Our security system consists of a Wyze doorbell on the front door, a Wyze camera facing the front of the house and yard, and a Wyze camera facing the backyard/dock area. The house also has working fire alarms, carbon monoxide alarms, and an interior noise monitoring device (Minut). The noise monitoring device monitors decibels of noise in the home, not conversations.

Guest access
The entire house and yard is accessible to guests. The owner does have 3 locked closets to store their personal belongings. One is located in the utility room, one is located in the kitchen, and one in a bedroom. Please do not force these doors open.

Other things to note
Check out: We believe that our guests should enjoy their vacation and do not need to worry about a long list of check out procedures. We just ask that our guests close and lock all the windows and doors, turn off the lights, and message the host at check out. Tidying up is always greatly appreciated, but not an expectation.

Listing Name: LUXE! Heated Salt POOL! Close to Town, Beach, IMG
name: LUXE! Heated Salt POOL! Close to Town, Beach, IMG
description:
Beautifully updated coastal farmhouse home in a quiet cul de sac with a private pool oasis in the back. The salt water pool is completely screened in so you can stay in the pool all day and night long without worrying about flies or mosquitos. Kitchen is fully stocked and ready for you to cook up a storm! Or if you prefer, downtown Sarasota is only a short 15 minute drive away with plenty of eating options. Siesta key beach is rated the number one beach in the USA and it‚Äôs only 30 minutes away!

The space
Completely updated 3 bedroom 3 bathroom home that has been beautifully renovated and furnished in a modern coastal design. There is plenty of seating on the huge, comfortable sectional in the living room allowing you to lounge, watch tv, or play some board games. The master bedroom is located on the first floor with its own en-suite bathroom with walk in shower and huge walk in closet that can double up as a workspace if needed. Upstairs you will find the additional 2 bedrooms that are furnished with full over full bunk beds and brand new, super comfortable memory foam mattresses. A portable pack and play is also available for your convenience!

The outdoor area is beautifully lit with ambient patio lights and has seating for 6, patio table, pool loungers, and a Weber grill available for your use. Right outside the screened in area you will find the home sits on a peaceful and serene lake, allowing for privacy and views outside the dining room. Lake is full of all kinds of wildlife including turtles and tropical birds (we haven't seen any alligators!). Back inside the home, the kitchen has all of your cooking essentials, utensils, dishes and updated appliances. The laundry room is also available for your use. You‚Äôll never want to leave the home! But just in case you do, there are plenty of eating options within a 10 minute drive and Lido Key beach only 20 minutes away. Beach chairs and umbrella are also available for your use! Come and enjoy all Florida has to offer at the Yellow Door Oasis!

TITLE: Showstopper. Garden oasis. Spacious & fun.
Listing Name: Showstopper. Garden oasis. Spacious & fun.
name: Showstopper. Garden oasis. Spacious & fun.
description:
Stunning 4-bedroom, 3-full bath retreat, perfect for accommodating up to 14 guests, nestled near Anna Maria, Longboat Key, and Siesta Key. This professionally remodeled and designed house offers a gorgeous kitchen with new appliances and quartz countertops, four spacious bedrooms, and a serene outdoor oasis. Whether you're a family seeking space or a group looking for comfort, this home is your ideal choice. It's just a short drive away to beaches, restaurants, shops and IMG Academy.

The space
Welcome to this spacious one-story house, boasting over 2600 sq ft of accommodation. Professionally remodeled and designed in late 2023, this home showcases stunning terrazzo floors throughout. All furniture and appliances are purchased in 2023, ensuring a comfortable and modern experience.

The fully remodeled kitchen is equipped with stainless steel appliances and beautiful quartz countertops, perfect for preparing delicious meals. We've thought of every detail to make you feel right at home, with a microwave, baking sheets, a 12-cup coffee maker and a Keurig coffee maker. You'll also find washer and dryer in a separate, spacious laundry room for your convenience.

With four tastefully decorated bedrooms, including a master suite and a primary bedroom with its own en-suite bathroom, this house comfortably accommodates families and groups of up to 14 guests. Each bedroom is generously sized, even when furnished with two beds, and includes a ceiling fan with a remote control featuring a sleep timer.

The entire house features dimmable lighting, allowing you to create the perfect ambiance for any occasion. If you need to work remotely, there's plenty of space throughout the house where you can comfortably use your laptop. For those who prefer a workspace, we have thoughtfully equipped the house with an office desk, chair, monitor, and keyboard, making it ideal for making office calls or focusing on tasks. Additionally, we provide beach towels, chairs, and umbrellas to ensure you can fully enjoy your time at the beach.

Outside, a tranquil oasis awaits in the backyard (partially fenced). Enjoy watching the peaceful pond on the patio, basking in the Florida sun, or hosting barbecues and outdoor games. There's plenty of seating for evening gatherings, and if the season is right, you can indulge in organic mangoes from the property.

The location is absolutely ideal, with a short drive to the renowned Anna Maria Island, Longboat Key, Lido Key, and Siesta Key. These areas are famous for their powdery white sands, crystal-clear waters, charming shops, and eateries. For those connected to IMG Academy (just 3 miles away), you can't beat the proximity. Sarasota downtown and Bradenton downtown are also close by.

Whether you're looking for a beachside escape, a family-friendly retreat, a group reunion, or convenient accommodations near IMG Academy, this 4-bedroom house is the perfect choice. Book now for an unforgettable stay filled with relaxation and adventure!

**Bedroom Configuration:**
- Bedroom 1: Master Suite with two Double beds and a private bathroom
- Bedroom 2: Two Queen beds with an en-suite bathroom.
- Bedroom 3: One King bed
- Bedroom 4: One Double over Double bunk bed


**Other Features:**
- Self-check-in and check-out via smart lock
- Dining: An 8-seat dining table plus a 3-seat kitchen island
- Ample outdoor entertaining space with seating for 4, 4, and 6 guests respectively
- High-speed Wi-Fi throughout the entire house
- 3 smart TVs: 1 in the game room, 1 in the living room, and 1 in the King bedroom
- A dedicated work-friendly common area with Wi-Fi
- Air-conditioning and ceiling fans for ultimate comfort
- High chair and Pack & Play for families with little ones
- Enjoy some indoor fun with a pool table and a variety of board games
- Washer and dryer for your convenience
- Luggage racks for your comfort
- Free parking for up to 4 cars on the driveway
- Beach towels, chairs, and umbrellas provided for your beach outings

Inside you'll find colorful decor and an updated kitchen and bathrooms. Each of the three bedrooms on the east side of the house features a queen bed, one with a bonus bunk, while the bunk room off the garage on the west side of the house is a great place for the kids to settle in when it's time to rest.

The family can gather at mealtimes around the big table in the dining room, or snuggle up to stream their favorite movies around the large flat-panel TV in the living room.

A NOTE ABOUT POOL HEAT: If you book online, your reservation will automatically populate with a pool heat charge for one week. If your reservation is for a longer period, someone on our staff will adjust the pool heat rate to reflect the longer stay. We recommend pool heat at this property, regardless of the time of year, as pools near shady trees stay cooler, even in the summer.

*PET OWNERS: This property is dog friendly for one to two dogs with a non-negotiable maximum weight of 25 pounds each and a non-refundable pet fee per dog. There is an additional fee per pet per week for each additional week booked. Also, certain breeds are excluded. It is necessary that you check with our office prior to your trip for details on weight and breed limitations.

FOR GUESTS WITH TODDLERS: This pool is big and open! Although there are pool alarms on every door leading from the back of the house to the pool area, for added peace of mind we can install the home's child safety fence that closely encircles the pool. An additional fee will apply. Please let our office know if you'd like to add this to your reservation.

Sleeps up to 10 in 3 queen beds and 2 twin bunk beds.

Traveling with a larger group? Check out "Tranquil Haven," a gorgeous three-bedroom home just two minutes down the street!

Our Cancellation Policy: In order to protect our owners from loss of income, ALL MONIES PAID TOWARDS YOUR RESERVATION MAY BE NON-REFUNDABLE AFTER A CERTAIN DATE! FULL AND PARTIAL REFUNDS MAY BE GIVEN UNDER CERTAIN CONDITIONS. Ask our office for details, or check your rental agreement.

TITLE: Island Home 5 min to Park, 25 min to Beach, Pool
Listing Name: Island Home 5 min to Park, 25 min to Beach, Pool
name: Island Home 5 min to Park, 25 min to Beach, Pool
description:
Soak up the warm Florida sunshine from this inviting 1969 home on Snead Island! Whether it's the oceanside air or the beachy design of this impeccably clean vacation rental, guests find themselves relaxing as soon as they arrive. Our light-filled interior includes a fully equipped kitchen and all the comforts of home. Spend time by the pool & hot tub, then head to the shores of Anna Maria Island (14 miles away) for a beach picnic just in time for sunset!
(Message me about multiple pets)

The space
Living Room:
Step into the inviting living room with cozy seating and a large flat-screen TV. It's the perfect place to unwind after a day of exploring the sunshine state.

Kitchen and dining area:
The fully equipped kitchen has all the modern appliances and cookware you need to prepare delicious meals. Gas stove. Enjoy your culinary creations in the dining area, which comfortably seats 6, making meal times a breeze.

Bedrooms:
Each of the three bedrooms is designed with your comfort in mind, featuring plush bedding and ample storage space.

Bathroom:
The clean and modern bathroom has essentials and fresh towels, ensuring you have everything.

Outdoor Space:
Our outdoor amenities are where the property truly shines. Relax on the outdoor patio, perfect for morning coffee or evening cocktails. The screened-in pool and patio area provide an excellent swimming space and lounge without worrying about bugs. The entire fenced yard is ideal for children, guests, and pets. Gather around the fire pit in the evening for a cozy and memorable experience.

Location:
This home is located on Snead Island. Quiet and quaint. You're moments from Emerson Point Park and about a 25-minute drive to Anna Maria Island.
Please note that this home is "off the beaten path".

Guest access
A guest has access to the entire property, including a private pool and hot tub.

Other things to note
This home is on a septic tank. Please note not to flush anything but toilet paper.
Please note this is a low-lying area, and during hard rains (like a tropical storm), you may not be able to use the shower or wash clothes for a few hours.

TITLE: Elegant 4BR Dog Friendly | Pool | Patio
Beach Lagoon House (pool&close to beach)
Listing Name: Beach Lagoon House (pool&close to beach)
name: Beach Lagoon House (pool&close to beach)
description:
This 3 bedroom 2 bath Lagoon style pool house will have you in awe. With plenty of space for family fun and a backyard that will amaze you, this home is only 5 miles from AMI. Located in West Bradenton, Village Green Neighborhood, with a spectacular backyard with ample amount of space , it‚Äôs worth the hype. Check out our photos and see for yourself!!

The space
Welcome to the beach lagoon house! The perfect vacation home for a family. This 3 bedroom 2 bathroom house is located in west Bradenton 5 miles from Holmes Beach AMI , 1/2 mile from shopping center, and 3.5 miles from downtown Bradenton, 9 miles from long boat key, and 17.5 miles from Siesta key.

This beautiful pool home has a fully stocked kitchen with all new appliances. In the kitchen you can find: pots and pans, utensils, plates, bowls, mixing bowls, blender, toaster, baking sheets, casserole dishes, sponge, hand soap, dish soap, cups, coffee cups, & seasoning. If you have any requests please let us know so we can accommodate you.

Right next to the kitchen is the dining room over looking the back porch. The dining room table seats 6 people.

Next to the dining room is the designated office space. Off to the right of the office is our living room. We have a huge sectional, a 70‚Äù roku tv (no cable), a coffee table with coasters.

When you walk in to the front door you will see the living room to the left and a hallway to the right. The hallway leads to 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms.

The first bedroom has 1 queen bed, 2 night stands, a 50‚Äù roku smart tv, walk in closet with hangers, laundry basket, two swivel chairs, and a private bathroom. In this bathroom there is a walk in shower, toilet, and a single sink. The mirror has a light built in it and can be turned on and off by just a touch! And also has defrost mode.

When you walk out of the first bedroom to your left is the common bathroom for everyone to use. This bathroom has the tub/shower combo, a toilet, a single sink, big vanity and the same mirror with the light built in as well!

Next to the common bathroom is the 2nd bedroom, in this bedroom you can find a 50‚Äù Roku smart tv, 1 queen bed , 2 side tables and 2 closets with hangers.

The third ‚Äúbedroom‚Äù is located next to the kitchen. It is a garage converted spacious bedroom! But don‚Äôt worry! This garage doesn‚Äôt feel like a garage. It has one queen bed in it, and two side tables. Also a queen pullout couch bed. Bedroom feels just like the rest of the house. This room has its own AC unit so you‚Äôre still staying cool in this Florida heat. It‚Äôs almost like your own little hotel room.

The laundry room is located inside the garage bedroom, but tucked in the back corner so it‚Äôs out of the way.

The backyard is like no other with a bubbling 3 ft drop lagoon style pool surrounded by sand color pavers and Astro turf for activities like Corn hole. This massive space is perfect for family fun and creating memories. There is also tons of kids toys in the back yard.

Guest access
You‚Äôll be able to access every part of the house!
There is two separate spots to park, 8 car parking in the front of the house (in the driveway and shell) and 4 more car parking on the side of the house on the shell. Plenty of room for your boat Please no parking in the grass.

Other things to note
Grill is in backyard please clean after yourselves.

Hurricane season is still a no refund policy. You take that risk when booking during these months.

pool is not heated

pool is 3ft deep, not a swimming pool. More of a lounging pool. Since it is so shallow it does get warmer faster

TITLE: FREE Heated Pool, Multiple King BR's, IMG Nearby
Listing Name: FREE Heated Pool, Multiple King BR's, IMG Nearby
name: FREE Heated Pool, Multiple King BR's, IMG Nearby
description:
Welcome to the beautiful & cozy Bradenton Boho Bungalow near the historic Bradenton Country Club! One of the BEST locations to get around. Located on a very safe & quiet residential street with LOW traffic. Perfect for your family destination! We also provide FREE pool heat!

*5 min to tons of shopping & dining
*8 miles to Anna Maria Island / beaches
*Close to Downtown Bradenton and Riverwalk
*5 min to LECOM Field
*10 min to IMG Academy
*15 min to the Sarasota Airport

The space
*BEDROOMS*

Primary Bedroom -
- Sealy Memory Foam KING BED with CopperChill Technology!
- Located on it's own side of the house and has its own direct access to the screened-in lanai. - En-suite bathroom with walk-in closet.
- 43in smart TV on big, spacious dresser.
- Charging stations
- Room darkening curtains
- Ceiling fan

Bedroom 2 -
- Sealy Memory Foam KING BED with CopperChill Technology!
- 43in smart TV
- Charging stations
- Room darkening curtains
- Ceiling fan

Bedroom 3 -
- DOUBLE TWIN BUNK BEDS, can sleep up to 4 in this room
- This bedroom is the perfect retreat for the kids!
- 43in smart TV
- Charging station
- Room darkening curtains

Every bedroom is equipped with plenty of linens and extra pillows!

*BATHROOMS*
- Two full bathrooms in the house
- Stocked with all the essentials you need for the start of your stay
- Hair dryers
- Makeup cloths

*KITCHEN & DINING*
- All brand new appliances (as of January 2024)
- Full sized fridge w/water & ice dispenser
- Granite countertops
- Garbage disposal
- Stocked with plenty of plates, cups, and silverware. Lots of pots/pans and other cookware to make your favorite meals. Next to the kitchen is a big and sturdy table - perfect for playing games and seating up to 8 people with a big pew bench.

*LIVING ROOM*
- Large, cozy, high-end leather couch to watch your favorite show or movie!
- 70in smart TV, with FREE YouTubeTV during your stay.
- FAST 2GB fiber internet, you won't miss a beat!

*SITTING AREA*
Be sure to take a seat in some super comfy vintage stuffed chairs, next to the electric fireplace. Need a place for the laptop? Make a simple workspace on the writing desk. 2GB Fiber internet, super fast!

*OUTSIDE SPACE*
- Spacious & furnished screened-in lanai
- Ceiling fan in lanai
- Fun, massive connect 4 game
- Private heated pool
- Gas Grill
- Firepit
- Unique and fun "beach directional sign" (Take a selfie!)

Guest access
Guests are free to use all spaces within the home, all living and bedroom spaces. The backyard is fenced and is not shared with anyone, so guests can enjoy some privacy with the pool, grill, and firepit.

Other things to note
- We are an approved and fully licensed vacation rental with the City of Bradenton and the State of Florida. This is important as not every vacation rental is licensed and is operating illegally. (Which can result in the renters being kicked out) We can provide our license # upon request.
- FREE POOL HEAT!! Pool is set at 85 degrees.
- Pets are not allowed.
- No 3rd party booking allowed.
- NO PARTIES OR EVENTS. There is a sheriff that lives across the street.
- This is a smoke-free home, including the outside area surrounding the property. No smoking of any substance, including vaping. There is a strict $500 fine if there is any smoke smell, damage, or any new/used tobacco products left in or around the home or property. If you or your guests are smokers, this isn't the place for you.
- Neighborhood quiet hours of 10pm to 8am. Again, there is a sheriff that lives across the street.
- No parking is allowed on the grass/yard. $500 fine if parked or driven on any part of the grass/yard.
- There is one camera on site which is located by the front door. Reservations will be terminated immediately for covering, tampering with or blocking any part of the camera, with no refund.
- There is no life guard on duty for the pool. Swim at your own risk.
- Weather and hurricanes are a part of the Florida lifestyle. Good weather can never be guaranteed and by booking our vacation rental, you assume 100% of the risk. We will provide refunds and/or cancellations only if mandatory evacuations are issued. Our evacuation zone is D, which is the safest location and last zone to be evacuated. We strongly suggest getting travel insurance to cover any travel interruptions.
- There are a couple of bikes that people may use. Please note by staying at our vacation rental, you take full responsibility and 100% risk of using the bikes and that you agree to wear helmets (provided) when using the bikes.
- There are 4 TV remotes (one for each tv). $25 replacement cost per remote will be charged if missing, damaged, or lost.
- There is one garage door remote. $25 replacement cost if remote is missing, damaged, or lost.

TITLE: Central Sprawl- Heated Pool+Spa!
Listing Name: Central Sprawl- Heated Pool+Spa!
name: Central Sprawl- Heated Pool+Spa!
description:
Welcome to Central Sprawl! My 1+ acre water view property is the ideal setting to enjoy a sense of country sprawl, while having our areas most desirable amenities nearby. Over 2,400 square-feet of bright and refreshing open living space welcomes you to relax and unwind. The 4 bedrooms are divided among 2 levels allowing for privacy between split parties or adults with children. Pool and spa are situated under the screened lanai with an additional 500+ square-foot open-air patio with pergola.

The space
Enjoy lakefront sunset views from the second floor balcony, pool or hot tub. Catch the perfect sunset view over the water from the back patio.

Located close to the best restaurants our area has to offer, 1 mile from Walmart and Publix, 16 miles to Siesta Key Beach, 14 miles to white sand beaches on AMI, 8 miles to UTC Mall, Benderson Park and rowing facility. 6 miles to Bradenton Area Conventional Center, 9 miles to Premier Sports Complex and 6 miles to IMG Academy. Sarasota International Airport is also less than 7 miles away!

Property is ideal for family vacations with ample space to spread out and enjoy each other‚Äôs company. The driveway is even large enough to bring your boat!

Smart TV's and Super Fast 1GB WiFi!

Lounge chairs and seating around the pool and patio allow you comfort while you enjoy the beautiful Florida weather.

Screened lanai to help keep bugs at bay and the pool clean.

Stocked pond on-site for catch and release fun for kids of all ages.

Bedroom 1: King Bed,
ensuite Bathroom with shower & large jacuzzi tub
Bedroom 2: King Bed
Bedroom 3: Queen Bed
Bedroom 4: Full over Full bunk with Twin trundle
Loft: Queen Murphy bed
Living Room: Queen Sofa Bed
Several air mattresses provided for your convenience

All linens and towels provided (bath and beach!)

The kitchen is fully equipped and includes stainless steel appliances with granite counters

Plenty of place settings to include drinking glasses, wine glasses, coffee mugs, pots and pans, cooking utensils, mixing bowls, baking dishes, pizza pan, cookie sheet, toaster, blender, crock pot, air fryer, can opener, wine opener, measuring cups/spoons, coffee maker (including complimentary coffee and creamer!)

Gas Grill provided with propane provided. We do not refill the tank so when it is empty feel free to exchange it (typically $20+/-).

Dining: Dining room table that seats 7 plus
Breakfast table w/2 stools. Other counter-seating available.

15 guests maximum with a limit of 8 adults (18yoa+).

Pack and Play and high chair provided.

Poolside: Outdoor chairs and accent table

Patio: Two, double sun loungers and outdoor sofa and chairs under the cedar pergola

Pool settings are all scheduled. When requested, Pool Heat can be set to 85 degrees, however if air temps drop below 70 degrees it can affect pool temp, so unfortunately temperatures cannot be guaranteed. If you desire the pool to be heated, please notify me upon booking so we can start the heating 24 hours in advance so it is ready for you upon your arrival.

Pool Heat is $100 per week or the duration of your stay; whichever is less.

Hot tub is set to 100 degrees and is included with your stay.

Games: Cards, Board Games, Pool Toys

Central air & heat pump with separate controls for upstairs and downstairs floors.

Washer and Dryer (including detergent & dryer sheets)

An abundance of amenities are included such as, toilet paper, paper towels, dish soap, dishwasher detergent, salt & pepper and soap!

Beach Equipment: chairs, large beach mat, cooler bag and wagon provided.

Pets will be considered on a case by case basis, and a $250 fee applies. Please message me your pet‚Äôs breed, size and level of obedience/house training. Pets must never be left alone uncrated* in the home or yard. Yard must be cleaned up after pet and kept free of fecal matter.

*Crate will be provided upon request and pet fee paid

This is a very well kept home and I want everyone to enjoy their time however; I do not allow parties. Violators of this rule will be immediately evicted without refund and subject to an additional $500 eviction fee. (Small gatherings and celebrations are allowed-message host for approval). No playing loud or vulgar music outside, no drug use on the property including marijuana with a medical ID, no excess cars or guests. No street or yard parking. Absolutely no indoor smoking including the garage. Age 26+ to book. 8 adults maximum (18+). We care about our neighbors and our home and this behavior is prohibited at this property.

There are no cameras located in, on or around my property. Your privacy and peace of mind is very important to me.

Guest access
You will have the entire house and 1+ acre property to yourself which includes the pool & hot tub as well as access to the stocked pond and garage.

Other things to note
Free early check in when available (not available on same day turns)- please check with host

TITLE: Serenity Now Bradenton
Listing Name: Serenity Now Bradenton
name: Serenity Now Bradenton
description:
Imagine life in a tropical oasis-surrounded by palms trees, soaking up the Florida sun while relaxing in a private pool. Serenity Now Bradenton, a 3bedroom/2 bath old Florida cottage located near Anna Maria Island's Gulf beaches, offers just that. This fully equipped home, located near the Manatee River & the best this West Coast area has to offer, will make your stay memorable and stress free. A large lot & ample parking, so bring your RV or boat.

No events or parties allowed.

The space
Outdoor living is what the Florida lifestyle is all about. Spend your days lounging by the pool in this tranquil setting or take a night swim under the peaceful night skies. The large, fenced in yard provides plenty of space to spread out and enjoy games of cornhole, bocce ball or volleyball.

This coastal sanctuary is full of Florida charm with modern day amenities and an open concept floor plan; perfect for family/friends' gatherings. The new remodeled, fully appointed kitchen includes a gas stove, Keurig coffeemaker, and all the appliances needed to prepare and serve meals. Formal dining indoors or casual dining outdoors options are available.

Each bedroom is its own retreat, tastefully decorated with relaxing colors and cooling ceiling fans. Perfect for afternoon naps after a day in the sun or for a restful night's sleep. The master bedroom has a King sized bed with cooling mattress topper. The 2nd bedroom has a Queen and the 3rd bedroom has 2 twins. All bedrooms have their own TVs. Additional Queen sized Sealy sleeper sofa in the living room. A Pack and Play can be made available upon request.

With close proximity to all the waterways of the Tampa Bay, this location is a boater's dream. A gated parking area with plenty of room for your boat/jet skis and trailer. A public boat launch is less than a mile away.
For seasonal travelers- this parking space would be perfect to keep your RV.

Working remotely? Picture a day at the office with views of the pool. Extra large desk and WIFI with high speed internet are sure to increase productivity!

This home is ideal for longer stays. Our location allows you proximity to enjoy the best of the area without the paying Island prices.

Guest access
Guests have access to entire house and yard
Detached garage is private.

Other things to note
We have beach supplies: chairs, cooler, wave boards, and sand toys.
Pool can be surrounded with a security fence for small children at guest requests.

Only Service Animals allowed. Service animals may not be left unattended at home without their owner present.


Pool heater is an extra $25 a night

description:
St. Lucia - 2 Bedroom / 2 Bathroom, Heated Pool, 40 ft. Boat Dock, with Water Views

The space
Welcome to St. Lucia, a waterfront single family house beautifully decorated in 2020. This private pool home has 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms.

Ideally located in Flamingo Cay, this home is just a 5-minute drive away from Anna Maria Island's beautiful and pristine white sand beaches with turquoise waters. Experience the best of both worlds by enjoying the peace and serenity of a neighborhood away from the hustle and bustle of the busy island, yet never far away from everything island life has to offer.

Our St. Lucia is nicely appointed with everything you may need during your stay. Enjoy cooking up your catch of the day in the well-equipped kitchen. If you are more of a BBQ person, a gas grill is available on the outside patio. The home comes fully stocked with bath towels, beach & pool towels and bed linens.

Soak up every second of cherished Florida sunshine while taking a dip in this new private heated pool. Beach supplies such as chairs and umbrellas can be found stored inside the garage, which also offers parking for one car and has a washer and dryer.

The master bedroom offers a king size bed, TV, walk-in closet and en-suite bathroom with walk-in shower. The guest bedroom offers two twin-size beds, TV, and a guest bathroom with shower tub combination is available in the hallway.

The living room offers comfortable seating for up to 4 people to catch up on your favorite TV shows and free highspeed Wi-Fi internet is available throughout the house. The oversized and air-conditioned Florida sunroom overlooking the pool is the perfect spot for family dinners or reading a book on the lounger while keeping an eye on children outside.

Located on a canal with private 40 ft. boat dock, we encourage you to rent a boat locally and explore the area. The waters of Palma Sola Bay are within sight, the Intercostal Waterways not much further, and you would not want to miss out on some boat cruising, tubing and fishing.

IMPORTANT: Parking of a boat trailer on the property requires advance approval by Island Dreams. Please contact us if you plan on having a trailer with you during your stay.

Pack and play and highchair provided.

Parental supervision for outdoor areas is required at all times.

Maximum Parking: 2 vehicles

Home is NOT wheelchair accessible

PLEASE NOTE: After successfully booking the home, you will receive an email message with a link to a rental agreement, which will require your online signature.

TITLE: Tropical Cottage w SPA near Anna Maria Island IMG
Listing Name: Tropical Cottage w SPA near Anna Maria Island IMG
name: Tropical Cottage w SPA near Anna Maria Island IMG
description:
Located in the secluded and historical best part of Bradenton along Palma Sola Bay, you will appreciate the quietness and charm of this cottage , near Anna Maria Island

The space
This one floor house offers 1300 square feet under AC

Other things to note
SPA SAFETY RULES
Supervision for Children:
Children under the age of 12 should never be allowed in a hot tub without adult supervision. The combination of high water temperatures and deep water can pose significant risks.
Time Limit:
Prolonged exposure to hot water can cause dizziness or heat stroke. Guests should limit their soaking time to 15-20 minutes and take a break before re-entering the spa.
Temperature Control:
The hot tub temperature should never exceed 104 degrees Fahrenheit, as recommended by the U.S. Consumer Product Safety Commission.
No Glassware:
To avoid potential injury, glass containers should never be allowed near or in the hot tub. Plastic or shatterproof containers should be used instead.
Cleanliness:
Guests should always shower before using the hot tub to remove any lotions, oils, or other substances that could affect water quality.
No Diving or Jumping:
Due to the relatively shallow depth of a hot tub, diving or jumping in could lead to serious injury. Make it clear to guests that they should enter and exit the hot bath tub carefully and calmly.
Limit on Occupancy:
Every hot tub has a maximum safe occupancy number based on its size. Guests should be informed of this limit to avoid overloading the hot tub, which can compromise its structure and filtration system, and also increase the risk of accidents.
No Electrical Appliances:
Any electrical devices, including phones, speakers, or laptops, should be kept at a safe distance from the pool or hot tub to avoid the risk of electric shock.
Pregnant Women Caution:
It is widely recommended that pregnant women consult with a healthcare professional before using a hot tub, as elevated body temperatures can pose risks during pregnancy.
Hydration:
Encourage guests to drink water before and after hot tub use to avoid dehydration, which can be heightened by the heat of the hot tub.
Proper Attire:
Guests should be advised to wear suitable swimwear that doesn‚Äôt compromise the water quality. Regular clothing or underwear can introduce detergents or contaminants to the water.
No Pets:
Pets should not be allowed to sit in the hot tub for their safety and to maintain water cleanliness.
Cover After Use:
Guests should be instructed to cover the hot tub after each use. This helps maintain water temperature, prevent debris and food from entering the tub, and acts as a safety measure to prevent unsupervised use.
Noise Control:
To respect the tranquility of the surrounding area or neighboring properties, a rule about maintaining a low noise level, especially during late hours, would be considerate.

The spacious guest bedroom offers two comfortable twin beds. The room has large oversized closet, dresser and night stand which provide plenty of storage space. There is also a flat screen TV (Roku stick compatible but must bring your own). The guest bedroom includes a full bathroom with a nice shower, toilet and granite countertop sink.

The fully equipped granite countertop kitchen has a large fridge, stove, dishwasher and smaller appliances such as a Keurig coffee machine, coffee pot machine, toaster and blender etc. for your convenience. The eat-in kitchen has a beautiful nice oak table and 4 chairs providing plenty of space.

Enjoy your dining experience in the separate dining room with ample room for up to 6 people. Perfect for unwinding from your busy day at the pool, beach or sightseeing.

The Shorewalk Vacation Villa Resort is located on 30 acres of lighted walkways and has excellent amenities including: 2 heated community swimming pools, hot tub, 2 tennis courts, pickle ball court, basketball court, newly renovated clubhouse with large screen TV, large sun deck, table tennis, ping pong, billiard/pool table, 2 oversized BBQ grills, free WIFI and six lakes stocked with fish. The condo has high-speed internet, plus 3 TV sets and a telephone with free calling to USA, Canada and Puerto Rico. This new two bedroom 2 bath condo offers a courtyard view and spacious accommodations. This private island paradise is a 2 minute drive over the bridge to Manatee Beach on the Gulf side of Anna Maria Island and to supermarkets, pharmacies and shopping areas.

One Particular Harbour is a secure, gated community offering covered parking with extra parking out front of the unit. It has elevator access.

SO SMOKING/FREE WI-FI

Spacious shower/bath combo

TITLE: 5/2 pool house close to AMI beaches, RV hookup
2/2 Charming Riverfront Cottage w Deck & Kayaks
Listing Name: 2/2 Charming Riverfront Cottage w Deck & Kayaks
name: 2/2 Charming Riverfront Cottage w Deck & Kayaks
description:
Let your worries drift away at this unique and tranquil river house getaway we call the Lazy Gator Lodge.

Craftsman cottage offering 2 large bedrooms with en suite bathrooms, open layout with great views of Braden River. The house has a large deck out back plus a fenced in yard for pet owners and families to enjoy.

Centrally located for the best of Bradenton/Lakewood Ranch/Sarasota -- and its world class beaches of Siesta Key and Anna Maria.

The space
A nature lover's dream and perfect for those who appreciate character and craftsmanship. The house was built in 1954 and we have taken careful thought to honor its history with decor and stylings that preserve the charm but offer all the modern comforts.

LIVING ROOM
Large leather sectional with chairs that electrically recline for max comfort in front of the 55" television and beautiful view of the river

KITCHEN
Fully equipped with everything a chef could need to prepare a fine meal. Double oven, Keurig and standard drip coffee maker, crock pot, and Weber grills for cookouts

MASTER #1
Both bedrooms could be considered "master bedrooms" but this one has a giant sliding glass doors to welcome your morning with a view of the river. The kingsized Tempur-pedic luxury bed will have you snuggled in tight. Also has its own bathroom with tub shower, a desk, TV, and a sitting area just outside your room on the deck.

MASTER #2
Recently remodeled with almost 2 separate areas in this extra large suite. One side has your luxury king bed while the other has a trundle day bed that has 2 twin mattresses. The room has a separate heating and cooling system so you can ensure a comfortable sleeping climate. Also has a private full bathroom and large tv on a swinging mount.

OUTSIDE
Huge wooden deck with large dinning table plus multiple sitting areas to relax and enjoy your front-row seat to the river. It‚Äôs a freshwater wetlands habitat for a wide range of birds and fish as well as the occasional otter, turtle and alligator - all safely kept below the property seawall. Smokeless fire pit will make your evenings extra memorable along the flowing water. The whole outside can be fenced off in multiple ways if you have pets staying with you, so they can be safe hanging out on the deck or limited to just the grassy side yard.

EXTRAS
A 3 seater canoe and two single fishing kayaks are provided for your adventures.

4 beach chairs, towels, a sun tent, cooler, and beach mat provided for your perfect beach day.

50 amp outlet in carport for complimentary EV charging, just bring your cord. (No RV's allowed)

NEIGHBORHOOD
Marineland is one of the oldest subdivisions in Manatee County and sits on the freshwater Braden River which is about 8 miles long and rich in history. Attractions along the river include Jiggs Landing and Linger Lodge - both can be accessed by river and you can stop and eat at either. The Braden River has fabulous fishing and bird watching.

Super convenient to loads of shopping and dinning - plus all the area attractions and hot spots.

Guest access
This rental is fully private and guests will have the entire space to themselves.

Other things to note
The house was built in 1954 and the master bedroom has some low beams -- we don't recommend that room for people over 6'3" in height so they don't bump their head : )

This vacation home has something for everyone! The property is situated off Cortez road and brings you out to Sarasota Bay. With a boat dock large enough for a 30' boat (Boatlift in pictures is not available to renters). With no bridges to the bay by boat and just minutes away from the most popular beaches in the area, this renovated pool home is the perfect destination spot to enjoy everything the area has to offer!

When pulling up to the property you instantly notice the well-manicured exterior and large driveway! Walking into the front door your eyes are instantly pulled to all the natural light coming off the back of the property overlooking the pool and canal. The main living space offers a large flat screen smart TV and has plenty of space for seating for everyone to gather around and play games and enjoy family time! For your enjoyment, you also have a professional-sized Billards table available for use.

The kitchen comes fully equipped with everything needed to make your favorite home-cooked meals! If you enjoy cooking on the grill the property has one of those available as well!

Leading out to the lanai the pool area has a large covered area and also available space to enjoy the sun in the loungers. The private pool can be heated for an additional fee during the colder months of the year. (This property DOES NOT have a spa). Leading out onto the deck is a large brick paver area as well as an extended dock perfect for your boat along with electricity and water.

Trying to figure out sleeping arrangements? The Master Bedroom offers a king-size bed, a mounted smart tv as well as an ensuite bathroom with a stand-up shower. The guest bedroom offers a Queen size bed. A shared bathroom is located in this hallway as well with a tub/shower combo.

Master Bedroom - King Bed, Ensuite Bathroom, Smart TV
Bedroom 2 - Queen Bed

*The boat lift on this property is owner-occupied year-round and not available for tenants' use. Tenants may dock their boat in the water along the dock only.
*Ring Doorbell located on Front Door
*Front Door and side gates are monitored with video surveillance.
* Pool can be heated for an extra fee.
*Pool heaters in private homes are locked for your safety and controls must not be tampered with as they are monitored by the pool company. 85¬∞ is the highest heat temperature setting. Pool temperatures will probably stay around 76¬∞ during the winter months. Please note if cold days occur, water temperatures will drop and may take longer to heat.
* Not Pet Friendly
*Owner Leaves car parked in driveway and boat on lift.

Damage Waiver: The total cost of your reservation for this Property includes a nightly damage waiver fee (‚ÄúManagement‚Äù), plus tax if applicable.
The Damage Waiver covers you for up to $1,500 of accidental damage to the Property or its contents (such as furniture, fixtures, and appliances) as long as you report the incident to the host prior to checking out. The Damage Waiver fee eliminates the need for a traditional security deposit.
More information is available from the ‚ÄúRental Agreement‚Äù in the House Rules

Other things to note
1. Please read the guestbook! Info like trash days, wifi passwords, and other things you need to know is located in the book.
2. Any people other than those in the guest party (renter) are the sole responsibility of the guest (renter). Parties and events are not allowed unless given prior
approval from the management company and paid an event fee. If a party or event did happen at the house an additional fee will be charged to the card on file
based on the property rented.
3. This home is privately owned. The homeowners are not responsible for any accidents, injuries, or illnesses that occur
while on-premises. The homeowners are not responsible for the loss of personal belongings or valuables of the guest. By
accepting this reservation, it is agreed that all guests are expressly assuming the risk of any harm arising from their use
of the premises or others whom they invite to use the premises.
4. Pets are only permitted with prior approval and upon completion of the Pet Addendum to the rental agreement. An additional pet fee does apply.
5. Please be considerate to the neighbors and not have loud music after 10 pm.
6. All items in the home and on the property, including DVD's, CD, books and games are intended for entertainment and
enjoyment of the guests while staying at the house and are not to be removed from the home or property. The only
exception would be those items which are intended for use at the beach.
7. Some properties have keys and garage/ gate remotes, if they are lost its $50 each to replace.
8. Please clean the grills after each use. There will be a $50 cleaning fee charged if grill is not cleaned.
9. No smoking allowed in the house. Smoking is allowed outside only.
($500 cleaning fee applies if found smoking in house or smoke smell)
10. Please follow the departure instructions to help keep our cleaning costs down. We do everything we can to keep the properties in the best shape possible
with your help! If you need anything during your stay please let us know!

My only wish to you is to enjoy my house and take a good care of it. I've worked so hard to achieve what I have.
Thank You for checking out my home and never stop dreaming!!!

@Art_House_SRQ

New 9 ft stock tank pool - 1 mile from SRQ Airport, Art House is also conveniently located near many beaches. Less than a mile from Sarasota Bay, 5 miles from Lido Beach, 10 miles from Siesta Key and countless others. 4 miles from downtown Sarasota and 1 mile down the street from the historic Ringling Museum! 25 min from the adorable Anna Maria Island, 20 min to Holmes and Coquina Beaches. Super funky home, and with ideal comforts. A photographer's dream!

The space
This home is artful and inspired. Each and every corner has been curated to be equal parts visually stimulating and warmly comfortable. New 9 ft stock tank Pool! As is mentioned in the title, this lovely home boasts modern and provoking art throughout. Cooling bamboo sheets on every bed, lush king sized pillows, a fully stocked kitchen, Keurig coffee maker, all ceramic cookware, and so many other amenities welcome you to the Art House. Newly installed Art + Novelties vending machine - featuring the work for sale of many local artists.

Overview of bedrooms and bathrooms:

++ A primary bedroom featuring a king sized bed, en suite bathroom with a shower and private entry door to the backyard.

++ A secondary bedroom featuring a queen sized bed.

++ A third bedroom with a bunk bed. A full sized bed on the bottom and a twin sized bed on the top.

++ A fourth bonus room featuring a twin sized sleeper sofa and two matching loveseats. This room contains the projector (the only other "TV" in the home aside from the main living room TV).

++ A second bathroom featuring a bathtub.

Guest access
This home shares the property with a detached guesthouse - that is a separate AirBNB. This guesthouse has a small private stock tank pool. The guests of Art House will not have access to this stock tank pool or small courtyard located near the guesthouse. Art House has its own larger, private backyard and larger stock tank pool.

The guests of Art Haus have 2 reserved parking spaces in the rock driveway (the right side). The guesthouse in the back also has 2 reserved spaces (the left side). There is unlimited and free street parking.

TITLE: Banyan in Bradenton
Listing Name: Banyan in Bradenton
name: Banyan in Bradenton
description:
**ASK ABOUT LAST MINUTE DEALS!

Located in West Bradenton, this secluded neighborhood features family homes on quiet residential streets plus super easy access to shopping and dining. Take a short stroll to Palma Sola Bay for serene views, picnicking, kayaking and a boat launch. Find the best seafood in the quaint local restaurants in the Cortez Commercial Fishing Village, several great boutiques, and Tyler's Homemade Ice Cream just around the Corner.

The space
Cross the Cortez bridge and you are on beautiful Anna Maria Island featuring 7 miles of sugar sand beaches.

This one bedroom unit is roomy and well-furnished. The open floor plan utilizes the space well and has everything you need to make your getaway special. You will want to brag to your friends about this perfect haven and everyone will want to make Banyan a regular part of future vacations.

You probably won't want to leave this relaxing home away from home, but if you decide to do some exploring, feel free to walk the neighborhood and enjoy lovely views of the water and the Marina at the end of the street. Or, for more adventure, Palma Sola Bay Kayak Rentals is just 2 blocks away! The historic Cortez fishing village is very close and if you cross the Cortez bridge onto Anna Maria Island, you can get to the sparkling Gulf waters within minutes. Once you're on the Island, take Anna Maria's free trolley for great shopping and dining options.

While we know you love your furry friends, this property is not pet friendly. Please make other arrangements for your pets.

Our Cancellation Policy: In order to protect our owners from loss of income, ALL MONIES PAID TOWARDS YOUR RESERVATION MAY BE NON-REFUNDABLE AFTER A CERTAIN DATE! FULL AND PARTIAL REFUNDS MAY BE GIVEN UNDER CERTAIN CONDITIONS. Ask our office for details, or check your rental agreement.

name: Romantic Quiet Luxury Tiny Home W/ Private Hot Tub
description:
Escape to a tropical paradise in this brand new luxury tiny home, nestled among palm trees. Relax in the private hot tub. Just 6 miles to Anna Maria. Ideal for a romantic getaway or a peaceful retreat.

We are located in a quiet neighborhood with a 10PM noise ordinance. If you want a quiet relaxing getaway, our tiny home is perfect for you.

A car is recommended in this area as there is limited public transportation. The best rental car rates can be found at TPA/SRQ airport.

The space
This is a custom built tiny home located in Bradenton, Fl. in a quiet waterfront neighborhood.

Bradenton Causeway- 3 miles
Anna Maria/Beach-6 miles
Grocery Stores-1.5 miles
Downtown Bradenton-4 miles.

The tiny home is fully private, separated from the main residence by a fence and lush landscaping. Inside, you'll find high-end finishes like polished concrete floors, marble countertops, micro-cement walls, and European slab cabinets. Large picture windows create a seamless connection with nature. As the property is completely private and dark at night, there are no window coverings. We can provide eye masks for mornings when you'd like to sleep in.. The custom built bed/booth/dining area features a hidden queen bed with a luxury foam mattress that slides out on rollers, allowing you to reclaim space in the morning. The home is 240 Sq. Ft. with an equally spacious patio. Relax in the new hot tub, with powerful jets.

Note the parking spot requires being able to drive over a 3" curb.

Kitchen Includes:
-Keurig
-French Press
-Water Kettle
-Toaster
-Fridge/Freeze

Guest access
You have access to the entire tiny home and the entire property that the tiny home sits on. It is fenced and private :)

Other things to note
The house may pose some challenges for guests with mobility issues, as it takes about 15 pounds of force to roll the bed out from under the dinette. Also the step up to the dinette is about 20".


Please note that this home is intended for a quiet, relaxing getaway. It is not suitable for parties, loud noise, or excessive drinking. We ask that you respect the peaceful atmosphere of the property and the surrounding area. All noise must be taken inside after 10PM. Failure to do so may result in removal from the property.

No smoking on the property.

Max 2 guest on the property. Please note that only registered guests on the reservation are permitted on the property.

While we love animals, our cleaner has an allergy, so we are unable to accommodate any animals in the tiny home.

No guest under 21 without prior approval. Guest under 21, there is a $200 refundable deposit required.

TITLE: Relax & Play! Salt Pool | 5 Min to IMG, 10 to AMI!
Listing Name: Relax & Play! Salt Pool | 5 Min to IMG, 10 to AMI!
name: Relax & Play! Salt Pool | 5 Min to IMG, 10 to AMI!
description:
You're close to everything when you stay at this West Bradenton gem with a heated and chilled saltwater pool and spa, fully stocked kitchen and idyllic, resort-like backyard with a massive patio, outdoor dining and propane grill. Just 5 minutes to IMG, 10 to Anna Maria, 20 to Sarasota Airport (SRQ), 45 to Tampa Int'l (TPA). 3 large bedrooms with 4 beds, smart TVs in every room, screened lanai. Walk-in shower in master bath. Fiber internet and dedicated work area with ultrawide monitor & printer.

The space
This home is thoughtfully equipped to meet all your needs during your stay. With three bedrooms and two baths, it comfortably accommodates up to 8 guests. All beds have brand new mattresses as of May 2024.

Upon arrival, guests are greeted with a sampling of K-cup coffee pods and hotel-sized toiletries to kickstart their stay. I also supply laundry pods, dishwasher detergent, dish soap, paper towels, napkins and toilet paper, though you may need to purchase additional supplies depending on usage and length of your stay.

Inside, you'll find 4k smart TVs in the living room and all three bedrooms, a walk-in shower in the master bath, and a dining table that can comfortably seat eight adults. A dedicated work space includes an ultrawide monitor, laser printer and ethernet connectivity for the fastest internet speeds.

The updated kitchen is a chef's dream, stocked with everything from stone dinnerware service for eight to a Ninja slow cooker, air fryer/countertop oven, blender, stand mixer and full spice rack. High-end laundry machines are one step away from the kitchen.

Step outside and discover your own private oasis in the incredible fenced-in backyard, complete with a pristine saltwater pool and 7'x7' spa, built in 2023. Swimmers will love the 37-foot swim lane, while the screened lanai offers a cozy spot to relax in the shade. In the evenings, enjoy dinner on the huge patio, surrounded by lush native plants and landscape lighting. Your backyard relaxation is made effortless with provided essentials such as towels, chairs, coolers, a propane grill and an umbrella-shaded dining table ‚Äì all you need to bring is your swimsuit and lots of sunscreen!

Additionally, the house includes board games for rainy days and baby gear including a Pack 'n Play, high chair and toddler dishes. For the pups, we provide supplies like food & water bowls, poop bags, toys, a comfy bed and a crate suitable for dogs up to 50 lbs. Cleaning supplies and a vacuum are provided. Your furry friends will feel right at home too, thanks to convenient dog doors leading to the lanai and backyard.

Plus, with IMG Academy, the world-famous beaches of Anna Maria Island and easy access to both Bradenton-Sarasota (SRQ) and Tampa International (TPA) airports, you'll have everything you need right at your fingertips. The house is located conveniently between Manatee Avenue and Cortez Road, the two main shopping and dining destinations in West Bradenton (and the two roads that lead to Anna Maria Island).

Experience the best of Bradenton vacation life in this fully equipped home. Your relaxation station awaits!

PET INFORMATION
A pet fee of $165 applies to all reservations with a dog. This fee is added to your reservation cost at the time of booking and, depending on which booking site you use, may or may not show as a separate line item on your bill. The fee covers up to two dogs, up to 50 pounds each. Any additional dogs or dogs larger than 50 pounds must be cleared with the owner prior to reserving the property. Sorry, no cats, birds, reptiles, or rodents allowed.

POOL INFORMATION:

**If you want the pool heated or chilled for your visit, please read the following information and inform me in advance if you wish to heat the pool during your visit, as it takes anywhere from 12-24 hours for the water to reach the desired temperature, ensuring you can enjoy it throughout your stay.**

>The pool heating fee is $30 per night of your stay, or $150 per full week. Additional discounts are available for stays of one month or longer. Spa heating is included with the pool heating fee. For guests who do not wish to heat the pool but do wish to use the spa, it can be heated separately for $15 per night of your stay or $80 per full week from October 1st through May 31st. There is no charge to heat the spa from June 1st through September 30th.

> During the spring and summer months, the pool will remain naturally above 80 degrees (and often above 90). While this temperature suits many guests, for those seeking a temperature that's more conducive to extended play time and swimming laps, you have the option to chill the pool to a refreshing 79 degrees for the same $30 per night/$150 per week.

> External factors such as weather may affect pool heater and chiller efficiency, and refunds cannot be provided for circumstances beyond my control. The pool heater will not work when air temperatures drop below 50 degrees, so rather than run the heater with no effect, it will turn off until the ambient temperature rises enough to allow it to work.

> While the pool undergoes weekly professional maintenance, I do not offer round-the-clock service as you might find at a resort. You may need to use the provided net to remove any debris before using the pool. The pool service typically visits on Friday mornings, though their schedule is subject to external factors such as weather.

> Guests staying longer than three days may need to add water to the pool to offset evaporation, which removes several hundred gallons per week during the summer. I provide a convenient hose connected to a timer to simplify the process, so all you'll need to do is put the end of the hose in the water and set the timer to start filling.

> The door and windows leading out to the pool are equipped with individual alarms that can be activated in the event that young children are in your party. You are responsible for activating and monitoring these alarms during your stay; they will not be active when you arrive.

Guest access
Guests have access to the entire property other than a locked owner's pantry and linen closet in the house and a gated and locked outdoor utility/storage area next to the garage. Guests are not permitted to touch the Hayward Omnilogic pool control panel under any circumstances. Access to the house is controlled by a Schlage Encode keypad on the front door. You will receive a unique four-digit code for the keypad prior to check-in.
title: Relax & Play! Salt Pool | 5 Min to IMG, 10 to AMI!
