TITLE: Families love the pool & fishing in the creek!
Listing Name: Families love the pool & fishing in the creek!
name: Families love the pool & fishing in the creek!
description:
Welcome to this stunning 5 bed, 3 bath home! With an open floor plan, it exudes beauty, elegance, and style. Enjoy the heated pool and vacation amenities for ultimate relaxation. Serene waterfront location with access to Wares Creek for fishing, hammocking, and kayaking. Situated in a peaceful neighborhood, this residence offers convenience and tranquility. Perfectly positioned midpoint to Anna Maria Island and Bradenton Beach. Pickleball enthusiasts bring your paddles! Courts are half block

The space
Discover the ultimate family vacation destination! This extraordinary vacation home is perfect for families, offering 2,300 square-feet of luxurious open living space. Step into your backyard oasis featuring a heated pool, outdoor dining/lounging areas, and waterfront hammocks. Immerse yourself in the enchanting world of waterfowl right in your own backyard! Please note that the pool is not covered by a cage, so leaves and debris may find their way into the pool on windy days. No worries, though ‚Äì pool skimmers are provided for your convenience.

Situated in a family-friendly neighborhood, this property is ideal for unforgettable family vacations. Plus, it's conveniently located within 4 miles of the nearest beach, providing easy access to Anna Maria Island and Bradenton Beach. Enjoy the option to heat the pool for an additional fee ($150) and indulge in the latest entertainment with Smart TVs and super-fast WiFi. Relax and soak up the beautiful Florida weather on the abundance of lounge chairs and seating surrounding the pool.

The house comfortably accommodates up to 12 guests in beds, with additional kid-friendly bedding options available. Rest peacefully in the well-appointed bedrooms, featuring king and queen beds, as well as full over full bunks and two fold-out chair mattresses. For added convenience, a pack n' play, stroller, highchair, and kids dinnerware are provided. All linens and towels, including beach towels, are included. THE FIFTH BEDROOM IS BEING CONSTRUCTED IN JANUARY, AND WILL BE AVAILABLE STARTING FEB 1, 2025.

The beautiful kitchen, fully equipped with stainless steel appliances and granite counters, opens up to the rest of the living space. Because let's face it, everyone always ends up in the kitchen! Enjoy ample place settings and kid-friendly dinnerware, along with pots and pans, cooking utensils, a toaster, blender, Instapot, air fryer, and coffee maker (complimentary coffee, filters, and creamer included!).

A gas grill with a propane tank is provided for delightful outdoor cooking experiences. Please note that the tank will not be refilled, so feel free to exchange it at a local gas station or Home Depot for approximately $20. Dine casually at the kitchen counter with 5 stools or gather around the dining room table that comfortably seats 6.

Poolside, relax on the outdoor sectional sofa or enjoy meals at the outdoor dining area, accommodating 6 guests. Pool settings are all scheduled for your convenience. When purchased, the pool heat is set to 85 degrees. However, please be aware that pool temperatures may be affected if air temperatures drop below 70 degrees, and therefore cannot be guaranteed.

Entertainment is never in short supply with a selection of cards, board games, foosball, ping pong and pool toys. Central air conditioning ensures utmost comfort, while a washer and dryer are provided for your convenience.

Prepare to be amazed by the extensive range of amenities included for your pleasure. Toilet paper, paper towels, dish soap, dishwasher detergent, salt, pepper, laundry detergent, dryer sheets, shampoo, conditioner, body wash, and hand soap are all provided! Make the most of your beach excursions with the provided beach equipment, including sand chairs, a large beach mat, cooler bag, sand toys, boogie boards, beach cart, and umbrella. Fishing enthusiasts will appreciate the two fishing rods and basic tackle box provided for fishing the sandy beaches or even the backyard!

Pickleball enthusiasts, bring your paddles! There are courts within walking distance. A half block from the house!!

Indulge in an unforgettable family vacation experience at this exceptional vacation home

Guest access
Entire house.

Other things to note
We offer self check in, which means we do not meet you on site to provide keys. Check in instructions are sent to guests 24 hours prior to check in. Every guest is provided with a unique door code that allows them access to the home during their stay.

Please let us know if you will be requiring pool heat for $120 per stay AND/OR if you will have a pet (dog) joining your group.

TITLE: Quiet with easy access Anna Maria Island beaches
Listing Name: Quiet with easy access Anna Maria Island beaches
name: Quiet with easy access Anna Maria Island beaches
description:
Discover the hidden gem of our peaceful street. Within 5-10 minutes from some of the most beautiful beaches in Anna Maria Island and nestled away from traffic and noise, our home provides a serene retreat where you can truly unwind and enjoy uninterrupted tranquility. Experience the blissful seclusion of our charming location, along with Gigabit WIFI, offering privacy and a safe haven for relaxation. Escape the hustle and bustle and embrace the peaceful ambiance of our inviting neighborhood.

The space
Beautifully Renovated 4-Bedroom Home Near the Beach with Large Fenced Backyard. Beautiful Anna Maria Island beaches are only 10 minutes away for vacation seekers. Bradenton IMG Academy is a 7-8 minute drive, ideal for those with loved ones attending from out of town.

Description:
Welcome to our newly renovated 4-bedroom home, less than 5 miles from the pristine beaches. Nestled on a peaceful dead-end road, this charming property offers a perfect retreat for families and friends seeking a relaxing beach getaway. The spacious interior, modern amenities, and large fenced backyard make it an ideal choice for unforgettable vacations. Modern Stay with Blazing Fast Gigabit Wi-Fi ‚Äì Perfect for Remote Work & Streaming

Features:
1. **Location**: Our home is conveniently situated within a short distance (less than 5 miles) from the sun-kissed beaches, allowing you to quickly soak up the coastal charm and enjoy fun-filled days by the water.

2. **Renovated Interior**: Step inside and be greeted by a stylishly renovated interior that combines contemporary comfort with coastal vibes. The open-concept living area is beautifully decorated, providing a welcoming space for relaxation and quality time with loved ones.

3. **Four Cozy Bedrooms**: The home features four thoughtfully designed bedrooms, each providing a peaceful retreat after a day of beach adventures. Comfortable beds, fresh linens, and ample storage ensure a restful stay for everyone.

4. **Modern Amenities**: We've equipped our home with modern amenities to enhance your experience. Enjoy high-speed Wi-Fi, a large flat-screen TV, and stay comfortable with air conditioning throughout the house.

5. **Spacious Backyard**: The highlight of our property is the generous fenced backyard, perfect for outdoor activities and leisurely evenings. Let the kids play freely while you unwind on the patio, BBQ, or bask in the sun.

6. **Well-Equipped Kitchen**: Prepare delicious meals in the fully equipped kitchen, complete with modern appliances, ample counter space, and cookware. A dining area adjacent to the kitchen offers a cozy spot to savor your culinary creations.

7. **Convenience**: The home is located in a quiet neighborhood, providing a peaceful atmosphere away from the hustle and bustle. However, you'll find restaurants, shops, and entertainment options within a short drive, ensuring convenience during your stay.

8. **Parking**: Ample parking space is available, making it convenient for guests with multiple vehicles.

9. Modern Samsung Washer and Dryer on site.

10. Gigabit Wi-Fi Internet Access

11. Beach chairs, umbrellas, coolers, and other amenities are available.

12. Electric stand-up desk with wireless charging for remote workers.

Come and experience the coastal charm of our newly renovated 4-bedroom (two Kings, one Queen, two Twin Bed) home. Book your stay today and create lasting memories in this idyllic beachside getaway!

We can't wait to welcome you to our beautiful 4-bedroom home near the beach. Book your stay now and take advantage of these extra amenities for an unforgettable vacation.

Guest access
The home can be accessed with smart locks. You don't need any physical keys. Same for the garage door. We do provide one remote garage opener at this time.

Other things to note
Getting to know the area:

Our home is conveniently located 10 minutes drive from local favorite beaches in Bradenton and Anna Maria Island, such as:

- Holmes Beach on Anna Maria Island
- Bradenton Beach
- Cortez Beach
- Coquina Beach (our favorite)
- Bean Point
- Bradenton IMG Academy
- Robinson Preserve
- Beer Can Island

Adding another 25 minutes of driving to Sarasota, you will arrive at Long Boat Beach, Lido Key, and Siesta Key Beach.

Local boat rental and tour guides provide ample "Salt Life" activities such as a trip to local favorite sand bars (Passage Key, Jewfish, Eggmont et.), deep sea fishing, parasailing, dolphin tours, and snorkeling.

The closest airport (15 minutes drive) is SRQ Sarasota Bradenton International Airport. The next two airports to the north are St. Pete-Clearwater International Airport (PIE - 40 minutes drive) and Tampa International Airport (TPA - 50 minutes to 1 hour depending on traffic)

Welcome to your perfect vacation retreat! This spacious 4-bedroom, 2-bathroom pool home is designed for relaxation and fun, offering everything you need for a fabulous getaway that will make you want to visit time and time again!

Step outside to your private oasis, where you can unwind by the sparkling pool and enjoy breathtaking sunsets over the serene lake. The outdoor space is perfect for lounging, dining, or simply soaking in the tranquil surroundings.

Each of the four bedrooms is thoughtfully designed for comfort, ensuring everyone has their own space to recharge.

TITLE: Sarasota Sea Breeze House/Perfect Vacation Getaway
Listing Name: Sarasota Sea Breeze House/Perfect Vacation Getaway
name: Sarasota Sea Breeze House/Perfect Vacation Getaway
description:
A charming 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom house with a lovely deck and pool for outdoor relaxation, this is the perfect spot for your Sarasota vacation.
Half of block away from Sara Bay Marina, Tarpon Bay Grill and Tiki bar, and direct kayak rentals for adventures on the beautiful Sarasota Bay, just steps from the house.
A short drive to Lido Beach, Siesta Key, and Anna Maria Island.
Make the Sarasota Sea Breeze House your base for a memorable Sarasota experience.
We look forward to welcoming you!

The space
Our beautiful house, is the perfect destination for your vacation near the shore! This spacious property offers a variety of amenities to ensure you have a fantastic and relaxing stay. Here's a general description of the property and its rooms:

Exterior Features:

Pool Deck: Step outside and you'll find a spacious pool deck where you can soak up the sun, take a refreshing swim in the pool, and enjoy stunning breeze from the sea. The pool deck is furnished with comfortable lounge chairs, so you can relax by the poolside and work on your tan.

Grill: For those who love outdoor cooking, we provide a grill for barbecue sessions with your family and friends. It's perfect for whipping up delicious meals while enjoying the beautiful sunny days.

Outside Shower: After a day at the beach, rinse off the sand and saltwater in our convenient outside shower. It's a great way to stay fresh and clean.

Seating Areas: You'll find various seating areas outside, ideal for unwinding, reading a book, or simply enjoying the tranquility of the ocean.

Playground: Families with children will appreciate our backyard playground, where kids can have endless fun.

Pool and Beach Towels: No need to bring your own towels; we provide pool and beach towels for your convenience.

Pool Toys: Make a splash in the pool with an array of pool toys available for guests of all ages. Water fun is guaranteed!

Interior Features:

Bedrooms: Inside, the property boasts comfortable and well-appointed bedrooms, ensuring a good night's sleep. Each room is designed with your relaxation in mind.

Living Spaces: Our spacious living areas are perfect for unwinding and spending quality time with your group. Enjoy the views from large windows and cozy up in the evenings.

Kitchen: The fully equipped kitchen has everything you need to prepare meals. It features modern appliances and ample counter space.

Dining Area: The dining area is perfect for family meals or gatherings. It offers a lovely view of the outside area.

In summary, our beach house is designed to offer you a wonderful vacation experience, combining the best of indoor comfort with outdoor relaxation and fun. Whether you're lounging by the pool, grilling, playing at the beach, or enjoying the playground with your children, you'll find everything you need for a memorable beachside getaway.

TITLE: The Tranquila House in Bradenton
Listing Name: The Tranquila House in Bradenton
Quality Rating Reason: Total Months is below Possibly Good Data threshold: 1 (threshold: 7); Missing Months is Good Data: 11; Avg Reviews Per Month is Good Data: 2.0; High Season Reviews is below Possibly Good Data threshold: 1 (threshold: 4)
name: The Tranquila House in Bradenton
description:
You'd be hard-pressed to find another vacation rental property that lives up to its name as this beautiful three-bedroom, two-bath pool home does! Tranquila is the Spanish word for peaceful, and that's exactly what you'll feel here.

Located in the lovely, quiet neighborhood of Village Green in West Bradenton, Tranquila rests on a large lot with loads of privacy. Your family will love the split floor plan, with the primary bedroom on one side of the house, and two other bedrooms (one with ...

The space
...a king bed and the other with two twins) on the other side. Both king bedrooms feature a smart TV, but family movie time can be enjoyed together in the living room. There's also a family room with seating for conversation or reading, and a game table ready for family competitions.

The kitchen is packed with everything you need to prepare delicious meals, from a crock pot to a hand mixer and most things in between. Serve your meals in the dining room, or pop outside to dine al fresco at the poolside dining table.

Speaking of outside, that's probably where you and your family will spend much of your time. The large, heated pool and patio area are great for enjoying your guest with chaises for sunning and a gas grill for barbequing. Feeling especially energetic? Bring your own equipment and set up a game of volleyball or badminton in the extra-large backyard.

This area is a great place for bike riding, both around Village Green and a little further afield to places like Manatee County's GT Bray Park, where you can find things like disc golf, orienteering, and other cool outdoor activities. For more information, check out the Manatee County website at

Shopping and restaurants are just a quick trip in any direction, and, of course, the beaches of Anna Maria Island are just a few minutes away! Find a good parking place, and then travel up and down the island on the free Anna Maria Island Trolley, which runs from Coquina Beach at the south to the Historic Anna Maria City Pier at the north from 6 in the morning until 10 at night.

Just 20 minutes from the Sarasota/Bradenton Airport, and only 10 minutes, from the world-famous IMG Academy, this beautiful home sleeps 6 people in two king beds and two twin beds.

PET OWNERS: This property is dog friendly for one dog with a maximum weight of 25 pounds and a non-refundable pet fee of $150 for the first week. There is a $50 fee per week for each additional week booked. Also, certain breeds are excluded. It is necessary that you check with our office prior to your trip for details on weight and breed limitations.

A NOTE ABOUT POOL HEAT: Pool heat is optional. If you would like the pool heated during your stay it will be an additional $150 per week. We recommend pool heat at this property, regardless of the time of year.

Our Cancellation Policy: In order to protect our owners from loss of income, ALL MONIES PAID TOWARDS YOUR RESERVATION MAY BE NON-REFUNDABLE AFTER A CERTAIN DATE! FULL AND PARTIAL REFUNDS MAY BE GIVEN UNDER CERTAIN CONDITIONS. Ask our office for details, or check your rental agreement.

TITLE: FALL IN LOVE! Modern pool home mins from the beach
Listing Name: FALL IN LOVE! Modern pool home mins from the beach
name: FALL IN LOVE! Modern pool home mins from the beach
description:
Bright and colorful mid-century modern pool home mins away from Anna Maria's white sand beaches but miles away from the traffic and crowds! Tons of room to relax both inside and out with world class beaches, golf, fishing, boating (bring your boat-Gulf access is 5 mins away!) nature preserves, IMG, swimming, Spring Training, pickleball, dolphin & manatee watching right there. But this property is so relaxing you may not want to go anywhere else! Pet friendly with a fenced-in backyard, too!

The space
Not your average rental property, this colorful mid-century modern home (circa 1959) is designed to be the ideal vacation destination. Clean and uncluttered, we kept the mid-century details like original wood floors, beamed ceiling and colorful vintage tile in the bathrooms, and updated the kitchen and living spaces to make this a relaxing family tropical getaway for you and your pet!

In the three bedrooms, you'll find comfortable mattresses, 100% cotton bed linens and blackout window shades for a good night's sleep.

One bedroom has a king-sized bed, attached bathroom with colorful vintage tile, TV, and a double closet.

The queen and twin bedrooms both have spacious closets and comfortable beds. The shared bathroom has a combination tub/shower and is still tiled in the wonderful original colorful vintage tile from the 1950s!

Working remotely? No problem! There's high speed internet throughout the house and we also provide a desk and desk chair upon request. Work a few hours then jump in the pool at the end of your work day!

The well-stocked kitchen has everything a cook could want including quality pots and pans, microwave oven, electric kettle, coffee maker, toaster oven, blender, dishware, serving bowls, and cooking basics like olive oil and spices.
There's also an outdoor gas grill for barbecuing.

The property has a washer and dryer for guests' use in the attached garage.

The heated pool (*heating is optional and a fee applies) is just outside the comfortable screened-in porch. Enjoy a drink, play games, or just hang out on the porch with your private pool only steps away.

Outside on the patio surrounding the private pool, guests can sunbathe on chaise lounges or jump in the water and spend the afternoon relaxing on floats in the Florida sunshine.
(* Out of consideration for neighbors, we ask guests to enjoy themselves INSIDE or in the screened-in porch after 11 pm. Please no splashing in the pool, music or loud conversation outside by the pool after 11 pm *)

Next to the pool there's a lawn you can use for a game of catch, corn hole, or even have a picnic.

Pets are allowed and the backyard is entirely fenced in. We also provide guests with a list of pet-friendly places in the area.

If you like boating, there's a public boat and fishing dock five minutes away with immediate access to the Gulf. And if you're bringing your boat, trailer or RV, there's plenty of room to park in the driveway.

We've tried to think of everything big and small to make this the perfect tropical destination but if there's anything else you need just ask!

NOTE: We highly recommend guests purchase travel insurance so they‚Äôre covered in case they have to cancel outside the refund window.

Guest access
Guests will have full and private access to the entire house, pool and property.

Other things to note
If you would like the pool heated during your visit, please let us know at least 24 hours before check in. Please note: pool heating needs to be on - or off - for the entire stay. A daily pool heating fee will apply.

Only 6 guests total to spend the night please.

In addition, no smoking or candles anywhere on the property.

Pets permitted and an additional pet fee will apply.
While this a perfect spot to connect with family and friends, this is not the property for large or late parties.
*Out of consideration for the neighbors, we ask guests to enjoy themselves INSIDE or in the screened-in porch after 11 p.m. So please no splashing in the pool, music or loud conversation outside by the pool after 11 p.m *

We highly recommend guests buy travel insurance so they‚Äôre covered in case they have to cancel outside the refund policy window.

You‚Äôve found your tropical paradise! Villa Piccolo is located 3 miles from Anna Maria Island and walking distance to Palma Sola Bay. Discover treasures including seashells, starfish, sand dollars, sharks teeth, manatees, dolphins, & beautiful sunsets! Many island restaurants, fishing, boating, parasailing, horseback riding in the bay, kayaking, & corn hole! Sip on a pi√±a colada in our backyard oasis while enjoying the swimming pool. The space
Villa Piccolo is a newly renovated one-story home located just across the bridge from Anna Maria Island off of Manatee Ave, near Palma Sola Bay. If you want to be in a more quiet neighborhood with less noise and traffic, this is the place to be. Only a 9 to 15 minute drive to all Manatee County Beaches (Anna Maria Island, Bradenton Beach, Holmes Beach, Coquina Beach) and about a half an hour from Sarasota County beaches and shopping. IMG Academy is just 12 minutes south. When you walk through the front door, you will notice the coastal wood planks throughout and the natural light that illuminates the space. The spacious gourmet kitchen is truly a dream! The kitchen is fully stocked with a Keurig, crockpot, blender, pots/pans, and toaster oven. The kitchen table seats 6-8 with additional 3 seats at the kitchen island. The bathrooms have been remodeled and everything is BRAND NEW! This 3 bedroom, 2 bath, open floor plan concept, with brand new furniture and comfortable beds, makes for a wonderful home away from home. Also provided are bed/bath linens, beach gear (wagon, umbrella, chairs, towels, cooler), Smart TV, free 400m Wifi, corn hole, and games for family entertainment. You will enjoy spending time by the pool with outdoor seating and the private, oversized, and fenced lot, perfect for little ones. The space
Heated pool!

Welcome to your dream vacation rental just an 8 miles away from the picturesque Anna Maria Island! This stunning 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom house is the perfect retreat for your family or group, comfortably accommodating up to 8 people. With private pool and a convenient location, your stay here promises to be a truly unforgettable experience.

As you step inside, you'll be greeted by a spacious and beautifully designed interior. The living area is elegantly furnished, offering a cozy and inviting atmosphere for relaxation. Sink into the plush sofas and catch up on your favorite shows on the large flat-screen TV, or simply unwind and enjoy the company of your loved ones.

The fully equipped kitchen features modern appliances and all the utensils and cookware you'll need to prepare delicious meals. Alternatively, head outdoors to the patio and savor your meals al fresco, surrounded by the lush tropical landscaping. Smart TVs in every room for your enjoyment.

When it's time to rest, the three bedrooms offer tranquil retreats for a good night's sleep. The master bedroom boasts a comfortable king-size bed and an en-suite bathroom for added privacy. The second bedroom is equally inviting, furnished with a queen-size bed and providing a peaceful ambiance. The third bedroom has a twin over full bunk bed and a single bed for the kids to enjoy!

One of the highlights of this rental is the private pool area. Spend your days swimming in the turquoise waters, building sandcastles, or strolling along the shoreline. description:
Relax in this charming 3-bedroom, 2-bath home in Bayshore Gardens, Bradenton! Just a short walk to the park and marina, this retreat features a new hot tub, stylish pagoda, fire pit, and BBQ grill for ultimate outdoor enjoyment. Inside, enjoy cozy living spaces, a fully equipped kitchen, and all the comforts of home. Close to Anna Maria Island, dining, and nature spots, it‚Äôs perfect for families or friends. Pet-friendly with approval. Book now for the ultimate Gulf Coast getaway!

The space
Welcome to your stylish retreat in sunny Bradenton, Florida!

This fully remodeled mid-century home blends timeless charm with modern flair, offering a bright, open space that‚Äôs perfect for relaxing, entertaining, or working remotely.

The main living area is filled with beautiful Florida sunshine and features an open-concept layout that connects the kitchen and living room, great for spending quality time with family and friends. Just off the kitchen, step into the game room or out to the private back patio, where you can enjoy the breeze and unwind in the hot tub.

Down the hall, you‚Äôll find three cozy bedrooms and two updated bathrooms. Two bedrooms feature queen-sized beds and closet space, while the primary suite includes its own ensuite bathroom and walk-in shower. The guest bathroom also offers double sinks and a spacious walk-in shower.

The home is fully furnished with everything you need for a relaxing stay‚Äîstocked kitchen (refrigerator, microwave, range), washer/dryer, fresh linens, and thoughtful touches throughout. Outside, the private patio is the perfect spot for your morning coffee or a glass of wine under the stars.

Conveniently located just minutes from the beautiful beaches of Anna Maria Island, and a short drive to downtown Bradenton, Riverwalk, local shops, restaurants, and the vibrant arts and culture scene. Whether you're looking to relax by the coast, explore nature parks, or catch a sunset on the Gulf, this is the perfect home base.

„ÄãPlease remember you're staying in a house, not a hotel. Please treat the space with respect. If any problems arise, we will do our best to take action ASAP, but there is no one living on site 24/7.

„ÄãBradenton has a noise ordinance policy in place, and they are enforced by local law enforcement and code enforcement officers. TITLE: 4.6  miles to beach and 16 foot heated swim spa!
Listing Name: 4.6 miles to beach and 16 foot heated swim spa!
name: 4.6 miles to beach and 16 foot heated swim spa!
description:
Enjoy close proximity to Anna Maria Island! The bay with beach, nature preserve, restaurants, & shopping 1 mile away! Home is in a quiet, safe, neighborhood! You will have everything you need in a well-equipped kitchen with new appliances! Stream your favorite apps on smart tv‚Äôs. Relax or exercise in the 16 foot heated river pool swim spa. Beach chairs, umbrella, towels, toys, are provided for the beach. Parking available inside garage. This house was updated in 2023 with a large family space.

The space
You can enter through the garage or at the top of the stairs. You will receive a code before check in. If you arrive at night, look for the yard with blue lights in the palms. There are solar lights and a bright motion detector light outside. You will enter the open living/ kitchen area. The kitchen is well equipped and has plenty of space to make your favorite meals. You can enjoy cool, filtered water from inside the refrigerator. Its located on the left side inside the door. There is a smart tv with your favorite apps to stream. There is a queen sleeper sofa. The linens are in the guest bedroom closet. There are 2 private bedrooms upstairs. The Master suite has a huge walk in rain shower and comfy king bed. There is a smart tv to stream your favorite apps. The other large bedroom has two twin beds and one standard bed. There is a shower with a tub in the hall. There are ceiling fans and portable fans in each bedroom. The spa can be heated to 103 degrees. Please lower temp back down when not in use. There is a holder for the cover making it easier to move it off and on. The spa is professionlly cleaned each Monday. You can park in the garage.

Guest access
You will have the entire upper level of the home. The bottom unit is not rented out. It is the owner‚Äôs personal unit.

Other things to note
It is important that anyone other than an adult should be supervised in the swim spa. It is 4 feet deep! It is safer not to be in the spa alone. Do not use the spa if you have any medical condition that would cause harm. Do not use the spa if you have consumed alcohol for your own safety.
Loosen the velcro straps before taking the cover off.
The cover is heavy and folds back in two parts. Fold back the back half first onto the 4 post holder. Then, fold back the other half. That way it stays off the ground and is easier to put the cover back on. The spa is professionally cleaned each Monday. Some leaves may fall in when the cover is taken off. There is a net in the garage if you would like to use it. You can adjust the temperature by holding down the temp button and moving it up or down. Then press it one more time and press the set button. The Aux button is for swimmimg resistance. It is a strong current for experienced swimmers. Please be careful getting in and out of the spa. Please use caution when going into the garage with wet feet. It gets slippery. There is a mat to dry feet on just inside the door. Please lower spa temperature to 88 degrees and cover it when you are finished using it. Please turn air conditioning up during the day when you are away. Please rinse off sandy beach equipment, shoes and feet. There is a hose in the back that you can use.

name: Casa Das Palmas in Bradenton
description:
**ASK ABOUT LAST MINUTE DEALS!
Experience Luxury at Casa Das Palmas ???. This exquisite 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom retreat sleeps 8 and offers the perfect blend of relaxation and recreation.

Located mere minutes from the stunning Gulf beaches of Anna Maria Island, this property boasts a private pool and beautifully landscaped yard. The open living area features comfortable seating and a large SMART TV, while the recently updated kitchen is equipped with granite countertops, a breakfast bar, ...

The space
...and a spacious dining area. A convenient laundry room with extra storage completes this ideal vacation haven.

Out the patio doors, you'll find a beautiful screened-in heated pool with plenty of room for everyone to relax, in or out of the water. A large dining table and gas grill make dining al fresco easier and more fun than eating out! String lights hang around the cage for magical evening hours enjoying the warm air and even the warm water after the sun goes down.

The patio area overlooks a charming waterway that lends to the ambiance. Although this waterway doesn't lead to open waters, it's a great spot for the kids to fish from the banks. You might also want to rent a paddle board and explore the waterway as it twists its way through the neighborhood; a shell ramp leading down to the water's edge would make it easy to launch.

Off the living area, you'll find the bedroom wing, with three bedrooms that can sleep 8. The primary bedroom has a king bed and en suite bath with a garden tub (currently there is no shower in this bathroom, but plans are underway to add one). The second bedroom has a queen bed and the third bedroom has bunk beds with a twin bed on top and a full-size mattress below. There's also a twin pull-out cushion that would make a comfortable sleeping spot for a small child. All three bedrooms have smart TVs so everyone can watch their own programs. The shared bathroom has a beautiful, tiled walk-in shower and vessel sink.

Another great feature of this vacation spot is the location. You are minutes from the beautiful beaches of Anna Maria Island where you can just plant your toes in the sand, or you can rent a boat, jet skis, kayaks, and paddleboards, or even go for a horseback ride in the waters of Palma Sola Bay! The Island abounds with wonderful places to eat and fun shopping. You can even park your car and just catch the free Anna Maria Trolley to explore anywhere on the Island.

Closer still is Robinson Preserve, one of Manatee County's loveliest parks, with walking and bike trails, kayaking opportunities, and even an observation tower from which you can see for miles out to the Manatee River, Tampa Bay, and Anna Maria Island to the Gulf of Mexico. The DeSoto National Memorial is also close at hand, a treasure from the National Park Service that anyone who loves history and the Florida landscape should be sure to enjoy.

Traveling with a larger group? Check out "Live Oak Lodge," a gorgeous four-bedroom home just three minutes down the street, or Tranquil Haven, just around the corner in the same neighborhood. Both of these pool homes can sleep up to 8 people.

AGAIN, PLEASE NOTE: While this is a waterfront home, the waterway is not accessible for boats, nor does it connect to open water. Casual fishing may be enjoyed from the bank.

ALSO, PLEASE NOTE that the garage is currently unavailable for guest use.

A NOTE ABOUT POOL HEAT: If you book online, your reservation will automatically populate with a pool heat charge for one week. If your reservation is for a longer period, someone on our staff will adjust the pool heat rate to reflect the longer stay. We recommend pool heat at this property, regardless of the time of year, as pools near shady trees stay cooler, even in the summer.

While we know you love your furry friends, this property is not pet friendly. Please make other arrangements for your pets.

Our Cancellation Policy: In order to protect our owners from loss of income, ALL MONIES PAID TOWARDS YOUR RESERVATION MAY BE NON-REFUNDABLE AFTER A CERTAIN DATE! FULL AND PARTIAL REFUNDS MAY BE GIVEN UNDER CERTAIN CONDITIONS. Ask our office for details, or check your rental agreement.

Welcome to the peaceful Gulf Trail Ranches community,located just 8miles from AnnaMariaIsland, with easy access to IMG and restaurants.This 2bed/2bath home offers a remodeled kitchen with stainless steel appliances, solid surface countertops, and a built-in breakfast bar.The spacious family room is equipped with a built-in bar for enjoying music,a vending machine stocked with drinks and snacks for your convenience, a fenced backyard with a gas grill and hot tub for a pleasant and relaxing stay.

The space
Relax and enjoy our beautiful beach house, we guarantee you a quiet and comfortable stay, this family house has the capacity to comfortably accommodate 6 people.

Our master bedroom features a king size bed, private bathroom with shower and large walk-in closet, the second bedroom features a queen size bed and closet, each with a 40 inch flat screen TV including cable TV and all Applications. The second bathroom has a tub/shower combination. We also have a queen size air mattress ideal for lounging.

The fully equipped modern kitchen with updated appliances has the necessary kitchen equipment for your stay:
‚ñ™Ô∏èMicrowave
‚ñ™Ô∏è2 Refrigerator (the other located in the garage)
‚ñ™Ô∏èCoffee maker (for hot/cold coffee)
‚ñ™Ô∏èTeapot
‚ñ™Ô∏èToaster
‚ñ™Ô∏èBaking trays
‚ñ™Ô∏èHand mixer
‚ñ™Ô∏èBasic kitchen items: pots, pans, cutting boards, spatulas and other utensils.
‚ñ™Ô∏èPlastic plates/bowls
‚ñ™Ô∏èDishwasher

Our beautiful home also has a vending machine for drinks and snacks. You can choose your favorite drink, cookie, or candy without leaving your comfortable stay. The best part is that all you need is a credit card, bills ($5, $10, and $20), or coins, and you're ready to enjoy.


We have for you a mini room decorated in beach style where you can enjoy television or a movie in the comfort of our sofa or if you prefer the large family room with a small dining room and our built-in bar, ideal for enjoying the music you like the most. Each of them has a 65-inch flat screen television and a sound system (home cinema) so you can spend truly pleasant moments.

Our vacation home has a renovated garage with an electric gate and space for one car, additionally you can park 2 vehicles outside the house, in the garage we have a washing machine and dryer as well as essential items for the beach: 4 chairs and 1 cart, 1 umbrella, 1 cooler and various games, ready to guarantee the fun of a day at the beach.

If you prefer to enjoy a good coffee with a pleasant view of our pasture at the back of the house, we have an ideal space with mosquito netting, comfortable chairs and a fan. You can also relax in our Jacuzzi/hydromassage machine or prepare a grill on our large expanse of land and enjoy the outdoors and share with family and friends. I assure you that you will have unforgettable moments.

In addition to providing you with all these comforts, our house has a security system supplied by the renowned company ADT, for us your safety and that of our property is a commitment, for this reason we have three cameras strategically located in the front area, right side area and left side, we also have an automated control panel that verifies each of the doors and windows, smart locks to avoid the use of keys with the simplicity of an access code created solely for that reservation, providing a pleasant security experience for our guests. It is necessary to mention that this system is designed not to disrupt your privacy within the property and the rear (patio). The house also has very sensitive smoke and CO2 detectors to provide you with an environment 100% free of toxic pollutants.


Our location is perfect, with several grocery and retail stores within walking distance: Walmart (.6 miles), Aldi (.9 miles), Publix (1.2 mile), HomeGoods and Marshalls (1 mile).
Plus, there are many delicious local and chain restaurants to take advantage of: Mc'donalds, Culver's, Applebee's all within 2 miles, it's an ideal vacation destination with many nearby attractions to keep everyone entertained.

Guest access
all spaces in the house can be used.

Other things to note
We do not allow smoking inside the house, please note we have smoke detectors, please use the back of the house for smoking.

We do not allow any type of pets.

Please note that we ONLY have cameras at the front of the house for everyone's safety

name: Sparkling Clean Pool Home near Gulf Beaches
description:
Our Vacation Home is in one of the premier neighborhoods of NW Bradenton. We are on a quiet Cul-De-Sac with no traffic. Just a short walk from the Manatee River, a couple of miles to the most beautiful beaches of the world.
Vacation will never be the same! Walk to Warner's Bayou at Manatee River and watch Sailboats and have a picnic. With Restaurants, shopping, even a National Park close by. Fully equipped home for family parties. Pool stuff, beach towels, chairs, umbrella. Gas Grill and more!!

The space
There are not many listings in this fabulous location. Northwest Bradenton is a wonderful location for being able to get to just about everything you want to do,and it's much better being able to get off the beach and enjoy all the amenities of the Florida Gulf Coast. Tastefully decorated and comfortable for the family. Spacious house is perfect for family get togethers. Big fenced yard and huge pool means you‚Äôll never want to leave!

Guest access
Our Vacation Home is all yours. The home has a large living /dining area, family room that can double as a bedroom in the evening. We have a bifold screen for privacy if used as a bedroom. The master bedroom has a King bed. Master bath has a walk in shower and access to the backyard pool area too. The guest bedroom is on the other end of the house. provides privacy. The lanai has a table and 6 chairs for dining and gathering, and a pass through window from the kitchen. We have a 2 car garage, laundry, fenced pool and big bedrooms and baths. Dining area has seating for 6 too.

TITLE: Bay Shore Bungalow
Listing Name: Bay Shore Bungalow
name: Bay Shore Bungalow
description:
Your family will be close to everything when you stay at our Bay Shore Bungalow. Whether you are coming to relax and enjoy the sun at Anna Marie Island, Bradenton Beach and Longboat Key or catching a game at IMG you will be close to it all. You will be away from the hustle and bustle but still close to everything you need. Come cool off in out family friendly home setup to create memories and enjoy your stay.

The space
Welcome to Bay Shore Bungalow. When you enter the home you will step into the living room. The large TV and sofa provides a great space to relax. Just beyond there is the kitchen where you will find everything you need to enjoy meals with your family. To the right of the living room are two bedrooms. The front room has two twin beds along with a closet. The back bedroom has a king size memory foam bed allowing you to get a great nights rest. There is also a full bath located on this side of the house.

To the left of the living room is the main bedroom with its own TV to watch while relaxing on a memory foam king size bed. This bedroom has its own bathroom with shower. Tucked into the closet is the stacked washer and dryer. Next to the bathroom is a door that leads out to a covered patio area for your you relax and enjoy the nights.

Back inside just beyond the kitchen is a dun room with a large dining table for the whole group to sit around and enjoy meals or play games. The sliding door leads outside to a covered patio (seperate from the main bedroom) where you can grill or sit back and enjoy the night while the family plays games in the yard.

We hope this home allows you to have a great time and create memories for you and your family.

Other things to note

TITLE: The Shellshack, 4 br/2ba, near AMI beaches
Listing Name: The Shellshack, 4 br/2ba, near AMI beaches
name: The Shellshack, 4 br/2ba, near AMI beaches
description:
The Shellshack is a budget friendly home that is located in the exclusive Northwest Bradenton. It features beautiful coastal decor and is a very spacious home. It is located near DeSoto National Park and Robinson's Preserve.

The space
Forget your worries and head for the beach. The Shellshack is a budget friendly home that is located in the exclusive Northwest Bradenton. It features beautiful coastal decor, a large living room, a Florida room and a screened back porch with a large backyard. This home is super clean. It is located near DeSoto National Park and Robinson's Preserve. The neighborhood is safe, quiet, and we offer self checkin. Anna Maria Island is a vacation destination and only 6 miles away from the Manatee Public Beach.


This home is comfortable and clean and plenty of room for each person to have their own space. The perfect home for large families to gather. The master bedroom shower is handicapped accessible. There is a large backyard for kids to play and there is a kenneled area (chain link fence) for a small breed dog. There is a large screened back porch that is perfect for visiting and telling stories at the end of a busy day.
There are 3 Roku TV's, but we do not have any streaming channels.
We are about 1mile from DeSoto Park, Robinson's Preserve, and the Botanical Gardens. Our neighborhood is very peaceful and quiet and our neighbors value this peace and quiet. Any loud music or noise after 10pm will likely be met with law enforcement. We do have one security camera at the front door that faces out to the driveway. We want to be as upfront as possible with you to make sure that this home is a good fit for you. Guests may bring a small under 20 lb dog.

******Please Read******
*****Florida and Air-conditioning*****
This can be a tricky situation. We want our guests to be cool and comfortable.
**For these warmer months, the air conditioning will reset to 77/78¬∞ by late morning.
**After 7pm or so, guests can adjust the thermostat to a cooler temperature. Our thermostat does not go below 75 degrees.


We just want to be honest and upfront so that guests can make an informed decision. We have smart thermostats in this house that will cool to 75 degrees.

Guest access
Guests have access to the entire home, meaning all of the bedrooms and bathrooms. This home has a large backyard and guests have access to that as well. We do keep guests out of the garage. We are local owners and live very close by. We maintain this property and keep our tools in the garage. This home has plenty of room to spread out. There are a total of 3 Roku tv's at the house. We do not have any streaming channels.

Other things to note
This home is nestled in the quiet, exclusive, Northwest Bradenton. It is safe to walk around the block and to DeSoto Park which is a half mile away. Robinson's Preserve is at the end of the road. The large back porch is a perfect place to gather with family, friends or just sit and read a book. No more than 3 cars can be parked in the driveway. No boats, trailers, or parking in the yard. The driveway has a 3 car maximum. camera is located on the front of the property for security reasons.

Any people other than the registered guest are the sole responsibility of the guest/renter. Parties and events are prohibited at this address.

PLEASE READ
**Summer is very hot here. With heat indexes of 100¬∞-110¬∞ we must make sure the AC's do not freeze up.

Air conditioning will reset to 78¬∞ by 10:30AM.
**After 6:30 pm guests can adjust the thermostat as low as 75¬∞F.

This home is privately owned. The homeowner is not responsible for any accidents, illness or injuries that occur while on this property. The homeowner is not responsible for the loss/theft of personal belongings or valuables of the guest. By accepting this reservation, it is assumed that the guest accepts all responsibility and holds the landlord/host not responsible.

TITLE: Riverside Cottage - 2bd/2.5bath Near Downtown
Listing Name: Riverside Cottage - 2bd/2.5bath Near Downtown
name: Riverside Cottage - 2bd/2.5bath Near Downtown
description:
Experience the best in modern living with this newly 2023 constructed 2-story, 2 bedrooms, 2.5 bath cottage, less than a mile from downtown Bradenton! Enjoy a full-size kitchen with top-notch appliances and the convenience of walking to nearby shops and restaurants. Your perfect blend of comfort and convenience awaits!

The space
Discover the ideal 2-story cottage featuring 2 bedrooms upstairs each accompanied with their own bathroom and there is a half bath on the main floor level. The kitchen is fully equipped boasting modern appliances, including a full-size fridge, electric stove, and dishwasher. There is a brand-new stackable washer and dryer in the home on the second level. Enjoy the convenience of free driveway parking with room for 2 vehicles. The ideal home designed for comfort and functionality awaits you!

Bradenton Beach is 11 miles away and Lido Key Beach is 16.3 miles away.

Guest access
Guests have access to the entire home, except a locked supply closet.

Please note: The homeowner has a car parked towards the back of the driveway that is under a cover. This does not affect parking space available for guests to use.

Other things to note
**Please note this home is located right down the street from the Manatee River
**Quiet time after 10pm
**No loud parties

We offer a complimentary starter kit of necessary amenities which is generally enough for shorter stays but after that is used up, it is the responsibility of the guest to provide the rest for themselves. Items included in the starter kit are toilet paper, small toiletries, paper towels, coffee, coffee filters, creamer, sugar, trash bags, a dish sponge, dish soap, and laundry soap.

If you need anything, please contact us through the Airbnb messaging system. This keeps an accurate record of our conversation and is easily accessible by an account representative in the event of an issue. We are available during the hours of 8am-10pm EST.

This home has weekly lawn maintenance so please be advised that someone will enter the property at times for these purposes.

TITLE: Coconut Cove near Anna Maria Island
Listing Name: Coconut Cove near Anna Maria Island
name: Coconut Cove near Anna Maria Island
description:
Beautiful house that is located in west Bradenton, FL just 10 minutes from gorgeous Anna Maria Island. AMI is known for having 7 miles of the most beautiful beaches in the country. Located in a nice end cul-de-sac location, close to grocery stores, shopping, and restaurants. Use our putting green, play cornhole or ping pong or take a short walk or bike ride and see the Manatees in the bay. Use our outdoor smoker or grill or our beach items including chairs, coolers, umbrellas and kid‚Äôs toys.

The space
There is a king-size bed in the master bedroom. There is a queen-size bed in the second bedroom. There are two roll-away beds that can be kept in the master bedroom or could be placed in the large living room. Comfortable living room with a sectional couch and 75 inch TV with Netflix, Hulu, and more! There is a kitchen table with 6 chairs but there is also seating just off the kitchen in the Florida room. There is also outdoor seating in the front of the house.

Guest access
You will have access to the entire house except the owner's section of the garage. You will have access to a separate and dedicated laundry room with a separate entrance on the north side of the home with washer and dryer and complimentary supplies to do your laundry.

Other things to note
We provide beach accessories such as towels, floaties, boogie boards, kids beach toys, chairs, etc... You will also have access to four beach bicycles with helmets to ride around the neighborhood or to the local shopping center. There are two major routes to Anna Maria island on Manatee Ave just to the north and Cortez Blvd to the south and we are close to both. Traffic can back up miles with beach goers by 9am, especially on the weekends. It‚Äôs a good idea to either start early or go later to avoid long waits in traffic.
Please note, that this house does back up to 75th Ave making it convenient to get places, but can be especially noisy during the day and early evening, especially at high traffic times. Please be aware that traffic can sometimes be heard within the house.

name: Spacious retreat - Near beaches - Cabana Breeze
description:
Welcome to your spacious 3-bedroom home, just minutes from Bradenton Beach on Anna Maria Island. Enjoy 1,500+ sq. ft. with a cozy living area, 50-inch TV, and a fully equipped kitchen. The master bedroom has a queen bed and private bath, while two guest rooms feature a queen and twin beds. Relax in the private fenced backyard with outdoor seating and a new pergola. Amenities include high-speed internet, a Florida room, second fridge, and washer/dryer in the garage.

The space
Welcome to your quiet and spacious 3-bedroom rental home minutes away from Bradenton beach on Anna Maria Island. and professionally managed by Gulf Coast Vacation Rentals. Anna Maria Island sits at the southern tip of Tampa Bay and the Gulf of Mexico and located north of Longboat Key. It is best known for it's seven mile strip of beautiful beaches, world class dining and old Florida charm. Bradenton Beach, one of the 3 cities, is known for its fishing piers, sugar-sand beaches and a charming strip of shops, restaurants and other family-owned businesses. This home is located 10 minutes away from Bradenton Beach, short distance to Holmes Beach and has endless things to do nearby. Convenient to restaurants, movies, shopping and the local beaches this home is perfect for those looking to enjoy all of Bradenton/ Sarasota has to offer. Not to mention a privately fenced in backyard for those looking for additional privacy.

Your home is spacious and open with over 1500 square feet. Your instantly greeted to the living area space equipped with plenty of seating, bright and open sliding doors, a brand new couch and adjoining day chair and a large 50 in flat screen TV. The ultimate display for those lazy days or simply for relaxing after long days spent at the beach. Included with your rental is cable to enjoy all your favorite shows. Off your living space is a nice dining area with seating for six. Not to worry, there is a bonus kitchen nook that offers additional seating next to a bright open window. Your kitchen space is perfectly balanced and offers plenty of room for those looking to prepare home cooked meals instead of opting for restaurant dining. This kitchen also includes all amenities you could need during your stay with a bonus Keurig machine for your use.

Head outside to paradise, and you will find the brand new pergola installed that offers plenty of seating for the perfect outdoor entertaining.

Your master bedroom is equipped with a queen size bed and flat screen TV. Also, attached to the master is your own master bathroom equipped with a walk-in shower. The first guest bedroom also showcases a queen size bed. The second guest bedroom has 2 twin size beds perfect for those traveling with kids or additional space for those visiting during your stay. The whole house has high-speed wireless internet and soft and comfortable towels and linens are available for your use. Another bonus is the bright calming Florida room this home has to offer. This room can be opened completely up as it is air conditioned. Your garage includes a second fridge for your use as well as a washer and dryer.

Furry friends welcome, max 2, and require a non-refundable pet fee to be paid directly to the management company.


Let Us Help You Plan Your Bradenton and Sarasota Vacation Let the team at Gulf Coast Vacation Rentals help you plan the perfect Florida vacation with Bradenton as your home base. You are surrounded by the best Florida offers, including Sarasota, the Gulf beaches and our beautiful Manatee River. During your vacation, be sure to include Bradenton Beach and the downtown Riverwalk next to the marina, as well as the Village Arts, and many restaurants and shopping opportunities.

**Disclaimer: Monthly rates are determined off of 27 nights. We do not provide free access to Netflix, Youtube TV, and other streaming platforms. Guest can use their own access**
